dhaad ɛ Yezu Klisto, dha ɛ Abalaam, dha ɛ Dhavid e:
Ye ɛ́ Abalaam ɛ nabya Izak, Izak ɛ nabya Zakɔɔb, Zakɔɔb kabya yɛ ɛ Yuda nɛ bɔn nyɛɛg.
Tin, Yuda ɛ nabya Pɛlɛɛz bɛ nɛ Zeedas. Din ɛ nyɛɛg'ɔɔ nabɛ ɛ́ Tamaad. Pɛlɛɛz kabya ɛ Eslɔm, Eslɔm kabya yɛ ɛ Alam.
Mɔn Alam kadi ɛ́ Aminadaab, Aminadaab nakabya yɛ ɛ Naasɔn. Naasɔn kabya ɛ Salman.
Salman naazɛbya Bhoaaz bɛ nɛ myɛl Layaab. Bhoaaz bɛ nɛ ngbɛ myɛl Luth nakabya ɛ Obɛɛd. Obɛɛd nakabya ɛ Yese,
Yese ɛ́ nabya mɛkoozi Dhavid. Mɛkoozi Dhavid naabya Salomɔŋ, nyɛ nabya Salomɔŋ ɛ bɛ nɛ mwaa Wyiili.
Salomɔŋ nabɛ ɛ́ sɛɛg ɛ Loboam, Loboam nakabya yɛ ɛ Abiya, Abiya kazɛbya yɛ ɛ Asaf.
Asaf nazɛbya ɛ́ Yozafat, Yozafat kabya yɛ ɛ́ Yolam, mɔn Yolam nabɛ ɛ́ Ozias.
Ozias nadi ɛ́ sɛɛg ɛ Yotam, Yotam kabya ɛ́ Akaaz, Akaaz eezɛbya Ezekias.
Ezekias kabya ɛ́ Manase. Manase kabya yɛ ɛ́ Amɔn, Amɔn nakabya yɛ ɛ́ Yosias.
Yosias kadi ɛ́ sɛɛg ɛ Yekonia nɛ bɔn nyɛɛg. Tin ɛ bɛ nazɛtɔ́ é ekwom pɛ kyee dik Bhabhilɔn.
Bhii bɔn Yisalaɛl natɔ́ é ekwom pɛ kyee dik Bhabhilɔn ɛ, Yekonya nakabya ɛ́ Salatyɛl, bhii tak Salatyɛl eezɛbya Zolobabɛl,
Zolobabɛl kabya yɛ ɛ́ Abyuud, Abiyuud nabɛ ɛ́ sɛɛg ɛ Elyakim, Eliyakim kadi ɛ́ sɛɛg ɛ Azɔɔd;
Azɔɔd eezɛbya Sadɔk, Sadɔk kabya ɛ́ Akim, mɔn Akim kadi ɛ́ Eliyuud.
Eliyuud kadi ɛ́ sɛɛg ɛ Eleazaad, Eleazaad kabya ɛ́ Matan. Matan eezɛbya Zakɔɔb,
Zakɔɔb kadi ɛ́ sɛɛg ɛ Zozɛf ngom ɛ Maali. Ye ɛ́ Maali tak ɛ nabya Yezu bot di edjóo Mɛsia ɔ.
Tinaak, kana kɔkɔ mɛbyel ɛ Abalaam, kɛyaka nɛ yɛ Dhavid, ye nabɛ ɛ́, ye naasa tyee ekɔkɔ e mɛbyel kam nɛ ená. Ye naabaasa tyee ekɔkɔ e mɛbyel kam nɛ ená kana ɛbyel ɛ Dhavid, kɛyaka nɛ membu mɛ bɔn Yisalaɛl natɔ́ é ekwom pɛ Bhabhilɔn ɛ. Kana membu mɛ bɔn Yisalaɛl natɔ́ é ekwom pɛ Bhabhilɔn ɛ kɛyaka nɛ ɛbyel ɛ Mɛsia, ye naasa tyee ekɔkɔ e mɛbyel kam nɛ ená.
Gwakeka ɛsuk ɛ ɛbyel ɛ Yezu Klisto. Maali nyɛɛg nabɛ ɛ́ ghɔɔd ɛ Zozɛf. Ɛsok nɛ bɛ nɛ di moma nɛ motom, ye nabɛ ɛ́, Maali eezɛbela ɛbum nɛ ghwyil ɛ Sisim na Dɛɛ.
Zozɛf, mwaaz'ɛ nabɛ ɛ́ mot epiki, nyɛ nabɛ ɛ́ ààkwyɛl ɛdhusal nyɛ é mis mɛ bot. Nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛke náá, emwaaz bɛ nɛ Maali si tɔ syaab.
Dáa nyɛ nadi esiiza deenek ɛ, dhiiti fofop ɛ Ghɛŋ ngɔt eezɛtuula nyɛ tɔ dhyam, nyɛ eezɛke nɛ nɛ náá: «Zozɛf, dha ɛ Dhavid, nàbem ba étɛp ɛba Maali, etɛɛ náá, ye ɛ́ nɛ ghwyil Sisim na Dɛɛ ɛ, nyɛ bela ɛbum.
Nyɛ waabya mɔn mɔɔ motom, bi aaget nyɛ ɛ Yezu, etɛɛ náá, nyɛy ɛ́ kwaatsik bot ɛ mbyak'ɛ tɔ mesyem mɔɔ.»
Esesɛɛ binek djas aasael ɛ, etɛɛ náá, etɛp djas Ghɛŋ nalɛɛ tɔ nuub ɛ ngoolel-mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb neebela ɛsuk. Ye nabɛ ɛ́ náá:
«Mɔn ɛsyes ɛ moma di ààgu botom ɔ waabela ɛbum. Bhii tak, nyɛ waabya mɔn mɔɔ motom, nyɛ aaget nyɛ ɛ́ Emanuɛl.» Ye kwyɛl ɛlɛɛ ɛ́: «Zɛɛb ɛ́ nɛ nena.»
Dáa Zozɛf kadjem é gɔ ɛ, nyɛ zokasa ɛ́ dáa fofop ɛ Ghɛŋ nalɛɛ nyɛ ɛ, nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛbeeb myɛl Maali.
Tin, nyɛ nabɛ ɛ́ ààsɛɛga goŋ bɛ nɛ myɛl kɛkum dwoo myɛl nabya mɔn motom, Zozɛf naget Yezu ɛ.
Yezu nabyel ɛ́ pɛ dɛl ɛ Bheteleɛm pɛ kyee dik Yude é ghɛŋ Elood nadi mɛkoozi ɛ. É ghɛŋ tak, ye nabɛ ɛ́, bɛtsoŋ ɛ bot naadus pɛ kyee ɛdjem ɛ dwoo, kum pɛ Yeluzalɛm.
Tin, bɛ moo zɛdji náá: «Mɛkoozi mɛ eYuda, mɔn di náá, nyɛ ààloo nɛ ɛbyel ɔ, nyɛ ɛ́ wo? Bis eebee kwyikwyen yɛ edus pɛ ɛdjem ɛ dwoo, bis ɛ́ bookazyɛ zɛduwal nyɛ.»
Dáa mɛkoozi Elood nagwak deenek ɛ, ye nabɛ ɛ́, ye naakpaa nyɛ lyem ɛbuɛpe dɔɔ nɛ bot ɛdi kɔ ghaada Yeluzalɛm ɔ.
Wɔ gwaa nyɛ zɛdjóo bot ɛ nadi kɔ elo eboo bɛghaa-Zɛɛb ɔ djas, nɛ bɛghaŋ ɛ mɛkana mɛ etsi djas, nyɛ needji bɛ di Mɛsia di esiŋa nɛ ɛbyel ɔ.
Bɛ eezɛbɔɔza nɛ nɛ náá: «Pɛ Bheteleɛm, pɛ kyee dik Yude etɛɛ náá, ngoolel-mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb nakwyal ɛ náá:
“Wɔy Bheteleɛm, kyee dik Yude Nɛ tsɛɛtsɛ wɔ tok nɛ ghwyil ɛbyaselaa pɛ kɔ mɛl mɛ di kɔ kyee dik Yude ɛ, etɛɛ náá, kɔ lɔ'ɛ aapaawyis boo kukuma mot aadjɛɛd mbyak'am Yisalaɛl ɔ.”»
Deenek, wɔ gwaa, mɛkoozi Elood zɛdjóo bɛtsoŋ ɛ bot binɔk tɔ syaab. Tin, bɛ eezɛlɛɛ nyɛ sum di nɛ ɛwala ɛ kwyikwyen tak nanyen tɔ gwoo ɛ.
Bhii tak, nyɛ eezɛlwom bɛ pɛ Bheteleɛm. Nyɛy nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Tɔ́ka kɛsaa, da bi ɛ́ gu etɛp djas dum nɛ mɔn tak, dɔɔ nɛ zeza nɛ di nyɛ di ɔ. Bi ɛ́ bela ɔɔ, da bi ɛ́ lɛɛ mɛ, etɛɛ náá, mam pe neezyɛ, zɛduwal nyɛ.»
Bhii bɛ nazegwak dáa mɛkoozi nalii nɛ nɔɔ ɛ, bɛ eezɛnɔɔ mɛnyel dhaa yɔɔ. Tin, kwyikwyen bɛ nadi ebee pɛ ɛdjem ɛ dwoo ɛ, moo kɛ pɛ sok bhwoob'ɔɔ pɛ ɛko, é sok bɛ nakum zeza nɛ di mɔn tak nadi ɛ́, Wɔ gwaa kwyikwyen zɛtyaa piki, é di wat, ààkabaakɛ.
Dáa bɛ nabee kwyikwyen ɛ, bɛ nabɛ ɛ́, bɛ naamyaala ɛbuɛpe.
Bhii tak, bɛ eezɛni tɔ ndjaa, zɛbela mɔn bɛ nɛ nyɛɛg Maali tin. Wɔ gwaa, bɛ zɛkwyit mɛboŋ si étɛp ɛduwal mɔn. Bhii tak, bɛ eezɛkɛɛ mɛkɔm mɔɔ. Bɛ eezɛpɛk nyɛ nɛ elɔɔd, nɛ bɛmɛnanas di edikaa tɔ du ɛ, zɛnɔɔ mul mɛ di djóoaa miid ɛ.
Bhii tak, wɔ gwaa Zɛɛb zɛlu bɛ tɔ dhyam náá, bɛ nàdhaa pɛ daa Elood. Tin, é ɛsik ɛ lɔɔ pɛ dɛl ɛ lɔɔ, bɛ nakadhaŋ ɛ́, pɛ ze sis.
Bhis bɛtsoŋ ɛ bot binɔk natɔ́ ɛ, fofop ɛ Ghɛŋ ngɔt eezɛtuula Zozɛf tɔ dhyam. Nyɛy nɛ nɛ náá: «Wyɛla. Nɔŋa mwalɔ nɛ mɔn, da bi ɛ́ kaab, tɔ́, kɛsɔwa pɛ Eziptɛ. Kɛdi penek, kɛkum dwoo mɛ aake náá, wɔ bula ɛ. Etɛɛ náá, Elood ɛ́ waasaa mɔn étɛp nyɛ neegó nyɛ.»
Tin, Zozɛf ɛ́ boozɛwyɛl, nɔɔ mɔn nɛ myɛl, zɛkaab pum-ɛ-pum, tɔ́, kɛsɔwa pɛ Eziptɛ.
Zozɛf zokadi penek ɛ kɛkum ɛlu ɛ ɛsyee ɛ Elood. Ye nasɛɛ deenek ɛ, etɛɛ náá, etɛp ee Ghɛŋ naloolɛɛ tɔ nuub ngoolel-mɛkpa mɛ ɛ, neebela ɛsuk. Ye nabɛ ɛ́ náá: «Mɛ eedjóo mɔn'am étɛp nyɛ neewyis tɔ dɛl ɛ Eziptɛ.»
Bhis Elood nazɛgu náá, bɛtsoŋ ɛ bot binɔk naakɔɔ nyɛ ɛ, nyɛ naazɛbiyo ɛlyelɛpe. Wɔ gwaa nyɛ zɛdjɛ ɛlee nɛ bot bɛ náá, bɛ tɔ́ pɛ Bheteleɛm nɛ mɛl mɛ di é mengwoob ɛ djas, kɛgó bɔn botom djas di náá, bɛ dinaa ààpaakum membu membá ɔ. Etɛɛ náá, ndem bɛtsoŋ ɛ bot nalɛɛ nyɛ ɛ, ye nabɛ ɛ́ náá, mɔn tak nadi ɛ́, tɔ lɔɔg membu menek.
Tin, etɛp ee ngoolel-mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb Zelemi nalɛɛ ɛ́ boo zɛbela ɛsuk. Nyɛ nabɛ ɛ́, nyɛ naake náá:
«Etsim ɛpegék pɛ dɛl ɛ Lama; etsim e boo mɛgwyɛ nɛ mezuk. Ye ɛ́ Lasɛl ɛ di edje bɔn bɛ. Nyɛ aanàkwaakat ɛgwyɛ, etɛɛ náá, bɔn tokapɛ.»
Bhis ɛsyee ɛ Elood, fofop ɛ Ghɛŋ ngɔt eezɛtuula Zozɛf tɔ dhyam pɛ Eziptɛ.
Nyɛy nɛ nɛ náá: «Wyɛla. Nɔŋa mwalɔ nɛ mɔn, da bi ɛ́ sik pɛ kyee dik Yisalaɛl etɛɛ náá, bot djas nadi ekwyɛl ɛgó mɔn'ɔ ɔ, bɛ eezesi “bhɛɛɛ”.»
Tin, Zozɛf ɛ́ boozɛwyɛl, nɔɔ mɔn nɛ myɛl sik pɛ kyee dik Yisalaɛl.
Tinaak, dáa nyɛ nagwak náá, Alselaɔs naadjila sɛɛg Elood kɔ bóó mɛkoozi pɛ Yude ɛ, bwoo naasa nyɛ é ɛtɔ́ pɛ yiizaag. Zɛɛb ɛ́ boobaazɛdjɛ nyɛ mɛlyo mɛsis tɔ dhyam. Tin, nyɛ eezɛtɔ́ pɛ dhiiti dɛl ɛsis, pɛ kyee dik Ghalile.
Nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛtɔ́ kɛdi pɛ dhiiti dɛl, din ɛ dɛl ɛ tak ɛ́ Nazalɛt. Ye nasɛɛ deenek ɛ́, etɛɛ náá, dhiiti etɛp ee Zɛɛb nalɛɛ tɔ enuub e bɛngoolel ɛ mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb ɛ, neebela ɛsuk. Ye nabɛ ɛ́ náá: «Bɛ aadjóo nyɛ mot Nazalɛt.»
É ghɛŋ tak ye nabɛ ɛ́ Zaŋ Nduuel-bot eetuula tɔ kyee bɔs bɛsyɛ di ààbɛ nɛ mɛdii ɛ e kyee dik Yude. Nyɛ nadi elyo ɛ́ náá:
«Liigka elyem bin, etɛɛ náá, Ɛyoŋ ɛ di tɔ gwoo ɛ, yɛ eezekunaa!»
Ngoolel-mɛkpa Ezayi nalii étɛp'ɛ ɛ́ náá: «Mot ngɔt ɛpetuud kɔ kyee bɔs bɛsyɛ di ààbɛ nɛ mɛdii ɛ náá: “Koobalka mɛze ɛ Ghɛŋ! Tuuka nyɛ mɛze mɛ na looba-looba!”»
Kaad Zaŋ nadi ebɔt ɛ nasael ɛ́ nɛ mya mɛ boo yaaga kyee bɔs bɛsyɛ di ààbɛ nɛ mɛdii ɛ. Nyɛ nabɛ ɛ́ nɛ bhɛtɛ ket é kuu. Nyɛ nadedɛ ɛ́ etsemaaka nɛ egho.
Bot ɛ ghaada Yeluzalɛm nɛ bot ɛ kyee dik Yude djas, zɛnɔɔ bot ɛ nadidi mbaka-mbaka nɛ dii Yuldɛn ɔ nadi ezyɛ pɛ daa lɛ.
Bɛ nadi evaa mesyem mɔɔ é mis mɛ bot. Bhii tak ɔ, Zaŋ zɛduu bɛ Zɛɛb tɔ dii Yuldɛn.
Dáa Zaŋ nabee náá, bɛtɛ nɛ eFalizyɛ nɛ eSaduseɛ nadi ezyɛ pɛ daa lɛ ɛbuɛpe zɛduwa Zɛɛb ɛ, nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛke nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Biyɔ mbyak mɛgel mak! Ɛzɛ lyo bin náá, bi kaab ɛbuk ɛ Zɛɛb ze kunaa nɛ ɛzyɛ enek?
Lyaalka nɛ esesɛɛ bin náá, ye ɛ́ tsɛɛtsɛ náá, bi eezeliig elyem bin.
Betka ɛke biyɔ nɛ biyɔ náá: “Dhiiti sonok aanàkwaasa mena, etɛɛ náá: Abalaam ɛ́ bhaab'enaka.” Etɛɛ náá, Zɛɛb ɛ́ nɛ ghwyil ɛliig mɛkok mak ye liiza bɛdha ɛ Abalaam.
Ye nyɔ ɛ́ bi gu náá, zoŋ moo ɛ́ nɛɛga é ɛbok ɛ le étɛp ye neetsaal ekaŋal e tak. Ele ee di ààdjɛ mbɛɛ bhum ɔ djas, goka ɛ́ nɛ ɛkwyalaa. Bhii tak, da ye ɛ́ kɛmwasaa tɔ du.
«Ye ɛ́ tsɛɛtsɛ náá, mam duu bin Zɛɛb ɛ́ tɔ mɛdii, étɛp ye neelyaal náá, bi eezeliig elyem. Yɛ kabɛ mot di zyɛ bhis'am ɔ, nyɛ aaduu bin Zɛɛb ɛ́, tɔ ghwyil Sisim na Dɛɛ nɛ du. Nyɛ eedhaa mɛ nɛ mɛbwala. Mam aanàkwaakobela-bela duu ɛmalal étɛp ɛkotii-tiiak ekel ekoko bɛ.
Tɔ mɛmbɔ mɛ, nyɛ eemɛt wal étɛp nyɛ neewa mbɛk pak ezeeza nɛ bhum. Ezeeza pak wat, mbɛɛ bhum yak pak. Tin, nyɛ waakwom mbɛɛ bhum tɔ taa. Yɛ kabɛ ezeeza ɔ, nyɛ kakɛmwas yɛ ɛ tɔ du na kɔm-kɔm.»
Dhiiti dwoo Yezu naazɛdus pɛ kyee dik Ghalile zɛkum pɛ dii Yuldɛn pɛ kyee Zaŋ nadi ɛ́, étɛp nyɛ needuwa Zɛɛb dáa Zaŋ.
Wɔ gwaa Zaŋ zɛbyen yɛ. Nyɛy nɛ nɛ náá: «Ye ɛ́ mam ɛ di egoka nɛ ɛzyɛ, zɛduwa Zɛɛb pɛ daa lɔ. Ghuna ye ɛ́ wɔy ɛ́ kazyɛ pɛ daa lam e!»
Yezu eezɛbɔɔza nɛ nɛ náá: «Wɔ goka ɛ́ wɔ myaal náá, ye sɛ́ɛ deenek é ɛwala ɛlak. Etɛɛ náá, deenek mena sa ɛ́ ɛkwosak ɛ Zɛɛb.» Tin, Zaŋ ɛ́ boo zɛmyaal.
Dáa Yezu naduwa Zɛɛb ɛ, wyisa nyɛ nazowyis tɔ mɛdii ɛ, é di tak wat, wɔ gwaa gwoo zɛbɛŋel kɔ ɛko ɛ lɛ. Bhii tak, Sisim na Dɛɛ eezyɛ, zɛsul kɔ lɛ tyee ɛghum.
Dhiiti gwood eezɛgék tɔ gwoo náá: «Nwyak ɛ́ mɔn'am mɛ di kwyɛl ɔ. Mɛ eedyeebamyaala nɛ nɛ ɛbuɛpe.»
Bhii tak, Sisim Zɛɛb eezɛwyel Yezu, tɔ́ nɛ nɛ pɛ kyee bɔs bɛsyɛ di ààbɛ nɛ mɛdii ɛ, etɛɛ náá, Dim mot mɛkɔŋ neekɛwa nyɛ tɔ mɛbhowal.
Dáa nyɛ nazɛtsi edee étɛp mendjaala tyee mɛlu mɛkam-mɛná nɛ epum mɛkam-mɛná ɛ, za naazɛsa nyɛ.
Tin, Satan, Mot mɛbhowal eezɛtiila pɛ daa lɛ. Nyɛy nɛ nɛ náá: «Yɛ bɛ náá, wɔ ɛ́ Mɔn ɛ Zɛɛb ɔɔ, kea nɛ mɛkok mak náá, ye liiza emapa.»
Yezu eezebɔɔza nɛ nɛ náá: «Ekwyala ɛ Zɛɛb lɛɛ ɛ́ náá: “Ye tok emapa nɛ emapa di esa náá, mot di nɛ tsik. Mot tsak ɛ́ nɛ mɛkpa djas di edus tɔ nuub Zɛɛb ɛ.”»
Bhii tak, Dim mot mɛkɔŋ eebaazɛtɔ́ nɛ nɛ pɛ Yeluzalɛm ghaada na dɛɛ. Nyɛ eezɛgel nyɛ kɔ nges Ndjaa-ebuwa.
Nyɛy nɛ Yezu náá: «Yɛ bɛ náá, wɔ ɛ́ Mɔn Zɛɛb ɔɔ, tsela, da wɔ ɛ́ kɛduma pɛ si, etɛɛ náá, ekwyala ɛ Zɛɛb lɛɛ ɛ́ náá: “Kɔ ɛsu ɛ lɔ, Zɛɛb ɛ́ waake nɛ efofop bɛ náá: Bɛ bɛp wɔ nɛ mɛmbɔ mɔɔ, é kaab náá, wɔ ɛ́ zɛkɛbema ɛbɛk.”»
Tin, Yezu eezɛbɔɔza nɛ nɛ náá: «Ekwyala baalɛɛ ɛ́ náá: “Sa wɔ ààwa Ghɛŋ Zɛɛb'ɔ tɔ mɛbhowal.”»
Dim mot mɛkɔŋ eebaazɛnɔɔ nyɛ, tɔ́ nɛ nɛ pɛ kɔ dhiiti ɛtsok ɛ na vyɛɛgvyɛɛg. Nyɛ eezɛtel nyɛ mɛyoŋ mɛ bɔs djas nɛ mɛkas nɛ enɛm tak djas.
Dim mot mɛkɔŋ eezɛke nɛ nɛ náá: «Mɛ waadjɛ wɔ esesɛɛ bak djas, wɔ kwyit mɛboŋ mɔ si mɛko mam, da wɔ ɛ́ duwal mɛ ɔɔ.»
É di'enek, Yezu ɛ́ boozɛke nɛ nɛ náá: «Dusa tin, Satan! Etɛɛ náá, ekwyala lɛɛ ɛ́ náá: “Ye ɛ́ Ghɛŋ Zɛɛb'ɔ ɛ́ wɔ di egoka nɛ ɛduwal. Wɔ goka nɛ ɛsa ɛ́ mɛsa mɛ met.”»
É sok'enek, Dim mot mɛkɔŋ eezɛbet nyɛ, nyɛ eezɛtɔ́ yɛ. É di'enek, wɔ gwak efofop zokazyɛ zɛkwyee nyɛ.
Bhis Yezu nagwak náá, Zaŋ naamɛtaa é mbok ɛ, nyɛ naazɛtɔ́ pɛ Ghalile.
Nyɛ nabɛ ɛ́ ààkosulal kɔ ghaada Nazalɛt. Tin, nyɛ nakwos ɛ́ ɛkɛdi pɛ ghaada Kapɛlnaum, ghaada tak nadi ɛ́ mbaka-mbaka nɛ boo soob na djato-djato Ghalile, pɛ pak kyee dik ɛ Zabulɔn nɛ Neftali.
Nyɛ nasa deenek ɛ́, etɛɛ náá, etɛp ngoolel-mɛkpa Ezayi nalɛɛ ɛ́ neebela ɛsuk:
«Ekyee mɛdhik mɛ Zabulɔn nɛ Neftali pɛ kyee ze boo soob na djato-djato pɛ yii kyiid dii Yuldɛn, Ghalile, pɛ bot ɛ di ààbɛ bot ɛ mbyak eYuda di ɔ!
Mbyak di tɔ ghooghom ɛ waabee boo ngel gwyɛ é kas tɔ lɔɔ! Dɔɔ nɛ bot ɛ di ekɔɔla tɔ ghooghom pɛ kyee dik ɛsyee ɔ, gwyes ɛ́ waakas kɔ lɔɔ.»
Kana ɛwala ɛlenek, Yezu naazɛkan ɛlyo bot náá: «Liigka elyem, etɛɛ náá, Ɛyoŋ ɛ di tɔ gwoo ɛ, yɛ eezekunaa!»
Dhiiti dwoo Yezu nadi ekɛ mbaka-mbaka nɛ boo soob na djato-djato e Ghalile. Dáa nyɛ nabee bɛlael ɛ mɛwyet bɛbá, dhyeeb nɛ tel, bɔɔ ela mɛwyet ɛ. Bot ɛ tak nabɛ ɛ́ Simɔŋ, mot nagetaa Pyɛɛd ɔ, zɛnɔɔ dhyeeb Andele ela ɛwyet tɔ dii.
Tin, Yezu eezɛke nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Duka mɛ, mɛ waasa náá, bi di bɛlael ɛ mɛwyet étɛp ɛmɛt ɛ bot.»
É di'enek wat, bɛ eezɛdhuugal mɛwyet mɔɔ, étɛp ɛdu Yezu.
Bhii Yezu nakɛ ba «zii» ɛ́, nyɛ eezɛboma nɛ bɛdhiiti bot ɛsis, dhyeeb nɛ tel, Zak bɛ nɛ mɔn ɛ nyɛɛg Zaŋ, bɔn ɛ Zɛbɛdɛ. Bɛ nadi ɛ́ tɔ elɛɛd, ekoobal mɛwyet mɔɔ, bɛ nɛ sɛɛg'ɔɔ. Tin, Yezu eezɛdjóo bɛ.
É di'enek wat, bɛ eezɛdhuugal elɛɛd nɛ sɛɛg'ɔɔ, bɛ eezɛdu Yezu.
Tin, Yezu naazɛtɔ́ pɛ kyee dik Ghalile djas, nyɛ nadi edjɛ mɛlyo tɔ mendjaa mɛ mendjaala mɛ eYuda nadi pɛ kyee dik tak ɛ. Nyɛ nadi egoola Mbɛɛ Bhaadal dum nɛ Ɛyoŋ ɛ Zɛɛb, nɛ ɛbaatsik bot ɛ nazyɛ nɛ mɛbɛ́ membi nɛ membi ɔ nɛ bot ɛ nadi nɛ edjam ɔ.
Ye nabɛ ɛ́, menduk mɛ naakɛ kɔ kyee dik Siili djas. Bɛ ɛ́ boodi zezyɛ nyɛ nɛ bot ɛ nadi nɛ mɛbɛ́ membi nɛ membi ɔ, nɛ bot ɛ embee esisim nadi edhe-dhek ɔ, dɔɔ nɛ bot ɛ nadi ebil djem ɔ nɛ eboka e bot. Yezu zokatsik bɔɔ djas.
Mɛdhuu mɛ bot ɛ nadi edu nyɛ ɔ, nadudus ɛ́ pɛ Ghalile, pɛ pak eghaada kam, pɛ ghaada Yeluzalɛm, pɛ Yude nɛ bot ɛ kyee dik nadi pɛ yii kyiid dii Yuldɛn ɔ.
Dáa Yezu nabee ɛdhuu ɛ bot binɔk ɛ, nyɛ naazɛbyet kɔ ɛtsok, nyɛ eezɛnɔɔ nyel'ɛ, disi. Bɛdjekel bɛ eezɛdisi e ngwoob'ɛ.
Nyɛ eezɛni é djɛ bɛ mɛlyo:
«Mɛnyɔ nɛ bɛdjel ɛ bot tɔ sisim, etɛɛ náá, Ɛyoŋ ɛ di tɔ gwoo ɛ, ye ɛ́ yɔbɔ.
Mɛnyɔ nɛ bot ɛ di edje nenak ɔ, etɛɛ náá, Zɛɛb ɛ́ waadis ghoŋ di tɔ elyem bɔɔ ɛ!
Mɛnyɔ nɛ bot ɛ di etela ɔ, etɛɛ náá, bɛ waabela kyee bɔs Zɛɛb nakɛk bɛ ɛ!
Mɛnyɔ nɛ bot ɛ di nɛ za nɛ gwyes ɛsa ɛkwosak ɛ Zɛɛb ɔ, etɛɛ náá, bɛ waadɛ, djil!
Mɛnyɔ nɛ bot ɛ di gek bot ɛsis ghoŋ ɔ, etɛɛ náá, Zɛɛb ɛ́ waagek bɛ ghoŋ!
Mɛnyɔ nɛ bot ɛ di nɛ mbɛɛ elyem ɔ, etɛɛ náá, bɛ waabee Zɛɛb.
Mɛnyɔ nɛ bot ɛ di esaa egwyem pak'ɔɔ ɛ, etɛɛ náá, Zɛɛb ɛ́ waadiig bet náá, bɛ ɛ́ bɔn bɛ!
Mɛnyɔ nɛ bot ɛ di tɔ tsik mezuk ɔ etɛɛ náá, bɛ ɛpesa ɛkwosak ɛ Zɛɛb, etɛɛ náá, Ɛyoŋ ɛ di tɔ gwoo ɛ, ye ɛ́ yɔbɔ!
Mɛnyɔ nɛ nen, yɛ bɛ náá, bot ɛpelee bin ɔ, nɛ ɛwa bin tɔ tsik mezuk ɔ, bɛ di esu bin etɛp mbɛs ɔ, nɛ ɛbaasaab dék'en, étɛp'am ɔ.
Myaalaka, da bi ɛ́ bɔl zɛŋ, etɛɛ náá, boo etuud bin ɛ́ nɛɛga pɛ tɔ gwoo. Etɛɛ náá, ye ɛ́ deenek ɛ bɛ nazuk bɛngoolel ɛ mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb nazyɛ ɛsok nɛ nen ɔ.»
«Ye ɛ́ biyɔ ɛ́ di mɛsɔn kɔ bɔs. Yɛ bɛ náá, mɛsɔn moo ɛ́, ààkagwom ɔ, ye goka ɛ́ nɛ ɛsaaa dáa étɛp mɛsɔn neebaagwom? Deenek mɛsɔn aakadi ɛ́, ààbɛ nɛ mɛsa mɛ yɛ aasaaa nɛ yɛ ɛ. Deenek, ye goka ɛ́ nɛ ɛmwasaa pɛ kel, da bot ɛ́ nyal yɛ.
«Ye ɛ́ biyɔ ɛ́ di mɛkas kɔ ɛko ɛ bɔs. Dɛl ɛ di suma kɔ ɛtsok ɔ, tok nɛ ghwyil ɛdi syela.
Wɔ aanàkwaatuub lama, da wɔ ɛ́ wa yɛ si bhe. Yɛ ààseaa deenek, ye goka nɛ ɛkɛlaa ɛ́, pɛ kɔ tɛɛg é di bot djas aadi tɔ gwyɛ tak ɔ.
Deenek ɛ́ di egoka náá, mɛkas men nyen tɔ bot, étɛp bot neebee mɛnyɔ mɛ esesɛɛ bi di esa ɛ, étɛp bɛ needuwal Sɛɛg'en di tɔ gwoo ɔ.»
«Nàkeka náá, mɛ nazyɛ ɛ́ zɛgó etsi ɛ Moiiz nɛ mɛlyo mɛ bɛngoolel ɛ mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb nadjɛ ɛ. Mɛ nabɛ ɛ́ ààzyɛ zɛgó etsi, mɛ nazyɛ ɛ́ zɛlyaal mɛsuk mɛ tak.
Tsɛɛtsɛ nɛ tsɛɛtsɛ, mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ náá: Dáa ye di náá, gwoo nɛ bɔs dinaa ààpaadum ɛ, ye tok nɛ sa wat aadisaa tɔ etsi. Ye nakoozodi ba moo ɛtɔn nɛghu ba moo kyeeb, sa wat aanàdus tɔ etsi kɛkum dwoo mɛsik mɛ etɛp djas.
Étɛp tak ɛ́ di náá, mot aazodis tsi wat, ye nakoozotɔɔl, da nyɛ ɛ́ lyo bɔn nyɛɛg náá, bɛ sa dáa nyɛ sa ɔ, yenɔk aadi ɛ́, mɔɔ dhyeeb tɔ Ɛyoŋ ɛ di tɔ gwoo ɛ. Tin, mot di eduwal etsi da nyɛ ɛ́ lyo bɔn nyɛɛg náá, bɛ sa dáa nyɛy ɔ, yenɔk aadi ɛ́ boo-mot tɔ Ɛyoŋ ɛ di tɔ gwoo ɛ.
Mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ náá: Epiki bin é mis mɛ Zɛɛb ɛ́ di ààdhaa yii bɛghaŋ ɛ mɛkana mɛ etsi nɛ eFalizyɛ ɔɔ, bi aanàkwaani tɔ Ɛyoŋ ɛ di tɔ gwoo ɛ.»
«Ye nabɛ ɛ́, bi naagwak náá, nyɛ nake nɛ bɛbhaab bina náá: “Sa wɔ ààgó mot. Mot ɛ́ gó sɔ mot ɔɔ, ye goka ɛ́ ye tɔ́aa nɛ nɛ é mis mɛ bɛtetɛp, nyɛ neepɛ́ɛaa.”
Yɛ kabɛ mam ɔ, mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ náá: Mot djas aagwak ɛbuk nɛ mɔn nyɛɛg ɔɔ, ye goka ɛ́ náá, bɛtetɛp pɛ́ɛ nyɛ. Mot aake nɛ sɔ mot náá, “wɔ ɛ́ wo ɔ”, nyɛ goka ɛ́ nyɛ tɔ́ kɛpɛ́ɛaa pɛ boo zɛɛga bɛtetɛp eYuda. Mot aake nɛ sɔ mot náá, “wɔ ɛ́ ndjemet ɔ”, ye goka ɛ́ náá, nyɛ kɛmwasaa tɔ du na kɔm-kɔm.
Yɛ bɛ náá, wɔ ɛpetɔ́ pɛ mesa ebuwa étɛp ɛkɛduwal Zɛɛb nɛ esa bɔ ɔɔ, tin, wɔ siiza náá, mɔn nyoog ɛ́ nɛ tɛp nyɛ di ebwak wɔ kɔ ɛsu ɛ tak ɔɔ,
pookobet esa e duu tak kɔ mesa ebuwa. Da wɔ ɛ́ pookokɛgwakel nɛ mɔn nyoog. Bhii tak ɛ wɔ aakazyɛ, zɛkaa Zɛɛb.
«Mot ɛ́ kɛpit wɔy ɔɔ, bi ɛ́ di etɔ́ pɛ dáa bɛtetɛp ɔɔ, lela ɛgwakel nɛ nɛ é di bi dinaa é ze yenek, é kaab náá, mot tak ɛ́ zɛkɛka wɔ é mis mɛ bɛtetɛp. Bhii tak, da bɛtetɛp ɛ́ djɛ wɔ é mɛmbɔ mɛ esodja, da bɛ ɛ́ wa wɔ é membok.
Tsɛɛtsɛ nɛ tsɛɛtsɛ, mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ náá: Wɔ aanàkwaawyis tin, wɔ di ààtuud dɔɔ nɛ falanga ɛsik ɔ.»
«Ye nabɛ ɛ́, bi naagwak náá: “Sa wɔ ààsa ɛzɔ.”
Tin, mam kalɛɛ nɛ nen ɛ náá, motom djas aagwyák mwaa sɔ, da ɛ́ wyeeb nyɛ tɔ lyem ɔ, yenɔk tak eezesa ɛzɔ nɛ moma tak tɔ lyem'ɛ.
Yɛ bɛ náá, ye ɛ́ dis ɛ kyee mbɔ eghɛŋ bɔ ɛ́ di ebelal wɔ náá, wɔ sa mesyem ɔ, wɔ goka ɛ́ nɛ ɛpiid ɛ yɛ, da wɔ ɛ́ mwas yɛ ɛtsetaɛpe. Yɛ aadi ɛ́, ɛnyɔɛpe nɛ nɔ náá, wɔ dis dhiiti kyee nyel'ɔ, ààkabɛ náá, wɔ kɛdyak tɔ du na kɔm-kɔm nɛ nyel'ɔ djas.
Yɛ bɛ náá, ye ɛ́, mbɔ eghɛŋ bɔ ɛ́ di esa náá, wɔ syem ɔ, tsaala yɛ, da wɔ ɛ́ mwas yɛ ɛtsetaɛpe nɛ nɔ. Yɛ aadi ɛ́, ɛnyɔɛpe nɛ nɔ náá, wɔ tsaal dhiiti kyee nyel'ɔ, ààkabɛ náá, wɔ kɛdyak tɔ du na kɔm-kɔm nɛ nyel'ɔ djas.»
«Ye nabɛ ɛ́, bɛ naabaake náá: “Mot ɛpɛɛ myɛl ɔɔ, nyɛ goka ɛ́ nɛ ɛdjɛ nyɛ mɛkana mɛ ɛbel ɛ ɛba.”
Yɛ kabɛ mam ɔ, mɛ ke ɛ́ náá: motom djas di epɛɛ myɛl, ààmɛt nyɛ nɛ sa etsi di elu ɔ, motom tak saŋ ɛ́ náá, moma tak di moma mɛzɔ nyɛ baatɔ́ ɛba ɛ sis ɔɔ. Tin, motom aaba moma zebyenaa é ɛba ɔ, nyɛy baasa ɛ́ ɛzɔ.»
«Ye nabɛ ɛ́, bi naagwak dáa bɛ nake nɛ bɛbhaab binaka náá: “Sa wɔ ààgwakel nɛ mot, da wɔ ɛ́ tuwal myoŋ nɛ mɛsoŋ bhii tak wɔ kadi ɛ́ ààsa sa wɔ nakɛk ɛ. Ye goka ɛ́ náá, wɔ sa sa wɔ kɛk é mis mɛ Ghɛŋ ɛ.”
Yɛ kabɛ mam ɔ, mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ náá, sa mot ààtuwal myoŋ nɛ mɛsoŋ, da ɛ́ nɔɔ gwoo dáa tyaasɛs, etɛɛ náá, penek ɛ́ pɛ bóó mɛkoozi mɛ Zɛɛb di ɛ.
Sa mot ààtuwal myoŋ nɛ mɛsoŋ nɛ bɔs, etɛɛ náá, bɔs ɛ́ di Zɛɛb di enyal nɛ mɛko mɛ ɔ. Sa mot ààtuwal myoŋ nɛ mɛsoŋ nɛ din ɛ Yeluzalɛm, etɛɛ náá, ye ɛ́ ghaada ɛ boo Mɛkoozi.
Sa wɔ ààtuwal myoŋ nɛ mɛsoŋ, da ɛ́ wa lo'ɔ é ban, etɛɛ náá, wɔ tok nɛ ghwyil ɛswoola bhoo lo'ɔ náá, ye bhilal nɛghu ye pum.
Yɛ bɛ náá, wɔ eemyaal tɛp ɔɔ, kea “Iyoo”. Yɛ kabɛ náá, wɔ eebyen ɔɔ, kea “ooh”, etɛɛ náá, ekɛla-ekɛla ee bot dyeebakɛl kɔ étɛp'enek dyeebadus ɛ́ pɛ daa Mbee mot.»
«Ye nabɛ ɛ́, bi naagwak náá: “Mot ɛ́ tuu sɔ dis ɔɔ, ye goka ɛ́ náá, nyɛ baatuuaa yɛ. Mot ɛ́ bwak wɔ ɛdjɛ ɔɔ, da wɔy ɛ́ baabwak nyɛ ɛdjɛ.”
Deenek, mam kalɛɛ bin ɛ náá: Sa mot ààbulal ɛbiyo nɛ ɛbiyo. Mot ɛ́ nyuu wɔ bɛɛz é ɛmuk pɛ mbɔ eghɛŋ ɔ, baaka nyɛ yak kyee ɛmuk.
Mot ɛ́ di esaa wɔ nɛ etɛp étɛp nyɛ neenɔɔ kuwa yɔ ɔɔ, beta nyɛ, nyɛ baanɔɔ dɔɔ nɛ ndjookuwa yɔ.
Mot ɛ́ besal wɔ náá, wɔ kɛ nɛŋ wat ɔɔ, kɛa enɛŋ ebá.
Gwyena nɛ mot di ewaab wɔ sonok ɔ. Yɛ bɛ náá, mot eenɔɔ sa yɔ ɔɔ, sa wɔ ààkabaakɛdu.»
«Ye nabɛ ɛ́, bi naagwak náá: “Ye goka ɛ́, wɔ kwyɛl sɔ'ɔ mot, da wɔ ɛ́ byen mot mɛbhuka mɔ.”
Yɛ bɛ mam ɔ, mɛ kalɛɛ bin ɛ náá: kwyɛlka bot ɛ mɛbhuka men. Djaalaka Zɛɛb kɔ ɛsu ɛ bot ɛ di ezuk bin ɔ.
Deenek ɛ́ bi aadi bɔn Sɛɛg'en di pɛ tɔ gwoo ɔ, etɛɛ náá, Zɛɛb sa ɛ́ náá, gwyes kas kɔ bot djas: bɛmbee ɛ bot nɛ bɛtɛtɛ ɛ bot. Tyee wat, Zɛɛb sil bhi ɛ́, étɛp bot ɛ di sosoob ɔ, nɛ bot ɛ di ààbɛ sosoob ɔ.
Yɛ bɛ náá, bi goka ɛ́ nɛ ɛzokwyɛl ɛ́ bot ɛ di ekwyɛl bin ɔ, étɛp ye bi di bun náá, bi ɛ́ waabela efute aadus pɛ ɛko ɛ? Dɔɔ nɛ bɛnɔŋel ɛ epata e lapo zobaakwyɛl ɛ́, bot ɛ di ekwyɛl bɛ ɔ.
Yɛ bɛ náá, bi zoswos ɛ́ bɔn nyɛɛg bin ɔ, bi bee tin ɛ́ náá, bi ɛpesa enɛm esa? Etɛɛ náá, bot ɛ di ààbɛ bot ɛ mbyak eYuda ɔ, bɔɔ pe zobaasa ɛ deenek!
Dika nɛ mbɛɛ elyem dáa Sɛɛg'en di tɔ gwoo ɔ di nɛ mbɛɛ lyem ɛ.»
«Bi ɛ́ kotiibal dum nɛ dáa bi di esa enɛm esa nɛ bot étɛp ɛduwal ɛ Zɛɛb ɛ. Bi ɛ́ sa deenek é mis mɛ bot, étɛp bot djas neeke náá: “Biyɔ ɛ́ di bɛmbɛɛ bot” ɔ. Deenek, bi ɛ́ sa deenek ɔɔ, bi aanàkwaabela efute e Sɛɛg'en di tɔ gwoo aadjɛ ɛ.
Wɔ kwyɛl ɛdjɛ djel mot sonok ɔɔ, wɔ goka ɛ́ nɛ ɛsa yɛ tɔ sɔ, sa mot ààgu. Nàsa dáa bot ɛ luwalɛŋ di sa tɔ mendjaa mɛ mendjaala mɛ eYuda nɛ é egba ɛ. Bɛ sa deenek ɛ́ étɛp bot needuwal bɛ. Tsɛɛtsɛ nɛ tsɛɛtsɛ, mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ náá: Mbi bot binɔk eezebela yɔbɔ efute.
Yɛ bɛ náá, mbɔ eghɛŋ bɔ ɛpedjɛ djel mot sonok ɔɔ, yɛ àànyɔ náá, mbɔ myɛl ɛ lɔ gu.
Etɛɛ náá, ye goka ɛ́ náá, sa wɔ djɛ mot ɛ, ye di sɔ. Tin, Sɛɛg'en, mot di egu dáa wɔ di ekwyee bot tɔ sɔ ɛ, nyɛ waadjɛ wɔ yɔ efute.»
Yezu eezɛke nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Bi ɛ́ di edjaala ɔɔ, nàdika dáa bot ɛ di nɛ lualɛŋ, bɛ dyeebakwyɛl ɛdjaala ɛ metetel tɔ mendjaa mɛ mendjaala mɛ eYuda nɛ é bɛman, étɛp bot neebee bɛ. Tsɛɛtsɛ nɛ tsɛɛtsɛ, mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ náá: bot binɔk eezebela yɔbɔ efute.
Yɛ kabɛ wɔy ɔ, wɔ kwyɛl ɛdjaala Zɛɛb ɔɔ, nia tɔ dhɛŋ'ɔ, da wɔ ɛ́ diyal ɛbɛ. Bhii tak, da wɔ ɛ́ djaala nɛ Soog di tɔ di sɔ ɔ. Tin, Soog, mot di ebee esesɛɛ wɔ di esa tɔ sɔ ɔ, nyɛ waadjɛ wɔ efute.
«É sok bi di edjaala ɛ́, sa mot ààbasal ɛkpa wat esok nɛ esok gwyes dáa bot ɛ di ààbɛ bot ɛ mbyak eYuda ɔ. Bɔɔ gek ɛ́ náá, Zɛɛb ɛ́ waagwak bɛ, etɛɛ náá, bɛ nɛ bil mɛkpa ɛbuɛpe tɔ mendjaala mɔɔ.
Sa mot ààbaŋa bɛ, etɛɛ náá, Sɛɛg'en nɛ gu sa elyem bin di ekwos ɛ, ɛsok nɛ bi nɛ waab nɛ nɛ.
Deenek, Gwakeka dáa bi di egoka nɛ ɛdjaala ɛ. Keka náá: “Sɛɛg'es di tɔ gwoo ɔ, ye goka ɛ́ náá, mot nɛ mot gu náá, wɔ ɛ́ Zɛɛb na Dɛɛ.
Mɛkoozi mɔ zyɛ. Beta náá, ɛkwosak ɛ lɔ sael kɔ bɔs, dáa ye di sael pɛ tɔ gwoo ɛ.
Djɛa bis mɛlu nɛ mɛlu edee di egoka nɛ nes ɛ.
Pela ɛbiyo ɛ bis zesa ɛ, etɛɛ náá, bisɔ pe, bis ɛpepel bot ɛ nazesa bis ɛbiyo ɔ.
Sa wɔ ààbet bis tɔ mɛbhowal. Pɛka bis é mɛmbɔ mɛ Mbee mot, [etɛɛ náá, ye ɛ́ wɔy ɛ́ di nɛ Mɛkoozi, nɛ mɛbwala, nɛ duma na kɔm-kɔm.]”»
«Guka náá: Bi ɛ́ pel ɛbiyo ɛ bot ɛ di etɔ́ nɛ ɛsa bin ɔ, Sɛɛg'en di pɛ tɔ gwoo ɔ waabaapel yebɔ pe.
Tin, yɛ kabela náá, bi ààpel bɛsɔ bin ɔɔ, Sɛɛg'en di tɔ gwoo ɔ aanàkwaabaapel ɛbiyo ɛ bi di esa ɛ.»
«Yɛ bɛ náá, bi ɛpetsi edee ɔɔ, sa mot ààdi nɛ bhwoob ghoŋ dáa bot ɛ di nɛ lualɛŋ ɔ. Bɛ lyaal bhwoob ghoŋ deenek ɛ́, étɛp bot djas neegu náá, bɛ ɛpetsi edee. Tsɛɛtsɛ nɛ tsɛɛtsɛ, mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ náá: bot binɔk eezebela yɔbɔ efute.
Yɛ kabɛ wɔy ɔ, wɔ tsi edee ɔɔ, gwyiia bhwoob, da wɔ ɛ́ lɔɔb mul é lo,
etɛɛ náá, bot needi ààgu náá, wɔ ɛpetsi edee. Tin, ye ɛ́ Soog mot di tɔ sɔ ɔ di egu, deenek Soog, mot di ebee esesɛɛ djas wɔ di sa tɔ sɔ ɔ, nyɛ waadjɛ wɔ efute.»
«Nàsaaka ɛdi ɛ́ nɛ bɛtɛ nɛ ekum é bɔs'ak. Ekum ee di náá, bɛsɛs nɛ emaa ɛ́ waapul ɛ. Ekum ee di náá, bot ɛ djii ɛ́ waakwak ɛbo ɛ ndjaa, da ɛ́ djii, nɔɔ, tɔ́ nɛ yɛ ɛ.
Kwomka ekum bin pɛ daa Zɛɛb. Penek, bot ɛ djii aanàkwaani kɛdjii yɛ, bɛsɛs nɛ emaa aanàkwaapul yɛ.
Etɛɛ náá, é di mot di ekwom esa bɛ ɔ, lyem'ɛ di ɛ́ tin.»
«Mis mɛ mot ɛ́ dáa lama nyel. Yɛ bɛ náá, mis mɔ ɛpenyaasok ɛnyɔɛpe ɔɔ, gua náá, nyel'ɔ djas ɛ́ tɔ selele.
Yɛ kabɛ náá, mis mɔ ɛpekpaŋ ɔɔ, nyel'ɔ djas ɛ́ tɔ ghooghom. Yɛ kabɛ náá, ngel di tɔ lɔ eezedim ɔɔ, tin, kwaa yenek mɛghomla aanɔŋel nɛ yé?»
Mot ngɔt aanàkwaadi mot-mɛsa mɛ ekukuma ebá. Yɛ bɛ deenek ɔɔ, nyɛ waabhina ngɔt, da nyɛ ɛ́ kwyɛl nwyak ngɔt, nɛghu nyɛ kaseya nɛ mot ɛsok ɔɔ, nyɛ waapɛɛ nwyak ngɔt. Bi tok nɛ ghwyil ɛsa mɛsa mɛ Zɛɛb nɛ mɛsa mɛ epata é di wat.
«Étɛp tak ɛ́ mɛ di elɛɛ nɛ nen náá: Nàbemka ba dum nɛ tɛp edee, nɛ gwyes mɛdii nɛ tɛp eduuba. Etɛɛ náá, tsik eedhaa edee nɛ mɛnyɔ. Nyel eedhaa ekaad nɛ mɛtaŋ. Etsal é?
Beeka enen pɛ ɛko, bɛ ààbɛ epyeeb, ààbɔ́k edee di ewum tɔ epyeeb ɛ. Bɛ ààkwom edee tɔ mɛbhwaa nɛ kɔ etaa. Tin, dhi Sɛɛg'en di tɔ gwoo ɔ, di djɛ bɛ edee! Bi ààpadhaa enen nɛ boo mɛtaŋ é mis mɛ Zɛɛb é?
Yɛ bɛ náá, bi ɛpebem ba ɔɔ, ɛzɛ pak'en di nɛ ghwyil ɛbil ba ɛlu ɛ wat kɔ mɛlu mɛ tsik'ɛ?»
«Étɛp ye bi di bem ba kɔ ɛsu ɛ ekaad? Beeka dáa mɛzɛm di ekwyil nɛ wyee tɔ pyeeb ɛ. Mɛzɛm mɛ tak ààsa mɛsa, ààlat ekaad.
Tin, mɛ ɛpelɛɛ bin náá, dɔɔ nɛ Salomɔŋ, nɛ boo duu yɛ, nyɛ nabɛ ɛ́ ààbɛ nɛ mbɛɛ kaad na nyɔ dhaa wat tɔ kɔkɔ mɛzɛm menek.
Yɛ bɛ náá, Zɛɛb ɛpebet eka ee di tɔ dik mos, da djɛmɛn ye ɛ́ nɔŋaa, dikaa tɔ du ɔɔ, tin, nyɛ tok nɛ ghwyil ɛsa deenek nɛ lyem'ɛ met étɛp'en é? Ye nakoozodi náá, bi tok nɛ boo ɛmyaal nɛ nɛ!»
«Nàbemka ba é ɛkeke náá: “Mena aadɛka yé? Mena aadɛka yaa mɛdii? Mena aabɔtka yé?”
Yenek djas, ye ɛ́ bot ɛ bɔs ɛ́ di ebwos esesɛɛ binek mɛlu djas. Tin, Sɛɛg'en mot di tɔ gwoo ɔ nɛ gu náá, bi ɛ́ nɛ gwyes tak.
Pookosaaka sok Ɛyoŋ ɛ Zɛɛb nɛ tsik tɔ epiki nyɛ di ewaab ɛ. Tin, Zɛɛb ɛ́ waadjɛ bin esa djas bi di nɛ gwyes tak ɛ.
Nàbemka ba nɛ etɛp aasael djɛmɛn ɛ, etɛɛ náá, etɛp ee djɛmɛn aagwyɛ lo ɛ́ nyɛ ɛmet. Dwoo nɛ dwoo ɛ́ nɛ yɛ ɛkwosak.»
«Sa bi ààdidi é pɛ́ɛ bot, deenek Zɛɛb aanàkwaapɛ́ɛ bin.
Etɛɛ náá, Zɛɛb aapɛ́ɛ bin ɛ dáa bi di epɛ́ɛ bɛsɔ bin ɛ. Nyɛ aalwoodal bhwaŋ'en ɛ dáa bi di elwoodal bhwaa bɛsɔ bin ɛ.
É tɛp yé wɔ gwyák kwyɛɛzyoŋ di tɔ dis ɛ sɔ'ɔ mot, wɔ kadi ɛ́ ààbee pek le di tɔ dis ɛ lɔ ɛ?
Wɔ nàkwaake nɛ sɔ'ɔ mot náá: “Mɔn nyaag'am, beta mɛ dis kwyɛɛzyoŋ tɔ dis ɛ lɔ,” wɔy ààbɛ é bee pɛk le di tɔ yɔ dis ɛ.
Wɔy mot mɛdjhaaz pɛ ɛko, bhimis pɛ si, pookodis sok pɛk le tɔ dis ɛ lɔ ɛ! Bhii tak ɛ́ wɔ waanyaa sok, étɛp wɔ needis kwyɛɛzyoŋ di tɔ dis ɛ mɔn nyoog ɛ.»
«Nàdjɛka esa ee di dɛɛ ɛ nɛ bɛbhyɛ, é kaab náá, bhii tak bɛ ɛ́ zɛkɛbula zɛduma wɔ é nyel nɛ mɛkwaala. Nàmwaska mɛvunga sok bhwoob bɛghwyee, é kaab náá, bɛ ɛ́ zɛkɛnyal yɛ.»
«Waabka, bi ɛ́ waadjɛaa. Saaka, bi ɛ́ waabela. Diigka, bɛ waadii bin ɛbɛ ɛ ndjaa.
Étɛp tak ɛ́ ye di náá, mot ɛ́ waab ɔɔ, nyɛ ɛpedjɛaa. Mot ɛ́ saŋ ɔɔ, nyɛ ɛpebela. Ɛbɛ ɛ ndjaŋ aadiiaa ɛ́, étɛp mot diig ɔ.
Ye ɛ́ nɛ mot ngɔt pak'en di nɛ ghwyil ɛdjɛ mɔn'ɛ ɛkok bela náá, mɔn waab ɛ́ mapa?
Nɛghu ɛzɛ di nɛ ghwyil ɛdjɛ mɔn nyɔ, yɛ bɛ náá, mɔn waab ɛ́ su ɔɔ?
Kwyii biyɔ, bɛmbee ɛ bot, di gu ɛdjɛ embɛɛ esonok nɛ bɔn bin, gwyata nɛ Sɛɛg'en di tɔ gwoo ɔ aapaadi ààdjɛ embɛɛ esonok nɛ mot aawaab nyɛ sonok ɔ!
«Kanka ɛsa sok nɛ bɛsɔ bin esesɛɛ bi di ekwyɛl náá, bot sa bin yɛ ɛ. Deenek ɛ́ mɛkana mɛ etsi ɛ Moiiz nɛ yii bɛngoolel ɛ mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb di elyo.»
«Nika tɔ ɛbɛ ɛ ndjaa na maad-maad, etɛɛ náá, ze di eniigal mot pɛ dɛl ɛ ɛsyee ɛ, ye nɛ bɔk. Bɛtɛ nɛ bot dyeebakwyɛl ɛdhaŋ ɛ́ penek.
Tin, guka náá, ɛbɛ ɛ ndjaa tak nɛ maad, bela náá, pɛ ze di edul bot pɛ ze tsik ɛ, ye nɛ pata. Étɛp tak ɛ́ di náá, bot ɛbuɛpe ààdyeebadu yɛ.»
«Bi ɛ́ di nɛ etsoŋ nɛ bɛngoolel ɛ mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb yii mɛkɔŋ. Bɛ zyɛ pɛ daa len ɛ́, nɛ ɛzaaba dáa mɔn ɛ taa, ghuna bɛ ɛ́ eben, bɛ zosyel ɛ mya mɔɔ.
Bi aagu bɛngoolel ɛ mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb yii mɛkɔŋ tak ɛ nɛ mɛfulu mɔɔ. Etɛɛ náá, bum le vin ààbɔ́kaa tɔ mɛkpak mɛ mɛgɔk nɛghu bum fiig kɔ le mɛgɔk.
Etɛɛ náá, mbɛɛ le zodjɛ ɛ́ mbɛɛ bhum. Mbee le kadjɛ ɛ́ mbee bhum.
Mbɛɛ le tok nɛ ghwyil ɛdjɛ mbee bhum. Tyee wat nɛ mbee le. Ye tok nɛ ghwyil djɛ mbɛɛ bhum.
Ele djas di ààdjɛ bhum ɛ, ye goka ɛ́ nɛ ɛkwyalaa, bhii tak da ye ɛ́ mwasaa tɔ du.
Étɛp tak ɛ́ di náá, bi aagu bɛngoolel ɛ mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb yii mɛkɔŋ tak ɛ́ nɛ embee mɛfulu mɔɔ.»
«Ye tok bot djas di djóo mɛ: “Ghɛŋ, Ghɛŋ!” ɔ, aani tɔ Ɛyoŋ ɛ di tɔ gwoo ɔ. Bot aani ɛ́, ye ɛ́ bot ɛ di esa ɛkwosak ɛ Saag'am di tɔ gwoo ɔ.
É dwoo Zɛɛb aazɛpɛ́ɛ bot ɛ, bot ɛbuɛpe ɛ waake nɛ nam náá: “Ghɛŋ, Ghɛŋ”, ye ɛ́ nɛ din ɛ lɔ ɛ bis nadi bɛngoolel ɛ mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb! Etsal é? Ye ɛ́ nɛ din ɛ lɔ ɛ bis nadi esesɔ mɛlyeeb! Etsal é? Ye ɛ́ nɛ din ɛ lɔ ɛ bis nasa bɛtɛ nɛ endem e mɛbwala! Etsal é?
Tin, mɛ waalɛɛ nɛ nɔɔ é mis mɛ bot náá: “Mɛ nabɛ ààgu bin. Duska é mis mam, tɔ́ka ɛtsetaɛpe nɛ nam, biyɔ, bot ɛ di esa embee esesɛɛ ɔ!”»
«Gwakeka, mɛ pookolyaal bin mbi mot zyɛ pɛ daa lam ɔ. Nyɛ gwak mɛkpa mam, da nyɛ ɛ́ kɛ tyee tak ɔɔ, nyɛ ɛ́ mot etsoŋ di esum ndjaŋ'ɛ kɔ ɛkok ɔ.
Wɔ gwaa bhi zɛnee ɛbuɛpe, tyee bhyoŋ natuula nɛ ghuu na lyel-lyel ɛ, ye naanyuŋa é ndjaŋ'enek. Ààbik, etɛɛ náá, ndjaa tak nasumel ɛ́, ɛnyɔɛpe kɔ ɛkok.
Tin, mot di egwak mɛkpa mam, da nyɛ ɛ́ kadi ààkɛ tyee mɛkpa mɛ tak di elɛɛ ɔ, nyɛ ɛ́ dáa ndjemet mot di esum ndjaa kɔ bɔs bɛsyɛ, ààwyɛl epap kɔ ɛkok ɔ.
Dáa bhi nakanee ɛbuɛpe ɛ, tin, tyee bhyoŋ nakatuula ɛ, ghuu na lyel-lyel eezɛnyuŋa é epap e ndjaŋ'enek, epap eezɛbik “syɛɛɛ” é di tak wat.»
Dáa Yezu nasilal ɛlyo bɛmɛlyo mɛ ɛ, mɛdhuu mɛ bot naadyeebadjoka dáa nyɛ nadi elelyo ɛ.
Etɛɛ náá, nyɛ nabɛ ɛ́ ààlyo dáa bɛghaŋ ɛ mɛkana mɛ etsi nalelyo ɛ́, nyɛ nalelyo ɛ́, nɛ eghɛŋ ɛ Zɛɛb.
Dáa Yezu nasul kɔ ɛtsok ɛ, zukamwaa nɛ mot naazɛdu nyɛ.
Tin, wɔ gwaa dhiiti mot nadi nɛ ɛbɛ́ ɛ zezam ɔ, zɛtiila pɛ daa lɛ. Nyɛ eezɛkwyit mɛboŋ si, zɛdjaala nɛ nɛ náá: «Ghɛŋ! Mɛ nɛ gu náá: wɔ kwyɛl ɔɔ, wɔ ɛ́ nɛ ghwyil ɛtsik mɛ, nyel'am bula dɛɛ.»
Tin, Yezu eezɛsɛɛb mbɔ, mɛt nyɛ. Nyɛy nɛ nɛ náá: «Mɛ eekwyɛl. Tsaka!» É di tak wat, wɔ gwaa, ɛbɛ́ ɛ zezam mot'enɔk zɛsi.
Bhii tak, Yezu ɛ boozɛke nɛ nɛ náá: «Gwaka mɛ ɛnyɔɛpe: Sa wɔ ààlɛɛ mot sa dhaa wak ɛ. Tɔ́a, kɛlyaal nyel pɛ daa bɛghaa-Zɛɛb, da wɔ ɛ́ kɛdjɛ esa e ɛgwyena dáa Moiiz nalyo ɛ, étɛp wɔ neelyaal bot djas náá, wɔ eetsak.»
Dáa Yezu nadi eni tɔ ghaada Kapɛlnaum ɛ, wɔ gwaa dhiiti kukuma tɔ lɔɔg esodja zɛzyɛ pɛ daa lɛ. Bhii tak, nyɛ eezɛke nɛ Yezu náá, nyɛ zɛkwyee nyɛ.
Nyɛy nɛ nɛ náá: «Ghɛŋ, mot-mɛsa mam ngɔt ɛ́ ndjaasi pɛ ndjaŋ'am, nyɛ eezesɔɔb nyɛ ɛpebɛ́ ɛlyelɛpe.»
Tin, Yezu eezɛbɔɔza nɛ nɛ náá: «Mɛ ɛpetɔ́, kɛtsik nyɛ.»
É di'enek, kukuma tɔ lɔɔg esodja binɔk eezɛbɔɔza nɛ nɛ náá: «Ghɛŋ, mam ɛ yam zɛ, wɔ neezɛni tɔ ndjaŋ'am. Ye goka ɛ́ náá, wɔ zolóo ɛkpa wat, étɛp mot-mɛsa mam neetsak.
Di mɛ di'aak, ye ɛ́ nɛ ekukuma bam ɛ, mɛ di egwak esesɛɛ mɛ di egoka nɛ ɛsa nɛ nɔɔ ɛ. Dɔɔ nɛ mam pe, mɛ ɛ́ nɛ esodja si mɛko mam. Mɛ ke nɛ nɔɔ: “Tɔ́ka” ɔɔ, bɛ ɛpetɔ́; “Bulaka” ɔɔ, bɛ ɛpebula; “Saka dáak” ɔɔ, bɛ ɛpesa.»
Dáa Yezu nagwak eyala e kukuma yenɔk ɛ, ye nabɛ ɛ́, nyɛ naadyeebamyaala. Tin, nyɛ ɛ́ booke nɛ bot ɛ nadi egyee bɛ nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Tsɛɛtsɛ nɛ tsɛɛtsɛ, mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ náá: mɛ dinaa ààpaabee mot di edum koŋ nɛ Zɛɛb, kɔ Yisalaɛl dáa mot'ak.
Betka mɛ lɛɛ bin náá, bot ɛbuɛpe ɛ waadus pɛ ɛbil ɛ dwoo nɛ pɛ ɛdjem ɛ dwoo. Bɛ waazyɛ, zɛdi kɔ mesa wat, bɛ nɛ bɔn Abalaam, Izak nɛ Zakɔɔb tɔ Ɛyoŋ ɛ di tɔ gwoo ɛ.
Tin, bot ɛ nagoka nɛ ɛdi ɛ bot ɛ ɛyoŋ ɛ tak ɔ, bɛ aadi ɛ́, wusa pɛ kel, tɔ ghooghom pɛ baadi edje mɛgwyɛ nɛ ɛkwaal ɛ mɛtsok ɛ.»
Bhii tak, Yezu eezɛke nɛ kukuma esodja binɔk náá: «Sika pɛ ndjaŋ'ɔ etɛɛ náá, kɔ ɛdum ɛ koŋ ɛ lɔ nɛ Zɛɛb, Zɛɛb eedjɛ wɔ sa lyem'ɔ di ekwos ɛ!» É di tak wat, ye nabɛ ɛ́, mot-mɛsa ɛ kukuma esodja binɔk naatsak.
Yezu eezɛwyis, tɔ́ pɛ daa Pyɛɛd. Ghuna tsi yɛ yii moma nadi ɛ́ ndjaasi nɛ mɛkosa ɛkpaŋɛpe.
Nyɛ eezɛmɛt nyɛ é mbɔ, mɛkosa eezɛsi. É di tak wat, moma yenɔk eezɛwyɛl, nyɛ moo zɛbe bɛ.
Dáa dwoo nadi esila ɛ, wɔ gwaa bɛ zɛzyɛ nyɛ nɛ bot ɛ mɛlyeeb nadi edhek ɔ. Dáa Yezu nadi elii kɔ membel menɔk ɛ, embee esisim nadi ewyis tɔ lɔɔ, tin, nyɛ naatsik dɔɔ nɛ bot ɛ mɛbɛ́ djas.
Nyɛ nasa deenek ɛ́, etɛɛ náá, esesɛɛ ngoolel-mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb Ezayi nalɛɛ ɛ́ neebela ɛsuk. Nyɛ nake ɛ́ náá: «Nyɛ naanɔɔ edjam bina nɛ mɛbɛ́ mena.»
Bhii tak dáa Yezu nabee ɛdhuu ɛ bot ɛ nadi edu nyɛ ɔ, nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛke nɛ bɛdjekel bɛ náá, bɛ sɛɛ dhaa pɛ yii kyiid boo soob na djato-djato.
Wɔ gwaa dhiiti ghaa mɛkana mɛ etsi zɛzyɛ pɛ daa lɛ. Nyɛy nɛ nɛ náá: «Lyoel, mɛ ɛpekwyɛl ɛdu ɛ wɔ é mɛze djas wɔ aadi tɔ́ ɛ.»
Deenek Yezu eezɛbɔɔza nɛ nɛ náá: «Bɛbhɛk ɛ́ nɛ eku bɛ di djaasi tɔ tak ɛ, enen ɛ́ nɛ mɛk mɔɔ. Yɛ kabɛ Sɛɛŋɛlɛ Mɔn Mot ɔ, nyɛ tok nɛ zeza nɛ di nyɛ aadi ndiindil nɛ ɛdja ɛ gɔ.»
Dhiiti mot ngɔt pak bɛdjekel bɛ eezɛke nɛ nɛ náá: «Ghɛŋ, ɛsok nɛ mɛ nɛ du wɔ, pookobet mɛ, mɛ pookokɛdel saag'am.»
Tin, Yezu eebɔɔza nɛ nɛ náá: «Dua mɛ. Beta bot ɛ di ààbɛ nɛ tsik ɔ, bɛ delel pak'ɔɔ.»
Wɔ gwaa Yezu zɛni tɔ boo elɛɛd sama wat nɛ bɛdjekel bɛ.
Ààbɔya deenek, kasɛka ɛ́ boo ghuu na lyel-lyel eezɛkan ɛpupal kɔ boo soob na djato-djato. Mɛpupal mɛ tak eezɛghɛɛ ɛbhyeeb ɛ mɛdii zɛkɛɛza é elɛɛd. Ye kabela tin ɛ́, Yezu edja gɔ́.
Tin, bɛdjekel bɛ zokazɛtiila pɛ pak nyɛ nadi tɔ elɛɛd ɛ. Bɛ eezɛdjem nyɛ nɛ etsim: «Ghɛŋ, tsika bis! Ɛsyee ɛ́ yak!»
É di'enek, ye nabɛ ɛ́ Yezu naazɛbɔɔza nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Étɛp yé bi di nɛ kɛŋ? Ɛbwaalel ɛ len nɛ Zɛɛb nɛ tɔɔl!» Bhii tak, nyɛ eezɛwyɛl, zɛbhɛm ghuu, nɛ dii, nyɛ eezɛlyak ghuu. Nyɛy nɛ dii náá: «Sila ghulal'ɔ ye di gwyem.» Wɔ gwaa, ghuu zɛsila, bhwak moo tin «kup».
Bɔɔ djas nabɛ ɛ́, bɛ naadyeebadjoka. Tin, bɔɔ náá: «Nwyak ɛ́ nwyaa kwaambi mot di náá, dɔɔ nɛ ghuu nɛ boo soob na djato-djato ɛpegwak nyɛ?»
Dáa Yezu nasɛɛ pɛ yii kyiid boo soob na djato-djato pɛ kyee dik Ghadasa ɛ, wɔ gwaa bot ɛbá zɛtuula tɔ mɛvit, bɛ neezɛboma nɛ nɛ. Ye nabɛ ɛ́ bot ɛ embee sisim nadi dhek ɔ, bɛ nadi ɛ́, nɛ mbee mɛnyan dhaa tyɛ, bot nabɛ ɛ́ ààbɛ nɛ ghwyil ɛdhaa é ngwoob mɛvit mɛ tak.
Bot binɔk moo tin etsim náá: «Bis sa wɔ yé, wɔy Mɔn Zɛɛb? Wɔ zyɛ wak ɛ́ zɛzɛm bis, sonok ɛwala ɛ tak dinaa ààdjala?»
Ba ɛtsetaɛpe nɛ di tak, ye nabɛ ɛ́ nɛ boo ɛsaŋ ɛ bɛghwyee nadi egɔɔ tin ɔ.
Embee esisim eezɛdjaala nɛ Yezu, bɔɔ náá: «Wɔ kwyɛl ɛsɔ bis ɔɔ, kyeeda bis tɔ ɛsaŋ ɛ bɛghwyee bak.»
Yezu eezɛmyaal, nyɛ eezɛke nɛ nɔɔ náá, bɛ tɔ́. Tin, wɔ gwaa embee esisim zɛwyis tɔ bot binɔk, zɛni tɔ ɛsaŋ ɛ bɛghwyee binɔk. Bhii tak, ɛsaa djas eezɛsul ɛtsok pɛ bɛ nadi ɛ́, kaab, kɛghaaga tɔ dii, bɔɔ djas si na «bhɛɛɛ.»
Bot ɛ nadi ebaal ɛsaŋ ɛ bɛghwyee tak ɔ, zokazɛkaab, sik pɛ dɛl. Bɛ moo tin ebaŋa bot ɛ dɛl edjema bɛ bee penek dum nɛ bot ɛbá binɔk.
Tin, wɔ gwaa bot ɛ dɛl djas zokazɛwyis, kɛboma nɛ Yezu. Dáa bɛ naboma nɛ nɛ ɛ, bɛ naazɛdjaala nɛ Yezu náá, nyɛ dus kɔ kyee dik'ɔɔ.
Wɔ gwaa Yezu zɛni tɔ elɛɛd, sɛɛ boo soob na djato-djato, sik pɛ dɛl.
Tin, bɛdhiiti bot zokazyɛ nɛ mot ngɔt nazesɔɔb nɛ ɛbɛ́ ɔ, byaala kɔ mwaala. Dáa Yezu nabee ɛdum ɛ koŋ ɛ bot ɛ nazyɛ nɛ mbel tak ɛ, nyɛ naazɛke nɛ mbel náá: «Sa mɛghaaz mɔn'am, mesyem mɔ eepelel!»
Dáa bɛ nabee deenek ɛ, bɛdhiiti bɛghaŋ ɛ mɛkana mɛ etsi ɛ Moiiz nabɛ ɛ́, bɛ moo nyiiŋla pak'ɔɔ náá: «Nwyak mot ɛpebyasal Zɛɛb!»
É di tak wat, ye nabɛ ɛ́ Yezu naagu esiiza bɔɔ. Nyɛ boozɛke náá: «Étɛp yé bi di nɛ mbee esiiza tɔ elyem bin deenek?
Ɛyé di elyel nɛ nen, ɛke ɛ́ nɛ mot ɛbɛ́ náá: “Mesyem mɔ eepelel” ooho, nɛghu ɛke náá: “Wyɛla, da wɔ ɛ́ kɛ”?
Ye goka ɛ́ bi ɛ́ gu náá, Sɛɛŋɛlɛ Mɔn Mot ɛ́ nɛ ghwyil ɛpel mesyem mɛ bot kɔ bɔs.» Bhii tak, nyɛ eezɛke nɛ mot zesɔɔb nɛ ɛbɛ́ ɔ náá: «Wyɛla, nɔŋa mwaala yɔ, da wɔ ɛ́ sik pɛ ndjaŋ'ɔ!»
É di'enek, mot'enɔk eezɛwyɛl, sik pɛ ndjaŋ'ɛ.
É di'enek wat, dáa ɛdhuu ɛ bot ɛ nadi tin ɔ nabee deenek ɛ, bɛ naadyeebadjoka ɛlyelɛpe. Bhii tak, bɛ moo eduwal Zɛɛb dáa nyɛ nadjɛ mbi yenek mɛbwala nɛ bot ɛ.
Yezu eezɛdus tin, dáa nyɛ nadi edhaŋ ɛ, nyɛ naazɛbee dhiiti mot, din ɛ lɛ ɛ́ Matye, nyɛ nadi ɛ́ ndiindil é di mɛsa mɛ. Nyɛ nadi ɛ́ nɔŋel epata e lapo. Yezu eezɛke nɛ nɛ: «Dua mɛ!» Matye eezɛwyɛl «ngbat», bhii tak, nyɛ eezɛdu nyɛ.
Yezu bɛ nɛ bɛdjekel bɛ nadi edɛ edee pɛ ndjaŋ ɛ Matye. Wɔ gwaa, bɛtɛ nɛ bɛnɔŋel ɛ epata e lapo nɛ bot ɛ mesyem zokazɛlwood tin, zɛdɛ bɛ nɛ bɛ nɔɔ djas kɔ mesa wat.
Dáa eFalizyɛ nabee deenek ɛ, bɛ naazɛdji bɛdjekel bɛ náá: «Étɛp ye lyoel yen di edɛ edee é di wat bɛ nɛ bɛnɔŋel ɛ epata e lapo nɛ bot ɛ na mbee dék?»
Yezu eegwak dáa bɛ nadi elii ɛ, tin, nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛke nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Bot ɛ di nɛ mɛnyel ɛnyɔɛpe ɔ tok nɛ gwyes dhɔkɔtɔlɔ nyɛ neegwom bɛ. Ye ɛ́ membel ɛ di nɛ gwyes mɛgwoma.
Tɔ́ka, kɛdjekeka ɛsuk ɛ mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb di eke náá: “Mɛ kwyɛl ɛ́ enɛm esa, dhaa ebuwa e bɛtit.” Etɛɛ náá, mɛ nabɛ ɛ́ ààzyɛ zɛsaa bot ɛ epiki. Mam nazyɛ ɛ́ zɛsaa bot ɛ di egu náá, bɛ ɛ́ bot ɛ mesyem ɔ.»
Dhiiti dwoo, bɛdjekel ɛ Zaŋ Nduuel-bot naazyɛ zɛdji Yezu náá: «Étɛp yé bisɔ nɛ eFalizyɛ di etsi edee étɛp mendjaala, dhi bɛdjekel bɔ di ààtsi edee étɛp mendjaala?»
Wɔ gwaa, Yezu zɛbɔɔza nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Bi nakobee sok paa náá, bɛsɔ ɛ mwaaz di tɔ ghoŋ dwoo ɛba, dhi bɛ di lɔɔg wat nɛ mwaaz, mot paazyɛ, zɛba moma ɔ? Yenek ààsael! Deenek ɛwala tak ɛpezyɛ, ɛwala ɛ di náá, mot zɛba moma ɔ waadisaa pak'ɔɔ. É di tak ɛ́ bɛ aatsi edee.
«Ye tok nɛ mot aanyaa pes bes kaad étɛp ɛkoobal put kaad nɛ yɛ. Wɔ sa deenek ɔɔ, é sok wɔ aagwyii kaad tak ɛ, bes kaad ɛ́ waanyaa put kaad, da ɛ́ bek ɛlen ɛ tak.
Mɛnyok mɛ na bes ààwaaa tɔ bhɛɛb na mwa. Yɛ sɛɛ deenek ɔɔ, bhɛɛb ɛ́ nɛ ghwyil ɛbel, da mɛnyok ɛ́ see, deenek bhɛɛb eepulel. Étɛp tak ɛ́ di lɛɛaa náá, yɛ ààgoka deenek, etɛɛ náá, mɛnyok mɛ bes goka ɛ́ tɔ ebes e bhɛɛb.»
Dáa Yezu nadi elii nɛ nɔɔ deenek ɛ, wɔ gwaa dhiiti kukuma eYuda zɛzyɛ pɛ daa lɛ. Nyɛ eezɛkwyit mɛboŋ si mɛko mɛ. Nyɛy nɛ nɛ náá: «Ɛsyes ɛ lam ààlóo nɛ pɛka. Mɛ kwyɛl ɛ́, wɔ zɛkɛl mɛmbɔ kɔ lɛ étɛp nyɛ neegom!»
Yezu eezɛwyɛl, «ngbat», bɛ nɛ bɛdjekel bɛ, du nyɛ.
Dhiiti moma nadi ebɛ́ ɛbɛ́ ɛ ghiya, ghiya nadi ekekɛk nyɛ é nyel ààbɛ nɛ ɛtsek. Ɛbɛ́ ɛ tak naaboya nɛ nɛ é di membu kam nɛ ebá. Moma tak zokazɛtiila pɛ bhii koŋ ɛ Yezu, nyɛ eezɛmɛt kyee ɛghɔ ɛ kaad ɛ Yezu.
Étɛp nyɛ nabɛ ɛ́, nyɛ eeke tɔ lyem'ɛ náá: «Mɛ zomɛt kaad'ɛ ɔɔ, mɛ ɛpetsak!»
Tin, Yezu eezɛliig mis, gwyák nyɛ. Nyɛ eezɛke nɛ nɛ náá: «Sa mɛghaaz ɛsyes ɛ lam! Ɛdum ɛ koŋ ɛ lɔ nɛ Zɛɛb eetsik wɔ.» É di tak wat, moma yenɔk naazɛtsak.
Bhii tak, Yezu eezɛtɔ́ pɛ ndjaa kukuma eYuda é tak. Dáa bɛ nakum ɛ, bɛ kabela bot ɛ, é ebwom ngɔmbi, zɛnɔɔ bak bot é sa yɔbɔ ɛzɛm pɛ ndjaa tak étɛp ɛkoobal esesɛɛ, bɛ neetɔ́ ndela.
Tin, Yezu eezɛke nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Wyiska pɛ kel, etɛɛ náá, ɛsyes ɛlak ààpagwyɛ, nyɛ dja ɛ́ gɔ́.» É di'enek, bɛ moo tin eduk Yezu.
Dáa bɛ nawyisal ɛdhuu ɛ bot pɛ kel ɛ, Yezu eezɛni tɔ dhɛŋ, nyɛ eezɛmɛt nyɛ é mbɔ, wɔ gwaa ɛsyes ɛlenɔk zɛwyɛl.
Menduk mɛ tɛp'enek naakɛ kɔ kyee dik'enek djas.
Dáa Yezu nadus tin ɛ, wɔ gwaa bot ɛ mɛbɛ́ mɛ edhim bɛbá zokazɛni edu nyɛ bhii koŋ nɛ etsim: «Mɔn Dhavid, geka bis ghoŋ!»
Dáa Yezu nakum pɛ ndjaŋ ɛ, wɔ gwaa, bɛ na edhim binɔk zɛtiila pɛ daa lɛ. Yezu eezɛdji bɛ náá: «Bi eemyaal náá, mɛ ɛ́ nɛ ghwyil ɛsa sa bi di ewaab'enek é?» Bot binɔk eezɛbɔɔza nɛ nɛ náá: «Iyoo, Ghɛŋ! Wɔ ɛ́ nɛ ghwyil ɛsa.»
Tin, Yezu eezɛmɛt bɛ é mis. Nyɛy nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Zɛɛb eedjɛ bin sa djala nɛ ɛdum ɛ koŋ ɛ len ɛ.»
É di tak wat, wɔ gwaa bɛ nyaasok. Yezu eezɛlu bɛ ɛlyelɛpe náá: «Gwakeka mɛ ɛnyɔɛpe: sa mot ngɔt ààgu sa sɛɛ wak ɛ.»
Tin, bot binɔk katɔ́ ɛ́, elɛɛ tɔ kyee dik'enek djas esesɛɛ Yezu nasa ɛ.
É sok bɛ nadi ekwyɛl ɛtɔ́ ɛ, bɛdhiiti bot nabɛ ɛ́ bɛ eezyɛ Yezu nɛ mot ngɔt nadi bubu ɔ, etɛɛ náá, embee sisim nadi edhek nyɛ.
Dáa Yezu nasɔ mbee sisim tak ɛ, é di tak wat mot'enɔk nabɛ ɛ́, nyɛ moo elii. Tin, ye nabɛ ɛ́ ɛdhuu ɛ bot ɛ nadi edi tak ɔ, moo tin edjoka. Bɔɔ náá: «Bis dinaa ààpaakobee kɔkɔ mbi yak sonok tɔ Yisalaɛl.»
Yɛ kabɛ eFalizyɛ ɔ, bɔɔ nake yɔbɔ ɛ́ náá: «Ye ɛ́ kukuma embee esisim ɛ di edjɛ Yezu mɛbwala mɛ nyɛ di esɔ embee sisim nɛ yɛ ɛ!»
Yezu nadi ekɛ kɔ boo eghaada nɛ kɔ mɛl. Nyɛ nadi elelyo mɛdhuu mɛ bot tɔ mendjaa mɛ mendjaala mɛ eYuda. Nyɛ nadi egoola bɛ Mbɛɛ Bhaadal dum nɛ Ɛyoŋ ɛ Zɛɛb. Nyɛ nadi etsik bot ɛ di nɛ epel ɔ, zɛnɔɔ bot ɛ nadi nɛ edjam ɔ.
Ye nabɛ ɛ́ ghoŋ naasa nyɛ ɛlyelɛpe dum nɛ ɛdhuu ɛ bot ɛ nadi tin ɔ. Etɛɛ náá, bot ɛ tak nadi ɛ́ bɛ eezewak dáa mɛsaa mɛ ebhata di ààbɛ nɛ mbaalel ɛ.
Nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛke nɛ bɛdjekel bɛ náá: «Bhum nɛ bu tɔ bok, tin, bot ɛ ɛbɔ́k ààbu.
Ye goka ɛ́, bi djaala nɛ nakuma pyeeb náá, nyɛ baadhis bot ɛ mɛsa étɛp bɛ neezɛsa mɛsa tɔ pyeeb'ɛ.»
Yezu naazɛdjóo bɛdjekel bɛ kam nɛ bɛbá. Bhii tak, nyɛ eezɛdjɛ bɛ eghɛŋ ɛsɔ embee esisim nɛ ɛtsik ɛ bot ɛ di nɛ epel, zɛnɔɔ bot ɛ́ nadi nɛ edjam ɔ.
Beeka min mɛ bot ɛ lwoma kam nɛ bɛbá tak e: Mot mɛkɛn ɛ́ Simɔŋ nadjɛaa din ɛ Pyɛɛd ɔ, nɛ dhyeeb Andele, Zak bɛ nɛ dhyeeb Zaŋ, bɔɔ bɛbá nabɛ ɛ́ bɔn Zɛbɛdɛ,
Filip nɛ Bhaatelemi, Toma zɛnɔɔ Matye nɔŋel epata e lapo, baazɛnɔɔ Zak mɔn Alfe, wɔ kabela ɛ́ Tade,
Simɔŋ, mot di tɔ ɛdhuu ɛ bot ɛ nadi edjóoaa eZɛlɔt ɔ, zɛnɔɔ Yudas Iskaliɔt mot naka Yezu ɔ.
Yezu zokazɛlwom bɛdjekel bɛ kam nɛ bɛbá étɛp esa mɛsa mɛ. Nyɛy nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Bi ɛ́ kookyee mɛl mɛ bot ɛ di ààbɛ bot ɛ mbyak eYuda ɔ. Sa bi ààni pɛ tɔ eghaada e bot ɛ Samali.
Bi goka nɛ ɛtɔ́ ɛ́, pɛ daa ebhata e bot ɛ mbyak Yisalaɛl nazewo ze ɔ.
Ze ɛ ze, gheegoolaka nɛ bot náá: “Ɛyoŋ ɛ di tɔ gwoo ɛ, moo ɛ́ ɛkunaaɛpe!”
Tsikeka bot ɛ mɛbɛ́. Gomalka bot ɛ ze gwyɛ ɔ. Gelalka bot mɛbɛ́ mɛ zezam, ezezam bɔɔ. Sɔka embee esisim. Esa ee bi bela ààbɔm-bɔmak ɛ, djɛka bot yɛ yii toto.
Nànɔɔka elɔɔd, àànɔɔ epata, ààbaanɔɔ-nɔŋak dɔɔ nɛ meea étɛp ɛwa tɔ mengwyɛ da ɛ́ tɔ́ nɛ yɛ.
Nànɔɔka mɛkoo mɛ di tɔ́aa nɛ yɛ mɛdjoŋ ɛ. Nànɔɔka dhiiti kuwa. Nànɔɔka bɛdhiiti ekoko. Nànɔɔka sek, étɛp ɛtɔ́ mɛdjoŋ nɛ yɛ, etɛɛ náá, mot di esa mɛsa ɔ goka ɛ́ nyɛ bela sa dek.
«Bi ɛ́ kum kɔ dhiiti mɔɔ dɛl nɛghu kɔ ghaada ɔɔ, saaka mot di nɛ ghwyil ɛmyaal bin náá, bi sulal pɛ daa lɛ ɔ. Dika pɛ daa mot'enɔk. Bi dus tin ɛ, yɛ bɛ bi moo twol kɔ dɛl ɛ tak ɔ.
Bi ɛ́ ni tɔ ndjaa mot ɔ, keka náá: “Bis eeswos bin hoo.”
Yɛ bɛ náá, bot ɛ ndjaa tak eemyaal bin ɔɔ, tin, egwyem bin di nɛ nɔɔ. Tin, bɛ pɛɛ náá, bi nàsulal tɔ mendjaa mɔɔ ɔɔ, betka egwyem bin sik nɛ nen.
Yɛ bɛ náá, kɔ dhiiti dɛl nɛghu tɔ dhiiti ndjaa bɛ eepɛɛ náá, bi nàsulal ɔɔ, bɛ byen ɛgwak bin ɔɔ, wyiska yebɔ kɔ dɛl ɛ́ tak, nɛghu tɔ ndjaa tak, da bi ɛ́ kut piib mɛko men.
Mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ́ etɛp etsɛɛtsɛ náá, é dwoo Zɛɛb aazɛpɛ́ɛ bot ɛ, dɛl ɛlenek aapɛ́ɛaa ɛ́ ɛlyelɛpe dhaa-dhaŋak epɛ́ɛ bot ɛ kyee mɛl mɛ Sodɔm nɛ Ghomɔɔd.»
«Gwakeka! Mɛ kyeed bin ɛ́ dáa ebhata kuku eben. Dika nɛ etsoŋ dáa bɛnyɔ, da bi ɛ́ di bot ɛ edɛɛ dáa mɛgum.
Dika bɛtsoŋ ɛ bot, etɛɛ náá, bot ɛ waakɛpit bin sok bhwoob bɛtetɛp, bi ɛ́ waanyuuŋaa nɛ eghwyɛs tɔ mendjaa mɛ mendjaala mɛ eYuda.
Kɔ ɛsu ɛ lam, bi ɛ́ waakɛtaŋal pɛ daa ekukuma nɛ bɛmɛkoozi, zɛnɔɔ pɛ daa bot ɛ di ààbɛ bot ɛ mbyak eYuda ɔ, étɛp bi needi bɛtyaasɛs ɛ etɛp ee bi nazebee ɛ.
É sok bɛ aatɔ́ nɛ nen sok bhwoob bɛtetɛp ɛ, sa mot ààbem ba étɛp mɛkpa aawyis tɔ enuub bin nɛ dáa bi aataŋal ɛ. Mɛkpa mɛ taŋal ɛ́ waadjɛaa bin é di'enek wat.
Etɛɛ náá, ye tok biyɔ aakalii tin. Ye ɛ́ Sisim Sɛɛg'en ɛ́ aapakalii é di'enek.»
«Bɔn mɔ ngɔt waakɛkael pak'ɔɔ é ɛsaŋ ɛ náá, mɔn nyɛɛg'ɔɔ neegóaa, dɔɔ nɛ bɛsɛɛg ɛ bɔn aazobaasa ɛ́ deenek nɛ bɔn bɔɔ. Bɔn ɛ́ waapit bɛbyael bɔɔ, bɔɔ kɛmɛtaa, kwyɛ ndjɛ sɔs, góaa.
Bot djas ɛ́ waabhina bin, etɛɛ din ɛ lam. Ye ɛ́ bot ɛ aamaad lyem kɛkum pɛ ɛsik ɔ aapaabela tsik.
É sok bi aadi kɔ dhiiti ghaada ɛ, bot ɛ́ ghaada tak ɛ́ di esa bin esa e kokok nɛ etɛp ɛpes nɛ mezuk ɔ, kaabka, da bi ɛ́ tɔ́ pɛ dɛl ɛ sis. Mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ́ etɛp e tsɛɛtsɛ náá, bi aanàkwaasilal ɛkɛ kɔ mɛl mɛ di kɔ kyee dik Yisalaɛl ɔ djas, ɛsok nɛ náá, Sɛɛŋɛlɛ Mɔn Mot zyɛ.»
«Ye tok nɛ djekel aadhaa mot di elyo nyɛ ɔ. Ye tok nɛ mot-mɛsa di edhaa kukuma yɛ.
Djekel goka ɛ́, nyɛ di dáa lyoel yɛ. Da mot-mɛsa ɛ́ di dáa kukuma yɛ. Kwyii nakuma mɛbyel ɛ́ koodjóoaa Bɛlzebul, “Aah” gwyata nɛ bot ɛ mɛbyel mɛ! Bɛ aazoleleeaa ɛ́ leea.»
«Étɛp tak ɛ́ di náá, sa mot ààkaab bɛmbee bot binɔk. Dhiiti dwoo ɛ́ tak, dwoo di náá, esesɛɛ djas di syela ɛ́ waawyis é gwyɛ ɛ. Esesɛɛ djas di tɔ syaab ɛ waaguaa.
Tɛp mɛ di elɛɛ bin tɔ ghooghom ɛ, lɛɛka yɛ popoopwon é mwos dwoo. Etɛp ee bi nadi nyiiŋlaa tɔ ɛlɔ ɛ, tuudka yɛ ɛlyelɛpe kɔ emii e mendjaa.
Nàkaabka bot ɛ di egu ɛgó epuud ɔ, etɛɛ náá, bɛ aanàkwaagó sisim. Bi goka ɛ́ nɛ ɛkaab ɛ Zɛɛb mot di nɛ ghwyil ɛgó sisim nɛ epuud tɔ du na kɔm-kɔm ɔ.
Tin, bɔɔ enen ebá tok wak ebɔmsaa nɛ ba mɔɔ pata wat é? Bela náá, ngɔt pak'ɔɔ tok nɛ ghwyil ɛkwyit é bɔs, Sɛɛg'en ɛ di ààmyaal ɔɔ.
Yɛ kabɛ biyɔ bɛ ɛmet ɔ, mɛko mɛ bhoo di tɔ elo bin djas ɛ́ elaŋa.
Sa mot ààbem ba etɛɛ náá, é mis mɛ Saag'am bi dhaa bɛtɛ nɛ bɔɔ enen nɛ boo mɛtaŋ!»
«Mot aamyaal popoopwon é mis mɛ bot djas náá, nyɛ ɛ́ djekel'am ɔɔ, mam pe, mɛ waamyaal nyɛ é mis mɛ Saag'am di tɔ gwoo ɔ náá, nyɛ ɛ́ ngbam.
Bela náá, mot aakɛla popoopwon é mis mɛ bot djas náá, nyɛ tok djekel'am ɔɔ, mam pe, mɛ waakɛla nyɛ é mis mɛ Saag'am di tɔ gwoo ɔ náá, mɛ ààgu nyɛ!»
«Nàgekeka náá, mɛ nazyɛ kɔ bɔs ɛ́, étɛp egwyem tɔ bot. Mɛ nabɛ ɛ́ ààzyɛ, zɛwa egwyem nɛ ɛgwakel tɔ bot. Mɛ nazyɛ ɛ́ zɛkus ɛghuub nɛ ɛzɛbɛk ɛ bot.
Mɛ nazyɛ ɛ́ zɛwa membɛk pak sɛɛg nɛ mɔn motom, pak nyɛɛg nɛ mɔn moma, pak nakɔla nɛ bhɛɛbel.
Bot ɛ mɛbhuka men aadi ɛ́, bot ɛ mɛbyel men met.
Mot di ekwyɛl mot ngɔt pak sɛɛg nɛ nyɛɛg, dhaa mɛ ɔɔ, mot tak ààkɔa nɛ nam. Mot di ekwyɛl mɔn'ɛ mɔɔ moma, nɛghu mɔn'ɛ mɔɔ motom dhaa mɛ ɔɔ, mot tak ààkɔa nɛ nam.
Mot ɛ di ààbɛp mɛlaaba mɛ, da nyɛ ɛ́ du mɛ ɔɔ, mot tak ààkɔa nɛ nam.
Mot aakwyɛl ɛkwyɛɛg tsik'ɛ dhaa mɛ ɔɔ, nyɛ waasu tsik'ɛ. Mot aakakwyɛl ɛsu tsik'ɛ étɛp ɛdu ɛ mɛ ɔɔ, nyɛ waabela tsik.»
«Mot aamyaal náá, bi sulal tɔ ndjaŋ'ɛ ɔɔ, nyɛ myaal ɛ́ mam. Mot aamyaal mɛ tɔ ndjaŋ'ɛ ɔɔ, nyɛ myaal ɛ́ mot nadhis mɛ ɔ.
Mot aamyaal ngoolel-mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb tɔ ndjaŋ'ɛ da dil nyɛ náá, nyɛ ɛ́ ngoolel-mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb ɔɔ, nyɛ waabela efute ee di egyee nɛ ngoolel-mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb ɛ. Mot di emyaal mot epiki, etɛɛ náá, nyɛ ɛ́ mot epiki ɔɔ, nyɛ waabela efute mot epiki di gyee nɛ yɛ ɛ.
Mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ́ etɛp e tsɛɛtsɛ náá, mot aadjɛ dhiiti ba mɔɔ djekel'am ngɔt ba mɔɔ bɛɛlɛ mɛdii mɛtela, etɛɛ náá, nyɛ ɛ́ djekel'am ɔɔ, nyɛ waabela efute bɛ.»
Dáa Yezu nasilal ɛlyo bɛdjekel bɛ kam nɛ bɛbá ɛ, nyɛ eezɛdus tin, tɔ́ kɛlyo nɛ ɛkɛgoola Mbɛɛ Bhaadal pɛ eghaada kyee dik'enek.
Zaŋ Nduuel-bot pɛ nyɛ nadi tɔ ndjaa membok ɛ, nyɛ naagwak menduk ɛ Mɛsia. Tin, nyɛ ɛ́ boolwom bɛdhiiti bɛdjekel bɛ
bɛ kɛdji Yezu náá: «Ye ɛ́ wɔy ɛ́ di Mɛsia nabɛ náá, nyɛ ɛpezyɛ “ohoo”, nɛghu ye ɛ́ náá, ye baabwoodaa dhiiti di baazyɛ ɔ?»
Yezu eezɛbɔɔza nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Kɛlɛɛka Zaŋ sa bi bee ɛ́ nɛ yii bi gwak nɛ mɛlɔ men ɛ.
Bot ɛ edhim moo nyaa sok. Eboka e bot moo kɛ. Bot ɛ mɛbɛ́ mɛ zezam eezetsak. Bɛ na endiila e mɛlɔ moo gwak, bot ɛ nazegwyɛ ɔ, bɛ ɛ́ zegom. Mbɛɛ Bhaadal ɛpegoolel kɛkum pɛ daa bɛdjel ɛ bot.
Mɛnyɔ nɛ mot aadi ààdis ɛbwaalel ɛ lɛ kɔ lam ɔ!»
Bhii bɛdjekel ɛ Zaŋ nasik ɛ, Yezu moo tin elii nɛ zukamwaa nɛ mot nadi tin ɛ kɔ ɛsu ɛ Zaŋ. Nyɛy nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Bi nakɛbee yé pɛ tɔ kyee dik bɛsyɛ di ààbɛ nɛ mɛdii ɛ? Bi nakɛbee ɛ́ mɔɔ le ghwaazok edheegel nɛ pup é?
“Ha” bi nakɛbee yé pɛ kyee dik bɛsyɛ di ààbɛ nɛ mɛdii ɛ? Bi nakɛbee ɛ́ mot ngɔt nɛ vaŋ mbi bhet é? Bi nɛ gu náá, bot ɛ dyeebabɔt evaŋ ekaad ɔ dyeebadi ɛ́ pɛ tɔ eboo mendjaa bɛmɛkoozi.
Bi nakɛbee yé? Bi nakɛbee ɛ́ ngoolel-mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb é? Nɛ tsɛɛtsɛ, mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ́ náá, nyɛ eedhaa-dhaŋak ngoolel-mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb.
Etɛɛ náá, ye ɛ́ kɔ ɛsu ɛ Zaŋ ɛ ekwyala nalɛɛ náá: “Ɛsok nɛ wɔ nɛ tɔ́, mɛ waalwom ngoola-ngoola yam, nyɛ neekɛdii wɔ ze.”
«Mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ́ etɛp e tsɛɛtsɛ náá: pɛ tɔ bot djas Zɛɛb nasa ɔ, ye tok nɛ mot dhaa Zaŋ Nduuel-bot. Tin, mot di mɔɔ dhyeeb tɔ Ɛyoŋ ɛ di tɔ gwoo ɔ, ɛ́ boo boo-mot nɛ nɛ.
Kɛkan membu mɛ Zaŋ Nduuel-bot nadi elyo bot tɔ mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb ɛ, kɛyaka nɛ ɛlu ɛ mos, ɛni ɛ tɔ Ɛyoŋ ɛ di tɔ gwoo ɛ nɛ lyel. Bot ɛ di nɛ mɛghaaz ɛ́ di nɛ ghwyil ɛdɛk yɛ.
Kana nɛ bɛngoolel ɛ mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb djas, zɛnɔɔ etsi ɛ Moiiz, mɛkpa mɛ Zɛɛb naagoolel kɛkum membu mɛ ɛkwyil ɛ Zaŋ.
Bi ɛ́ kwyɛl ɛtiibal ɛnyɔɛpe ɔɔ, ye ɛ́ Zaŋ ɛ́ di Eli, ngoolel-mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb nalookɛkaa náá, nyɛ waabula ɔ.
Yɛ bɛ náá, bi ɛ́ nɛ mɛlɔ ɔɔ, gwakeka yɛ ɛnyɔɛpe!
«Mɛ gek bot ɛ membu mak nɛ bɛzɛ? Bɛ ɛ́ dáa zɛɛga bɔɔ dhyeeb mendiindil kɔ ɛbɛsɛɛ ɛ bot djas di di ɛ, da bɛdhiiti ɛ́ gheetsim kɔ bɛsɔ bɔɔ náá:
“Bis eebwom bin ngɔmbi, bi ààpabɔl. Bis eedjeeb bin mɛdjeeb mɛ ɛsyee, bi ààpadje!”
Etɛɛ náá, Zaŋ eezyɛ, nyɛ nabɛ ɛ́, nyɛ eetsi edee nɛ mɛnyok. Deenek, bot kake ɛ́ náá: “Ye ɛ́ embee esisim ɛ di sa nyɛ deenek!”
Sɛɛŋɛlɛ Mɔn Mot eezyɛ. Nyɛ ɛpedɛ yɛ edee nɛ mɛnyok me vin, bi kake ɛ́ náá: “Beeka nwyak é? Mɛsa mɛ ɛ́ ɛdɛ edee nɛ dɛ mɛnyok mɛ vin, nyɛ be mɛsɔ ɛ́ nɛ bɛnɔŋel ɛ epata e lapo dɔɔ nɛ bot ɛ di nɛ mbee tsik ɔ!” Tin, etsoŋ e Zɛɛb nadi enyen tɔ mɛsa mɛ.»
Tin, Yezu eezɛni nɛ mɛlyo mɛ ɛdul ɛ mɛlɔ mɛ bot ɛ eghaada ee nyɛ nasa bɛtɛ nɛ endem e mɛbwala ɔ, etɛɛ náá, bot ɛ eghaada tak nabɛ ɛ́ ààliig elyem bɔɔ. Nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛlɛɛ náá:
«Haa kpaa-ghoŋ nɛ nɔ, dɛl ɛ Koodazin, kpaa-ghoŋ nɛ nɔ, dɛl ɛ Bhɛtsaida! Etɛɛ náá, bɛtɛ nɛ endem e mɛbwala nasael pɛ yebɔ ɔ, yɛ ɛpedi ɛ́ di náá, ye nasael ɛ́ pɛ eghaada Tiid nɛ Sidɔn ɔɔ, pe bot ɛ eghaada binɔk naaloobɔt kaad ɛpum, pe bɛ naazelɔɔba mɛsii, pe bɛ naaloozeliig elyem bɔɔ.
Étɛp tak ɛ́ mɛ di elɛɛ nɛ nen náá, dwoo Zɛɛb aazɛpɛ́ɛ bot ɛ, yebɔ epɛ́ɛ ɛ́ waadhaa yii bot ɛ eghaada Tiid nɛ Sidɔn nɛ mɛlyel.
Yɛ kabɛ wɔy ɔɔ, dɛl ɛ Kapɛlnaum, wɔ gek ɛ́ náá, wɔ ɛ́ nɛ ghwyil ɛ byet tɔ́ pɛ tɔ gwoo? Wɔ waasilaa kɛkum pɛ dɛl ɛ bot ɛ nazegwyɛ ɔ. Etɛɛ náá, endem e mɛbwala mɛ nasɛɛ penek ɛ, ye ɛpedi ɛ́ di náá, ye naasɛɛ ɛ́ pɛ dɛl ɛ Sodɔm ɔɔ, pe dɛl ɛlenek dinaa tak dɔɔ nɛ mos.
Étɛp tak ɛ́ mɛ di elɛɛ bin náá, dwoo Zɛɛb aazɛpɛ́ɛ bot ɛ, epɛ́ɛ nyɛ aapɛ́ɛ bin ɛ, yɛ waadhaa yii bot ɛ ghaada Sodɔm nɛ mɛlyel.»
É ghɛŋ tak, Yezu naazɛke náá: «Hyee Bhaaba, Ghɛŋ gwoo nɛ bɔs, mɛ ɛpeghaapɛɛ wɔ, etɛɛ náá, esesɛɛ wɔ nasyel bɛtsoŋ ɛ bot nɛ bot ɛ di etselal ɔ, wɔ eelyaal yɛ nɛ bɔɔ dhyeeb.
Iyoo, Bhaaba, wɔ nakwyɛl ɛ́, ye sɛɛ deenek.
«Saag'am naadjɛ mɛ esonok djas. Ye tok nɛ mot di egu Mɔn Zɛɛb, yɛ di ààbɛ Sɛɛg nyɛ ɛmet ɔ. Deenek, ye tok nɛ mot di egu Sɛɛg, yɛ di ààbɛ Mɔn nɛghu mot Mɔn aakwyɛl ɛlyaal ɔɔ.
«Biyɔ, bot ɛ zewak étɛp ɛbɛp edil-dil mɛkɔm men ɔ, dhaka pɛ daa lam, mɛ needjɛ bin ɛwala.
Bɛpka kɔm etɛp bam. Tin, betka náá, mɛ djɛ bin etsoŋ, etɛɛ náá, mam ɛ́ mot mɛsila nɛ ɛtela ɛ lyem. Tin, bi ɛ́ waabela di ɛwala biyɔ bɛ ɛmet.
Kɔm mɛ di edjɛ bin ɛ́, yɛ ààdil, ɛbɛp ɛ lam mɛ di djóo bin náá, bi zɛbɛp ɛ, ye nɛ gwyaa.»
Dhiiti dwoo saba, Yezu nadi edhaa tɔ pyeeb kɔkɔ mbi bhek bhisa di edjóoaa ble ɛ. Tin, wɔ gwaa, za zɛbe bɛdjekel bɛ, bɛ moo tin ebɔ́k mɛbhisa mɛ tak étɛp ɛdɛ.
Dáa eFalizyɛ nabee deenek ɛ, bɛ eezɛke nɛ Yezu náá: «Beea, bɛdjekel bɔ ɛpesa esesɛɛ di náá, yɛ ààpadjɛaa bɛ ze dwoo saba ɛ!»
Yezu zokazɛbɔɔza nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Bi nabɛ ɛ́ ààlaa sa Dhavid nasa é sok bɛ nɛ bot ɛ nadi egyee bɛ nɛ bɛ nɔɔ nagwak za ɛ?
Ye nabɛ ɛ́, bɛ nɛ bot ɛ lɔɔg'ɛ naani tɔ ndjaa Zɛɛb, bɔɔ zokakɛdɛ emapa ee nakaŋaa Zɛɛb ye ɛ́. Dhi ye di náá, bɛ nabɛ ɛ́ ààgoka nɛ ɛdɛ emapa e tak. Etɛɛ náá, etsi bina lɛɛ ɛ́ náá, bot ɛ di egoka nɛ ɛdɛ emapa e tak ɔ, ye ɛ́ bɛghaa-Zɛɛb bɔɔ bɛ ɛmet.
Nɛghu bi nabɛ ɛ́ ààlaa tɔ etsi ɛ Moiiz náá, bɛghaa-Zɛɛb nadi esa mɛsa tɔ Ndjaa-ebuwa dwoo saba ɔ, bɛ nabɛ ɛ́ ààdi eduwal etsi e saba, dhi bɔɔ, ààbela ndjɛ kɔ ɛsu ɛ tak é?
Tin, betka mɛ lɛɛ bin náá, wak, ye ɛ́ nɛ sonok wat di edhaa Ndjaa-ebuwa nɛ mɛbɔk ɔ!
Bi ɛ́ pe di egu ɛnyɔɛpe sa ɛsuk ɛ ekwyala bak: “Mɛ kwyɛl ɛ́ enɛm esa, ààkabɛ ebuwa e bɛtit” di ekwyɛl ɛlɛɛ ɔ, pe bi ààpazyɛ zɛpit bot ɛ di ààgu tɛp ɔ gwyes.
Etɛɛ náá, Sɛɛŋɛlɛ Mɔn Mot ɛ́ di kukuma dwoo saba.»
Bhii tak, Yezu eezɛdus tin, nyɛ eezɛtɔ́ pɛ ndjaa mendjaala mɛ eYuda.
Tɔ ndjaa mendjaala mɛ eYuda e tak, ye nabɛ ɛ́ nɛ dhiiti mot ngɔt nadi nɛ sɔɔbela mbɔ ɔ. Ɛkwosak ɛ eFalizyɛ nabɛ ɛ́, Yezu bela ndjɛ é mis mɔɔ. Étɛp tak ɛ́ bɛ nadji nyɛ náá: «Etsi bina ɛpemyaal náá, mot tsikaa dwoo saba?»
Yezu ɛ́ boozɛbɔɔza nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Yɛ bɛ náá, mot ngɔt pak'en ɛ́ nɛ sim bhata ngɔt ɔɔ, nyɛ gwak náá, dwoo saba, sim bhata tak eekwyit tɔ guk na dim-dim ɔɔ, nyɛ aanàkwaatɔ́ kɛwyisal nyɛ tɔ guk tak é?
Dáa ye di náá, mot eedhaa bhata nɛ mɛtaŋ ɛ, tin, etsi lɛɛ ɛ́ náá, mena saka bot enɛm esa dwoo saba.»
Yezu ɛ́ boozɛke nɛ mot nadi nɛ sɔɔbela mbɔ ɔ náá: «Sɛɛba mbɔ'ɔ.» É di tak wat, mbɔ mot'enɔk eezɛbula ɛnyɔɛpe, dáa yak dhiiti mbɔ.
Bhii tak, eFalizyɛ ɛ́ boozɛdus tin, tɔ́ yɔbɔ. Wɔ gwaa bɛ kɛsɛɛga é kwan, étɛp ɛdjek dáa bɛ aadjɛ nyɛ epɛ́ɛ e ɛsyee ɛ.
Dáa Yezu nagwak deenek ɛ, nyɛ eezɛdus tin, wɔ gwaa, zukamwaa nɛ mot zokadu nyɛ. Wɔ gwaa, nyɛ zokazɛtsik membel djas.
Tin, nyɛ eezɛlyak bɛ ɛlyelɛpe náá, bɛ nàsa náá, bot gu mbi mot nyɛ nadi ɛ́.
Nyɛ nasa deenek ɛ́, etɛɛ náá, etɛp ee ngoolel-mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb Ezayi nalɛɛ ɛ́, ye neebela ɛsuk. Ngoolel-mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb Ezayi nalɛɛ ɛ́ náá:
«Zɛɛb lɛɛ ɛ́ náá: “Beea mot-mɛsa mam mɛ nasɛ́ɛ ɔ, mot mɛ di ekwyɛl ɔ. Lyem'am ɛ́ tɔ mɛmyaala kɔ ɛsu ɛ lɛ. Mɛ waawa Sisim'am tɔ lɛ. Tin, nyɛy ɛ́ aapagoola nɛ bot ɛ membyak djas, epiki bam mɛ aadhis ɛ.
Nyɛ aanàkwaawaya nɛ bot. Nyɛ aanàkwaabiyo nɛ mot. Bi aanàkwaagwak gwood'ɛ é gba.
Nyɛ aanàkwaabwak-bwakak mɔɔ le ghwaazok di náá yɛ eezenyaabel ɛ. Nyɛ aanàkwaadimal mɔɔ ngel lama di esaa náá, ye dim ɛ. Nyɛ aasa deenek, kɛkum dwoo epiki bɛ aanyen é mis mɛ bot ɛ.
Tin, bot djas di ààbɛ bot ɛ mbyak eYuda ɔ, bɛ waawa ɛbwaalel ɛ lɔɔ kɔ lɛ.”»
Wɔ gwaa bɛ zokazyɛ Yezu nɛ dhiiti mot, mot tak nadi ɛ́, bubu nɛ ɛbɛ́ ɛ edhim. Ye ɛ́ embee sisim ɛ nasa mot tak deenek. Tin, Yezu eezɛtsik mot tak, nyɛ moo tin elii nɛ ɛnyaasok.
Mɛdhuu mɛ bot ɛ nadi tin ɔ, naadyeebadjoka. Bɛ moo tin eke náá: «Wɔ ke ɛ́ nwyak tok Mɔn Dhavid é?»
Dáa eFalizyɛ nagwak bot binɔk elii ɛ, bɛ boozɛke náá: «Mot tak sɔ embee sisim ɛ́ etɛɛ náá, Bɛlzebul kukuma embee sisim ɛ, di edjɛ nyɛ kɔkɔ yak mbi mɛbwala mɛ nyɛ di esɔ embee sisim nɛ yɛ ɛ.»
É di'enek, Yezu nadi egu egeka e elyem bɔɔ, nyɛ boozɛlɛɛ nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Ɛyoŋ ɛ di náá, mɛsa mɛ bot ɛ tak ɛ mɛwɔ nɛ edho pak'ɔɔ, ɛsik ɛyoŋ ɛ tak ɛ́ ɛbel nɛ ɛwaazel. Bot tɔ ghaada wat nɛghu bot ɛ mɛbyel mɛ wat, ɛ di nɛ mɛwɔ nɛ etuub pak'ɔɔ ɔ, yenek mɛbyel nɛ yenek ghaada aanàkwaapyet ɛnyɔɛpe.
Yɛ bɛ náá, Satan moo sɔ sa di náá, ye ɛ́ yɛ Satan ɛ, bi ààbee náá, Satan kaduu tuub ɛ, bɛ nɛ nyel'ɛ met e? Tin, ɛyoŋ ɛ lɛ aakapyet dáa?
«Yɛ bɛ náá, mam sɔ embee sisim ɛ nɛ ghwyil ɛ Bɛlzebul ɔɔ, ɛzɛ di edjɛ bot bin ghwyil bɔɔ di esɔ embee sisim nɛ yɛ ɛ? Mɛ bee ɛ́ náá, ye ɛ́ bɔɔ bɛ nakuma tak ɛ aapalyaal bin náá, bi tok nɛ gham.
Sa di tsɛɛtsɛ ɛ́ náá: mɛ sɔ embee sisim ɛ́ nɛ ghwyil ɛ Sisim ɛ Zɛɛb. Yenek djas kwyɛl ɛlɛɛ ɛ́ náá, Ɛyoŋ ɛ Zɛɛb moo ɛ́ wak nɛ nena é di wat.
«Ye tok nɛ mot di nɛ ghwyil ɛni tɔ ndjaa mot mɛnyan, da ɛ́ nɔɔ esa e ndjaa mot tak, nyɛ di ààkɔl nyɛ mɛmbɔ nɛ mɛko ɔɔ. Ye ɛ́ bhis ɛkɔl nyɛ ɛ, nyɛ aakabela ghwyil ɛnɔɔ esa e ndjaŋ'ɛ djas, da nyɛ ɛ́ wyis tɔ́ nɛ yɛ.
Mot di ààdi pɛ yam kyee ɔ, ye lɛɛ ɛ́ náá, mot tak ɛ́ mot di ebhina mɛ ɔ. Tin, mot di ààkwyee mɛ é ɛsɛɛg ɛ bot ɔ, nyɛ waaz ɛ́ waazak.
Étɛp tak ɛ́ mɛ di elɛɛ bin náá, mɛ ɛ́ nɛ ghwyil ɛpel mesyem mɛ bot djas, ye nakoozodi ebyas nɛ embee esesɛɛ bɛ nasa Zɛɛb ɛ. Yɛ kabɛ náá, mot eebyasal Sisim na Dɛɛ ɔɔ, nyɛ aanàkwaapelaa.
Mot ɛ́ lii ɛbiyoɛpe nɛ Sɛɛŋɛlɛ Mɔn Mot ɔɔ, mesyem mɛ ɛ́ nɛ ghwyil ɛpelaa. Tin, mot ɛ́ lii ɛbiyoɛpe nɛ Sisim na Dɛɛ ɔɔ, mesyem mɛ aanàkwaapelaa tɔ tsik mena dika mos'aak nɛghu tsik ɛbhis.»
«Étɛp wɔ neebela mbɛɛ bhum, ye goka ɛ́ le pookokan ɛdi sok mbɛɛ le. Etɛɛ náá, le ɛ́ di nɛ ɛbɛ́ ɔɔ, bhum tak aabaazodi ɛ́ mɛbɛ́ nɛ mɛbɛ́, etɛɛ náá, le gwyakaa ɛ́ nɛ bhum di ekwyil é tak ɛ.
Mbyak mɛgel! Bi aakwak ɛlii embɛɛ etɛp dáa, bela náá bi ɛ́ bɛmbee ɛ bot? Etɛɛ náá, nuub dyeebawyisal ɛ́ etɛp ee zelwood tɔ lyem ɛ.
Mbɛɛ mot nɔɔ etɛtɛ etɛp ee nyɛ di lii ɛ́ tɔ ɛkwom ɛ mbɛɛ esesɛɛ bɛ. Tyɛ wat nɛ mbee mot, nyɛ nɔɔ embee etɛp ee nyɛ di elii ɛ́, tɔ ɛkwom ɛ mbee esesɛɛ bɛ.
Betka mɛ lɛɛ bin, sa di tsɛɛtsɛ náá, dwoo Zɛɛb aazɛpɛ́ɛ bot ɛ, bot ɛ waatyaa sok bhwoob bɛtetɛp étɛp mɛlee mɛ bɛ nadi elee bot ɛ.
Etɛɛ náá, ye ɛ́ kɔ mɛkpa mɔ met ɛ wɔ aabela gham nɛghu ɛkwyɛ ndjɛ sɔs é mis mɛ Zɛɛb.»
É di'enek, bɛdhiiti bɛghaŋ ɛ mɛkana mɛ etsi nɛ eFalizyɛ zokazɛdji Yezu náá: «Lyoel! Bis kwyɛl ɛ́ náá, wɔ lyaal bis dhiiti ndem mɛbwala.»
Yezu ɛ́ boozɛbɔɔza nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Étɛp yé di náá, bot ɛ di ewaab mos dhiiti ndem mɛbwala pɛ daa Zɛɛb ɔ, di di bɛmbee ɛ bot, bot ɛ di ààbɛ sosoob é mis mɛ Zɛɛb ɔ? Tin, Zɛɛb aazolyaal bɛ ɛ́ ndem wat. Yɛ aadi ɛ́ kɔkɔ mbi ndem ngoolel-mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb Yonas nabee ɛ.
Ye ɛ́ tyɛ wat nɛ dáa ngoolel-mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb Yonas nakpaa emwos elɛl nɛ epum elɛl tɔ mɔ boo su ɛ, Sɛɛŋɛlɛ Mɔn Mot aabaasa ɛ́ emwos elɛl nɛ epum elɛl tɔ bɔs.
Dwoo Zɛɛb aazɛpɛ́ɛ bot ɛ, bot ɛ ghaada ɛ Niniv ɛ waazyɛ, zɛtyaa sok bhwoob bot ɛ di mos'aak étɛp ɛpit bɛ, deenek, bɛ neekwyesal ndjɛ sɔs. Etɛɛ náá, gwaka bɛ nagwak Yonas é ɛlyo bɛ mɛkpa mɛ Zɛɛb ɛ́, ye nabɛ ɛ́ bot ɛ Niniv naaliig elyem bɔɔ. Ye nyɔ ɛ́, bi gu náá, mot di nenak wak'aak, nyɛ eedhaa Yonas.
Dwoo Zɛɛb aazɛpɛ́ɛ bot ɛ, mɛkoozi mɛ moma dɛl ɛ di pɛ kyɛ bɔs ɛ́ waazyɛ, zɛtyaa sok bhwoob bot ɛ di mos'aak étɛp ɛpit bɛ, deenek, bɛ neekwyesal bɛ ndjɛ sɔs. Etɛɛ náá, nyɛ nadus ɛ́ pɛ mɛdhik mɛ ɛtseta, nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛgwak mbɛɛ mɛlyo mɛ etsoŋ e mɛkoozi Salomɔŋ. Ye nyɔ ɛ́ bi gu náá, mot di nenak wak'aak, nyɛ eedhaa Salomɔŋ!»
«É sok mbee sisim di ewyis tɔ nyel mot ɛ, nyɛ katɔ́ ɛ́ pɛ kyee bɔs bɛsyɛ di ààbɛ nɛ mɛdii ɛ, kɛsaa di nyɛ aakɛdi ɛ. É di nyɛ aakadi ààbela di nyɛ aadi ɔ,
nyɛ kake ɛ́ náá: “Mɛ pookosik pɛ ndjaŋ'am, ndjaa mɛ nawyis tɔ tak sok ɛ.” Tin, sika nyɛ aakasik ɛ, nyɛ aabela ndjaa tak toto, bɛ eezewaabal nɛ ɛkoobal yɛ.
Tin ɛ nyɛ aakatɔ́, kɛnɔɔ bɛdhiiti embee esisim bɛ na nyan-nyan bɛtɛn nɛ bɛbá di edhaa nyɛ nɛ embee mɛsa ɔ. Tin, bɔɔ djas kabula ɛ́ tɔ ndjaa tak, da ɛ́ be di tin. Deenek, tsik yenɔk mot eezepulel dhaa-dhaŋak yii nabɛ sok ɛ. Yɛ aadi ɛ́ deenek étɛp bɛmbee ɛ bot di pak'ena mos'aak.»
Yezu dinaa kuku ɛlii, wɔ gwaa bɔn nyɛɛg nɛ nyɛɛg zɛkum é di nyɛ nadi ɔ. Bɛ eezɛtyaa pɛ kel. Tin, bɛ nadi ekwyɛl ɛlii nɛ nɛ.
Dhiiti mot ɛ́ boozɛlɛɛ Yezu náá: «Beea, nyoog nɛ bɛdhyeeb bɔ ɛ́ pɛ kel, bɛ ɛpekwyɛl ɛlii nɛ nɔ.»
Yezu ɛ́ boozɛbɔɔza nɛ mot'enɔk náá: «Nyaag'am ɛ́ zɛ, da mɔn nyaag'am ɛ́ kadi bɛ zɛ?»
Bhii tak, nyɛ eezɛlyo bɛdjekel bɛ nɛ djin. Nyɛy náá: «Beeka nyaag'am, nɛ bɔn nyaag'am di wak e.
Etɛɛ náá, ye ɛ́ mot di esa ɛkwosak ɛ Saag'am di tɔ gwoo ɔ, di mɔn nyaag'am, kɛl'am nɛ nyaag'am.»
Dwoo tak wat, Yezu nadus ɛ pɛ ndjaa nyɛ nadi ɛ́, nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛtɔ́, kɛdisi pɛ ɛboŋ ɛ boo soob na djato-djato. Tin, nyɛ moo zɛlyo bot.
Wɔ gwaa, zukamwaa nɛ mot zokazɛmaala é di tak. Dáa nyɛ nabee náá, zukamwaa nɛ mot naazɛsɛɛga tin ɛ, nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛni tɔ dhiiti elɛɛd, nɔɔ nyel, disi. Nyɛ eezɛpus elɛɛd tɔ dii, ɛdhuu ɛ bot eezɛlik pɛ kyiid é ngwoob dii.
Mɛlyo mɛ nyɛ nalelyo bɛ ɛ nadyeebabu ɛ́ tɔ ekana. Tɔ ekana ee nyɛ nadi elyo bɛ nɛ yɛ ɛ, wat nabɛ ɛ́ kɔ ɛsu ɛ sɔsel mɛbhek. Tin, nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛke nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Dhiiti dwoo mot ngɔt natɔ́ pɛ pyeeb kɛsɔs bhek.
Dáa nyɛ nakadi emwam bhek tak ɛ, kyee wat nakwyit ɛ́ é gba. Wɔ gwaa enen zokazɛdɛ yɛ.
Yak kyee kakwyit ɛ́ kɔ bat ɛkok. Tin, ààkobɔya deenek, mɛbhek eezɛkwyil, etɛɛ náá, di tak nadi ɛ́, nɛ ba bɔs.
É di gwyes na ghɛ-ghɛ nakakas ɛ, wɔ gwaa mɛbhek djas zɛsyee, etɛɛ náá, ekaŋal e tak nabɛ ɛ́ ààni tɔ bɔs ɛdimɛpe.
Yak pak mɛbhek nakakwyit ɛ́ tɔ engwyinini. Wɔ gwaa, engwyinini binek zokawyee, kala kɔ mɛbhek ààbɛ nɛ dáa mɛbhek wyee ɛnyɔɛpe.
Tin, mɛbhek mɛ nakakwyit kɔ mbɛɛ bɔs ɛ, naakwyil ɛnyɔɛpe, wɔ gwaa ye kwyil bhum. É kwos wat, bhum mɛkam-mɛlɛl, é yak mɛkam-mɛtɛn nɛ wat, é yak tak bhum dhet.»
Bhii tak, Yezu eezɛke náá: «Yɛ bɛ náá, bi ɛ́ nɛ mɛlɔ mɛ ɛgwak ɔɔ, gwakeka ɛnyɔɛpe!»
Tin, bɛdjekel eezɛtiila pɛ pak Yezu nadi ɛ́, bɛ ɛ́ boozɛdji nyɛ náá: «Étɛp yé wɔ di elii nɛ nɔɔ tɔ ekana?»
Wɔ gwaa nyɛ zɛbɔɔza nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Biyɔ, bi eezedjɛaa etsoŋ ɛgu ɛsuk ɛ Ɛyoŋ ɛ di tɔ gwoo ɛ. Yɛ bɛ bɛsɔ bin ɔ, bɛ dinaa ààpaamɛt ɛsuk ɛ tak.
Etɛɛ náá, mot aadi nɛ ba bim sonok ɔ, bɛ waabil nyɛ dhiiti, étɛp ye neebu. Tin, mot aakadi toto ààbɛ nɛ sonok ɔ, bɛ waadɛk nyɛ dɔɔ nɛ eghutu-ghutu nyɛ lik nɛ yɛ ɛ.
Étɛp tak ɛ́ mɛ di elii nɛ nɔɔ tɔ ekana. Etɛɛ náá, bɛ ɛ́ nɛ ghwyil ɛgwyák nɛ mis, ààbee. Bɛ ɛ́ nɛ ghwyil ɛgwak nɛ mɛlɔ, dhi bɛ di ààsiiza sa ye di ekwyɛl ɛlɛɛ ɛ.
Ye ɛ́ deenek ɛ́, etɛp ee ngoolel-mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb Ezayi nalɛɛ ɛ́ aabela ɛsuk. Nyɛ nabɛ ɛ́, nyɛ eeke náá: “Bi ɛ́ waagwak ɛnyɔɛpe, bi ɛ́ aanàkwaagu ɛsuk ɛ tɛp tak. Bi ɛ́ waabee nɛ mis, bi aanàkwaasiiza ɛsuk ɛ tak.
Etɛɛ náá, bot ɛ mbyak'ak nɛ kalyel elyem dhaa nyel. Bɛ nɛ kasa maa-ɛlɔ dhaa tyɛ. Bɛ eezedipal mis mɔɔ étɛp bɛ ɛ́ zɛkɛbee. Bɛ eediyal mɛlɔ mɔɔ, ye nàgwak. Bɛ eezelu ɛtselal ɛ lɔɔ náá, ye nàgwak sonok. Tin, bɛ tok nɛ ghwyil ɛbula, dum koŋ nɛ Zɛɛb etɛɛ náá, Zɛɛb neetsik bɛ.”»
«Yɛ kabɛ biyɔ bɛ ɛmet ɔ, mɛnyɔ nɛ nen, etɛɛ náá, mis men ɛpebee, mɛlɔ men ɛpegwak!
Mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ́ etɛp ee tsɛɛtsɛ náá: Bɛtɛ nɛ bɛngoolel ɛ mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb, bot ɛ epiki naadyeebakwos ɛbee nɛ ɛgwak sa bi di ebee nɛ gwak mos'aak. Bɛ ààpabela bhwoob ɛbee nɛ gwak sa bi di ebee mos'aak.»
«Biyɔ, bot bak! Gwakeka ɛsuk ɛ kana sɔsel mɛbhek:
Bɔs é ngwoob gba di bhek nakwyit ɔ, ye kwyɛl ɛlyaal ɛ bot ɛ nadi egwak etɛp Ɛyoŋ ɛ Zɛɛb, bɛ kadi ɛ́, ààmɛt ɛsuk ɛ tak ɔ. Tin, Mbee Mot eetuula, nyɛ eezɛdɛk mɛbhek bɛaa tɔ elyem bɔɔ ɛ.
Bɛdhiiti bot kadi ɛ́ dáa mɛbhek nakwyit kɔ bat ɛkok ɛ, é sok bɛ di egwak-gwakak mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb ɛ, bɛ nɛ dyeebamyaala tɔ elyem bɔɔ.
Tin, bɛ ààpakabet náá, mɛkpa mɛ tak pookoni bɛ tɔ ebhum elyem ɛnyɔɛpe. Bɛ kadi ɛ́, ààwa zii ɛbuɛpe tɔ ɛbaal ɛ mɛkpa mɛ tak. Tin, é ghɛŋ mezuk nɛ mɛbhowal aatuula bɛ kɔ ɛsu ɛ mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb ɔ, ɛliig ɛ lɔɔ koŋ nɛ Zɛɛb ààbɔya.
Bɛdhiiti tɔ len gwak mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb ɛ dáa kyee mɛbhek nakwyit tɔ engwyinini ɛ. Bɛ nɛ gwak mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb, ye kabela ɛ náá, yɔbɔ elyem ɛ́ tɔ ɛwyeeb ɛ esa e bɔs, mɛvu mɛ di ekɔɔ bot kɔ bɔs'ak ɛ, nɛ mbee esiiza tɔ elyem bɔɔ di enyal mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb ɛ. Tin, mɛbhek mɛ tak kadi ɛ́, ààwum.
Bɛdhiiti bot kadi ɛ́ dáa mɛbhek nakwyit kɔ mbɛɛ bɔs ɛ. Bɛ ɛpegwak mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb, myaal yɛ nɛ lyem wat, bɛ kakɛ ɛ́ dáa Zɛɛb kwyɛl ɛ. Tin, yɛ waawum ɛbuɛpe. Yak mɛkam-mɛlɛl, yak mɛkam-mɛtɛn nɛ ngɔt, yak dhet.»
Yezu zokabaalɛɛ bɛdhiiti kana sis: «Beeka dhiiti sonok di tyee Ɛyoŋ ɛ di tɔ gwoo ɛ: Dhiiti mot ngɔt naabɛ mbɛɛ mɛbhek tɔ pyeeb'ɛ.
Yak pum, é sok bot ɛ dɛl djas nadi é gɔ́ ɛ, wɔ gwaa dhiiti mot mɛbhuka mɛ zokazɛbɛ nyɛ mbee bhek tɔ pyeeb, nyɛ eezɛnɔɔ nyel sik.
Dáa mɛbhek nakawyee ɛ, yɛ eezɛwum, mbee mɛbhek menek eebaazɛwyee yɛ.
Tin, bot ɛ mɛsa mɛ nakuma pyeeb tak ɛ́ boozɛlɛɛ nɛ kukuma yɔbɔ náá: “Ghɛŋ, wɔ nabɛ tɔ pyeeb'ɔ ɛ́ mbɛɛ mɛbhek, etsal é? Ha yak mbee bhek kadus paa?”
Nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛbɔɔza nɛ nɔɔ náá: “Ye ɛ́ mot mɛbhuka ɛ́ sa esesɛɛ binek.” Bhii tak, bot ɛ mɛsa ɛ́ boozɛdji nyɛ náá: “Bis sa dáa, wɔ kwyɛl ɛ́, bis kɛdis embee mɛbhek menek é?”
Nyɛ eebaazɛbɔɔza nɛ nɔɔ náá: “Hoo! Ààbɛ! Etɛɛ náá, bi ɛ́ kɛgu yɛ ɔɔ, bi ɛ́ nɛ ghwyil ɛgu dɔɔ nɛ mbɛɛ mɛbhek lɔɔg wat nɛ yiizaag.
Deenek, betka náá, mɛbhek menek djas wyee lɔɔg wat, kɛkum dwoo yɛ aakabɛ náá, bi moo kɛdis ɛ. Tin, mɛ waalɛɛ nɛ bot aakɛdis ɔ náá, bɛ pookokan sok ɛdis ɛ mbee bhek, da bɛ ɛ́ kɔl yɛ é di wat étɛp bɛ needik yɛ. Bhii tak ɛ bɛ aakasɛɛg mbɛɛ bhek, kwom kɔ taŋ'am.”»
Wɔ gwaa Yezu baazɛlɛɛ bɛ yak kana sis, nyɛy náá: «Ɛyoŋ ɛ di tɔ gwoo ɛ, ye ɛ́ dáa bhek le di edjɛ bhum di edjóoaa mutaad ɛ dhiiti mot nakɛbɛ pɛ tɔ pyeeb'ɛ ɛ.
Bhum mutaad ɛ́ bhek na sikɛ-sikɛ dhaa mɛbhek djas di ebɛaa kɔ ɛko ɛ bɔs ɛ nɛ mɛtɔɔl. Tin, é ghɛŋ yɛ di ekwyil ɛ, mɛbɔk mɛ di edhaa ele e bok djas nɛ mɛbɔk. Ye kadi ɛ́, ye moo le di náá, enen ɛpebatazɛlóo mɛk mɔɔ kɔ elɛɛ e tak.»
Yezu zokabaazɛdjɛ bɛdhiiti kana. Nyɛy nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Ɛyoŋ ɛ di tɔ gwoo ɛ, ye ɛ́ dáa moma di enɔɔ ba mɔɔ deez pu leviid, sɛɛg nɛ bɛtɛ nɛ pu falin, étɛp nyɛ neesa tsim mapa nɛ yɛ ɛ. Mɔɔ ɛwala bhii tak, tsim'enek djas kadi ɛ́, yɛ eezeghamta.»
Mɛlyo mɛ Yezu nadyeebadjɛ mɛdhuu mɛ bot ɛ nabe-bɛ ɛ́ tɔ ekana. Nyɛ nabɛ ɛ́ ààdjɛ dhiiti mɛlyo, ààlɛɛ yɛ tɔ kana.
Nyɛ nasesa deenek ɛ́, etɛɛ náá, sa bɛngoolel ɛ mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb nalɛɛ ɛ́ neebela ɛsuk. Ye nabɛ ɛ́ bɛngoolel ɛ mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb naake náá: «Mɛ waalii nɛ nen tɔ ekana. Tin, mɛ waalɛɛ bɛ esa ee nadi syela kana bɔs nakusel ɛ.»
Bhii tak, Yezu zokazɛdus tɔ ɛdhuu ɛ bot, nyɛ eezɛsik, tɔ́ pɛ ndjaa. Tin, bɛdjekel ɛ́ boozɛzyɛ pɛ nyɛ nadi ɛ. Bhii tak, bɛ ɛ́ boozɛke nɛ nɛ náá: «Lɛɛa bis ɛsuk ɛ kana mbee bhek tɔ pyeeb.»
É di'enek, Yezu ɛ́ boozɛni elɛɛ bɛdjekel bɛ náá: «Ye ɛ́ Sɛɛŋɛlɛ Mɔn Mot ɛ di bɛ mbɛɛ mɛbhek.
Pyeeb kwyɛl ɛlyaal ɛ́ mɛdhik djas di kɔ bɔs ɛ. Mbɛɛ mɛbhek kwyɛl ɛlyaal ɛ́ bot ɛ di ekɛ dáa Ɛyoŋ ɛ Zɛɛb di kwyɛl ɛ. Mbee bhek kalyaal ɛ́ bot ɛ Mbee Mot.
Mot mɛbhuka nazɛbɛ bhek ɔ, kabɛ ɛ́ Dim mot mɛkɔŋ. Dwoo ɛkɛbɔ́k bhum kabɛ ɛ́ ɛsi ɛ bɔs, bot ɛ mɛsa kwyɛl ɛlyaal ɛ́ efofop.
Dáa ye di náá, embee mɛbhek ɛ́ waatsaalaa étɛp ɛkɛmwasaa tɔ du ɛ, yɛ aabaazodi ɛ́ deenek é ɛsi ɛ bɔs.
Sɛɛŋɛlɛ Mɔn Mot ɛ́ waalwom efofop bɛ, nyɛ waadis tɔ Ɛyoŋ ɛ lɛ bot djas di ezɛm ɛmyaal ɛ bɔn nyɛɛg bɔɔ ɔ, zɛnɔɔ bot ɛ mbee mɛsa.
Nyɛ waamwas bɛ tɔ boo du di egoo na kɔm-kɔm ɛ. Penek, bot ɛbuɛpe aadi ɛ́ tɔ mɛgwyɛ nɛ ɛkwaal ɛ mɛtsok.
Tin, bot ɛ epiki ɛ́ waakas tɔ Ɛyoŋ ɛ Sɛɛg'ɔɔ dáa gwyes. Yɛ bɛ náá, bi ɛ́ nɛ mɛlɔ mɛ ɛgwak ɔɔ, gwakeka ɛnyɔɛpe.»
«Ɛyoŋ ɛ di tɔ gwoo ɛ́ dáa di ɛkwom ɛ epata di syela tɔ pyeeb ɛ. Dáa dhiiti mot nakabela yɛ ɛ, nyɛ ɛ́ boobaazɛsyel yɛ é di sis tɔ pyeeb'enek. É di'enek, nyɛ moo ɛ́ tɔ mɛmyaala, etɛɛ náá, nyɛ nadi ekwyɛl ɛkɛbɔmsa esa bɛ djas étɛp nyɛ neezɛbɔm pyeeb tak.
«Ɛyoŋ ɛ di tɔ gwoo ɛ baanɔŋel ɛ́, nɛ mot di esaa esa e ghoŋ étɛp nyɛ neebɔmsa ɔ. Nyɛ dyeebasaŋ ɛ́ tɛtɛ esa e ghoŋ na nyenyɔ-nyɔ.
Yɛ kabɛ náá, nyɛ eebela yii na nyenyɔnyɔ dhaa bɛsɔ djas nɛ boo mɛtaŋ ɔɔ, nyɛ kakɛbɔmsa ɛ́ esa bɛ djas étɛp nyɛ neezɛbɔm yii zaag na boo mɛtaŋ.»
«Ɛyoŋ ɛ di tɔ gwoo ɛ, baanɔŋel ɛ́, nɛ ɛwyet bɛ di ela tɔ dii ɛ. Ɛwyet ɛ tak dyeebamɛt ɛ́ ekɔkɔ bɛsu djas.
Tin, yɛ bɛ náá, ɛwyet eezelwood ɔɔ, bɛlael ɛ mɛwyet kadul yɛ ɛ, zyɛ nɛ yɛ pɛ kyiid, da bɛ ɛ́ nɔɔ mɛnyel disi étɛp ɛdis ɛ́ bɛsu ɛ́ bel é ɛwyet ɛ tak ɔ. Tin, bɛ kabɛk bɛ edi ɛ́ bɛkak. Bɛ nɔɔ bɛtɛtɛ, wa tɔ mɛbɔɔl, yɛ kabɛ bɛ na sikɛ-sikɛ nɛ embee e tak ɔ, bɛ kamwas bɛ ɛ́ mwasak.
Ɛsi ɛ bɔs aadi ɛ́ deenek: Zɛɛb ɛ́ waadhis efofop bɛ zɛwa mbek pak mbee bot nɛ bot ɛ epiki.
Etɛɛ náá, mbee bot ɛ́ waakɛlóoaa tɔ boo du na kɔm-kɔm. Tin, bot ɛbuɛpe waadje mɛgwyɛ nɛ ɛkwaal ɛ mɛtsok.»
Yezu zokazɛdji bɛ náá: «Bi eemɛt ɛsuk ɛ etɛp binek é?» Bɔɔ náá: «Iyoo»
Yezu ɛ́ boozɛke nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Étɛp tak ɛ́ di náá: ghaa mɛkana mɛ etsi djas di ekwos ɛdi djekel étɛp Ɛyoŋ ɛ di tɔ gwoo ɔ, nyɛ ɛ́ dáa kuma mot di enɔɔ ɛkwom ɛ lɛ pɛ tɔ mɛvu mɛ na mwa zɛnɔɔ yii na bes ɛ.»
Bhii Yezu nasilal ɛlyo bot tɔ ekana binek ɛ, nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛnɔɔ nyel, tɔ́ yɛ.
Nyɛ natɔ́ ɛ́ pɛ dɛl ɛ nyɛ nawyee kɔ tak ɛ. Nyɛ moo tin elyo bot tɔ ndjaa mendjaala mɛ eYuda. Tin, bot ɛ nadi egwak nyɛ ɔ, naadyeebadjoka ɛbuɛpe, bɛ moo tin eke náá: «Nyɛ kɛbela yak kwaambi etsoŋ nɛ mbi yak endem e mɛbwala paa?
Mɔn'ak tok wak mɔn salpande? Ye tok Maali di wak nyɛɛg é? Zak bɛ nɛ Zozɛf, nɛ Simɔŋ, zɛnɔɔ Yudas tok bɛdhyeeb é?
Haa ye tok bɛkɛl mena nɛ bɛ nɔɔ di mɛlu djas é di wat'aak é? Ha nyɛ kɛbela yenek mɛbwala paa?»
Egeka binek djas ɛ́ nasa náá, ɛmyaal nɛ ɛbwaalel ɛ bot binɔk djas dus kɔ Yezu. É di'enek, Yezu ɛ́ boozɛke nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Ngoolel-mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb dyeebaduwalaa ɛ́, pɛ kyee sis, ààbɛ pɛ kɔ dɛl ɛ nyɛ nabyel kɔ tak ɛ, nɛghu tɔ ndjaŋ'ɛ nɛ tɔ bil'ɛ.»
Yezu nabɛ ɛ́ ààsa bɛtɛ nɛ endem e mɛbwala tin, étɛp mɛlyel mɛ elyem bɔɔ.
É ghɛŋ tak Elood mot nadi mɛkoozi kɔ Yeluzalɛm ɔ, zokagwak menduk ɛ Yezu.
Nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛke nɛ bot ɛ mɛsa mɛ náá: «Ye ɛ́ Zaŋ Nduuel-bot ɛ baagom ɛ́ gomak é! Étɛp tak ɛ́ nyɛ di nɛ ghwyil ɛsa bɛtɛ nɛ yenek endem e mɛbwala.»
Nɛ tsɛɛtsɛ, ye nabɛ ɛ́ mɛkoozi Elood naalwom náá, bɛ mɛt Zaŋ, da bɛ ɛ́ kɔl nyɛ nɛ eghwooz. Bhii tak, bɛ naakɛwa nyɛ é membok. Ye nabɛ ɛ́ étɛp Elodiaad, mwaa tel Filip,
etɛɛ náá, Zaŋ naake nɛ Elood náá: «Dum nɛ etsi ɛ Moiiz, ye ààgoka náá, wɔy dɛk Elodiaad mwaa tel'ɔ!»
Étɛp tak ɛ Elood nakadi esaa dáa nyɛ aasa étɛp nyɛ neegó Zaŋ. Nyɛ nadi ekaab ɛdhuu ɛ bot ɛ mbyak eYuda, etɛɛ náá, bɔɔ djas nakeke ɛ́ náá, Zaŋ Nduuel-bot nabɛ ɛ́ ngoolel-mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb.
Tinaak, é dwoo ɛbyoŋ ɛ Elood di eduwal ɛbyel ɛlɛɛ ɛ, ɛsyes ɛ Elodiaad naabɔl é mis mɛ bɛdjoŋ ɛ nadjóoaa é ɛbyoŋ ɔ. Elood naadyeebamyaala nɛ ko zɛŋ ɛsyes ɛ tak.
Tin, mɛkoozi Elood ɛ́ booke nɛ ɛsyes ɛ mɔɔ moma yenɔk náá: «Myoŋ nɛ mɛsoŋ mam! Waaba esa ee lyem'ɔ kwyɛl ɛ djas, mɛ waadjɛ wɔ!»
Ɛsyes ɛlenɔk zokazɛwaab sa nyɛɛg nalɛɛ nyɛ ɛ. Nyɛy náá: «Mɛ kwyɛl ɛ́, wɔ djɛ mɛ nenak yak lo ɛ Zaŋ Nduuel-bot kɛla kɔ pɛt kongo na pyaaz!»
Wɔ gwaa, ye sa Mɛkoozi Elood nyel «wɔyɔŋ» nɛ ghoŋ. Tin, nyɛ nabɛ ɛ́ ààkabɛ nɛ tyee nyɛ pɛɛ, etɛɛ náá, nyɛ naazetuwal myoŋ nɛ mɛsoŋ mɛ é mis mɛ bɛdjoŋ. Nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛlɛɛ nɛ bot bɛ náá, bɛ djɛ nyɛ sa nyɛ nawaab ɛ.
Tin, nyɛ eezɛlwom dhiiti mot étɛp nyɛ neekɛtsaal lo ɛ Zaŋ Nduuel-bot pɛ nyɛ nadi tɔ membok ɛ.
Wɔ gwaa, bɛ zokazyɛ nɛ lo ɛ Zaŋ kɔ pɛt kongo na pyaaz, bɛ eezɛdjɛ ɛsyes ɛ mɔɔ moma yenɔk. Tin, ɛsyes ɛ tak ɛ́ boonɔɔ yɛ, kɛdjɛ nɛ nyɛɛg.
Tin, bɛdjekel ɛ Zaŋ ɛ́ boozɛnɔɔ muu'ɛ, kɛdel. Bhii tak, bɛ ɛ́ boozɛtɔ́ kɛbaŋa Yezu etɛp djas nadhaŋ ɛ.
Dáa Yezu nagwak etɛp binek djas ɛ, nyɛ ɛ́ boodus tin, nyɛ eezɛni tɔ elɛɛd, tɔ́, kɛsaa di ɛwala pɛ bot aadi ààbee nyɛ ɛ. Ghuna ɛdhuu ɛ bot naagu ze nyɛ natɔ́ ɛ, wɔ gwaa, zukamwaa nɛ mot nadus pɛ mɛl mɛ nadi é engwoob tin ɔ, zɛdu nyɛ nɛ mɛko mbaka-mbaka nɛ dii.
Dáa Yezu nasul tɔ elɛɛd ɛ, nyɛ kabee ɛ́ ɛdhuu ɛ bot binɔk, ye nabɛ ghoŋ naasa nyɛ ɛlyelɛpe. Nyɛ moo tin etsik bot mɛbɛ́ mɔɔ.
Dáa bɛ nabee náá, dwoo moo ɛ́ bikoko ɛ, bɛdjekel ɛ́ boozɛtiila pɛ daa lɛ. Bɔɔ nɛ nɛ náá: «Dwoo eezeleega. Tɔ kakoŋ'ak, ye tok nɛ bɔɔ mɛl. Swaala bot bak étɛp bɛ neekɛsaa edee pɛ bɔɔ mɛl mɛ di é engwoob'aak.»
Yezu ɛ́ boozɛbɔɔza nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Yɛ ààgoka náá, bɛ swaalaa, djɛka bɛ edee biyɔ bɛ ɛmet!»
Tin, bɛ ɛ́ boozɛke nɛ Yezu náá: «Zuka nɛ sa bis di nɛ yɛ wak ɛ, ye ɛ́ etsim e emapa etɛn nɛ bɛsu ɛbá.»
Yezu ɛ́ boozɛke nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Dhaka nɛ yɛ wak.»
É di'enek, nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛke nɛ mɛdhuu mɛ bot ɛ nadi tin ɔ náá, bɛ disi mendiindil kɔ bɔɔ eka e na bes. Bhii tak, Yezu ɛ́ boozɛnɔɔ emapa etɛn nɛ bɛsu ɛbá binek, nyɛ eezɛben mis pɛ ɛko, zɛghaapɛɛ Zɛɛb. Nyɛ eezɛpyak emapa, nɔɔ, djɛ bɛdjekel bɛ. Bɛdjekel ɛ́ boozɛnɔɔ yɛ, kaa, djɛ ɛdhuu ɛ bot ɛ nadi tin ɔ.
Mot nɛ mot naadɛ, djil. Wɔ gwaa, bɛdjekel baabula nɛ mɛbhubhwak mɛ emapa nɛ bɛsu ɛ nalik ɛ, ye naalwoodal mɛbhwaa kam nɛ ebá.
Bot ɛ nadɛ emapa nɛ bɛsu binek ɔ, nabɛ ɛ́ tyee botom bɛmil ɛtɛn, ààkalaa mɛtaŋ mɛ boa nɛ bɔɔ dhyeeb.
Batsa bhii tak, Yezu eezelwom bɛdjekel bɛ náá, bɛ ni tɔ elɛɛd, tsaal, tɔ́ pɛ yii kyiid boo soob na djato-djato. Tin, nyɛ eezɛlik é ɛswaal ɛ zukamwaa nɛ bot binɔk pɛ mendjaa mɔɔ.
Bhii nyɛ nazeswaal bɛ ɛ, nyɛ ɛ́ boo zɛbyet kɔ ɛtsok étɛp ɛkɛdjaala Zɛɛb. Dáa ye nabɛ náá, dwoo nabɛ ɛ́ yɛ eezesila ɛ, nyɛ nakalik tin ɛ́ nyɛ ɛmet.
Elɛɛd nabɛ ɛ́ ye moo ɛtsetaɛpe nɛ ɛboŋ. Wɔ gwaa, boo ghuu zɛpupal kɔ dii, tin, bhuuge moo tin enyuŋa e elɛɛd, etɛɛ náá, pup nadi ebulal bɛ elɛɛd pɛ bhis.
Kuku pum, tɔ ghooghom, wɔ gwaa Yezu zɛsul kɔ dii, nyɛ moo tin edu bɛdjekel bɛ. Nyɛ nadi ekɛ ɛ́ nɛ mɛko mɛ kɔ dii.
Dáa bɛdjekel bɛ nabee nyɛ ekɛ kɔ dii ɛ, bwoo naasa bɛ ɛlyelɛpe. Bɔɔ náá: «Nwyak ɛ́ dim!» Bɛ moo tin etsim nɛ bɛbebwol.
Batsa deenek, Yezu eezɛdjóo bɛ. Nyɛy náá: «Nàbemka ba. Saka mɛghaaz. Ye ɛ́ mam.»
Dáa nyɛ nabee deenek ɛ, Pyɛɛd ɛ́ boozɛke nɛ Yezu náá: «Ghɛŋ, yɛ bɛ náá, ye ɛ́ tsɛɛtsɛ náá, ye ɛ́ wɔy ɔɔ, kea náá, mɛ kɛ kɔ mɛdii, zyɛ pɛ wɔ di'enek.»
Yezu ɛ́ boozɛke nɛ nɛ náá: «Dha!» Tin, Pyɛɛd ɛ́ boozɛwyis tɔ elɛɛd, sul kɔ dii. É di'enek, Pyɛɛd moo kɛ kɔ dii nɛ mɛko mɛ, etɔ́ pɛ kyee Yezu nadi ɛ́.
Tinaak, dáa nyɛ nabee náá, ghuu naalyel pyep ɛ. Wɔ gwaa bwoo zɛsa nyɛ. É di tak wat, nyɛ moo ediida tɔ dii, nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛtsim ɛlyelɛpe náá: «Ghɛŋ, tsika mɛ!»
É di tak wat, Yezu ɛ́ boozɛsɛɛb mbɔ, wɔ gwaa, nyɛ zokamɛt Pyɛɛd, nyɛ ɛ́ booke nɛ nɛ náá: «Étɛp yé wɔ be mɛso? Ɛmyaal ɛ lɔ ààdyeebabɔk.»
Bhii tak, bɔɔ djas bɛbá eezɛgo tɔ elɛɛd. Tin, ghuu yenek eezɛsila.
Tin, bɛdjekel ɛ nadi tɔ elɛɛd ɔ, zokazyɛ, zɛkwyit mɛboŋ si mɛko ɛ Yezu. Bɔɔ nɛ nɛ náá: «Ye ɛ́ tsɛɛtsɛ náá, wɔ ɛ́ Mɔn Zɛɛb!»
Bhii bɛ nasɛɛ dii ɛ, bɛ ɛ́ boozɛtɔ́ pɛ kyee dik Ghenezalɛt.
Dáa bɛ nakum é di'enek ɛ, wɔ gwaa, bot ɛ dɛl ɛ tak zokazɛgwyak Yezu. Tin, lɛŋ ɛ ɛkum ɛ Yezu zokadjala mɛl djas, wɔ gwaa, bɛ zokazyɛ nɛ membel djas bɛ nadi nɛ nɔɔ ɛ.
Bot ɛ tak ɛ́ boozɛdjaala nɛ Yezu náá, nyɛ bet membel djas, bɔɔ bɛ ɛmet zokee-keeak ɛlɔ ɛ ndjookuwa yɛ. Tin, bot djas namɛt nyɛ ɔ nabɛ ɛ́ bɛ naatsak.
Dhiiti dwoo eFalizyɛ nɛ bɛghaŋ ɛ mɛkana mɛ etsi naadus pɛ Yeluzalɛm zɛboma nɛ Yezu, bɛ ɛ́ boozɛdji nyɛ náá:
«Étɛp yé bɛdjekel bɔ di ààduwal etsi e bɛbhaab bina nalik ɛ? Etɛɛ náá, bɔɔ bɛ ààgwyii mɛmbɔ, bɛ di náá, bɛ moo dɛ edee ɔ.»
Yezu ɛ́ boozɛbɔɔza nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Étɛp yé bi di ààkɛ dáa etsi e Zɛɛb di lɛɛ ɛ? Bi kwyɛl ɛkɛ ɛ́ dáa etsi e mbyak'en di elɛɛ ɛ!
Etɛɛ náá, Zɛɛb ke ɛ́ náá: “Dila soog nɛ nyoog. Mot ɛ di ekal sɛɛg nɛ nyɛɛg ɔɔ, nyɛ goka ɛ́ nɛ ɛsyee.”
Yɛ kabɛ biyɔ ɔ, bi lyo bot ɛ́ náá, mot ɛ́ nɛ ghwyil ɛlɛɛ nɛ sɛɛg nɛ nyɛɛg náá: “Esa ee mɛ waakwyee bin nɛ ye ɛ, mɛ eenɔɔ kɛdjɛ étɛp ɛtuud ɛ Zɛɛb nɛ yɛ.”
Mot ɛ́ ke deenek ɔɔ, nyɛ tok nɛ gwyes ɛkwyee sɛɛg nɛ nyɛɛg. É di'enek, bot ɛbuɛpe ɛpesa náá, mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb zɛhoola, étɛp ɛsa nɛ ɛduwal etsi bin biyɔ bɛ ɛmet.
Bot ɛ mɛdjhaaz pɛ ɛko, bhimis pɛ si! Ngoolel-mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb Ezayi nabɛ ɛ́ nɛ gham nɛ nyɛ nɛ ke náá:
“Bot ɛ mbyak'ak duwal mɛ ɛ́ duwela mɛkɔŋ, elyem bɔɔ ɛ́ pɛ kyee sis.
Zɛɛga mendjaala mɔɔ, ye ɛ́ yii toto é mis mam, etɛɛ náá, mɛlyo mɛ bɛ di elyo ɛ́ mɛlyo mɛ epuud.”»
Wɔ gwaa Yezu zokazɛdjóo ɛdhuu ɛ bot, nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛke nɛ bɔɔ djas náá: «Biyɔ djas, gwakeka mɛ, da bi ɛ́ mɛt sa mɛ di elii'aak:
Ye tok sa mot di ewa tɔ nuub'ɛ ɛ, di epul mot é mis ɛ Zɛɛb ɛ. Ye ɛ́ sa wyis tɔ nuub ɛ di epul mot tak é mis ɛ Zɛɛb.»
Tin, bɛdjekel ɛ́ boozyɛ, zɛlɛɛ Yezu náá: «Wɔ nɛ gu náá, etɛp ee wɔ lii'enek eedyeebakpaa eFalizyɛ tɔ elyem é?»
Nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛbɔɔza nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Mɛbhek djas di náá, ye tok Saag'am di tɔ gwoo ɛ nabɛ ɛ́, yɛ aadi ɛ́ guaa.»
Yezu ɛ́ boozɛke náá: «Betka bɛ. Yɛ ɛ́ bɛ na edhim ɛ di edjɛɛd bɛsɔ bɔɔ bɛ na edhim. Tin, ye nyɔ bi ɛ́ gu náá: Yɛ bɛ náá, ye ɛ́ mot edhim ɛ di edul sɔ mot edhim ze ɔɔ, ɛsik ɛ tak ɛ náá, bɔɔ djas ɛ́ waadjoola tɔ guk.»
Tin, Pyɛɛd ɛ́ boozɛke náá: «Lɛɛa bis sa ekana binek di ekwyɛl ɛlɛɛ ɛ.»
Yezu ɛ́ boozɛbɔɔza náá: «Dɔɔ nɛ biyɔ pe, bi tok nɛ etsoŋ ɛtiibal é?
Bi ààgu náá, esa djas mot di ewa tɔ nuub ɛ, dhaŋ ɛ́ tɔ mɔ yɛ. Bhii tak, ye kakɛwyis ɛ́ tɔ́ ɛbyeed é?»
Bhii tak, nyɛ eebaazɛke náá: «Sa di ewyis tɔ nuub mot ɛ ààpul edɛɛ e mot. Ye ɛ sa di edus tɔ lyem ɛ di epul edɛɛ e mot.
Etɛɛ náá, embee egeka dus ɛ́ tɔ lyem mot. Yɛ ɛ́ esiiza ɛ di elwom bot náá, bɛ gó bot, bɛ sa mɛzɔ, bɛ sa mɛpam, bɛ djii, nɛ ɛsu bɔn nyɛɛg bɔɔ etɛp nɛ mɛbhekel.
Yenek ɛ́ esesɛɛ ee di epul ɛgwakel pak bot nɛ Zɛɛb ɛ. Yɛ kabɛ tɛp ɛdɛ edee ààgwyii mɛmbɔ ɔ, yɛ ààpul mot é mis mɛ Zɛɛb.»
Yezu zokadus tin, tɔ́ pɛ kyee dik eghaada Tiid nɛ Sidɔn.
Dhiiti moma dɛl ɛ Kanan nadidi kɔ kyee dik ɛ tak ɔ, zokazyɛ pɛ daa lɛ, nyɛ moo tin etsim náá: «Ghɛŋ, Mɔn Dhavid, geka mɛ ghoŋ, dhiiti kwaambi mbee sisim ɛpedhek mɔn ɛsyes ɛ lam, nyɛ tok ɛnyɔɛpe!»
Tin, Yezu gwyem'enek, ààbis moma tak. Wɔ gwaa bɛdjekel bɛ zokazɛke nɛ Yezu náá: «Sɔa nyɛ, étɛp nyɛ ɛpedu mena nɛ etsim lookɛbok mos.»
É di'enek, Yezu ɛ́ boozɛbɔɔza náá: «Mɛ nadhisaa ɛ́, kɔ ɛsu ɛ bot ɛ mbyak Yisalaɛl di bɛ eezediib dáa bɔɔ ebhata ee di ààbɛ nɛ mbaalel ɔ.»
Tin, wɔ gwaa moma yenɔk zɛkwyit mɛboŋ si mɛko ɛ Yezu. Nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛke nɛ nɛ náá: «Ghɛŋ, kwyeea mɛ!»
Yezu ɛ́ boozɛbɔɔza nɛ nɛ náá: «Yɛ àànyɔ náá, bɔn bɛbhyɛ djɛaa emapa di náá, ye ɛ́ yii bɔn bot ɛ.»
Wɔ gwaa moma yenɔk baazɛpesal náá: «Wɔ ɛ́ nɛ gham, Ghɛŋ! Tin, bɛbhyɛ aazodedɛ ɛ́ bɔɔ eghutu-ghutu emapa dyeebakwyit é mesa kukuma yɔɔ ɛ.»
Tin, Yezu eezɛke nɛ moma yenɔk náá: «Hee moma! Ɛdum ɛ koŋ ɛ lɔ nɛ Zɛɛb nɛ bɔk. Étɛp tak ɛ Zɛɛb ɛ́ waadjɛ wɔ sa lyem'ɔ di ekwos ɛ.» É di tak wat, wɔ gwaa mɔn zokatsak.
Bhii tak, Yezu eezɛdus tin, nyɛ eezɛtɔ́ pɛ ɛboŋ ɛ boo soob na djato-djato Ghalile. Nyɛ eezɛbyet kɔ mɔɔ ɛtsok, nɔɔ nyel, disi.
Bot mɛdhuu-mɛdhuu zokazyɛ nɛ bot ɛ edjam, bot ɛ edhim, eboka e bot, ebubu e bot, nɛ bɛtɛ nɛ membel. Bɛ eezɛsil bɛ sok bhwoob'ɛ. Tin, Yezu zokazɛtsik bɛ.
Ɛdhuu ɛ bot naadyeebadjoka dáa bɛ nadi ebee ebubu moo lii ɛ, bot ɛ edjam nɛ eboka moo kɛ ɛ, bot ɛ edhim moo nyaa sok ɛ. Bɛ moo tin eduwal Zɛɛb Yisalaɛl.
Yezu eezɛdjóo bɛdjekel bɛ. Nyɛ ɛ́ booke nɛ nɔɔ náá: «“Ha” kpaa-ghoŋ nɛ ɛdhuu ɛ bot bak e! Mena nɛ bɛ nɔɔ moo mos ɛ́ mɛlu mɛlɛl e di wat. Bɛ tokapɛ nɛ edee e dek. Mɛ tok nɛ ghwyil ɛswaal bɛ pɛ mendjaa mɔɔ tɔ emɔ toto, bɛ waazuk, ze ɛ ze.»
Tin, bɛdjekel bɛ ɛ́ boozɛke nɛ nɛ náá: «Mena aabela edee ee ɛdhuu ɛ bot bak djas aadɛ, djil nɛ yɛ ɛ paa? Menabɛl ɛ́ dika kuku kakoŋ'aak?»
Yezu eezɛdji bɛ náá: «Bi ɛ́ nɛ emapa edhen?» Bɛ ɛ́ boozɛbɔɔza náá: «Etɛn nɛ ebá nɛ ba bɔɔ bɛsu.»
Nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛlɛɛ nɛ ɛdhuu ɛ bot náá, bɛ disi é bɔs.
Bhii tak, nyɛ eezɛnɔɔ emapa etɛn nɛ ebá nɛ bɛsu binek zɛghaapɛɛ Zɛɛb. Bhii tak nyɛ eezɛpyak yɛ ebil-ebil. Nyɛ eezɛnɔɔ yɛ náá, djɛ bɛdjekel bɛ, bɛ neekaa bot djas.
Mot nɛ mot naadɛ, djil. Bɛdjekel bula nɛ yii nabwak ɛ. Mɛbhubhwak naalwoodal bɛbhwaŋ ɛtɛn nɛ ebá.
Bot ɛ nadɛ ɔ, naakum botom bɛmil ɛná (4 000), ààlaa-laŋak boa nɛ bɔɔ dhyeeb.
Bhii tak Yezu ɛ́ boozɛswaal bot ɛ tak bɛ sik pɛ mendjaa mɔɔ. É di'enek wat, nyɛ eezɛni tɔ elɛɛd, bɛ nɛ bɛdjekel bɛ zokazɛtɔ́ pɛ kyee dik Maghadan.
EFalizyɛ nɛ eSaduseɛ naazyɛ pɛ dáa Yezu étɛp ɛsaŋ ɛ ɛlóo ɛ nyɛ pɛ ɛko, da ɛ́ bwood nyɛ pɛ kiyɛ. Bɛ eezɛke nɛ nɛ náá, nyɛ lyaal bɛdhiiti ndem mɛbwala di edus pɛ tɔ gwoo ɛ.
Yezu ɛ́ boo kabulal bɛ dáak: «Dwoo ɛ́ sila ɔɔ, bi ke ɛ́: “Yɛ aadi ɛ́, mbɛɛ dwoo, etɛɛ náá, gwoo moo ɛ́ tɔɔbelaa.”
Kɛɛŋ tɔ mɛlem, bi dyeebake ɛ́: “Bhi ɛ́ waanee mos, etɛɛ náá, gwoo ɛ́ tɔɔbelaa.” Bi nɛ gu ɛbɛk embi e gwoo; ghuna bi ààgu ɛbɛk embi e endem di edhaa mɛlu mak ɛ.
Biyɔ, bot ɛ mɛlu mak, bi ɛ́ bɛmbee ɛ bot, bot ɛ di ààbɛ sosoob é mis mɛ Zɛɛb ɔ. Bi kasaŋ ɛ́ endem e mɛbwala. Yɛ aanàkwaadjɛaa bin bhis yɛ Yonas nasael ɛ.» Bhii tak, nyɛ eezɛbet bɛ, zɛtɔ́.
É di bɛdjekel nadhaa pɛ yii kyiid soob ɔ, bɛ eezɛdjisa ɛnɔŋ ɛ emapa.
Yezu ɛ́ boolɛɛ bɛ náá: «Dika nɛ etsoŋ, da bi ɛ́ kyee leviid e eFalizyɛ nɛ eSaduseɛ di nɛ yɛ ɛ.»
Bɛdjekel moo tin é nyiiŋela pak'ɔɔ náá: «Nyɛ lii deenek ɛ́, etɛɛ náá, mena ààpanɔɔka emapa.»
Yezu eezɛgu sa bɛ nadi enyiiŋela ɛ. Nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛdji bɛ náá: «Étɛp yé bi di elii pak'en: Ye ɛ́ etɛɛ náá, mena tok nɛ mapa é? Dáa ɛbwaalel ɛ len nɛ Zɛɛb di batsa ɛ!
Bi dinaa ààpaamɛt ɛsuk, bi tok nɛ ghwyil ɛtaala emapa etɛn mɛ nakaa botom bɛmil ɛtɛn yɛ ɛ, dɔɔ nɛ bɛtɛ nɛ mɛbhwaa bi nabula nɛ yɛ ɛ?
Bi tok nɛ ghwyil ɛtaala emapa etɛn nɛ ebá mɛ nakaa bot bɛmil ɛna yɛ ɛ, nɛ bɛtɛ nɛ bɛbhwaŋ ɛ bi nabula nɛ ye ɛ́?
Étɛp yé bi di ààgu náá, mɛ bɛ ɛ́ ààlii nɛ nen étɛp emapa é sok mɛ lii nɛ nen ɛ? Mɛ ke ɛ́ náá: “Kyeeka emapa eFalizyɛ nɛ eSaduseɛ”.»
É di tak, bɛdjekel eezɛgu náá, nyɛ nabɛ ɛ́ ààke náá, bɛ kyee leviid di waaa tɔ emapa ɛ. Ghuna ye nabɛ ɛ́ mɛlyo mɛ eFalizyɛ nɛ eSaduseɛ.
Yezu zɛkum ko bɔs ɛ Sezaad ɛ Filip. Nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛdji bɛdjekel bɛ náá: «Bot ke dáa dum nɛ Sɛɛŋɛlɛ Mɔn Mot?»
Bɛ eezɛbɔɔza nɛ nɛ náá: «Bɛdhiiti ke ɛ́ náá, wɔ ɛ́ Zaŋ Nduuel-bot, bak náá, wɔ ɛ́ Eli. Bɛdhiiti kabaake ɛ́ náá, wɔ ɛ́ Zelemi nɛghu dhiiti ngoolel-mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb.»
Yezu ɛ́ boozɛdji bɛ náá: «Haa! Biyɔ, bi ke náá, mam ɛ́ zɛ?»
Tin, Simɔŋ Pyɛɛd zɛbɔɔza náá: «Wɔ ɛ́ Mɛsia, Mɔn Zɛɛb di nɛ tsik na kɔm-kɔm ɔ.»
Yezu ɛ́ boozɛke nɛ nɛ náá: «Mɛnyɔ nɛ nɔ, Simɔŋ mɔn Zaŋ, etɛɛ náá, ye tok mot epuud zetel wɔ yenek etsɛɛtsɛ, gua náá ye ɛ́ Saag'am di tɔ gwoo ɔ.
Yɛ bɛ mam ɔ, mɛ ɛpelɛɛ wɔ, wɔy Pyɛɛd wɔ ɛkok, kɔ ɛkok ɛ tak ɛ́ mɛ aakus di zɛɛga ndjaa mendjaala mam. Ɛsyee aanàkwaakwak yɛ.
Mɛ waaboodjɛ wɔ bɛsap ɛ ndjaa Ɛyoŋ ɛ di tɔ gwoo ɛ. Sa wɔ aalu kɔ bɔs ɛ, yɛ waaluel tɔ gwoo. Sa wɔ aadjɛ ze kɔ bɔs ɛ, ze ɛ́ waadjɛel tɔ gwoo.»
Bhii tak, Yezu eezɛlu bɛdjekel bɛ náá, sa bɛ ààlɛɛ mot náá, nyɛ ɛ́ Mɛsia.
É di'enek, Yezu moo zɛlɛɛ nɛ bɛdjekel bɛ náá: «Ye goka ɛ́ náá, mɛ tɔ́ pɛ Yeluzalɛm, étɛp mɛ neekɛzuk ɛbuɛpe é mɛmbɔ mɛ bɛpaa eYuda, bɛ nɛ eboo bɛghaa-Zɛɛb, zɛnɔɔ bɛghaŋ ɛ mɛkana mɛ etsi. Bɛ waagó mɛ, bhii mɛlu mɛlɛl, mɛ waagom.»
É di'enek, Pyɛɛd eezɛdul nyɛ é ngwoob bɛ nɛ nɛ bɛbá, nyɛ moo djɛ nyɛ mɛbɛ: «Zɛɛb baal wɔ, Ghɛŋ! Yenek aanàkwaakosael.»
É di'enek, Yezu eezɛbhɛm nyɛ. Nyɛ nɛ Pyɛɛd náá: «Dusa! Tɔ́a ɛtsetaɛpe nɛ nam, Satan! Wɔ ɛ́ ɛbɛk é ze yam, etɛɛ náá, esiiza bɔ tok dáa yii Zɛɛb, gua náá, yɔ esiiza ɛ́ yii bot.»
Bhii tak, Yezu ɛ́ boozɛke nɛ bɛdjekel bɛ náá: «Mot ɛ́ ke náá, nyɛ aazyɛ bis nɛ nɛ ɔɔ, nyɛ bet ɛsiiza etɛp nyel'ɛ, nyɛ bɛp mɛlaaba mɛ, da nyɛ ɛ́ du mɛ.
Etɛɛ náá, mot di ekwyɛl ɛtsik ɛ nyel'ɔ ɔ, nyɛ ɛ́ waasu nyel'ɛ. Ghuna mot aasu nyel'ɛ étɛp'am ɔ, nyɛ waabela yɛ!
Duma yé mot aadi nɛ yɛ, nyɛ bela dik djas, da nyɛ ɛ́ kasu ɛ tsik'ɛ ɔ? Ye ɛ́ nɛ dhiiti sa mot aadjɛ étɛp ɛbɔm ɛ tsik'ɛ? Mam ààbee!
Ye ɛ́ deenek ɛ Sɛɛŋɛlɛ Mɔn Mot aazyɛ tɔ duma Sɛɛg, bɛ nɛ efofop bɛ. É di'enek ɛ́ nyɛ aadjɛ mot nɛ mot efute mɛsa mɛ tyee nyɛ nadi eke ɛ.
Mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ́ etɛp e tsɛɛtsɛ náá, bɛdhiiti bot ɛ di wak ɔ, bɛ aanàkwaagwyɛ ɛsok nɛ bɛ nɛ bee Sɛɛŋɛlɛ Mɔn Mot ezyɛ tɔ Mɛkoozi mɛ.»
Mɛlu mɛtɛn nɛ wat bhii tak, Yezu naanɔɔ Pyɛɛd, Zak nɛ Zaŋ mɔn nyɛɛg ɛ Zak. Nyɛ naazɛtɔ́ nɛ nɔɔ kɔ vyɛɛg-vyɛɛg ɛtsok é di tak bɛ nadi ɛ́ bɔɔ bɛmet.
É di'enek, wɔ gwaa Yezu zɛswoola bhwoob é mis mɔɔ. Bhwoob'ɛ moo tin ɛkasɛpe dáa gwyes, ekaad bɛ moo ɛkasɛpe dáa dwoo.
É di tak wat, bɛdjekel bɛ eezɛbee Moiiz nɛ Eli elɛɛ elɛŋ bɛ nɛ Yezu.
Wɔ gwaa Pyɛɛd zokazɛke nɛ Yezu náá: «Ghɛŋ, ye goka ɛ́ náá, mena di wak. Wɔ kwyɛl ɔɔ, mɛ ɛ́ sum epɛt elɛl: wat yɔ, yak yɛ Moiiz, yak wat kadi ɛ́, yɛ Eli.»
Dáa nyɛ nadi nyɛ dinaa elii ɛ́, wɔ gwaa eguud na kas-kas zɛdipal bɛ. Bhii tak, gwood zokazɛgék náá: «Yenɔk ɛ́ mɔn'am mɛ dyeebakwyɛl ɔ, ye ɛ́ nyɛy ɛ́ mɛ natɔ. Gwakeka nyɛ!»
