É di bɛdjekel nagwak gwood'enek ɛ, bwoo naazɛsa bɛ ɛlyelɛpe, wɔ gwaa bɛ zɛkwyit mɛboŋ mɔɔ, bhwoob si.
Yezu naazɛtiila pɛ daa lɔɔ, nyɛ eezɛmɛt bɛ. Nyɛy nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Wyɛlka. Nàdika nɛ bwoo.»
Tin, bɛ nakaben mis ɛ, bɛ nabɛ ɛ́ ààkabee dhiiti mot bhii Yezu nyɛ ɛmet.
Dáa bɛ nadi ewyeed ɛtsok ɛ, Yezu naazɛke nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Sa mot ààlɛɛ mot esesɛɛ mɛbwala mɛ bi bee ɛ. Baalka yɛ kɛkum dwoo Sɛɛŋɛlɛ Mɔn Mot aagom bhis ɛsyee ɛ.»
Bhii tak, bɛdjekel naazɛdji Yezu náá: «Étɛp yé bɛghaŋ ɛ mɛkana mɛ etsi dyeebake náá, Eli ɛ́ kwaaleezyɛ ɛsok?»
Nyɛ naazɛbɔɔza nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Ye ɛ́ deenek. Eli ɛ́ di egoka nɛ ɛzyɛ sok étɛp ɛzɛkoobal etɛp djas.
Gwakeka, mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ́ náá, Eli eezezyɛ, bot ààpagwyak nyɛ. Bɛ kasa nyɛ ɛ, dáa elyem bɔɔ di ekwyɛl ɛ. Ye ɛ́ deenek ɛ, bɛ aatiig Sɛɛŋɛlɛ Mɔn Mot.»
É di'enek, bɛdjekel naazɛgu náá, nyɛ nalii nɛ nɔɔ ɛ́ dum nɛ Zaŋ Nduuel-bot.
Dáa bɛ nakum é di ɛdhuu ɛ bot nadi ɔ, wɔ gwaa mot ngɔt zokazyɛ é bhaaz ɛ Yezu, zɛkwyit mɛboŋ si mɛko mɛ.
Nyɛy náá: «Ghɛŋ, geka mɔn'am ghoŋ, nyɛ ɛ́ nɛ ɛbɛ́ ɛ djem. É sok ye dyeebamɛt nyɛ ɛ́, ye nɛ lwak nyɛ, kɛghɛɛg nyɛ tɔ du, é dhiiti ɛwala, ye ghɛɛg nyɛ ɛ́ tɔ dii.
Mɛ naazyɛ nɛ nɛ pɛ daa bɛdjekel bɔ, bɛ nabɛ ɛ́ ààkwak ɛtsik nyɛ.»
É di'enek, Yezu naazɛkim ɛlyelɛpe, nyɛy nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Biyɔ bɛmbee ɛ bot di ààdum koŋ nɛ Zɛɛb ɔ! Membu medhen mɛ aabaadi di wat nɛ nen sama? Mɛ baamaad bin, kɛkum yaa ɛlu? Dhaka mɛ nɛ mɔn'enɔk wak.»
Tin, wɔ gwaa Yezu zɛbhɛm mbee sisim. Mbee sisim tak naazɛwyis tɔ mɔn'enɔk. É di'enek wat, mɔn'enɔk naazɛtsak.
É di'enek, bɛdjekel eezɛtiila é bhaaz ɛ Yezu nyɛy nyɛ ɛmet, bɛ eezɛdji nyɛ náá: «Étɛp yé bisɔ nadi ààkwak ɛsɔ mbee sisim'enek?»
Yezu eezɛbɔɔza nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Étɛp náá, ɛdum ɛ koŋ ɛ len nɛ Zɛɛb nɛ tɔɔl. Mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ etɛp e tsɛɛtsɛ náá: Bi ɛ́ pe di nɛ ɛdum ɛ koŋ nɛ Zɛɛb ɛbɔkɛpe dáa bhek le mutaad ɔɔ, pe bi ɛ́ nɛ ghwyil ɛke nɛ ɛtsok ɛlak náá: “Dusa wak. Tɔ́ penek,” pe yɛ waadus. Tin, pe ye tok nɛ sa wat aadi nɛ ghwyil dhaa bin. [
Guka náá, ye ɛ́ nɛ ghwyil mendjaala nɛ ɛtsi ɛ edee ɛ wɔ aadis mbi yenek embee esisim.]»
Dwoo wat, bɛdjekel eezɛdi é di wat pɛ Ghalile. Tin, Yezu eezɛlɛɛ bɛ náá: «Sɛɛŋɛlɛ Mɔn Mot ɛ́ waakaaa é mɛmbɔ mɛ bot.
Bɛ waagó nyɛ, mɛlu mɛlɛl bhii tak, nyɛ waagom.» Tin, ghoŋ naazɛmɛt bɛdjekel dhaa nyel.
É ghɛŋ Yezu nɛ bɛdjekel bɛ nakum pɛ ghaada Kapɛlnaum ɛ, bɛnɔŋel ɛ epata e lapo Ndjaa-ebuwa zokazyɛ pɛ kyee Pyɛɛd nadi ɛ́. Bɛ ɛ́ boozɛdji nyɛ náá: «Lyoel yen ààtuud lapo Ndjaa-ebuwa?»
Pyɛɛd ɛ naazɛbɔɔza náá: «Hee, nyɛ nɛ tuud.» É ghɛŋ Pyɛɛd nani tɔ ndjaŋ ɛ, Yezu nadi ɛ́ mot mɛkɛn ɛlii. Nyɛy náá: «Wɔ gek dáa, Simɔŋ? Ɛzɛ di egoka nɛ ɛtuud lapo nɛghu bɛdhiiti etuud pɛ dáa bɛmɛkoozi mɛ bɔs'ak? Ye ɛ́ bot ɛ dɛl “ohoo” nɛghu ye ɛ́ bɛdjoŋ?»
Pyɛɛd ɛ́ boozɛbɔɔza nɛ Yezu náá: «Ye ɛ́ bɛdjoŋ.» É di'enek, Yezu eezɛpesal náá: «Wɔ bee ɔɔ, bot ɛ dɛl ààgoka nɛ ɛtuud lapo.
Ye ɛ́, etɛɛ náá, mena ɛ́ zɛkɛdhusal bot binɔk. É di tak, Tɔ́a pɛ boo soob na djato-djato. Lóoa ngwyep tɔ dii, nɔŋa su mɛkɛn wɔ aabela ɛ, da wɔ ɛ́ dii nuub'ɛ, wɔ waabela pata aagoka nɛ ɛtuud ɛ lapo yam nɛ yɔ ɛ. Nɔŋa yɛ, da wɔ ɛ́ tuud mena yenabɛl lapo.»
É ɛwala ɛlenek, bɛdjekel naazɛtiila é bhaaz ɛ Yezu, bɛ naazɛdji nyɛ náá: «Ye ɛ́ ɛzɛ di boo-mot tɔ Ɛyoŋ ɛ di tɔ gwoo ɛ?»
É di'enek, wɔ gwaa Yezu zɛdjóo mɔɔ dhyeeb, zɛtel nyɛ é mis mɔɔ.
Nyɛy nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ́ etɛp e tsɛɛtsɛ náá: Bi ɛ́ di ààswoola mɛfulu men, da bi ɛ́ di dáa bɔɔ dhyeeb ɔɔ, bi aanàkwaani tɔ Ɛyoŋ ɛ di tɔ gwoo ɛ.
Boo-mot tɔ Ɛyoŋ ɛ di tɔ gwoo ɔ, ye ɛ́ mot di esil nyel'ɛ, da nyɛ ɛ́ di dáa mɔn'ak ɔ.
Mot ɛ́ be ɛnyɔɛpe mɔɔ dhyeeb dáa mɔn'ak kɔ ɛsu ɛ din ɛ lam ɔɔ, nyɛ be ɛ́ mam.»
«Mot aakwyesal mɔn ngɔt tɔ sama bɔn zedum koŋ nɛ nam tɔ mesyem ɔɔ, ye goka ɛ́ náá, bɛ tiŋal nyɛ boo ɛkok é tsuŋ. Bhii tak, da bɛ ɛ́ lóo nyɛ tɔ boo dii mɛsɔn, da nyɛ ɛ́ diida kɛkum pɛ si.
“Haa” kpaa-ghoŋ nɛ bot ɛ di kɔ bɔs ɔ, etɛɛ náá, mɛbɛk mɛ di ekwyesal bot tɔ mesyem ɔ nɛ bu! Ye tok nɛ ghwyil ɛdi ààbɛ. Tin, “haa” kpaa-ghoŋ nɛ mot aadi mɛbɛk menek ɔ.
Yɛ bɛ náá, ye ɛ́, mbɔ'ɔ, nɛghu ko'ɔ ɛ́ di esa náá, wɔ gheekwye-kwyɛ tɔ mesyem ɔɔ, tsaala yɛ, da wɔ ɛ́ mwas yɛ ɛtsetaɛpe nɛ nɔ. Ye goka ɛ́ náá, wɔ ni tɔ mbɛɛ tsik nɛ tsaala mbɔ, nɛghu tsaala ko, ààbɛ náá, wɔ baal mɛmbɔ mɛmbá nɛ mɛko mɛmbá, bhii tak, wɔ kakɛmwasaa ɛ́ tɔ du na kɔm-kɔm.
Yɛ bɛ náá, dis ɛ lɔ, di esa náá, wɔ kwyɛ, tɔ mesyem ɔɔ, piida yɛ, da wɔ ɛ́ mwas yɛ ɛtsetaɛpe nɛ nɔ. Ye goka ɛ́ náá, wɔ ni tɔ mbɛɛ tsik nɛ tiila dis, ààbɛ náá, wɔ baal mis mɛmbá mɔ, bhii tak, wɔ kakɛmwasaa ɛ́, tɔ du na kɔm-kɔm.»
«Bi ɛ́ koobaka! Sa mot ààbyasal mot ngɔt tɔ bɔn bak etɛɛ náá, efofop bɔɔ dyeebadi ɛ́, é di wat é mɛwala djas bɛ nɛ Saag'am di pɛ tɔ gwoo ɔ. [
Etɛɛ náá, Sɛɛŋɛlɛ Mɔn Mot nazyɛ ɛ́ zɛtsik bot ɛ nabɛ náá, bɛ eezediib ɔ.]
«Bi ke dáa? Pookogekeka náá, dhiiti mot ngɔt nabɛ ɛ́ nɛ ebhata dhet (100). Tin, ngɔt zokazɛdiib, nyɛ aanàkwaalik ebhata mɛkam-mɛtɛn nɛ mɛkam-mɛná nɛ etɛn nɛ ená (99) kɔ ɛtsok, étɛp nyɛ neekɛsaa ngɔt diib ɔ?
Mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ́ tsɛɛtsɛ náá, nyɛ bela nyɛ ɔɔ, nyɛ waadi tɔ mɛmyaala ɛbuɛpe étɛp bhata wat'enɔk, dhaa ebhata nadi ààdiib ɔ.
Ye ɛ́ tyɛ wat nɛ Sɛɛg'en di tɔ gwoo ɔ. Nyɛ ààkwyɛl náá, mot ngɔt tɔ bɔn bɛ djas wo ze.»
«Yɛ bɛ náá, mɔn nyoog eesa wɔ ɛbiyo ɔɔ, tɔ́ kɛbee nyɛ wɔy wɔ ɛmet. Da wɔ ɛ́ kɛlyaal nyɛ ɛbiyo ɛ lɛ. Nyɛ gwak wɔ ɔɔ, tin, wɔ eekwak ɛbulal ɛ nyɛ é ze.
Yɛ kabɛ náá, nyɛ ààpagwak wɔ ɔɔ, djóoa dhiiti mot ngɔt nɛghu bot ɛbá. Dáa ekwyala di elyaal ɛ náá: “Etɛp djas koobelaa ɛ́ é mis mɛ bɛtetɛp ɛbá nɛghu bɛlɛl.”
Tin, nyɛ byen ɛgwak bɛ ɔɔ, tɔ́ nɛ nɛ sok bhwoob bot ɛ zɛɛga mendjaala. Nyɛ byen ɛgwak bot ɛ zɛɛga mendjaala ɔɔ, tin, bi kaabee nyɛ ɛ́ dáa mot di ààdum koŋ nɛ Zɛɛb ɔ, dáa bɛnɔŋel ɛ epata e lapo.
«Mɛ ɛpelɛɛ bin, ye ɛ́ tsɛɛtsɛ náá, etɛp djas ee bi ààpɛɛ wak kɔ bɔs ɛ, Zɛɛb ɛ́ waapɛɛ yɛ tɔ gwoo. Etɛp djas bi aamyaal wak kɔ bɔs ɛ, Zɛɛb ɛ́ waamyaal yɛ tɔ gwoo.
«Mɛ kabaalɛɛ bin ɛ náá, wak kɔ ɛko ɛ bɔs, bot ɛbá ɛ́ gwakel, da bɛ ɛ́ waab sonok bɛ aakwyɛl ɛwaab tɔ mendjaala mɔɔ ɔɔ, Saag'am di pɛ tɔ gwoo ɔ waadjɛ bɛ sa bɛ waab ɛ.
Etɛɛ náá, bot ɛbá nɛghu bot ɛlɛl ɛ́ sɛɛga kɔ ɛsu ɛ din ɛ lam ɔɔ, mɛ aadi ɛ́ tin, pak'ɔɔ.»
Wɔ gwaa Pyɛɛd zokazyɛ pɛ pak Yezu nadi ɛ́. Tin, nyɛ boozɛdji nyɛ náá: «Ghɛŋ, mɛ goka ɛ́ nɛ ɛpel mɔn nyaag'am esok edhen nyɛ sa mɛ ɛbiyo ɔɔ? Tyee esok etɛn nɛ ebá?»
Yezu naazɛbɔɔza nɛ nɛ náá: «Ààbɛ, mɛ ààpalɛɛ nɛ nɔ náá, ye di esok etɛn nɛ ebá. Mɛ lɛɛ wɔ ɛ́, ye di esok mɛkam-mɛtɛn nɛ mɛkam-mɛmbá (70), esok etɛn nɛ ebá.
«Étɛp tak ɛ́ di náá, Ɛyoŋ ɛ di tɔ gwoo ɔ nɔŋel ɛ, nɛ dhiiti mɛkoozi nadi ekwyɛl ɛkoobal etɛp bɛ nɛ bot ɛ mɛsa mɛ nakola epata bɛ ɔ.
Tin, é ghɛŋ nyɛ nakan ɛdjóo ngɔt-ngɔt ɛ, wɔ gwaa bɛ zokazyɛ nyɛ nɛ mot-mɛsa mɛ ngɔt nakola epata ɛbuɛpe ɔ.
Mot'enɔk nabɛ ɛ́, ààbɛ nɛ sa nyɛ aabulal epata e kukuma tak nɛ yɛ. Kukuma yɛ ɛ́ boodjɛ ɛlee náá, nyɛy nɛ myɛl nɛ bɔn zɛnɔɔ esa bɛ djas bɔmsaa, etɛp epata e tak neebulal kola nyɛ nadi nɛ yɛ ɛ.
Tin, mot-mɛsa menɔk eezɛkwyit mɛboŋ si sok bhwoob kukuma yɛ tak. Nyɛy nɛ nɛ náá: “Sila lyem, da wɔ ɛ́ gek mɛ ghoŋ. Mɛ waazɛbulal wɔ epata binek djas!”
Kukuma yɛ zokazɛgek nyɛ ghoŋ, nyɛ eezɛpel nyɛ nɛ epata ee nyɛ nakola ɛ djas. Bhii tak, nyɛ eezɛbet nyɛ, nyɛ tɔ́.
«Dáa mot-mɛsa menɔk nawyis tin ɛ, nyɛ eezɛboma nɛ dhiiti mɔn nyɛɛg nyɛy nakola nyɛ ba bɔɔ epata ɔ. Nyɛ eezɛvyɛk, mɛt nyɛ é tsuŋ “gbak”, nyɛ moo tin enyam nyɛ é tsuŋ ɛkɛɛ, nyɛ aagó nyɛ góak. Nyɛy nɛ nɛ náá: “Tuuda mɛ kola yam nenak!”
Mɔɔ sɔ zokazɛkwyit mɛboŋ si sok bhwoob'ɛ, nyɛ eedjaala nɛ nɛ náá: “Sila lyem, da wɔ ɛ́ gek mɛ ghoŋ. Bwooda batsa mɛ waatuud kola yɔ!”
Wɔ gwaa nakuma epata zokapɛɛ. Tin, nyɛ ɛ́ zokakɛkɔɔl mɔn nyɛɛg é mbok é bwood dwoo nyɛ aabulal epata bɛ ɛ.
«Dáa bɛdhiiti bot ɛ mɛsa nabee deenek ɛ, ye naakpaa bɛ tɔ elyem. Bɛ ɛ́ boozɛtɔ́, kɛlɛɛ kukuma yɔɔ etɛp djas dhaŋ ɛ.
Tin, kukuma yɔɔ ɛ́ boozɛbaadjóo mot-mɛsa menɔk, nyɛ ɛ́ booke nɛ nɛ náá: “Wɔ ɛ́ mot-mɛsa mɛ di náá, wɔ ɛ́ nɛ mbee lyem! Mɛ bɛ mbembɛ ɛ́, mɛ eepel wɔ nɛ epata bam wɔ nakola ɛ, etɛɛ náá, wɔ bɛ ɛ́, wɔ eedjaala nɛ nam náá, mɛ bet wɔ.
Ye goka ɛ́ náá, wɔ gek mɔɔ sɔ'ɔ ghoŋ dáa mɛ gek wɔ ghoŋ ɛ.”
Tin, ye nabɛ ɛ́, kukuma eezebiyo ɛlyelɛpe, nyɛ ɛ́ boolwom náá, bɛ mɛt mot-mɛsa menɔk. Nyɛ kɛsa mɛsa mɛ bhel kɛkum dwoo nyɛ aaboobulal kola yenek djas ɛ.»
Yezu eebaazɛke náá: «Ye ɛ́ deenek ɛ Saag'am di tɔ gwoo ɔ aasa nɛ nen, yɛ bɛ náá, mot nɛ mot ààpapel sɔ nɛ lyem wat ɔɔ.»
Bhii Yezu nasilal ɛlyo bot pɛ kyee dik Ghalile ɛ, nyɛ naazɛtɔ́ pɛ kyee dik Yude, pɛ yii kyiid dii Yuldɛn.
Tin, zukamwaa nɛ mot baazɛdu nyɛ, Wɔ gwaa, nyɛ zokatsik bot ɛ mɛbɛ́ mɛ bɛ nazyɛ nɛ nɔɔ ɛ.
Tin, wɔ gwaa bɛdhiiti eFalizyɛ zokazyɛ, zɛlaab nyɛ nɛ dhiiti mɛdjin. Bɔɔ nɛ Yezu náá: «Etsi bina ɛpemyaal náá, mot pɛɛ myɛl kɔ ɛsu ɛ etɛp mbɛs é?»
Yezu ɛ́ boozɛbɔɔza nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Bi ààlaa sa di kwyala tɔ mɛkana mɛ Zɛɛb é? “É ghɛŋ Zɛɛb nakus bɔs ɛ, nyɛ nakus ɛ moma nɛ motom.”
Nyɛ eebaazɛbil náá: “Étɛp tak ɛ́ ye di náá, motom ɛ́ waalik sɛɛg nɛ nyɛɛg, étɛp nyɛ neekɛsɛɛga bɛ nɛ myɛl. Tin, bɔɔ bɛbá aakadi ɛ́, bɛ moo mot ngɔt.
É di'enek, bɛ tokapɛ bot ɛbá, bɛ aakadi ɛ́, bɛ moo mot ngɔt. Sa mot ààbɛk sa di náá, Zɛɛb eesɛɛg ɛ.”»
EFalizyɛ ɛ́ boo baadji nyɛ náá: «Étɛp yé Moiiz nalɛɛ náá, yɛ bɛ náá, motom ɛpekwyɛl ɛsɔ myɛl ɔɔ, nyɛ kwyal nyɛ mɛkana mɛ di lɛɛ mɛsɔ mɛ nyɛ pɛɛ nyɛ kɔ ɛsu ɛ tak ɛ?»
Yezu eezɛbɔɔza nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Moiiz namyaal náá, bi pɛɛ bɛl bin ɛ́, étɛp mɛlyel mɛ elyem bin. Etɛɛ náá, é ɛkɛn ɛ bɔs, ye nabɛ ɛ́ ààbɛ deenek.
Mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ́ náá, motom ɛ́ pɛɛ myɛl, da nyɛ ɛ́ baakɛba dhiiti moma sis, ààbɛ náá, myɛl tak eesa ɛzɔ ɔɔ, tin, motom'enɔk eesa ɛzɔ.»
Tin, bɛdjekel eezɛke nɛ Yezu náá: «Yɛ bɛ náá, etɛp ɛba goka ɛ́ nɛ ɛdi ɛ́ deenek pak moma nɛ motom ɔɔ, ye nyɔ ɛ́ náá, mot di yɛ kɔ, ààba moma.»
É di'enek, Yezu eezɛke nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Bot djas ààdyeebakwyɛl mbi mɛlyo mak. Tin, ye ɛ́ bot ɛ Zɛɛb yii nyɛy nyɛ ɛmet aadjɛ ghwyil ɔ aapaakwak yɛ.
Ye ɛ́ nɛ bɛtɛ nɛ etɛp di elu náá, bot nàba ɛ. Ye ɛ́ nɛ bot ɛ nabyel náá, bɛ tok nɛ ghwyil ɛba yɔbɔ ɛ. Yɛ kabɛ bɛdhiiti bot ɔ, ye ɛ́ bɛsɔ bɔɔ bot ɛ aapaasa náá, bɛ nàkwyɛl ɛba. Bɛdhiiti aadi ààba ɛ́, étɛp Ɛyoŋ ɛ Zɛɛb. Deenek yɛ bɛ náá, mot ɛpekwyɛl ɛmyaal mɛlyo mak ɔɔ, nyɛ myaal.»
Dhiiti dwoo, bot naazɛzyɛ Yezu nɛ bɔɔ dhyeeb étɛp nyɛ needjaala bɛ Zɛɛb nɛ ɛkɛl ɛ bɛ mɛmbɔ. Wɔ gwaa bɛdjekel bɛ zokazɛlu bot ɛ tak.
Dáa Yezu nabee deenek ɛ́, nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛke nɛ bɛdjekel náá: «Betka bɔɔ dhyeeb, bɛ zyɛ pɛ daa lam! Nàluka bɛ etɛɛ náá, Ɛyoŋ ɛ di tɔ gwoo ɛ goka nɛ bot ɛ di tyee bɔɔ ɔ.»
Tin, nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛkɛl bɛ mɛmbɔ. Bhii nyɛ nakasilal ɛ, nyɛ boozɛnɔɔ nyel tɔ́.
Dáa bɛ nadi gba-gba é goŋ ɛ, dhiiti mot zokazyɛ pɛ daa Yezu, mot tak nɛ Yezu náá: «Lyoel! Mɛ goka ɛ́ nɛ ɛsa yaa tɛtɛ sonok étɛp mɛ neebela tsik na kɔm-kɔm?»
Yezu eezɛbɔɔza nɛ nɛ náá: «Étɛp yé wɔ di edji mɛ mɛdjin dum nɛ tɛtɛ etɛp? Ye ɛ́ Zɛɛb nyɛ ɛmet ɛ di tɛtɛ mot. Wɔ kwyɛl ɛni tɔ tsik na kɔm-kɔm ɔ, wɔ goka ɛ́ wɔ looba nɛ sa mɛtiŋ di elɛɛ ɛ.»
Mot'enɔk eezɛdji Yezu náá: «Yaa mɛtiŋ?» Yezu ɛ́ boozɛlɛɛ nyɛ náá: «Sa wɔ ààgó mot. Sa wɔ ààsa mɛzɔ. Sa wɔ ààdjii sa mot. Sa wɔ ààlɛɛ elɛŋ e etsal dum nɛ mot.
Duwala soog nɛ nyoog. Kwyɛla sɔ'ɔ mot dáa wɔ di ekwyɛl nyel'ɔ wɔ ɛmet ɛ.»
Ngbaaz'enɔk eezɛbɔɔza nɛ nɛ náá: «Mɛtiŋ menek djas mɛ nɛ duwal yɛ. Mɛ kabaasa yé?»
É di'enek, Yezu eezɛbɔɔza nɛ nɛ náá: «Wɔ kwyɛl ɛdi tɔ epiki ɔɔ, tɔ́ kɛbɔmsa esa bɔ djas, da wɔ ɛ́ nɔɔ epata tak, djɛ bɛdjel ɛ bot. Tin, wɔ waabela mɛvu tɔ gwoo. Bhii tak, da wɔ ɛ́ zyɛ, zɛdu mɛ.»
Dáa ngbaaz'enɔk nagwak deenek ɛ, «kiyooo» nyɛ eeliigel, sik yɛ, etɛɛ náá, ye naatek nyɛ nyel, étɛp ekum ee nyɛ nadi nɛ yɛ ɛbuɛpe ɛ.
Bhii tak, Yezu eezɛke nɛ bɛdjekel bɛ náá: «Mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ́ etɛp ee tsɛɛtsɛ náá: Ɛkɔɔla náá, bot ɛ di nɛ mɛvu ɔ ni tɔ Ɛyoŋ ɛ di tɔ gwoo ɛ!
Mɛ baalɛɛ bin ɛ náá, ɛkɔɔla náá, boo yaaga kyee bɔs bɛsyɛ di ààbɛ nɛ mɛdii ɛ dhaa tɔ ba mɔɔ ɛlen ɛ dhɔɔ. Yɛ kabɛ bɛkum ɛ bot ɔ, ɛni ɛ lɔɔ tɔ Ɛyoŋ ɛ Zɛɛb eebaadhaa-dhaŋak ɛni ɛ yaaga tɔ ɛlen ɛ dhɔɔ nɛ mɛlyel.»
Dáa bɛdjekel nagwak mɛkpa menek ɛ, bɛ naadyeebadjoka. Bhii tak, bɛ ɛ́ boozɛdji Yezu náá: «Yɛ bɛ deenek ɔɔ, ɛzɛ aabela tsik?»
Yezu zokabɔɔza nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Ye ɛ́ ɛpipɛpe é mis mɛ bot. Tin, mot ɛ dum koŋ nɛ Zɛɛb ɔɔ, yɛ waasael.»
Wɔ gwaa, Pyɛɛd zɛke nɛ nɛ náá: «Gwaka! Bis eezekat mɛze mes nɛ etɛp bis djas étɛp ɛdu ɛ wɔ. Yisɔ efute aakadi tin yé?»
Tin, Yezu eezɛbɔɔza nɛ nɔɔ: «Mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ́ etɛp e tsɛɛtsɛ náá, é ghɛŋ Sɛɛŋɛlɛ Mɔn Mot aadi kɔ bóó mɛkoozi mɛ nɛ duma tɔ Ɛyoŋ ɛ na bes ɛ, biyɔ, bot kam nɛ bɛbá namyaal ɛdu ɛ mɛ ɔ, bi aadi ɛ́, kɔ mɛbhóó mɛ mɛkoozi kam nɛ ebá, étɛp ɛpɛ́ɛ ɛ membyak kam nɛ ebá ɛ Yisalaɛl.
Bot ɛ di ebet mendjaa mɔɔ, bɔn nyɛɛg bɔɔ, nɛ bɛkɛl bɔɔ, zɛnɔɔ bɛsɛɛg bɔɔ nɛ bɛnyɛɛg bɔɔ, bɔn bɔɔ, zɛnɔɔ epyeeb bɔɔ étɛp'am ɔ, bɛ waabela bɛdhet nɛ bɛdhet kala kɔ yii. Bɛ waabela tsik na kɔm-kɔm.
Tin, ye kabela ɛ́ náá, bɛtɛ nɛ bot ɛ di mos é lɔɔg ɛsok ɔ, bɛ aakaswaala ɛ́ bot ɛ ɛbhis. Bot ɛ di mos pɛ lɔɔg ɛbhis ɔ, bɛ aaswaala ɛ́ bot ɛ lɔɔg ɛsok.»
«Beeka dhiiti sa di enɔŋel nɛ Ɛyoŋ ɛ di tɔ gwoo ɛ: Dhiiti kukuma naazɛwyis tɔ ghooghom mɛlem kɛsaa bot étɛp bɛ neekɛsa mɛsa tɔ pyeeb vin'ɛ.
Bɛ nɛ bɛ nɔɔ zokagwakel náá, efute bɔɔ aadi ɛ́, dáa bot di ezyɛ nɛ ɛfutaa sok ɛ, nɛghu falanga wat tɔ ɛlu ɛ wat. Tin, nyɛ eezɛlwom bɛ, bɛ kɛsa mɛsa tɔ pyeeb'ɛ.»
«Nyɛ eebaazɛwyis é ɛwala etɛn nɛ ená yii mɛlem, wɔ gwaa nyɛ baazɛboma nɛ bɛdhiiti bot metetel kɔ ɛbɛsɛɛ dɛl, bɔɔ tin, ààbɛ nɛ mɛsa.
Nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛke nɛ nɔɔ náá: “Biyɔ pe, tɔ́ka, kɛsaka mɛsa tɔ pyeeb vin'am, mɛ aadjɛ bin efute dáa ye di egoka ɛ.”
Tin, bot binɔk ɛ́ boozɛnɔɔ mɛnyel, tɔ́.» «Bhii tak, kukuma yenɔk naabaazyɛ kuku mwos dwoo dɔɔ nɛ é ɛwala elɛl yii bikoko. Nyɛ nabaazolii ɛ́ dáa nyɛ nazolii nɛ bot ɛsok ɛ.
Nyɛ eebaazɛwyis bikoko, dwoo eezesila. Tin, nyɛ ɛ́ boo baazɛboma nɛ yak ɛdhuu ɛ bot. Nyɛ eezɛdji bɛ náá: “Étɛp yé bi di wak, kana mɛlem, kɛyaka nɛ yak ɛwala, ààsa sonok?”
Bot binɔk zokazɛbɔɔza nɛ nɛ: “Ye ɛ́, etɛɛ náá, bis tok nɛ mɛsa mɛ ɛsa.” Bhii tak, nyɛ ɛ́ booke nɛ nɔɔ náá: “Dɔɔ nɛ biyɔ pe, tɔ́ka, kɛsaka mɛsa tɔ pyeeb vin'am.”»
«Dáa dwoo nakabɛ, ye moo bikoko ɛ, kukuma ɛ́ booke nɛ mot nadi kɔ elo e bot ɛ mɛsa mɛ djas ɔ náá: “Djóoa bot ɛ mɛsa, da wɔ ɛ́ djɛ mot nɛ mot efute bɛ. Wɔ kan ɛ́ nɛ bot ɛ nadjóoaa ɛbhis ɔ, da wɔ ɛ́ kɛsilal nɛ bot ɛ́ nakanaa ɛdjóoaa sok ɔ.”»
«Tin, bot ɛ nakan mɛsa bikoko ɔ, zokazyɛ, zɛbela yɔbɔ efute e pata wat.
Dáa bot ɛsok nakazyɛ yɔbɔ ɛ́, bɛ nagek tɔ elyem bɔɔ ɛ náá, bɛ waabela efute dhaa bot ɛ nakan bikoko ɔ. Tin, bɛ nazokabaadjɛ bɛ ɛ́ efute e pata wat.
Beea bɛ nabee deenek ɛ, bɛ ɛ́ boozɛni é byak kukuma pyeeb.
Bɔɔ náá: “Bot ɛ kan mɛsa nenak bikoko ɔ, bɛ zosa ɛ́ mɛsa é di ɛwala wat. Tin, wɔ kadjɛ bɛ efute ɛ́ tyee wat nɛ dáa wɔ djɛ bisɔ ɛ? Bot ɛ kan mɛsa tɔ mɛlem ɔ, si kas-kas gwyes nɛ etuŋ, zɛnɔɔ mɛnyel na ‘wɔyɔŋ’ ghwyil djas eezesi.”»
«Tin, kukuma ɛ́ boobɔɔza nɛ ngɔt pak'ɔɔ náá: “Mɔn nyaag'am, ye tok nɛ ɛbiyo mɛ sa ɛ. Tin, mena bɛ ààgwakel náá, wɔ sa mɛsa ɛ étɛp wɔ neebela etuud e pata wat, di egoka náá, ye djɛaa nɛ mot sa mɛsa mɛ dwoo wat ɔ, etsal é?
Nɔŋa pata yɔ, da wɔ ɛ́ tɔ́ yɔ, etɛɛ náá, mɛ neebaadjɛ nwyak mot kalik'aak dáa mɛ djɛ wɔy ɛ.
Mɛ tok nɛ ghwyil ɛbe esa bam dáa lyem'am di ekwyɛl ɛ? Étɛp yé wɔ di ebyen náá, mɛ sa enɛm esa?”»
É di'enek, Yezu ɛ́ bookabaazɛpesal náá: «Yɛ aadi ɛ́ deenek, bɛtɛ nɛ bot ɛ́ di bot ɛ mɛsik'aak, bɛ kaaswaalaaa ɛ́, bot ɛ ɛsok. Bot ɛ ɛsok'aak aaswaalaa ɛ́ bot ɛ mɛsik.»
Dáa Yezu nadi etɔ́ pɛ Yeluzalɛm ɛ, nyɛ naazɛnɔɔ bɛdjekel kam nɛ bɛbá bɔɔ bɛ ɛmet. Tin, dáa bɛ nadi ekɛ ze ɛ ze ɛ, nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛlɛɛ bɛdjekel náá:
«Gwakeka, mena tɔ́ka wak ɛ́, pɛ Yeluzalɛm pɛ Sɛɛŋɛlɛ Mɔn Mot aakɛkaaa é mɛmbɔ mɛ eboo bɛghaa-Zɛɛb nɛ bɛghaŋ ɛ mɛkana mɛ etsi ɛ, étɛp bɛ needjɛ nyɛ epɛ́ɛ e ɛsyee.
Bhii tak, bɛ waaka nyɛ é mɛmbɔ mɛ bot ɛ di ààbɛ bot ɛ mbyak eYuda ɔ, étɛp bɛ needim nyɛ nɛ ɛduk nyɛ. Bɛ waanyuu nyɛ nɛ eghwyɛs bhii tak, da nyɛ ɛ́ kɛbemaa kɔ mɛlaaba. Tin, é mɛlu mɛlɛl bhii ɛsyee ɛ lɛ, nyɛ waagom.»
Wɔ gwaa, mwaa Zɛbɛdɛ zokazyɛ nɛ bɔn bɛ bɛbá zɛbee Yezu. Dáa bɛ nakum é di Yezu nadi ɛ́, nyɛ eezɛkwyit mɛboŋ sok bhwoob'ɛ étɛp nyɛ neewaab sonok pɛ daa lɛ.
Yezu ɛ́ booke nɛ nɛ náá: «Wɔ saa yé?» Moma tak ɛ́ boozɛbɔɔza nɛ Yezu náá: «Beea bɔn bam bɛbá bak. Mɛ kwyɛl ɛ́, wɔ kɛk mɛ náá, bɛ bela duma di náá, ngɔt di pɛ mbɔ eghɛŋ bɔ, nwyak ngɔt pɛ mbɔ ɛmyɛl ɛ lɔ, é sok waadi tɔ mɛkoozi mɔ ɛ.»
Tin, Yezu ɛ́ boozɛbɔɔza náá: «Bi ààgu sa bi di ewaab ɛ. Bi ɛ́ nɛ ghwyil ɛbɛp kɔm mezuk mɛ mam aabɛp ɛ?» Bɛ eezɛbɔɔza náá: «Hɛɛɛ! Bis ɛ́ nɛ ghwyil ɛbɛp.»
Yezu eezɛke nɛ bɔn bɛ bɛbá náá: «Ye ɛ́ tsɛɛtsɛ! Bi ɛ́ waabɛp kɔm mezuk mam. Yɛ kabɛ dum nɛ tɛp ɛdi pɛ mbɔ eghɛŋ bam nɛghu pɛ mbɔ ɛmyɛl ɛ lam ɔ, mam tok nɛ ghwyil ɛdjɛ bin edi é tak. Etɛɛ náá, Saag'am ɛ di egu bot ɛ nyɛ aadjɛ edi binek ɔ.»
Dáa bak bɛdjekel kam nalik ɛ nagwak deenek ɛ, ye nabɛ ɛ́, ye naakpaa bɛ elyem nɛ sa Zak bɛ nɛ Zaŋ nasa ɛ.
Bhii tak, Yezu ɛ́ bookazɛdjóo bɔɔ djas, nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛke nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Bi kabɛ edjak náá, mɛsa mɛ ekukuma e bot ɛ bɔs ɛ́ ɛnyal bot ɛ́ di ezuk ɔ. Mɛsa mɛ bot ɛ di djóoaa eboo bot ɛ bɔs ɛ, ye ɛ́ ɛnyal bot ɛ di eduwal bɛ ɔ.
Ghuna, yɛ ààgoka nɛ ɛsɛ́ɛ deenek pak'en. Ye goka ɛ́ náá, ngɔt pak'en ɛ́ kwyɛl ɛdi kɔ elo bɛsɔ ɔɔ, nyɛ di mot-mɛsa mɛ bɛsɔ.
É di'enek, mot aakwyɛl ɛdi pɛ sok bɛsɔ ɔ, di kwom bɛsɔ djas.
Étɛp tak ɛ́ di náá, ɛzyɛ ɛ́ Sɛɛŋɛlɛ Mɔn Mot nabɛ ɛ́ ààbɛ, etɛɛ náá, nyɛ eezɛliig bot, bot ɛ mɛsa mɛ. Nyɛ nazyɛ ɛ, étɛp ɛzɛdi mot-mɛsa mɛ bot, nɛ ɛzɛdjɛ bot tsik'ɛ nyɛ ɛmet tyee etuud étɛp ɛpɛk bɛtɛ nɛ bot.»
Bhii bɛ nawyis kɔ dɛl ɛ Yeliko ɛ, zukamwaa nɛ mot naazɛdu Yezu.
Tin, wɔ gwaa bot ɛ edhim bɛbá nadidi é ngwoob gba ɔ, zokagwak menduk náá, Yezu ɛpedhaa tin. Wɔ gwaa bɛ zɛbo etsim náá: «Ghɛŋ, Mɔn Dhavid! Geka bis ghoŋ!»
Ɛdhuu ɛ bot ɛ nadi edu Yezu ɔ, moo tin ebhɛm bɛ étɛp bɛ needi gwyem. Wɔ gwaa bɛ zokabaaben ebhyeed bɔɔ ɛlyelɛpe náá: «Ghɛŋ, Mɔn Dhavid! Geka bis ghoŋ!»
É sok'enek, Yezu eezɛtyaa. Wɔ gwaa nyɛ zokadjóo bɛ. Nyɛ eezɛdji bɔɔ bɛbá náá: «Bi kwyɛl náá, mɛ sa bin yé?»
Bot binɔk ɛ́ boopesal náá: «Ghɛŋ, bis kwyɛl ɛ́ náá, bis nyaasok.»
Tin, Yezu zokazɛgek bɛ ghoŋ. Bhii tak, nyɛ eezɛkɛl bɛ mɛmbɔ kɔ mis. É di tak wat, mis mɔɔ eezebɛŋel, tin, bɛ eezɛdu nyɛ.
Dáa bɛ nadi, bɛ moo ekunaa nɛ Yeluzalɛm ɛ, bɛ moo é ngwoob dɛl ɛ bɛ di djóo Bhɛtfaze, pɛ ɛtsok ɛ pyeeb oliv ɛ, Yezu eezɛlwom bɛdjekel bɛ bɛbá:
Nyɛy nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Tɔ́ka kɔ dɛl ɛ di pɛ sok'enek. Tuula bi aatuula kɔ dɛl ɛ tak ɛ, bi ɛ́ waabela dhiiti mbi myɛl tit di edjóoaa an ɛ nɛ mɔɔ swooz tak kɔla é di wat. Tiika bɛ, da bi ɛ́ zyɛ mɛ nɛ nɔɔ wak.
Mot ɛ́ dji bin náá: “Bi tɔ́ nɛ nɔɔ wo ɔɔ?” Lɛɛka nyɛ náá: “Ye ɛ́ Ghɛŋ ɛ́ di nɛ gwyes nɛ nɔɔ ɔ.” Tin, bɛ waaleedjɛ bin bak.»
Esesɛɛ binek goka nɛ ɛsael, etɛɛ náá, etɛp ee di kwyala tɔ mɛkana mɛ ngoolel-mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb ɛ neebela ɛsuk:
«Lɛɛka nɛ ɛsyes ɛ ghaada Siɔŋ náá: “Beea, mɛkoozi mɔ ɛpezyɛ pɛ daa lɔ. Nyɛ zyɛ ɛ́ nɛ enɛm esa, nyɛ ɛ́ ndiindil kɔ mɔɔ swooz an. Nyɛ zyɛ ɛ́ ààbɛ nɛ ɛbet, nyɛ ɛ́ ndiindil kɔ mɔɔ swooz an.”»
Bhii tak, bɛdjekel eezɛtɔ́. Dáa bɛ nakakum é di tak ɛ, bɛ ɛ́ boozɛsa tyee Yezu nalɛɛ bɛ ɛ.
Wɔ gwaa bɛ zɛsik nɛ myɛl an, nɛ swooz an tak Yezu nawaab ɛ. Bɛ moo tin ezɛkɛl bɛ endjookuwa bɔɔ kɔ ekoŋ. Bhii tak, Yezu eezɛkalal kɔ tak, disi.
É di tak wat, bot ɛbuɛpe naabaazɛdja yɔbɔ endjookuwa gba-gba, bɛdhiiti nadi etsaal yɔbɔ ɛ́ ebhuuz e le, étɛp ɛdja é gba.
Ngoŋ bot ɛ́ nadi ekɛ pɛ sok ɔ, nɛ bot ɛ nakabɛ pɛ bhis ɔ, moo tin ekyeeb: «Hozanna nɛ Mɔn Dhavid! Duu nɛ Zɛɛb! Zɛɛb goka ɛ́ nɛ ɛsɛɛ mot di ezyɛ nɛ din ɛ Ghɛŋ ɔ mbɛɛ mɛtel! Hozanna nɛ Zɛɛb pɛ tɔ gwoo!»
Dáa Yezu nakani tɔ Yeluzalɛm ɛ, bot djas kɔ dɛl nabɛ ɛ́, bɛ moo «nyaa-nyaa», bɛ ɛ́ boozɛdji: «Yenɔk ɛ́ nwyaa mot?»
Mɛdhuu mɛ bot nadi ebɔɔza náá: «Ye ɛ́ ngoolel-mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb, Yezu mɔn dɛl ɛ Nazalɛt pɛ kyee dik Ghalile.»
Bhii tak, Yezu naazɛni tɔ kok Ndjaa-ebuwa. Deenek, nyɛ moo tin esɔ bot ɛ nadi ebɔmsa esesɛɛ bɔɔ ɔ. Nyɛ baadi esɔ dɔɔ nɛ bot ɛ́ nadi ebɔm-bɔmak nadi tin ɔ, nyɛ naawaaz emesa ee bɛ nadi eswoola epata kɔ tak ɛ, nɛ mɛbhóó mɛ bot ɛ́ nadi ebɔmsa mɛghum ɔ.
Bhii tak, Yezu eezɛbaakaada bɛ náá: Ye tok kwyala tɔ mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb náá: «Ndjaŋ'am aadjóoaa ɛ́, “ndjaa mendjaala” Mɛ bee ɛ́ ɛkɛɛ, biyɔ, bi eezeliig yɛ, ye moo ɛ́ zɛɛga bot ɛ ɛzɛm.»
É di tak wat, bot ɛ nadi nɛ edhim ɔ, nɛ bot ɛ nadi nɛ edjam ɔ, naazyɛ pɛ daa Yezu tɔ kok Ndjaa-ebuwa, nyɛy zokatsik bɛ.
Tin, bɛghaŋ ɛ mɛkana mɛ etsi nɛ eboo bɛghaa-Zɛɛb nabɛ ɛ́ ebee esesɛɛ binek djas Yezu nasa ɛ. Bɛ naabee pe dáa bɔɔ dhyeeb nadi eduwal nyɛ nɛ etsim tɔ Ndjaa-ebuwa ɛ. Bɛ nadi kyeeb ɛ́ náá: «Duu nɛ Mɔn Dhavid!» Bɛ ɛ́ boozɛkpaa elyem.
Bot binɔk ɛ́ boozɛdji Yezu náá: «Wɔ ɛpegwak dáa bɔɔ dhyeeb di eke'enek é?» Yezu eezɛbɔɔza nɛ nɔɔ: «Iyoo! Mɛ ɛpegwak. Bi nabɛ ɛ́ ààlaa tɔ mɛkana mɛ Zɛɛb é di nakwyalaa náá: “Tɔ enuub e bɔɔ dhyeeb nɛ bɔɔ etɔlɔɔ, wɔ eelyaal dáa bis di egoka nɛ ɛduwal wɔ ɛ?”»
Bhii tak, nyɛ zɛwyis, tɔ́ pɛ dɛl ɛ Bhetani pɛ bɛ nakɛdjaasi ɛ.
Yak mɛlem, é ghɛŋ bɛ nadi esik pɛ boo dɛl ɛ, wɔ gwaa za zɛmɛt Yezu.
Nyɛ eezɛbee le fiigh é ngwoob gba. Tin, Yezu eezɛtiila si le tak étɛp nyɛ neebɔ́k. Dáa nyɛ nakakum si le ɛ, nyɛ kabela eka nɛ eka, ààbɛ nɛ bhum. É di'enek, Yezu ɛ́ booke nɛ le tak náá: «Kana dwoo pan mos'ak, wɔ aanàkwaakabaawum!» É di tak wat, wɔ gwaa le syee.
Dáa bɛdjekel nabee deenek ɛ, ye nabɛ ɛ́, bɛ naadyeebadjoka, bɛ ɛ́ boozɛdji Yezu náá: «Étɛp yé le fiigh zosyee é di wat deenek?»
Yezu eezɛbɔɔza nɛ bɛdjekel bɛ náá: «Mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ́ etɛp e tsɛɛtsɛ náá: bi ɛ́ di edum koŋ nɛ Zɛɛb ɔɔ, bi ɛ́ di ààsa mɛso ɔɔ, bi ɛ́ nɛ ghwyil ɛsa esa mɛbwala dhaa yii mɛ sa nɛ le fiigh'ak ɛ. Bi ɛ́ nɛ ghwyil ɛke nɛ ɛtsok ɛlak náá: “Ghɛɛa nyel tin, dusa, kɛghaaga tɔ boo dii,” yɛ ɛpesɛ́ɛ.
Bi ɛ́ dum koŋ nɛ Zɛɛb ɔɔ, esesɛɛ djas bi aawaab tɔ mendjaala ɛ, Zɛɛb ɛ́ waadjɛ bin yɛ ɛ.»
Bhii tak, Yezu eezɛni tɔ kok Ndjaa-ebuwa, nyɛ moo tin elyo bot mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb. Eboo bɛghaa-Zɛɛb, nɛ bɛpaa ɛ eYuda zokazyɛ pɛ daa lɛ zɛdji nyɛ náá: «Kɔ eghɛŋ e zɛ wɔ di esa esesɛɛ binek? Ɛzɛ nadjɛ wɔ eghɛŋ e tak?»
Yezu eezɛbɔɔza nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Bwoodka, mɛ pookodji bin kiya wat. Bi ɛ́ bɔɔza mɛ ɔɔ, ye ɛ́ mɛ aakalɛɛ bin kɔ eghɛŋ e zɛ mɛ di esa esesɛɛ binek.
Ye ɛ́ ɛzɛ nadhis Zaŋ, nyɛ zɛduu bot Zɛɛb? Ye nabɛ ɛ́ Zɛɛb “ohoo”, ye nabɛ ɛ́ mot?» É di'enek, bɛ moo tin esɔs pak'ɔɔ. Bɔɔ náá: «Mena aake nenak náá: “Ye ɛ́ Zɛɛb ɛ́ nadhis nyɛ” ɔɔ, nyɛ waadji mena náá: “Étɛp yé bi nadi ààmyaal Zaŋ?”
Mena aakake nenak náá: “Ye ɛ́ bot ɛ nadhis nyɛ” ɔɔ, ye goka ɛ́ náá, bis kaab ɛdhuu ɛ bot, etɛɛ náá, bɛ dyeebake ɛ́ náá, Zaŋ nabɛ ɛ́ ngoolel-mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb.»
Bɛ ɛ́ boozɛbɔɔza nɛ Yezu náá: «Bis ààgu.» Tin, Yezu ɛ́ boozɛbulal nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Dɔɔ nɛ mam pe, mɛ aanàkwaalɛɛ bin kɔ eghɛŋ e zɛ mɛ di esa esesɛɛ binek.»
Yezu eebaazɛke nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Yak kwyɛl ɛlɛɛ bin yé? Motom ngɔt nabɛ ɛ́ nɛ bɔn bɛbá. Nyɛ eezɛke nɛ yii mɛgwyak náá: “Mɔn'am, dwoo ɛlak mos, tɔ́ kɛsa mɛsa tɔ pyeeb'am e vin.”
Nyɛ eezɛbɔɔza nɛ sɛɛg: “Hoo, mɛ aanàkwaatɔ́.” Ba ɛwala eezɛdhaa bhii tak, mɔn'enɔk eezɛdjɛ lyem mɛbɛ, tin, nyɛ eezɛnɔɔ nyel, tɔ́ pɛ pyeeb vin sɛɛg nalwom nyɛ ɛ.
Wɔ gwaa sɛɛg'ɔɔ baazɛlwom mɔɔ dhyeeb. Mɔn tak eezɛmyaal: “Iyoo, mɛ waatɔ́.” Bhii tak, nyɛ kadi ɛ́, ààtɔ́.
Tin, tɔ bɔn binɔk bɛbá, ɛzɛ looba dum nɛ lwomel sɛɛg'ɔɔ?» Bɛ eezɛbɔɔza nɛ Yezu náá: «Ye ɛ́ mɔn mɛgwyak.» Tin, Yezu ɛ́ boozɛke nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ́ etɛp e tsɛɛtsɛ náá, bɛnɔŋel ɛ epata e lapo nɛ boa ɛ mɛzɔ ɛ́ waaleeni tɔ Ɛyoŋ ɛ Zɛɛb ɛsok nɛ nen.
Etɛɛ náá, Zaŋ Nduuel-bot nazyɛ ɛ́ zɛlyaal bin ze epiki, bi nabɛ ɛ́ ààmyaal nyɛ. Tin, bɛnɔŋel ɛ epata e lapo nɛ boa ɛ mɛzɔ naamyaal nyɛ. Bela náá, dáa bi naabee yɛ ɛ, bi nabɛ ɛ́ ààliig elyem bin, bi ààpakomyaal-myaalak nyɛ.»
«Gwakeka dhiiti kana. Mot ngɔt naabɛ pyeeb ele di edjɛ bhum bɛ di esa mɛnyok mɛ vin nɛ yɛ ɛ. Nyɛ eezɛpeeb pyeeb tak, pu guk tɔ ɛkok é di bɛ aadi esyaal mɛdii mɛ bhum tak ɔ, baasum ndjaa, étɛp bot aadi ebaal pyeeb ɔ. É di tak, nyɛ eezɛdjɛ bot ɛ di egu mɛsa mɛ vin ɔ etɛp bɛ neesa mɛsa tɔ tak. Nyɛ eezɛnɔɔ nyel, tɔ́ mɛdjoŋ.
Tin, mbu epyeeb e tak di ewum ɛ, yɛ eezɛkum. Wɔ gwaa, nakuma pyeeb zokazɛlwom bot ɛ mɛsa mɛ pɛ daa bot ɛ nyɛ nalik bɛ nɛ pyeeb ɔ, étɛp bɛ needjɛ nyɛ yɛ pak vin bɛ bela ɛ.
Wɔ gwaa, bot ɛ nalik nɛ pyeeb ɔ, zokazɛmɛt bɛ. Bɛ eezɛduma ngɔt é nyel nɛ mɛbin, bɛ eenɔɔ nwyak gó nyɛ, zɛnɔɔ nwyak tak, bɛ eezɛwus nyɛ nɛ mɛkok, gó nyɛ.
Bhii tak, nakuma pyeeb ɛ́ boozɛkyeed bot ɛbuɛpe dhaa bot ɛ nyɛ nalwom sok ɔ, pɛ pyeeb tak, bɛ nabaazosa nɛ nɔɔ ɛ́ deenek.
Bhii tak, nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛlwom mɔn'ɛ met. Nyɛ nabɛ ɛ́ nɛ geka náá: “Bot binɔk ɛ́ waamyaal nyɛ nɛ ɛdjɛ nyɛ duu, etɛɛ náá, yɛ ɛ́ mɔn'ɛ met.”
Dáa bot ɛ nadi esa mɛsa tɔ pyeeb ɛ nabee mɔn'enɔk ɛ, bɔɔ náá: “Yawee! Beeka mot aalik nɛ mɛvu mak djas ɔ! Dhaka, mena góka nyɛ. Tin, mɛvu mak aakadi ɛ́, yenabɛlka.”
Wɔ gwaa, bɛ zɛmɛt nyɛ, mwas nyɛ bhii pyeeb vin, bɛ eezɛgó nyɛ.»
Yezu ɛ́ boozɛdji bɛ náá: «É di'enek, é sok nakuma pyeeb aakazyɛ ɛ́, nyɛ goka nɛ ɛsa bot binɔk dáa?»
Yala yɔbɔ kabɛ ɛ́ náá: «Ye goka ɛ́ nakuma pyeeb gó bot ɛ nadi esa mɛsa tɔ pyeeb'ɛ ɔ ààgek bɛ ghoŋ. Bhii tak, da nyɛ ɛ́ nɔɔ pyeeb, djɛ nɛ bot ɛ sis aazɛdjɛ nyɛ yɛ pak ɛkɛɛ ɔ.»
É di'enek, Yezu ɛ́ booke nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Bi dinaa ààpaalaa mɛkpa mak tɔ ekwyala e Zɛɛb é? “Ɛkok ɛ bɛsumel mwas ɛ́, ye moo ɛ́ ɛkok ɛ di epyet ndjaŋ ɛ. Ye ɛ́ nɛ ghwyil ɛ Ghɛŋ. Ye ɛ́ tin ɛ boo mbyok étɛp'ena!”»
Yezu eebaazɛkɛl náá: «Mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ́ náá, bi ɛ́ waadɛkaa Ɛyoŋ ɛ Zɛɛb, étɛp ye needjɛaa nɛ bot ɛ mbyak aadi edjɛ bhum ɔ. [
Mot aaduma kɔ ɛkok ɛ tak ɔ, nyɛ waabik. Yɛ kabɛ náá, ɛkok ɛ kakwyit kɔ mot ɔɔ, mot tak ɛpetwaalel. Nyɛ moo eghutu-ghutu.]»
Gwaka bɛ nagwak kana tak ɛ, eboo bɛghaa-Zɛɛb, nɛ eFalizyɛ nabɛ ɛ́, bɛ eegu náá, Yezu nalii ɛ́ nɛ nɔɔ.
Bɛ ɛ́ boozɛkan ɛsaa mɛpek étɛp bɛ neemɛt nyɛ. Bɛ nadi ɛ́ nɛ bwoo ekaab mɛdhuu mɛ bot ɛ nadi tin ɔ. Bot ɛ tak nake ɛ́ náá, Yezu ɛ́ ngoolel-mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb.
Yezu eebaazɛkan ɛlii nɛ bot tɔ kana. Nyɛy náá:
«Beeka sa di enɔŋel nɛ Ɛyoŋ ɛ di tɔ gwoo ɛ: Dhiiti mɛkoozi naazɛdjóo ɛbyoŋ étɛp ɛba ɛ mɔn.
Ye ɛ́ nyɛ kazɛlwom bot ɛ mɛsa mɛ, bɛ kɛdjóo bot étɛp ɛdɛ edee ɛbyoŋ ɛ ɛba. Tin, bot ɛ tak ààpakakwyɛl ɛzyɛ.
Bhii yenek, nyɛ eebaazɛlwom bɛdhiiti bot ɛ mɛsa mɛ é yak kɔkɔ nɛ bhaadal náá, bɛ kɛlɛɛ bot náá: “Edee moo ɛ́ ndjaaba. Mɛ eezegó engɔmbɛ nɛ etaa bam na mɛdɛl. Esa djas moo ɛ́ koobela. Dha dɛka ɛbyoŋ.”
Tin, bot ɛ nadjóoaa ɔ, ààkobis-bisak, mot nɛ mot naaghɛɛ yɛ nyel, tɔ́ mɛze mɛ. Nwyak tɔ́ pɛ pyeeb'ɛ, nwyak tɔ́ pɛ nyɛ di ebɔmsa esa bɛ ɛ.
Bak bot zokazɛmɛt bot ɛ mɛsa mɛ kukuma yenɔk nalwom ɔ, duma bɛ é mɛnyel nɛ mɛbin, bɛ ɛ́ boozɛgó bɛ.
Mɛkoozi zokazɛkpaa lyem: nyɛ ɛ́ bookazɛlwom esodja bɛ, bɛ gó bot ɛ nagó bot bɛ ɔ. Bhii tak, da bɛ ɛ́ dik eghaada bɔɔ.
Bhii tak, nyɛ eezɛlɛɛ bot ɛ mɛsa mɛ náá: “Edee e ɛbyoŋ ɛ ɛba moo ɛ́ koobela. Bot ɛ djóoaa bɛ zɛdɛ ɔ, ààkɔa nɛ ɛdɛ edee e tak.
Wyiska, da bi ɛ́ tɔ́ kɔ eboo egba. Djóoka mot djas bi aaboma nɛ nɔɔ ɛ, bɛ zɛdɛ edee e ɛbyoŋ ɛ ɛba.”
Bot ɛ mɛsa zokazɛtɔ́ egba nɛ egba, kɛdjóo bot djas bɛ aaboma nɛ nɔɔ ɔ, bɛmbee ɛ bot nɛ bɛmbɛɛ bot. Tin, koo bɛ nakoobal étɛp ɛbyoŋ ɛ naalwood “kpep”.
«Tin, mɛkoozi eezɛni tɔ koo tak, étɛp nyɛ neekabee bot ɛ zyɛ zɛdɛ edee ɛbyoŋ ɔ. É di'enek, nyɛ kabee kuku bot ɛ́ dhiiti mot ààbɛ nɛ kaad di egoka nɛ ɛbɔtaa é mɛbyoŋ ɛ.
Nyɛ ɛ́ boodji nyɛ náá: “Mɔɔ sɔ'am, wɔ ni wak dáa, wɔy ààbɛ nɛ kaad bot di egoka nɛ ɛbɔt étɛp ɛ ɛbyoŋ ɛ?” Tin, mot'enɔk kadi ɛ́, ààbɔɔza kiya mɛkoozi menɔk.
Tinaak mɛkoozi eezɛlwom bot ɛ mɛsa mɛ náá: “Mɛtka mot'enɔk, da bi ɛ́ kɔl nyɛ mɛko nɛ mɛmbɔ. Bhii tak, da bi ɛ́ mwas nyɛ pɛ kel, tɔ ghooghom. Penek aadi ɛ́ mɛgwyɛ nɛ ɛkwaal ɛ mɛtsok.”»
Yezu eebaazɛbil náá: «Ye ɛ́, etɛɛ náá, bot ɛbuɛpe ɛ́ waadjóoaa. Tin, bot aasɛ́ɛaa ɔ ààdyeebabu.»
EFalizyɛ zokakɛboma étɛp ɛdjek dáa bɛ di egoka nɛ ɛsa, bɛ neekwyesal Yezu nɛ mɛdjin étɛp nyɛ neebela ndjɛ kɔ mɛkpa mɛ ɛmet ɛ.
Bɛ ɛ́ boozɛkyeed bɛdhiiti bɛdjekel bɔɔ, nɛ bot ɛ zɛɛga ɛ mɛkoozi Elood, bɛ zɛlɛɛ nɛ Yezu náá: «Lyoel, bis nɛ gu náá, etɛp ee wɔ di elɛɛ ɛ, ye ɛ́ etsɛɛtsɛ. Wɔ lyo bot ɛ́ epiki dáa mot di egoka nɛ ɛkɛ dáa Zɛɛb di ekwyɛl ɛ. Wɔ ààbem ba nɛ sa mot di egek tɔ lyem'ɛ ɛ, etɛɛ náá, wɔy ààdyeebagwyák sa bot di esa étɛp bɛ neetela mɛnyel ɛ.
Lɛɛa bis, tɔ yɔ egeka dáa wɔ di ebee ɛ: etsi bina lɛɛ ɛ́ náá, bot tuud lapo nɛ mɛkoozi Sezaad, mena tuudka ohoo mena nàtuudka?»
Dáa Yezu nadi egu mbee mɛpek mɔɔ ɛ, nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛbɔɔza nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Bot ɛ mɛdjhaaz pɛ ɛko, bhimis pɛ si! Étɛp yé bi di ekwyɛl ɛwa mɛ tɔ mɛbhowal?
Pookolyaalka mɛ falanga wat bot di etuud lapo nɛ yɛ ɛ, étɛp mɛ neebee.» Wɔ gwaa, bɛ zɛzyɛ nyɛ nɛ mɔɔ falanga wat.
Bhii tak, Yezu ɛ́ boozɛdji bɛ náá: «Kɔ ghwooz'ak, ye lulaa ɛbhwoob ɛ zɛ? Ye ɛ́ din ɛ zɛ di kwyala kɔ tak?»
Bot binɔk eezɛbɔɔza nɛ Yezu náá: «Ye ɛ́ yɛ Sezaad.» Tin, Yezu ɛ́ boozɛke nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Djɛka mɛkoozi Sezaad sa di náá ye ɛ́ yɛ Sezaad ɛ, da bi ɛ́ djɛ Zɛɛb sa di náá, ye ɛ́ yɛ Zɛɛb ɛ.»
Gwaka bɛ nagwak eyala ɛ Yezu deenek ɛ, ye nabɛ ɛ́, bɛ naadyeebadjoka ɛlyelɛpe. Bhii tak, bɛ boozɛnɔɔ mɛnyel, tɔ́ yɔbɔ.
Dwoo tak wat, bɛdhiiti eSaduseɛ zokazyɛ pɛ daa Yezu. ESaduseɛ ɛ́ bot ɛ di ke náá, bot aanàgom bhis ɛsyee ɔ. Bɛ eezɛdji kiya,
bɔɔ nɛ Yezu náá: «Lyoel, mɛkana ɛ Moiiz lɛɛ ɛ́ náá: “Mot ɛ́ gwyɛ ààlik mɔn ɔɔ, ye goka ɛ́ náá, dhyeeb mot lik ɔ, ba kus myɛl étɛp nyɛ neekwyiida tel gwyɛ ɔ.”
Bela tin, tɔ lɔɔg'es, ye nabɛ ɛ́ nɛ bɔn botom ɛtɛn nɛ bɛbá. Mot mɛgwyak eezɛba, dáa nyɛ kagwyɛ ɛ́, nyɛ kalik kus myɛl nadi ààbɛ nɛ mɔn ɔ nɛ dhyeeb.
Mot nabɔɔba nyɛ ɛ́ kanɔɔ moma bhii koŋ'ɛ. Nyɛy eebaazɛkpaa nɛ mɛsyee, gwyɛ, ààlik mɔn. Tyee wat nɛ mot nabaazyɛ bhis yenɔk ɔ. Tin, bɔɔ djas bɛtɛn nɛ bɛbá kadi ɛ́, ààbya nɛ moma yenɔk.
Bhis ɛsyee ɛ bɔɔ djas, moma eebaazɛkpaa nɛ mɛsyee, gwyɛ.
Dwoo bot aagom bhis ɛsyee ɛ, moma yenɔk aakadi mwaa zɛ pak bɔɔ bɛtɛn nɛ bɛbá? Etɛɛ náá, bɔɔ djas nabɛ ɛ́ botom bɛ!»
Yezu eezɛbɔɔza nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Bi ɛ́ tɔ ɛdjak, etɛɛ náá, bi ààmɛt ɛnyɔɛpe sa di kwyala tɔ mɛkana mɛ Zɛɛb ɛ. Bi ààgu ghwyil ɛ Zɛɛb!
Etɛɛ náá, é ghɛŋ bot aagom bhis ɛsyee ɛ, botom nɛ boa aanàkwaabaabael. Boa pe aanàni mɛba, etɛɛ náá, bot djas aadi ɛ́, dáa efofop tɔ gwoo.
Dum nɛ tɛp ɛgom bhis ɛsyee, bi dinaa ààpaalaa sa Zɛɛb lɛɛ kɔ ɛsu ɛ tak ɛ? Nyɛ naake ɛ́:
“Ye ɛ́ mam, Zɛɛb ɛ Abalaam, yɛ Izak, nɛ Zɛɛb ɛ Zakɔɔb.”» Yezu eebaazɛke náá: «Zɛɛb tok Zɛɛb bot ɛ zegwyɛ ɔ. Nyɛ ɛ́ Zɛɛb bot ɛ di nɛ tsik ɔ.»
Ye nabɛ ɛ́, mɛlyo mɛ tak naadyeebakwyɛsa tɔ elyem e mɛdhuu mɛ bot ɛ nadi egwak nyɛ ɔ.
Dáa eFalizyɛ nagwak náá, Yezu naadiyal eSaduseɛ enuub ɛ, bɛ ɛ́ boozɛsɛɛga.
Dhiiti lyoel etsi e Zɛɛb naazɛkwyɛl ɛbhoal Yezu. Nyɛy nɛ nɛ náá:
«Lyoel, yaa tsi di edhaa etsi djas?»
Yezu kabɔɔza nɛ nɛ náá: «“Wɔ goka ɛ́, wɔ kwyɛl Ghɛŋ Zɛɛb'ɔ, nɛ lyem'ɔ djas, nɛ sisim'ɔ djas, nɛ ɛtselal ɛ lɔ djas.”
Yenek ɛ́ di boo tsi. Ye ɛ́ tsi di dhaa etsi djas ɛ.
Gwaka tsi di ebɔɔba yii mɛkɛn ɛ: “Wɔ goka ɛ́, wɔ kwyɛl sɔ'ɔ mot dáa wɔ di ekwyɛl nyel'ɔ ɛmet ɛ.”
Etsi ɛ Moiiz djas nɛ mɛlyo mɛ bɛngoolel ɛ mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb pyet ɛ́ kɔ etsi binek ebá.»
Efalizyɛ nadi ɛ́, tɔ yɔbɔ zɛɛga. Yezu ɛ́ boozɛdji bɛ náá:
«Tɔ yebɔ egeka, Mɛsia ɛ́ zɛ?» Bɛ ɛ́ boozɛbɔɔza nɛ nɛ náá: «Nyɛ ɛ́ dha ɛ Dhavid.»
É di'enek, Yezu ɛ́ boozɛke nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Ye nakosa dáa náá, Dhavid nɛ ghwyil Sisim na Dɛɛ djóo nyɛ “Ghɛŋ”? Etɛɛ náá, Dhavid naake náá:
“Ghɛŋ Zɛɛb nake nɛ Ghɛŋ'am ɛ náá: Dha disi pɛ mbɔ eghɛŋ bam. Mɛ waalwom bot ɛ mɛbhuka mɔ lwoma bhel náá, bɛ zɛdhaa si mɛko mɔ.”»
«Yɛ bɛ náá, Dhavid nyɛ ɛmet naadjóo nyɛ “Ghɛŋ” ɔɔ, é yaa tyɛ Mɛsia aakabaadi dha yɛ?»
Bɔɔ djas moo tin «kup», ààbɛ nɛ ɛkpa ɛlóo bhis étɛp djas Yezu nalii ɛ. Kana dwoo ɛlenek, bot nabɛ ɛ́ ààkadjheebal ɛdji nyɛ mɛdjin.
Wɔ gwaa, Yezu zɛlii nɛ mɛdhuu mɛ bot ɛ nadi tin ɔ, dɔɔ nɛ bɛdjekel bɛ.
Nyɛy nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Mɛsa mɛ bɛghaŋ ɛ mɛkana mɛ etsi nɛ eFalizyɛ zɛlyo bot dum nɛ dáa etsi ɛ Moiiz di egoka nɛ ɛkɛ ɛ.
Bi goka ɛ́ nɛ ɛlooba nɛ nɔɔ, da bi ɛ́ sa esesɛɛ bɛ aalwom bin ɛ, djas. Yɛ kabɛ mɛfulu mɔɔ ɔ, sa mot ààsa dáa bɔɔ. Etɛɛ náá, bɛ ààsa esesɛɛ ee bɛ di elyo bot ɛ.
Bɛ ɛpekaŋal mɛkɔm mɛ na dil-dil di ɛlyelɛpe é ɛbɛp ɛ, bɛ kakɛl ɛ́ kɔ mɛbyak mɛ bot. É di'enek, bɛ kadi ɛ́, ààkwyɛl ɛkokee-keeak nɛ djin bɛ neekogek mɛdil mɛ mɛkɔm mɛ tak.
Bɛ sa esesɛɛ bɔɔ djas ɛ́, étɛp bɛ neetela mɛnyel. Deenek, yɛ kabɛ ekwyala ee mɛkpa mɛ Zɛɛb bɛ di ebɛk é ebhata-bhwoob bɔɔ nɛ é mɛmbɔ mɔɔ ɔ, bɛ sa epɛk e tak ɛ́ ɛbɔkɛpe. Yɔbɔ ekel ee di lataa kɔ ekaad ɛ, nɛ elɔbɔ bɔɔ nɛ dyeebadjaa dhaa tyɛ.
Tɔ mɛbyoŋ, bɛ dyeebakwyɛl ɛdisi ɛ́ kɔ mɛbhóó mɛ koobelaa étɛp bot ɛ duu ɛ. Yɛ kabɛ tɔ́ ndjaa mendjaala mɛ eYuda ɔ, bɛ dyeebakwyɛl ɛnɔŋ ɛ́ mɛbhóó mɛ pɛ sok é di bɛ aatela mɛnyel ɛ.
Bɛ dyeebakwyɛl ɛ́ bot swos bɛ nɛ duu kɔ mɛbɛsɛɛ é di bot di ɛbuɛpe ɔ. Bɛ kwyɛl ɛ́, bot djóo bɛ “Lyoel”.
«Yɛ kabɛ biyɔ ɔ, nàkeka náá, bi djóoaa “Lyoel”, etɛɛ náá, biyɔ djas ɛ́ bɔn sɛɛg ngɔt. Bi ɛ́ nɛ lyoel ngɔt.
Sa mot ààdjóo mot kɔ bɔs'ak “Sɛɛg'es” etɛɛ náá, biyɔ djas ɛ́ bɔn sɛɛg ngɔt, Sɛɛg'en ngɔt di pɛ tɔ gwoo ɔ.
Nàkwyɛlka náá, bot djóo bin “Kukuma” etɛɛ náá, kukuma yen ɛ́ ngɔt, Mɛsia.
Mot ɛ́ kwyɛl ɛdi mot ɛsok ɛ lɔɔg ɔɔ, ye goka ɛ́ nyɛ di tyee mot-mɛsa mɛ bɔn nyɛɛg.
Mot di eben nyel tɔ bɛsɔ ɔ, nyɛ waasilaa. Mot di esil nyel tɔ bɛsɔ ɔ, nyɛ waabenaa.»
«Haa kpaa-ghoŋ nɛ nen, biyɔ bɛghaŋ ɛ mɛkana mɛ etsi nɛ eFalizyɛ, bot ɛ mɛdjhaaz pɛ ɛko, bhimis pɛ si! Bi ɛpediyal bot ɛbɛ ɛ Ɛyoŋ ɛ di tɔ gwoo ɛ. Biyɔ bɛmet, bi aanàkwaani, tin, bi ààkwyɛl náá, bot ɛ di ekwos ɛni ɔ, bɛ ni tɔ Ɛyoŋ ɛ tak. [
«Haa kpaa-ghoŋ nɛ nen, biyɔ bɛghaŋ ɛ mɛkana mɛ etsi nɛ eFalizyɛ, bot ɛ mɛdjhaaz pɛ ɛko, bhimis pɛ si! Bi ɛpedɛk bɛkus ɛ boa esa bɔɔ djas. É di tak wat, bi nɛ kwyɛl ɛdul ɛ mendjaala na “kpɔkɔlɔm” étɛp ɛtela mɛnyel tɔ bot. É tɛp tak ɛ́ di náá, bi ɛ́ waapɛ́ɛaa ɛ́ epɛ́ɛ wat di na lyel-lyel, ààbɛ nɛ ghoŋ ɛ!]
«Haa kpaa-ghoŋ nɛ nen, biyɔ bɛghaŋ ɛ mɛkana mɛ etsi nɛ eFalizyɛ, bot ɛ mɛdjhaaz pɛ ɛko, bhimis pɛ si! Bi ɛ́ ɛpetɔ́ mɛdjoŋ é edi djas kɔ bɔs nɛ kɔ eboo mɛdhii mɛ mɛsɔn, étɛp ɛsaa mot ngɔt di emyaal ɛdjaala Zɛɛb eYuda ɔ. Tin mot ɛ́ kadu bin ɔɔ, bi kaliig yii zaag mot ɛ mbi mot di egoka nɛ du na kɔm-kɔm ɛ, dhaa-dhaŋak biyɔ bɛmet.
«Haa kpaa-ghoŋ nɛ biyɔ bot ɛ edhim, biyɔ bot ɛ́ di edjɛɛd bot ɔ. Bi dyeebalɛɛ ɛ́ náá: “Mot ɛ́ tuwal myoŋ nɛ mɛsoŋ kɔ Ndjaa-ebuwa ɔɔ, yɛ aanàsa sonok. Nyɛ katuwal myoŋ nɛ mɛsoŋ kɔ lɔɔd di tɔ Ndjaa-ebuwa ɔɔ, nyɛ goka ɛ́ nɛ ɛsa sa nyɛ tuwal myoŋ nɛ mɛsoŋ kɔ ɛsu ɛ tak ɛ.”
Bi ɛ́ endjemet e bot, bot ɛ edhim! Ɛyé di dhaa mɛtaŋ tin, yɛ lɔɔd “ohoo” nɛghu Ndjaa-ebuwa di edjɛ lɔɔd edɛɛ ɛ?
«Bi baalɛɛ ɛ́ náá: “Mot ɛ́ tuwal myoŋ nɛ mɛsoŋ kɔ mesa ebuwa ɔɔ, yɛ aanàsa sonok. Nyɛ katuwal myoŋ nɛ mɛsoŋ kɔ buwa di kɔ mesa ebuwa tak ɔɔ, nyɛ goka ɛ́ nɛ ɛsa sa nyɛ tuwal myoŋ nɛ mɛsoŋ kɔ ɛsu ɛ tak ɛ.”
Biyɔ bot ɛ edhim! Ɛyé di dhaa mɛtaŋ tin, ɛsa e buwa “ohoo” nɛghu mesa ebuwa bɛ di eka gha kɔ tak ɛ?
Yɛ bɛ náá, mot eetuwal myoŋ nɛ mɛsoŋ kɔ mesa ebuwa ɔɔ, nyɛ tuwal yɛ ɛ́ kɔ mesa ebuwa dɔɔ nɛ kɔ esa e buwa ee di kaaa kɔ mesa ɛ.
Mot ɛ́ di etuwal myoŋ nɛ mɛsoŋ mɛ kɔ Ndjaa-ebuwa ɔɔ, nyɛ tuwal myoŋ nɛ mɛsoŋ mɛ tak ɛ́ dɔɔ nɛ kɔ din ɛ Zɛɛb mot di tɔ ndjaa tak ɔ.
Mot di etuwal myoŋ nɛ mɛsoŋ, da nyɛ ɛ́ nɔɔ gwoo dáa tyaasɛs ɔɔ, nyɛ tuwal yɛ ɛ́ kɔ bóó mɛkoozi ɛ Zɛɛb nɛ din ɛ Zɛɛb, mot di kɔ tak ɔ.
«Haa kpaa-ghoŋ nɛ nen, biyɔ bɛghaŋ ɛ mɛkana mɛ etsi nɛ eFalizyɛ, bot ɛ mɛdjhaaz pɛ ɛko, bhimis pɛ si! Bi dyeebakwyɛl ɛ́ ɛtuud Zɛɛb nɛ endiyal kam e nadjeebe nɛ eka e na mbɛɛ mɛnuub zɛnɔɔ aghomkɔtɔ. Tin, bi kadjisa ɛ́ etɛtɛ mɛlyo mɛ di nɛ boo mɛsuk tɔ etsi ɛ. Mɛlyo mɛ tak ɛ́: epiki, enɛm esa, nɛ ɛkɛ dáa Zɛɛb di ekwyɛl ɛ. Yenek djas ɛ́ sa di egoka náá, bot du mɛlu djas nɛ zii, ààbet dhiiti sonok ɛ.
Biyɔ, bɛdjɛɛdel, bot ɛ edhim! Bi ɛpesyal mɛnyok men ekaab náá, ba mɔɔ kuŋ ɛ́ zɛkɛdhaa tɔ tak, ghuna bi ɛpemin boo tu yaaga kyee dik bɛsyɛ di ààbɛ nɛ mɛdii ɛ!
«Haa kpaa-ghoŋ nɛ nen, biyɔ bɛghaŋ ɛ mɛkana mɛ etsi nɛ eFalizyɛ, bot ɛ mɛdjhaaz pɛ ɛko, bhimis pɛ si! Bi gwyii ɛ́ koŋ bɛɛlɛ nɛ koŋ saan, tin pɛ tɔ mɔ tak kadi ɛ́ “tɔɔɔ” nɛ mendi mɛ embee mɛfulu men: esa e djii nɛ embee mɛkwosak men.
Biyɔ eFalizyɛ, bot ɛ edhim! Pookogwyiika sok tɔ mɔ bɛɛlɛ. Tin, pɛ koŋ tak ɛ waadjhaazal.
«Haa kpaa-ghoŋ nɛ nen, biyɔ bɛghaŋ ɛ mɛkana mɛ etsi nɛ eFalizyɛ, bot ɛ mɛdjhaaz pɛ ɛko, bhimis pɛ si! Bi ɛ́ dáa mɛvit nasumaa ɛnyɔɛpe da ɛ́ lɔɔbaa ɛpyaab ɛ. Enɛm e tak nyen ɛ́ pɛ kel é mis mɛ bot, ghuna tɔ tak, ye ɛ́ ɛbyok ɛ egwyes ààbɛ nɛ tsik nɛ ebet esonok.
Ye ɛ́ dáa biyɔ, bot ɛ di ebee bin ɔ, bɛ ke ɛ́ náá, bi ɛ́ bot ɛ epiki. Ghuna pɛ tɔ len, ye ɛ́ “tɔɔɔ” nɛ mɛdjhaaz pɛ ɛko, bhimis pɛ si nɛ embee esesɛɛ.
«Haa kpaa-ghoŋ nɛ nen, biyɔ bɛghaŋ ɛ mɛkana mɛ etsi nɛ eFalizyɛ, bot ɛ mɛdjhaaz pɛ ɛko, bhimis pɛ si! Bi ɛpesum embɛɛ mɛvit étɛp bɛngoolel ɛ mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb. Bi ɛpekoobal nɛ ɛsɔn ɛ mɛvit mɛ bot ɛ epiki.
Bi dyeebake ɛ́ náá: “Mena ɛpedi ɛ́, dika é ghɛŋ bɛbhaab binaka ɔɔ, pe mena nabɛ ɛ́ ààgwakel nɛ nɔɔ étɛp ɛgó ɛ bɛngoolel ɛ mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb.”
Deenek, bi ɛpemyaal biyɔ bɛmet náá, bot ɛ nadi egó bɛngoolel ɛ mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb ɔ nabɛ ɛ́ bɛbhaab bin.
Ɛbɛsɛɛ'enek tsabidibila, belaka, duka ko bɛbhaab bin nalik bin yɛ ɛ. Silalka mɛsa mɛ bɛ nakan ɛ.
Bɛnyɔ, mbyak mɛgel! Bi aasa dáa étɛp bi needi ààkɛdyak tɔ du na kɔm-kɔm?
«Gwakeka mɛ ɛnyɔɛpe: mɛ waadhis bin bɛngoolel ɛ mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb, bɛtsoŋ ɛ bot, nɛ embɛɛ bɛghaŋ ɛ mɛkana mɛ etsi. Bi ɛ́ waagó bɛdhiiti, bi ɛ́ waabem bɛdhiiti tak é mɛlaaba. Bi ɛ́ waabi bɛdhiiti nɛ eghwyɛs tɔ mendjaa mɛ mendjaala mɛ eYuda men. Bi ɛ́ waadu bɛ nɛ swaka eghaada nɛ eghaada étɛp bi neegó bɛ.
Tinaak, guka náá, ɛbiyo djas bot di esa kɔ bot ɛ epiki kana ɛsyee ɛ Abhɛl mot epiki, kɛyaka nɛ yɛ Zakali mɔn Balakyi bi nagó pak Di na Dɛɛ ɛ Ghɛŋ nɛ mesa-ebuwa ɔ, yɛ waabulelaa kɔ len.
Mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ́ etɛp e tsɛɛtsɛ náá, efute e embee esesɛɛ binek ɛ́ waabulelaa kɔ bot ɛ di é dwoo mena dika mos'aak.»
«Yeluzalɛm! Yeluzalɛm wɔy mot di egó bɛngoolel ɛ mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb ɔ, wɔy mot di egó bot ɛ Zɛɛb di edhis ɔ, nɛ mɛkok. É sok edhen mɛ di ekwyɛl ɛsɛɛg bot ɛ di kɔ dɛl ɛ lɔ dáa nabwa-kuu di esɛɛg bɔn bɛ si mɛbhap mɛ ɛ, biyɔ ààkwyɛl!
Deenek guka náá, ndjaŋ'en ɛ́ waalik wum!
Nɛ tsɛɛtsɛ, mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ́ náá, bi aanàkabaabee mɛ, kana dwoo pan mos'ak, kɛyaka nɛ dwoo bi aake náá: “Mɛnyɔ nɛ mot aazyɛ nɛ din ɛ Ghɛŋ ɔ!”»
Dáa Yezu nadi ewyis tɔ Ndjaa-ebuwa ɛ́, bɛdjekel eezɛtiila pɛ daa lɛ étɛp bɛ neelyaal nyɛ zumal Ndjaa-ebuwa.
Tin, Yezu moo zɛlii nɛ nɔɔ, nyɛy nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Bi ɛpebee esa djas di tin ɛ? Mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ́ etɛp e tsɛɛtsɛ náá, ɛkok wat aanàkwaalik yak kɔ yii. Djas ɛ́ waawaazel.»
Yezu eezɛdisi kɔ ɛtsok ɛ pyeeb oliv, bɛdjekel eezɛdu nyɛ é ngwoob. Bɔɔ nɛ nɛ náá: «Lɛɛa bis esesɛɛ binek sael den? Lyaala bis endem e bis aagu náá, wɔ moo ɛ́ kɔ ɛbula nɛ náá, bɔs moo ɛ́ kɔ ɛsi ɛ.»
Yezu eezɛbɔɔza nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Dika nɛ etsoŋ, sa mot ààkɔɔ bin.
Etɛɛ náá, bɛtɛ nɛ bot ɛ́ waazyɛ nɛ din ɛ lam. Bɛ waalɛɛ bin náá: “Ye ɛ́ mam ɛ́ di Mɛsia!” Bɛ waasa náá, bot ɛbuɛpe kat ɛdum koŋ nɛ Zɛɛb.
Bi ɛ́ waagwak bot elii etɛp e mɛɛb é ngwoob'en nɛ menduk mɛ mɛɛb mɛ di pɛ ɛtseta ɛ. Sa mot ààbem ba etɛɛ náá, ye goka ɛ́, esesɛɛ binek sɛ́ɛ. Tin, guka náá, yenek tok mɛsi mɛ bɔs.
Dhiiti mbyak ɛ́ waaghɛɛ, kɛlumela dɛɛb nɛ yak mbyak. Dhiiti ɛyoŋ ɛ́ waakɛghɛɛ, kɛlumela dɛɛb nɛ yak ɛyoŋ. É bɛdhiiti edi, bɔs ɛ́ waakuu, pwom edee ɛ́ waani kɔ mɛl.
Mɛzel menek djas aadi ɛ́ dáa endem e mɛkɛn ɛsuula ɛbyel ɛ mɔn.
Bot ɛ́ waakɛpit bin, étɛp bi neezukaa. Tin bot ɛ́ waagó bin. Membyak djas ɛ́ waabhina bin kɔ ɛsu ɛ lam.
É sok'enek, bot ɛbuɛpe ɛ́ waakat ɛdum koŋ nɛ Zɛɛb. Bot ɛ́ waapitel pak'ɔɔ. Bɛdhiiti ɛ́ waabhina bɛsɔ bɔɔ.
Bɛtɛ nɛ bɛngoolel ɛ mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb yii mɛkɔŋ ɛ́ waatuula, bɛ waakɔɔ bot ɛbuɛpe.
Dáa ye di náá, embee esa ɛ́ waazɛdhaa tɔ elyem e bot ɛ, kwyɛl tɔ elyem e bot ɛbuɛpe waatyaala.
Tin, mot aakɛ nɛ ɛwa zii, kɛkum pɛ ɛsik ɔ, nyɛ waabela tsik.
Mbɛɛ Bhaadal dum nɛ Ɛyoŋ ɛ Zɛɛb aadi ɛ́ egoolel kɔ ɛko ɛ bɔs'ak djas, étɛp, bot djas di ààgu Zɛɛb ɔ neegwak yɛ. Bhii tak ɛ ɛsik ɛ bɔs aakakum.»
«Bi aabee mot na mbee mesyem mɛ na lyel-lyel dáa ngoolel-mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb Daniel nalɛɛ ɛ, nyɛy ebe di tɔ Di na Dɛɛ. Ye goka ɛ́ bot ɛ di egu ɛlaa mɛkana ɔ tiibal ɛnyɔɛpe!
Étɛp tak ɛ́ di náá, bot aadi pɛ kyee dik Yude ɔ, kan ekaab, tɔ́ pɛ tɔ mɛtsok.
Mot aadi kɔ mii ndjaŋ'ɛ ɔ nàbaasul pɛ si zɛni tɔ ndjaa étɛp ɛkɛnɔɔ sonok.
Mot aadi tɔ pyeeb ɔ, nàbaasik pɛ dɛl, kɛnɔɔ ndjookuwa yɛ.
Haa kpaa-ghoŋ dwoo ɛlenek nɛ boa aadi nɛ mɛbum ɔ, zɛnɔɔ boa aadi nɛ bɔn edɛ mɛbel ɔ!
Djaalaka nɛ Zɛɛb étɛp, bi ɛ́ zɛkɛwyis ekaab é mbu bɛbhi, nɛghu é dwoo saba!
Etɛɛ náá, é ɛwala tak, mezuk ɛ́ waadhaa mezuk mɛ mena zebee, kana bɔs nakusel ɛ, kɛyaka nɛ dwoo pan mos'ak. Yɛ aanàkwaakabaabɛ nɛ mbi mezuk deenek.
Zɛɛb nyɛ ɛmet ɛpedi ààbɛk bim mɛlu mɛ tak ɔɔ, pe ye tok nɛ mot aatsak. Ye nyɔ ɛ́, bi gu náá, Zɛɛb bɛk bim mɛlu mɛ mezuk menek ɛ́, kɔ ɛsu ɛ bot ɛ nyɛ nazɛsɛ́ɛ ɔ.
Dhiiti mot ɛ́ lɛɛ bin náá: “Beeka Mɛsia di wak e!” nɛghu bɛ lɛɛ náá: “Mɛsia ɛ́ poon!” ɔɔ, sa mot ààmyaal.
Etɛɛ náá, bɛmɛsia mɛ etsal nɛ bɛngoolel ɛ mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb yii mɛkɔŋ ɛ́ waatuula ɛbuɛpe. Bɛ waasa etɛp e mɛbwala nɛ bɛmɛvyɛkɛlɛ ɛbuɛpe étɛp bɛ neekɔɔ bot, dɔɔ nɛ bot ɛ Zɛɛb nazesɛ́ɛ ɔ.
Gwakeka, mɛ dul bin mɛlɔ ɛsok nɛ esesɛɛ binek kum tɔ len.
«Yɛ bɛ náá, bɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ́ náá: “Beeka, nyɛ ɛ́ pɛ tɔ kyee dik bɛsyɛ di ààbɛ nɛ mɛdii!” ɛ, nàtɔ́ka. Nɛghu bɛ kalɛɛ bin ɛ́ náá: “Beeka, yɛ sɔwa ɛ́ wak!” Sa mot ààmyaal, nyɛ tok tin.
Dáa ngwyes di ekas tɔ gwoo, dus pɛ ɛdjem ɛ dwoo, kɛtɔ́ pɛ ɛbil ɛ dwoo ɛ, Sɛɛŋɛlɛ Mɔn Mot aazyɛ ɛ́ deenek.
Enen ee di edɛ epuud ɔ dyeebasɛɛga ɛ́ é di muu tit di ɔ.»
«Ààbɔya batsa bhii ɛwala ɛ mezuk menek aadhaŋ ɛ, bi ɛ́ waabee náá, gwyes ɛ́ waagwyiid dhɔɔ, ngɔn aanàkabaakas, ekwyikwyen ɛ́ waadus tɔ gwoo, kwyit é bɔs, esa e mɛbwala djas di tɔ gwoo ɛ waadheegel.
Tin, ndem ɛ Sɛɛŋɛlɛ Mɔn Mot ɛ́ waanyen tɔ gwoo. Membyak djas di kɔ bɔs ɛ, yɛ aadi ɛ́, tɔ etsim nɛ mɛgwyɛ. Tin, bɛ waabee Sɛɛŋɛlɛ Mɔn Mot esul tɔ eguud tɔ gwoo nɛ bɛtɛ nɛ mɛbwala nɛ duma.
Boo tɔŋ ɛ́ waalɔɔel. Tin, nyɛ waalwom efofop pɛ é edum e bɔs djas, bɛ neekɛsɛɛg bot djas Zɛɛb nazesɛ́ɛ ɔ, kan yak edum e bɔs, kɛyaka nɛ yak edum.»
«Nɔɔka etsoŋ nɛ kana le fiigh: dáa mɛdii mɛ le fiigh aadi, ye moo byet tɔ elɛɛ e tak ɛ, eka moo baakwyil é tak ɛ, bi nɛ gu náá, mbɛɛ mbu eezekunaa.
Ye ɛ́ tyɛ wat nɛ biyɔ, é sok bi aabee endem binek moo nyen ɛ, guka náá, ɛbula ɛ Sɛɛŋɛlɛ Mɔn Mot moo ɛ́, yɛ eezekɔ. Yɛ aasael ɛ́ deenek.
Mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ́ etɛp e tsɛɛtsɛ náá, bot ɛ membu mak aanàkwaagwyɛ djas esonok bak ààsael.
Gwoo nɛ bɔs ɛ́ waadhaa, ye ɛ́ kabɛ mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb ɔ, yɛ aanàkwaadhaa.»
«Yɛ kabɛ dum nɛ dwoo nɛ ɛwala ɛ esesɛɛ binek aasael ɛ, ye tok nɛ mot ngɔt di egu, ààkobɛ-bɛak efofop tɔ gwoo, dɔɔ nɛ Mɔn Zɛɛb pe ààgu dwoo tak. Ye ɛ́ Sɛɛg nyɛ ɛmet ɛ di gu.
Ɛbula ɛ Sɛɛŋɛlɛ Mɔn Mot aadi ɛ́, dáa sa nasɛ́ɛ é ghɛŋ Noe ɛ.
Etɛɛ náá, é ghɛŋ tak, ɛsok nɛ boo bhyoŋ nɛ zyɛ, bot nadi ɛ́, tɔ mɛmyaala, edɛ edee, edɛ bɛmɛnyok, eba boa, ekyeed mɛsyes mɔɔ é mɛba, kɛkum dwoo Noe nani tɔ mɛsuwa ɛ.
Bot nabɛ ɛ́ ààbis, kɛkum dwoo boo bhyoŋ nazɛsilal bɔɔ djas na “bhɛɛɛ” ɛ. Yɛ aabaadi ɛ́, deenek dwoo Sɛɛŋɛlɛ Mɔn Mot aabula ɛ.
É ghɛŋ tak ɛ́ di náá, bot ɛbá ɛ́ waadi tɔ pyeeb. Ngɔt ɛ́ waanɔŋaa, nwyak ngɔt ɛ́ waalik.
Boa ɛbá ɛ́ waadi edum bhum tɔ bwak wat. Ngɔt ɛ́ waanɔŋaa, nwyak ngɔt ɛ́ waalik.
«Dika nɛ etsoŋ! Bɛɛka mis etɛɛ náá, bi ààgu dwoo Ghɛŋ'en aaboozyɛ ɛ́.
Gwakeka sa mɛ di elɛɛ ɛ́, yɛ bɛ náá, nakuma ndjaŋ ɛpedi egu ɛwala ɛ pum mot djii aazyɛ zɛdjii tɔ ndjaŋ'ɛ ɔɔ, pe nyɛ aanàkwaadja gɔ́, étɛp nyɛ neelu mot djii yenɔk, nyɛ nàni tɔ ndjaŋ'ɛ.
Ye ɛ́ mɛ di elɛɛ bin náá, bi bɛ ɛ́ mis, nàpeebaka, etɛɛ náá, Sɛɛŋɛlɛ Mɔn Mot aatuula ɛ́ é ɛwala bi aadi ààbwood nyɛ ɛ.»
«Ɛzɛ di mot-mɛsa mɛ na sosoob nɛ etsoŋ? Ye ɛ́ mot-mɛsa kukuma yɛ djɛ nyɛ mɛsa mɛ ɛbaal ɛ bɛsɔ nɛ ɛdjɛ bɛ edee bɔɔ é ɛwala bɛ di egoka nɛ ɛdɛ ɛ.
Mɛnyɔ nɛ mot-mɛsa menɔk, yɛ bɛ náá, kukuma yɛ aabula, nyɛ ɛ́ zɛbela nyɛ, nyɛy esa mɛsa mɛ menek ɔ.
Mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ́ etɛp e tsɛɛtsɛ náá: kukuma yenɔk ɛ́ waadjɛ mot-mɛsa menɔk esa bɛ djas nyɛ baal.
Yɛ kabɛ náá, nyɛ ɛ́ mbee mot-mɛsa di ààbɛ sosoob nɛ etsoŋ ɔɔ, nyɛ aake ɛ́ náá: “Kukuma aanàkwaaleebula.”
Deenek, nyɛ aadi ɛ́, ezuk bɛsɔ di esa mɛsa bɛ nɛ bɛ nɔɔ ɔ, nɛ ɛkɛdedɛ bɛ mɛnyok bɛ nɛ bot ɛ zegel mɛnyel mɔɔ tɔ mɛnyok ɔ.
Tin, kukuma yɛ aabula ɛ é dwoo nyɛ aadi ebwaal náá, nyɛ aanàkwaazyɛ ɛ.
Kukuma yenɔk ɛ́ waasɔ mot-mɛsa menɔk. Da nyɛ ɛ́ wa nyɛ é di mezuk, é di wat nɛ bot ɛ lwalɛŋ. Bhii tak nyɛ ɛ́ wus nyɛ pɛ kel pɛ bot ɛ di edje mɛgwyɛ nɛ ɛkwaal ɛ mɛtsok di ɛ.»
«Ɛni tɔ Ɛyoŋ ɛ di tɔ gwoo ɛ́ aadi ɛ́, dáa kana mɛsyes kam nanɔɔ elama bɔɔ, wyis, étɛp bɛ neekɛboma nɛ motom di ekwyɛl ɛba ɔ.
Bɛtɛn pak'ɔɔ nadi ɛ́, endjemet e mɛsyes. Bak bɛtɛn kadi ɛ́ bɛtsoŋ ɛ bɔɔ boa.
Endjemet e mɛsyes menɔk nanɔɔ yɔbɔ elama ɛ́, àànɔɔ ba mul, nɛ gu yii di tɔ elama ɛ́ waasi.
Yɛ kabɛ bot ɛ nadi bɛtsoŋ ɔ, bhii bɛ nanɔɔ elama ɛ, ye nabɛ ɛ́ bɛ naatɔ́ nɛ yak bim bɛmul bɛ nakwom ɛ.
Tin, motom kadi ɛ́, ààleetuula. Gɔ́ naazɛsa bɔɔ mɛsyes menɔk, wɔ gwaa, bɔɔ djas zɛkpaa nɛ gɔ́ ndjaasi.
«É di'enek, wɔ gwaa, boo tuud zokazɛgék kuku ɛgha ɛ pum náá: “Beeka motom ɛba! Kɛbomaka nɛ nɛ.”
Tin mɛsyes kam menɔk ɛ́ boozɛdjem, bɛ moo tin ekoobal elama bɔɔ.
Tin, mɛsyes mɛ nadi endjemet ɔ naazɛke nɛ bɛtsoŋ náá: “Bi ɛ́ nɛ ghwyil ɛbɛk bis ba mul mɛ lama batsa, etɛɛ náá, elama bis ɛpedim.”
Mɛsyes mɛ nadi bɛtsoŋ ɔ ɛ́ boobɔɔza nɛ nɔɔ náá: “Hooo, ààbɛ! Etɛɛ náá, bim bis di nɛ yɛ ɛ, yɛ aanàkwaadjala menabɛlka djas. Ye nyɔ ɛ́, bi kɛbɔm yebɔ tɔ edjando.”
Tin, endjemet e bɔɔ mɛsyes menɔk eezɛtɔ́, kɛbɔm yɔbɔ bɛmul. Bhii koŋ'ɔɔ, motom ɛba eezɛkum, nyɛ zokanɔŋ ɛ́ bɛtɛn ɛ nadi bɛtsoŋ ɔ. Nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛni nɛ nɔɔ tɔ ndjaa nakoobelaa étɛp ɛba ɛ. Bhii tak, bɛ eezɛkɔɔl ɛbɛ ɛ ndjaa nɛ ɛngoŋ.
Bhii ba ɛwala kadhaŋ ɛ, bɛdhiiti bɔɔ mɛsyes menɔk eezɛbula, bɛ moo tin etsim náá: “Ghɛŋ, Ghɛŋ diia bis ɛbɛ ɛ ndjaa!”
Motom ɛba eezɛbɔɔza nɛ nɔɔ náá: “Mɛ lɛɛ bin nɛ tsɛɛtsɛ ɛ́ náá, mɛ ààgu bin.”»
Bhii tak, Yezu eebaazɛke nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Bɛɛka mis, nàdjaka egɔ́. Dika nɛ etsoŋ etɛɛ náá, bi ààgu dwoo nɛ ɛwala ɛ tak.»
«Yɛ aadi ɛ́, dáa dhiiti motom nadi ekwyɛl ɛtɔ́ mɛdjoŋ, nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛdjóo bot ɛ mɛsa mɛ, da ɛ́ lik bɛ nɛ esa.
Nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛnɔɔ mɛdhɛɛb mɛ lɔɔd ɛtɛn, djɛ mot mɛkɛn. Mot nabɔɔba ɔ, nyɛ kadjɛ nyɛ ɛ́ mɛdhɛɛb mɛ elɔɔd ebá. Mot nazyɛ bhii mot bhɔɔba ɔ, nyɛ kadjɛ nyɛy ɛ́ ɛdhɛɛb lɔɔd wat. Nyɛ zokadjɛ mot nɛ mot ɛ sa di edjala nɛ ghwyil'ɛ ɛ, bhii tak nyɛ eezɛtɔ́ yɛ.
Mot-mɛsa nabela mɛdhɛɛb mɛ lɔɔd ɛtɛn eezɛtɔ́, yɛ kɛliig mɛmbɔ nɛ lɔɔd'enek. Wɔ gwaa nyɛ baazɛbela mɛdhɛɛb mɛ lɔɔd ɛtɛn kɔ yii nyɛ nadjɛaa sok ɛ.
Ye ɛ́ tyɛ wat nɛ mot nabela mɛdhɛɛb mɛmbá ɔ, nyɛ nabaasa yɛ ɛ́ dáa mot ɛsok nasa ɛ. Wɔ gwaa, nyɛ baabela mɛdhɛɛb mɛ lɔɔd membá kɔ yii nyɛ nalikaa nɛ yɛ ɛ.
Mot nabela ɛdhɛɛb ɛ lɔɔd wat ɔ, nyɛ naatɔ́ kɛpu bɔs, da ɛ́ nɔɔ yɛ, syel yɛ pɛ si bɔs.
«Bɛtɛ nɛ mɛlu bhii tak, kukuma bot ɛ mɛsa menɔk eezɛbula. Bhii tak nyɛ moo zɛdji bɛ dáa bɛ nadi ebe lɔɔd nyɛ nalik bɛ nɛ yɛ ɛ bhii koŋ'ɛ.
Mot-mɛsa na mɛdhɛɛb mɛtɛn ɛ́ boozɛlyaal yɛ mɛdhɛɛb mɛtɛn mɛ nyɛ nabaabela ɛ. Nyɛy nɛ kukuma yɛ náá: “Ghɛŋ, wɔ nadjɛ mɛ ɛ́ mɛdhɛɛb mɛ lɔɔd mɛtɛn. Beea dhiiti mɛdhɛɛb mɛ lɔɔd mɛtɛn mɛ mɛ baabela ɛ́.”
Kukuma yɛ ɛ́ booke nɛ nɛ náá: “Ɛnyɔɛpe! Wɔ ɛ́ mbɛɛ mot-mɛsa nɛ esosoob. Wɔ eesa mbɛɛ mɛsa nɛ sa dem. Mɛ waadjɛ wɔ yii di bu ɛ. Dha myaala é di wat nɛ nam.”
Mot-mɛsa nabela mɛdhɛɛb mɛ lɔɔd ebá ɔ, baazyɛ yɛ. Nyɛy náá: “Ghɛŋ, wɔ nadjɛ mɛ ɛ́ mɛdhɛɛb mɛ lɔɔd ebá. Mam eebaabela yak mɛdhɛɛb membá kɔ tak. Beea yɛ.”
Tin, kukuma yɛ eezɛke nɛ nɛ náá: “Ɛnyɔɛpe! Wɔ ɛ́ mbɛɛ mot-mɛsa nɛ esosoob. Wɔ eesa mbɛɛ mɛsa nɛ sa dem. Mɛ waadjɛ wɔ yii di bu ɛ. Dha myaala é di wat nɛ nam.”
«Bhii tak, mot nabela ɛdhɛɛb ɛ wat ɔ, nyɛ eezɛzyɛ é yɛ kɔkɔ. Nyɛ nɛ kukuma náá: “Ghɛŋ, mɛ nɛ gu náá, wɔy nɛ goo lo dhaa nyel. Wɔ dyeebakɛnɔɔ edee ɛ́ tɔ epyeeb ee wɔ di ààbɛ ɛ. Wɔ dyeebakɛbɔ́k bhum ɛ́, tɔ pyeeb wɔ nadi ààbɛ ɛ.
É tɛp tak ɛ́ mɛ gwak bwoo. Mɛ ɛ́ bookɛsyel lɔɔd'ɔ tɔ bɔs. Beea lɔɔd'ɔ, nɔŋa.”
É di'enek, kukuma ye ɛ́ boobɔɔza nɛ nɛ náá: “Mbee mot-mɛsa, tyaabel. Wɔ ke ɛ́ náá, wɔ nɛ gu náá, mam dyeebakɛnɔɔ esa e dɛk ɛ́ tɔ pyeeb mɛ di ààmwam bhek ɛ. Mɛ kɛbɔ́k bhum ɛ́ tɔ pyeeb mɛ nadi ààbɛ ɛ.
Gwaka mɛ, wɔ di àànɔɔ lɔɔd'am, kɛwa tɔ eboo mendjaa mɛ bɛ di ebaal epata e bot ɛ, étɛp yé? Wɔy ɛpedi ɛ́, di tsoŋ mot ɔɔ, pe bula mɛ bula ɛ, mɛ kazɛbela ɛ́ dhiiti lɔɔd eezekala kɔ yii mɛ nalik ɛ.
Dɛkeka nyɛ ɛdhɛɛb ɛ lɔɔd'enek, da bi ɛ́ djɛ mot di nɛ mɛdhɛɛb kam ɔ.
Etɛɛ náá, mot aadi nɛ ba bim sonok ɔ, bɛ waabil nyɛ dhiiti, étɛp ye neebu. Tin, mot aakadi toto ààbɛ nɛ sonok ɔ, bɛ waadɛk nyɛ dɔɔ nɛ eghutu-ghutu nyɛ lik nɛ yɛ ɛ.
Yɛ kabɛ mbee mot-mɛsa mak ɔ, zyeegalka nyɛ pɛ kel, tɔ ghooghom, tɔ di mɛgwyɛ nɛ di ɛkwaal ɛ mɛtsok.”»
«É sok Sɛɛŋɛlɛ Mɔn Mot aazyɛ tɔ duma yɛ bɛ nɛ efofop bɛ djas ɛ, nyɛ waazɛdisi kɔ bóó mɛkoozi mɛ.
Membyak djas di kɔ bɔs ɛ́ waazɛsɛɛga sok bhwoob'ɛ, bhii tak nyɛ waawa membɛk pak bot dáa mbaalel mɛsaa di ewa mbɛk pak ebhata nɛ etaŋ ɛ.
Nyɛ waanɛɛg ebhata pɛ mbɔ eghɛŋ, etaa pɛ mbɔ ɛmyɛl.
Tin, mɛkoozi waalɛɛ nɛ bot aadi pɛ mbɔ eghɛŋ ɔ náá: “Biyɔ, bot ɛ Saag'am zesɛɛ mɛtel ɔ, dhaka pɛ kak. Dhanika tɔ Ɛyoŋ ɛ Zɛɛb naloozekoobal bin yɛ é sok nyɛ nadi ekus bɔs ɛ.
Etɛɛ náá, za naasa mɛ, bi naadjɛ mɛ edee. Mɛ naagwak gwyes mɛdii, bi naadjɛ mɛ mɛdii. Mɛ nadi ɛ́ ndjoŋ, bi naamyaal mɛ tɔ mendjaa men dáa mɔn nyɛɛg'en.
Mɛ nadi ɛ́ ben toto, bi naabet mɛ. Mɛ naabɛ́, bi naagwom mɛ. Mɛ naani membok, bi naazyɛ zɛbee mɛ.”
«Deenek bot ɛ nakɛ tɔ epiki ɔ aabɔɔza nɛ nɛ náá: “Ghɛŋ! Yaa dwoo bis nabee wɔ nɛ za, da bis ɛ́ djɛ wɔ edee? Yaa dwoo wɔ nadi nɛ gwyes mɛdii, da bis ɛ́ djɛ wɔ mɛdii?
Yaa dwoo wɔ nadi ndjoŋ, da bis ɛ́ djɛ wɔ di tɔ mendjaa mes? Yaa dwoo wɔ nadi ben toto, da bis ɛ́ bet wɔ?
Yaa dwoo wɔ nadi ebɛ́, da bis ɛ́ zyɛ, zɛgwyák wɔ? Yaa dwoo wɔ nadi é membok, da bis ɛ́ zyɛ zɛbee wɔ?”
Mɛkoozi kabɔɔza ɛ́ náá: “Mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ́ etɛp e tsɛɛtsɛ náá, esonok djas bi di esa nɛ mot mɛsik tɔ bɔɔ nyaag'am ɛ, bi sa mbɛɛ esa binek ɛ́ nɛ nam.”
«Bhii tak, kukuma ɛ́ waake nɛ bot aadi pɛ mbɔ ɛmyɛl ɔ náá: “Duska mɛ é mis. Tɔ́ka ɛtsetaɛpe nɛ nam, biyɔ, bot ɛ Zɛɛb zelek ɛbiyoɛpe ɔ. Tɔ́ka tɔ du di ààdim ɛ. Ye nakoobelaa ɛ́, étɛp Dim mot mɛkɔŋ bɛ nɛ efofop bɛ!
Etɛɛ náá, mɛ nabɛ ɛ́ nɛ za, bi nabɛ ɛ́ ààdjɛ mɛ edee. Mɛ naagwak gwyes mɛdii, bi nabɛ ɛ́ ààdjɛ mɛ mɛdii.
Mɛ nadi ɛ́ ndjoŋ, bi nabɛ ɛ́ ààdjɛ mɛ di tɔ mendjaa men. Mɛ nadi ɛ́ ben toto, bi nabɛ ɛ́ ààbet mɛ kaad. Mɛ nadi ebɛ́, bi nabɛ ɛ́ ààgwom mɛ. Mɛ naani mbok, bi nabɛ ɛ́ ààzɛgwyak mɛ.”
«Wɔ gwaa, bɛ zɛbɔɔza náá: “Ghɛŋ, yaa dwoo bis nabee wɔ nɛ za, nɛ gwyes mɛdii, nɛ nɛghu ndjoŋ? Yaa dwoo bis nabee wɔ ben toto, wɔy ebɛ́, nɛghu wɔy é membok, da bis ɛ́ kadi ààkyee wɔ?”
Kukuma ɛ́ boozɛbɔɔza nɛ nɔɔ náá: “Mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ́ etɛp e tsɛɛtsɛ náá, esok djas bi nadi ààsa esonok binek nɛ mot mɛsik tɔ bɔn nyaag'am ɛ, bi nadi ààsa yɛ ɛ nɛ nam.”
Bɛ waatɔ́, kɛbee mɛsuk na kɔm-kɔm. Yɛ kabɛ bot ɛ epiki ɔ, bɛ waabela tsik na kɔm-kɔm.»
Bhii Yezu nasilal mɛlyo mɛ djas ɛ, nyɛ naazɛke nɛ bɛdjekel bɛ náá:
«Bi nɛ gu náá, ye kalik ɛ́ mɛlu mɛmbá, etɛɛ náá, ɛbyoŋ ɛ Pak neesael. Sɛɛŋɛlɛ Mɔn Mot ɛ́ waaseebaa, étɛp nyɛ neekɛbemaa kɔ mɛlaaba.»
Tin, eboo bɛghaa-Zɛɛb nɛ bɛpaa ɛ eYuda naazɛsɛɛga tɔ ndjaa mɛkoozi Kayif, mot nadi boo ghaa-Zɛɛb ɔ.
Wɔ gwaa, bɔɔ djas zokazɛgwakel náá, bɛ mɛt Yezu tɔ syaab, bhii tak, da bɛ ɛ́ gó nyɛ.
Bɛ nadi eke ɛ́ náá: «Sa mena ààmɛtka nyɛ dwoo ɛbyoŋ ɛ Pak, é kaab náá, bot ɛ́ zɛkɛkpaa elyem, da bɛ ɛ́ sa ɛzɛm.»
Dáa Yezu nadi pɛ Bhetani tɔ ndjaŋ ɛ Simɔŋ mot na ɛbɛ́ ɛ zezam ɛ,
wɔ gwaa, dhiiti moma zɛni tɔ ndjaa tak zeza nɛ di Yezu nadi ɛ́. Nyɛ nadi ɛ́, nɛ bɛɛb nasael nɛ ɛkok ɛ albat ɛ «tɔɔɔ» nɛ mɛnanas di nɛ boo mɛtaŋ ɛ. Moma tak zokazɛso mɛnanas menek kɔ lo ɛ Yezu é sok bɛ nadi kɔ mesa ɛ.
Dáa bɛdjekel bɛ nabee deenek ɛ́, ye nabɛ ɛ́, ye nakpaa bɛ elyem. Bɔɔ náá: «Yak ɛ́ yaa kwaambi puluk?
Ɛnyɔ ɛ́ náá, bɛ bɔmsa mɛnanas mɛ tak nɛ boo mɛtaŋ, da ɛ́ nɔɔ epata e tak, djɛ nɛ bɛdjel ɛ bot!»
Ye nabɛ ɛ́ Yezu naagu sa bɛ nadi enyiŋela pak'ɔɔ ɛ. Nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛke nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Betka moma yak gwyem. Étɛp yé bi di ezɛm nyɛ? Sa nyɛ sa kɔ ɛsu ɛ lam ɛ, ye ɛ́ ɛnyɔɛpe.
Yɛ bɛ étɛp bɛdjel ɛ bot ɔ, bi nɛ bɛ nɔɔ ɛ́ aapaazodi mɛlu djas ɛ é di wat. Yɛ kabɛ mam ɔ, bi aanàdi sama nɛ nam mɛlu djas.
Moma yak so mɛ mɛnanas é nyel'am ɛ́, étɛp nyɛ neekan ɛkoobal nyel'am e dwoo mɛdela mam.
Mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ́ etɛp e tsɛɛtsɛ náá, é edi djas Mbɛɛ Bhaadal aadi egoolaa kɔ bɔs ɛ, tseŋa moma yak sa ɛ waakaadaaa mɛdhik nɛ mɛdhik. Tin, bot ɛ waataala enɛm esa nyɛ sa kɔ ɛsu ɛ lam ɛ.»
Tinaak, djekel ngɔt tɔ bɛdjekel kam nɛ bɛbá ɛ Yezu, nadi edjóoaa Yudas Iskaliɔt ɛ, zokazɛtɔ́ pɛ daa eboo bɛghaa-Zɛɛb.
Nyɛ eezɛdji bɛ náá: «Mam ɛ́ ka bin Yezu ɔɔ, bi kadjɛ mɛ yé é di tak?» Tin, wɔ gwaa, bot ɛ tak zɛwyisal efalanga mɛkam-mɛlɛl e epata, nɔɔ, laa, bhii tak bɛ eezɛdjɛ nyɛ.
Kana tin, Yudas nabɛ ɛ́, nyɛ moo saa mɛpek étɛp nyɛ neeka bɛ Yezu.
É dwoo mɛkɛn mɛ ɛbyoŋ ɛ emapa ee di ààwaaa leviid ɛ, bɛdjekel ɛ Yezu zɛdji nyɛ náá: «Wɔ kwyɛl náá, bis kɛkoobal wɔ di mena aadɛka edee e ɛbyoŋ ɛ Pak wo é?»
Tin, Yezu ɛ́ boozɛke nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Tɔ́ka pɛ dɛl, pɛ daa dhiiti mot, da bi ɛ́ lɛɛ nyɛ náá: “Lyoel ke ɛ́ náá: Ɛwala ɛ lam eezekum. Mam nɛ bɛdjekel bam aadɛ ɛbyoŋ ɛ Pak'ak ɛ pɛ tɔ ndjaŋ'ɔ.”»
Tin, bɛdjekel ɛ́ bookɛsa dáa Yezu nalɛɛ bɛ ɛ. Bɔɔ zokazɛkoobal nɛ ɛdjaab edee ɛbyoŋ ɛ Pak.
Dáa dwoo nakabɛ, ye moo bikoko ɛ, Yezu eezɛdisi kɔ mesa bɛ nɛ bɛdjekel bɛ kam nɛ bɛbá.
Dáa bɛ nadi kɔ mesa edɛ ɛ, Yezu ɛ́ boozɛke náá: «Mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ́ etɛp e tsɛɛtsɛ náá, ngɔt pak'en ɛ́ waaka mɛ.»
Bɛdjekel djas moo tin nɛ ghoŋ tɔ elyem, bhii tak, ngɔt-ngɔt moo tin ezɛdji nyɛ: «Ghɛŋ, ye ɛ́ mam é?»
Yezu eezɛbɔɔza nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Ye ɛ́ mot duu mbɔ tɔ saan wat bis nɛ nɛ ɔ aapaaka mɛ.
Ye ɛ́ tsɛɛtsɛ, Sɛɛŋɛlɛ Mɔn Mot ɛ́ waagwyɛ dáa ekwyala di elɛɛ kɔ ɛsu ɛ lɛ ɛ. Tinaak, boo ghoŋ nɛ mot aakɛka nyɛ é mɛmbɔ mɛ mbee bot ɔ. Ye nabɛ ààgoka náá, mot'enɔk byel!»
Yudas, mot nadi ekɛka nyɛ gha ɔ ɛ́ boodji náá: «Lyoel, ye kabɛ ɛ́ mam é?» Yezu ɛ́ boozɛbɔɔza nɛ nɛ náá: «Ye ɛ́ wɔ ɛmet ɛ ke deenek».
Dáa bɛ nadi edɛ kɔ mesa ɛ, wɔ gwaa Yezu zɛnɔɔ mapa. Nyɛ eezɛghaapɛɛ Zɛɛb, bhii tak, nyɛ eezɛpyak mapa tak, nɔɔ, djɛ bɛdjekel bɛ. Nyɛy náá: «Nɔɔka yɛ, da bi ɛ́ dɛ, etɛɛ náá, yak ɛ́ nyel'am.»
Bhii tak, nyɛ eezɛnɔɔ bɛɛlɛ nadi nɛ mɛnyok mɛ vin tɔ tak ɛ, nyɛ eezɛbaazɛghaapɛɛ Zɛɛb, nyɛ eezɛke nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Nɔɔka yɛ, da bi ɛ́ dɛ biyɔ djas,
etɛɛ náá, yak ɛ́ ghiya yam. Yɛ ɛ́ ghiya di edjɛ bot ze ɛni tɔ ɛbhɛŋ ɛ Zɛɛb ɛ, ghiya nasee kɔ ɛsu ɛ bot ɛbuɛpe étɛp mesyem mɛ bot neepelel ɛ.
Mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ́ náá: kana dwoo pan mos'ak, mɛ aanàkabaadɛ mɛnyok mɛ vin, kɛkum dwoo mɛ aakabaakɛdɛ mɛnyok mɛ na bes menabɛlka tɔ Ɛyoŋ ɛ Saag'am ɛ.»
Tin, wɔ gwaa bɛ zɛduwal Zɛɛb tɔ mɛdjeeb. Bhii tak, bɛ eezɛnɔɔ mɛnyel, tɔ́ pɛ ɛtsok ɛ pyeeb oliv.
Tin, Yezu zokake nɛ bɛdjekel bɛ náá: «É pum'ak mos, biyɔ djas ɛ́ waadhuugal mɛ, etɛɛ náá, ekwyala lɛɛ náá: “Mɛ waagó mbaalel ebhata. Tin, ɛsaa djas ɛ́ waawyɛɛza na gwyiiŋ.”»
Yezu eebaazɛbil ɛkpa náá: «Bhii ɛgom ɛ lam, mɛ waatɔ́, kɛbwood bin pɛ Ghalile.»
Pyɛɛd zokake nɛ nɛ náá: «Yɛ bɛ náá, bot djas ɛ́ waakaab wɔ ɔɔ, mam aanàkwaakaab wɔ.»
Tinaak, Yezu kabɔɔza nɛ nɛ ɛ́ náá: «Gwaka, mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ́ etɛp e tsɛɛtsɛ náá, é pum'ak mos, ɛsok nɛ kuu nɛ kɔk, yɛ aabela ɛ́, wɔ eezelɛɛ nɛ bot esok elɛl náá, wɔ ààgu mɛ.»
Pyɛɛd eezɛbɔɔza nɛ Yezu náá: «Mɛ tok nɛ ghwyil ɛke nɛ bot náá, mɛ ààgu wɔ, ye nakoozobɛ ɛsyee, mɛ ɛpemyaal náá, menabɛl bɛbá gwyɛ.» É di'enek, ye nabɛ tin ɛ́, bɛdjekel djas moo ɛkpa wat.
Bhis yenek, Yezu bɛ nɛ bɛdjekel bɛ naazɛkum pɛ di di edjóoaa Ghɛtɛsemani ɛ. É di tak, nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛke nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Likeka wak. Mɛ pookotiila poon, kɛdjaala Zɛɛb.»
Tin, nyɛ kanɔŋ ɛ́ Pyɛɛd, nɛ bɔn Zɛbɛdɛ bɛbá, tɔ́ nɛ nɔɔ. É di'enek, ye nabɛ ɛ́, keŋ nɛ ghoŋ moo sa nyɛ ɛbuɛpe tɔ lyem.
Nyɛ eezɛke nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Sisim'am ɛ́ tɔ ghoŋ saa-saŋak náá mɛ gwyɛ. Likeka wak dika ndjem sama nɛ nam. Nàdjaka egɔ́, djaalaka Zɛɛb.»
Bhii tak, nyɛ eezɛtiila batsa pɛ sok, zɛkwyit mɛboŋ bhwoob si na «ghɔkɔ», nyɛ moo tin edjaala nɛ Zɛɛb náá: «Saag'am, wɔ kwyɛl ɔɔ, wɔ ɛ́ nɛ ghwyil ɛdis bɛɛlɛ mezuk mak sok bhwoob'am. Ye goka ɛ́ djas sael tɔ ɛkwosak ɛ lɔ, ààkabɛ yam ɛkwosak.»
Bhii tak, nyɛ eezɛsik, tɔ́ pɛ nyɛ lik bɛdjekel bɛ bɛlɛl binɔk ɛ, nyɛ kazɛbela bɛ ɛ́ é gɔ́. Nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛke nɛ Pyɛɛd náá: «Deenek, bi eedja gɔ́! Bi ààpakodi-diak mis membek sama nɛ nam é ɛwala wat é?
Dika ndjem, djaalaka Zɛɛb, etɛɛ náá, bi ɛ́ zɛkɛkwyɛ tɔ mɛbhowal. Sisim ɛ́ ghiŋ, tin, epuud nɛ bu elɛtɛ.»
Yak kɔkɔ, nyɛ eebaazɛsik pɛ pak nyɛ nadi sok ɛ, nyɛ kadjaala é sok tak ɛ́ dáak: «Saag'am, yɛ kosael náá, bɛɛlɛ mezuk mak dhaa mam ààdɛ yɛ ɔɔ, ye goka ɛ́ náá, ɛkwosak ɛ lɔ sael.»
Yezu eebaazɛbula pɛ nyɛ nalik bɛdjekel bɛ ɛ, nyɛ kabaazobela bɛ é egɔ́, etɛɛ náá, mis mɔɔ nadi ɛ́ ɛdilɛpe.
Yak sok, Yezu eebaazɛlik bɛ, zɛbaasik, nyɛ eezɛtseta nɛ nɔɔ. Ye nabɛ ɛ́, ɛtɔ́ ɛ lɛ tyee esok elɛl nyɛ nadi etetɔ́ kɛdjaala dáa nyɛ nadjedjaala sok ɛ.
Tin, Yezu eezɛbula pɛ bɛdjekel bɛ nadi ɛ́, nyɛy nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Bi dinaa é gɔ́? Bi ɛpewala? Guka náá, ɛwala Sɛɛŋɛlɛ Mɔn Mot aaseebaa é mɛmbɔ mɛ bot ɛ mesyem ɛ eezedjala.
Wyɛlka, ghɛɛka mɛnyel, mena tɔ́ka, etɛɛ náá, mot ka mɛ é mɛmbɔ mɛ bot binɔk ɔ, moo ɛ́ ɛkunaaɛpe nɛ nena.»
Yezu dinaa ààpaakosilal ɛlii deenek, Yudas, ngɔt tɔ bɛdjekel bɛ eezɛtuula nɛ boo ɛdhuu ɛ bot nɛ epɛl nɛ ebhil e ele é mɛmbɔ. Eboo bɛghaa-Zɛɛb, nɛ bɛpaa ɛ eYuda ɛ́ nalwom bɛ.
Kabela tin ɛ́, Yudas, mot naka bɛ Yezu gha ɔ naazelyaal bɛ geka, bɛ aagwyak Yezu nɛ yɛ ɛ: «Mot mɛ aakɛbeedal ɔ, ye ɛ́ nyɛy, mɛtka nyɛ.»
Batsa deenek, Yudas eezɛtuula, nyɛ eezɛtiila pɛ daa Yezu, nyɛ eezɛke nɛ nɛ náá: «Mɛ eeswos wɔ, Lyoel!» Bhii tak, nyɛ eezɛbeedal nyɛ.
É di tak, Yezu ɛ́ boozɛke nɛ nɛ náá: «Wɛn sɔ'am! Lela ɛsa sa wɔ zyɛ zɛsa ɛ.» Bhii tak, bot ɛ nazyɛ bɛ nɛ Yudas ɔ ɛ́ boozɛmɛt Yezu.
Tin, wɔ gwaa, ngɔt pak bot ɛ nadi bɛ nɛ Yezu ɔ, zokawaal pɛl, tsaal dhiiti mot-mɛsa mɛ boo ghaa-Zɛɛb ɛlɔ.
Yezu eezɛke nɛ mot'enɔk náá: «Nɔŋa pɛl'ɔ, da wɔ ɛ́ bulal tɔ pɛp, etɛɛ náá, bot ɛ di egó bɛsɔ bɔɔ bot nɛ epɛl ɔ, bɛ aabaazogwyɛ ɛ́ nɛ pɛl.
Wɔ ààgu náá, mɛ ɛ́ nɛ ghwyil ɛdjóo Saag'am, nyɛ zɛkwyee mɛ? É di tak wat, nyɛ ɛ́ nɛ ghwyil ɛdhis mɛ ɛdhuu ɛ esodja efofop ɛbuɛpe kum-kumak mɛdhuu kam nɛ bɛbá.
Mɛ sa deenek ɔɔ, etɛp ee di tɔ ekwyala aakasael dáa? Etɛɛ náá, ekwyala lɛɛ náá, ye goka ɛ́ etɛp binek sael deenek.»
Bhii tak, Yezu eezɛke nɛ ɛdhuu ɛ bot náá: «Ye goka nɛ nen ɛ́ náá, bi zyɛ nɛ epɛl nɛ ebhil e ele étɛp bi neezɛmɛt mɛ tyee náá, mɛ ɛ́ mot ɛzɛm é? Dhi mɛlu djas mɛ di ndiindil tɔ kok Ndjaa-ebuwa é lelyo, biyɔ ààmɛt mɛ.
Esesɛɛ binek sael ɛ́, etɛɛ náá, etɛp ee nakwyalaa tɔ mɛkana mɛ Zɛɛb dum nɛ nam ɛ́ neebela ɛsuk.» Tinaak, bɛdjekel djas ɛ́ boo zɛghuma nɛ ekaab tɔ́ yɔɔ.
Bot ɛ namɛt Yezu ɔ eezɛtɔ́ nɛ nɛ pɛ daa Kayif, mot nadi kɔ elo e bɛghaa-Zɛɛb ɔ, é di bɛghaŋ ɛ mɛkana mɛ etsi, nɛ bɛpaa ɛ eYuda nakɛsɛɛga ɛ.
Pyɛɛd nadi edu bɛ, nyɛy ɛtsetaɛpe nɛ nɔɔ, batakɛni tɔ ɛbɛsɛɛ ɛ ndjaŋ ɛ boo ghaa-Zɛɛb. Nyɛy zokani tɔ ɛbɛsɛɛ, nɔɔ nyel, disi bɛ nɛ bot ɛ di ebaal ndjaa tak ɔ, étɛp nyɛ neebee dáa tɛp tak aakɛ sik ɛ.
Eboo bɛghaa-Zɛɛb, nɛ bɛdhiiti bot ɛ boo kwan eYuda nadi esaa dhiiti esua-esua étɛp bɛ needjɛ Yezu epɛ́ɛ e ɛsyee.
Ye nakoozodi náá, bot ɛbuɛpe naazezyɛ zɛpit nyɛ nɛ etɛp esua-esua, tin, bɛ nakadi ɛ́, ààbela sonok. É di tak, wɔ gwaa, bot ɛbá zokazyɛ zɛpit nyɛ.
Bɔɔ náá: «Mot tak naake náá: “Mɛ waabwak kok Ndjaa-ebuwa e Zɛɛb, da mɛ ɛ́ sum yɛ tɔ mɛlu mɛlɛl.”»
Tin, boo ghaa-Zɛɛb eezɛwyɛl, zɛdji Yezu náá: «Tɔ mɛpita mɛ bot bak zɛpit wɔ'aak, wɔ ààkataŋal yɔ é?»
Yezu nabɛ ɛ́ ààbɔɔza nyɛ. Boo ghaa-Zɛɛb baazɛdji nyɛ náá: «Tuwala myoŋ nɛ mɛsoŋ mɔ nɛ din ɛ Zɛɛb. Lɛɛa bis tsɛɛtsɛ tyee mwaado: Lɛɛa bis nɛghu wɔy ɛ́ di Mɛsia Mɔn Zɛɛb!»
Tin, Yezu eezɛbɔɔza náá: «Ye ɛ́ wɔy, wɔ ɛmet ɛ́ ke deenek! Mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ́ náá, kana ɛwala mena dika'aak, bi ɛ́ waabee Sɛɛŋɛlɛ Mɔn Mot ndiindil pɛ kyee mbɔ eghɛŋ ɛ Zɛɛb mɛbwala. Bi ɛ́ waabee nyɛ ezyɛ kɔ eguud tɔ gwoo.»
É di'enek, wɔ gwaa, boo ghaa-Zɛɛb zɛnyaa ekaad bɛ, nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛke náá: «Nyɛ eelee Zɛɛb! Mena tokapɛ nɛ gwyes náá, mot zɛlɛɛ mena sa nyɛ di esa ɛ! Bi eegwak ebyas ee nyɛ byasal Zɛɛb ɛ.
Biyɔ kake dáa?» Bɔɔ djas eezɛbɔɔza náá: «Nyɛ ɛ́ nɛ ndjɛ, nyɛ goka ɛ́ nɛ ɛsyee.»
Bhii tak, bɛ eezɛsɛɛ nyɛ mɛtel é bhwoob, bɛ moo tu nyɛ nɛ ekutupo. Bɛdhiiti bot moo tin epak nyɛ mɛbhɛɛz.
Bɔɔ nɛ nɛ náá: «Naŋa! Wɔy Mɛsia, yɛ ɛ́ zɛmyak wɔ?»
Pyɛɛd nadi ɛ́ ndiindil pɛ kel tɔ ɛbɛsɛɛ. Dhiiti moma nadi esa mɛsa tɔ ndjaa boo ghaa-Zɛɛb ɔ, zɛtiila pɛ daa lɛ. Nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛke nɛ nɛ náá: «Wɔy pe, wɔ nadi ɛ́, bi nɛ Yezu, mot Ghalile yenɔk.»
Wɔ gwaa, Pyɛɛd zɛswonal. Nyɛy náá: «Mɛ ààgu sa wɔ di kwyɛl ɛlii'enek.»
Bhii tak, Pyɛɛd eezɛswoola di tɔ peeb ɛbɛsɛɛ, tɔ́ kɛtyaa pɛ ɛniel. Tin, wɔ gwaa, dhiiti moma mɛsa baazɛgwyak nyɛ. Moma tak eezɛlɛɛ nɛ bot ɛ nadi tin ɔ náá: «Mot'ak nadi ɛ́, bɛ nɛ Yezu, mot Nazalɛt.»
Tin, wɔ gwaa, Pyɛɛd baazɛkɛla Yezu kɛla sis, nyɛ eetuwal myoŋ nɛ mɛsoŋ nɛ din ɛ Zɛɛb náá: «Mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ́ tsɛɛtsɛ náá, mɛ ààgu mot'enɔk.»
Bhii tak, bot ɛ nadi é di'enek bɛ nɛ bɛ nɔɔ eezɛtiila pɛ Pyɛɛd nadi ɛ́, bɛ eezɛke nɛ nɛ náá: «Ye ɛ́ tsɛɛtsɛ! Wɔ ɛ́ mot'ɔɔ, etɛɛ náá, ɛlii ɛ lɔ ɛpelyaal pɛ kyee dɛl wɔ dus ɛ.»
É di'enek, Pyɛɛd eezɛben gwood, kɛla. Nyɛ ɛ́ bookalal: «Zɛɛb Mɛkaake! Mam ààgu mot bi di eke'enɔk!» Batsa deenek, kuu ɛsok eezɛkɔk.
Tin, Pyɛɛd eezɛtaala sa Yezu nalɛɛ nyɛ ɛ: «Ɛsok nɛ kuu nɛ kɔk, yɛ aabela ɛ́, wɔ eezeswonal mɛ esok elɛl». É di'enek, Pyɛɛd eezɛwyis, tɔ́, nyɛ moo tin edje ɛbuɛpe.
Tɔ ghooghom mɛlem, eboo bɛghaa-Zɛɛb, nɛ bɛpaa ɛ eYuda zokazɛsɛɛga. Tɔ zɛɛga tak, bɛ nagwakel ɛ́ náá, bɛ neegó Yezu.
Bɛ eezɛmɛt nyɛ, kɔl nyɛ mɛmbɔ, zɛnɔɔ nyɛ, tɔ́ nɛ nɛ pɛ daa Pilat mot nadi kukuma dɛl ɔ.
Dáa Yudas, mot naka nyɛ gha nagwak náá, Yezu eemɛtaa étɛp nyɛ neekɛgóaa ɛ, ye nabɛ ɛ́, nyɛ naadyeebadjɛ lyem mɛbɛ. Tin, nyɛ ɛ́ bookanɔɔ efalanga mɛkam-mɛlɛl e epata ee eboo bɛghaa-Zɛɛb, nɛ bɛpaa ɛ eYuda nadjɛ nyɛ ɛ, nyɛ eekɛbulal yɛ.
Nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛlɛɛ nɔɔ náá: «Mɛ eekwyɛ ndjɛ! Mɛ eemyaal náá, mɛ eeka mot baa gwyes nyɛ góaa!» Bot binɔk ɛ́ boozɛbɔɔza nɛ nɛ náá: «Yenek ààkagwyák bisɔ, ye gwyák ɛ́ wɔy.»
Wɔ gwaa Yudas zokanɔɔ epata binek, mwas tɔ Ndjaa-ebuwa. Bhii tak, nyɛ eezɛtɔ́, kɛtiŋal kel é tsuŋ yeeda.
Bot ɛ nadi kɔ eboo bɛghaa-Zɛɛb ɔ ɛ́ boozɛtek epata binek. Bɔɔ náá: «Etsi bina lɛɛ ɛ́ náá, mbi epata dáak ààgoka nɛ ɛbaakɛkwomaa tɔ di epata di ekwomaa tɔ Ndjaa-ebuwa ɛ. Etɛɛ náá, yenek moo ɛ́ epata e ghiya.»
Bhii bɛ nazegwakel ɛ, bɛ ɛ́ boozɛnɔɔ epata binek, kɛbɔm pyeeb mɛel mɛbhe mɛ dyak. Bɛ nabɔm yɛ ɛ́ étɛp ye needi, di mɛvit mɛ bɛdjoŋ.
Étɛp tak ɛ, bɛ naget pyeeb tak «pyeeb ghiya», kɛkum dɔɔ nɛ dwoo pan mos'ak.
Djas yenek nasael ɛ́ dáa ngoolel-mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb Zelemi nalɛɛ ɛ́: «Bɛ eenɔɔ bɔɔ efalanga mɛkam-mɛlɛl epata binek, mɛtaŋ mɛ bot ɛ Yisalaɛl nazetiŋal kɔ ɛsu ɛ lɛ ɛ.
Tin, bɛ ɛ́ boozɛnɔɔ epata e tak, bɔm yɛ nɛ pyeeb ɛ mɛel mɛbhe mɛ dyak, dáa Ghɛŋ nalɛɛ mɛ ɛ.»
Yezu eezɛpɛ́ɛaa pɛ daa kukuma. Pilat eezɛdji nyɛ náá: «Wɔ ɛ́ mɛkoozi mɛ eYuda?» Tin, Yezu eezɛbɔɔza náá: «Wɔy, wɔ ɛmet eelɛɛ!»
Bhii tak, dáa eboo bɛghaa-Zɛɛb, nɛ bɛpaa eYuda nakadi esu nyɛ zukamwaa nɛ etɛp ɛ, nyɛ nabɛ ɛ́ ààbɔɔza nɛ nɔɔ.
Pilat eezɛke nɛ nɛ náá: «Wɔ ààgwak mɛpita mɛ bɛ di epit wɔ yenek é?»
Tinaak, Yezu kadi ɛ́ ààbɔɔza bɛ ɛkpa wat. Kukuma naadyeebadjoka nɛ dáa Yezu nadi gwyem, ààbɛɛ nuub ɛ.
Esok djas yii eYuda nadi ebebɔl ɛbyoŋ ɛ Pak ɛ, ekukuma bɔɔ nabebɛ ɛ́ nɛ mɛfulu mɛ ɛpel ɛ mot membok ngɔt yii ɛdhuu ɛ bot aasɛ́ɛ ɛ, da nyɛ ɛ́ wyiselaa é membok.
É di tak, tɔ membok, ye nabɛ ɛ́ nɛ dhiiti ngék mot membok. Din ɛ lɛ nabɛ ɛ́ Yezu Bhaalabas.
Pilat ɛ́ boozɛdji ɛdhuu ɛ bot ɛ nadi tin ɔ náá: «Bi kwyɛl náá, mɛ bet bin zɛ? Yezu Bhaalabas “ooho” Yezu, mot di djóoaa Klisto ɔ?»
Tin, Pilat nadi egu náá, Yezu namɛtaa ɛ́, etɛɛ náá, bɛ nabɛ ɛ́ nɛ mbee lyem nɛ nɛ.
Dáa Pilat nadi kɔ bóó epɛ́ɛ bɛ ɛ, myɛl zokadhis nyɛ bhaadal náá: «Sa wɔ ààsa mot epiki yenɔk ɛbiyo, etɛɛ náá, mɛ eedyeebazuk é pum'ak mos tɔ dhyam kɔ ɛsu ɛ lɛ.»
É di'enek, eboo bɛghaa-Zɛɛb, nɛ bɛpaa ɛ eYuda moo tin ebesal ɛdhuu ɛ bot, bɛ lɛɛ nɛ Pilat náá, nyɛ wyisal bɛ Bhaalabas, da bɛ ɛ́ gó Yezu.
Wɔ gwaa, kukuma Pilat baazɛdji bɛ náá: «Tɔ bot ɛbá bak, bi kwyɛl náá, mɛ bet bin nwyaa?» Ɛdhuu ɛ bot binɔk kabulal ɛ́ náá: «Bhaalabas.»
Pilat ɛ́ boozɛbaadji bɛ náá: «Mɛ sa dáa nɛ Yezu di djóoaa Klisto ɛ?» Bɛ kabɔɔza nɛ nɛ náá: «Bema nyɛ kɔ mɛlaaba!»
Pilat eebaadji bɛ náá: «Yaa etɛp e ɛbiyo nyɛ sa?» Wɔ gwaa, bɛ baazɛtsim ɛlyelɛpe: «Bema nyɛ kɔ mɛlaaba!»
Dáa Pilat nabee náá, bot nadi enenal ɛ, nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛnɔɔ mɛdii, gwyii mɛmbɔ mɛ é mis ɛdhuu ɛ bot binɔk, nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛke nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Tɛp ɛsyee ɛ mot'ak ààkagwyák mɛ. Ye kagwyák ɛ́ biyɔ bɛ ɛmet!»
Ɛdhuu ɛ bot ɛ nadi tin ɔ zokazɛbɔɔza náá: «Beta náá, esesɛɛ binek djas kwyɛ kɔ elo bis nɛ kɔ elo e bɔn bis!»
Tin, Pilat ɛ́ boozɛwyisal bɛ Bhaalabas, é di'enek nyɛ eezɛlwom bɛ, bɛ bi Yezu nɛ eghwyɛs, bhii tak, nyɛ eezɛdjɛ bɛ Yezu, étɛp bɛ neekɛbem nyɛ kɔ mɛlaaba.
Esodja ɛ Pilat zokatɔ́ nɛ Yezu tɔ ɛbɛsɛɛ pɛ daa kukuma, é di'enek, bɛ eezɛwa nyɛ kuku ɛbwak.
Bɛ eezɛsɔ nyɛ kaad nyɛ nabɔt ɛ, bhii tak bɛ eezɛbet nyɛ ndjookuwa na tɔɔbelaa.
Tin, bɛ eezɛnɔɔ lɛɛ le mɛgɔk, pyeed nyɛ kɔtɔ mɛkoozi nɛ yɛ. Wɔ gwaa, bɛ sɔm nyɛ yɛ ɛ é lo, bɛ eezɛsɛk nyɛ mɔɔ le ghwaazok é mbɔ eghɛŋ bɛ. Bhii tak, bɛ eezɛkwyit mɛboŋ sok bhwoob'ɛ, bɛ moo tin eduk nyɛ. Bɔɔ nɛ nɛ náá: «Bis eeswos wɔ, mɛkoozi mɛ eYuda!»
Bɛ moo tin esɛɛ nyɛ mɛtel é nyel. Bɛ eezɛdɛk mɔɔ le ghwaazok nyɛ nadi nɛ yɛ é mbɔ ɛ, bɛ eezɛmyak nyɛ nɛ yɛ é lo.
Bhii bɛ nasilal ɛduk nyɛ ɛlyelɛpe ɛ, bɛ ɛ́ boozɛdis nyɛ ndjookuwa bɛ nazebet nyɛ ɛ́, bɛ eebaazɛbet nyɛ ekaad ee nyɛ nadi nɛ yɛ sok ɛ. Bhii tak bɛ eezɛtɔ́ nɛ nɛ étɛp nyɛ neekɛbemaa kɔ mɛlaaba.
É ghɛŋ bɛ nadi ewyis kɔ dɛl ɛ, wɔ gwaa, bɛ zɛboma nɛ dhiiti mot dɛl Silɛn. Din ɛ mot tak nabɛ ɛ́ Simɔŋ. Tin, esodja ɛ́ boolwom nyɛ nɛ bhel náá: Nyɛ kwyee Yezu é ɛbɛp mɛlaaba.
Tin, bɛ eezɛkum é di bɛ nadi edjóo: Ghologhota ɛ. Din ɛ tak kwyɛl ɛlɛɛ: «Di Bhobho Lo».
É di'enek, bɛ ɛ́ boozɛdjɛ Yezu mɛnyok puuza nɛ dhiiti sonok mɛnyan na gwyee-gwyee. Bhii nyɛ nabowal ɛ, nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛpɛɛ ɛdɛ yɛ.
Bhii tak, bɛ eezɛbem nyɛ kɔ mɛlaaba. Bot ɛ nadi tin ɔ ɛ́ boozɛkaa ekaad bɛ, bhii bɛ nasa ɛgwyeeg étɛp bɛ neesɛ́ɛ mot aanɔɔ ekaad e tak ɔ.
Bhii tak, bɛ eezɛdisi tin ebaal Yezu.
Bɛ nabɛ ɛ́, bɛ eekwyal kɔ lo'ɛ, kɔ ɛko ɛ mɛlaaba mɛsɔ mɛ nyɛ nagóaa étɛp tak ɛ. Ye nakwyalaa ɛ́ náá: «Nwyak ɛ́ Yezu, mɛkoozi mɛ eYuda.»
Bɛdhiiti bot ɛ ɛzɛm nɛ etuub bɛbá naabemaa é yɔbɔ mɛlaaba dwoo tak wat, ngɔt pɛ mbɔ eghɛŋ ɛ Yezu, nwyak tak pɛ mbɔ ɛmyɛl ɛ lɛ.
Bot ɛ nadi edhaa tin ɔ, bɛ nadi elee nyɛ, nɛ ɛsyaal elo.
Bɔɔ nɛ nɛ náá: «Wɔy mot di ekwyɛl ɛwaaz kok Ndjaa-ebuwa, da bhii tak, wɔ ɛ́ baawyɛl yɛ bhii mɛlu mɛlɛl ɔ, tsika nyel'ɔ wɔ ɛmet. Yɛ bɛ náá, wɔ ɛ́ Mɔn Zɛɛb ɔɔ, sula kɔ mɛlaaba!»
Dɔɔ nɛ eboo bɛghaa-Zɛɛb, nɛ bɛghaŋ ɛ mɛkana mɛ etsi, zɛnɔɔ bɛpaa ɛ eYuda moo tin eduk nyɛ. Bɔɔ nɛ nɛ náá:
«Nyɛ ɛpetsik bot ɛ sis, nyɛ tok nɛ ghwyil ɛtsik nyel'ɛ nyɛ ɛmet! Nɛ tsɛɛtsɛ náá, ye ɛ́ nyɛy ɛ́ di mɛkoozi mɛ Yisalaɛl é? Nyɛ pookokasul kɔ mɛlaaba étɛp mena needumka koŋ nɛ nɛ.
Nyɛ naadyeebadum koŋ'ɛ nɛ Zɛɛb, nyɛy batake náá: “Mɛ ɛ́ Mɔn Zɛɛb”. Tin, yɛ bɛ náá, Zɛɛb nɛ kwyɛl nyɛ ɔɔ, nyɛ katsik nyɛ é di'enek nenak!»
Bot ɛ ɛzɛm ɛ nadi mbema é mengwoob ɛ Yezu ɔ, moo tin ebaalee nyɛ pe mɛkpa mɛ wat tyee bot ɛ ɛsok nadi elee nyɛ ɛ.
Dáa ye nakum kuku mwos ɛ, wɔ gwaa, ɛgwyitok zɛgwyiidela kɔ ɛko ɛ bɔs djas, mɛghomla menek naabɔya mɛwala mɛlɛl.
Tin, é ghɛŋ ye nadhaa mɛwala mɛlɛl bhii kuku mwos ɛ, wɔ gwaa, Yezu zɛbo boo tsim: Eli, Eli, lema sabatani? Ye kwyɛl ɛlɛɛ ɛ́ náá: «Zɛɛb Saag'am, Zɛɛb Saag'am! Étɛp yé wɔ bet mɛ mɛ ɛmet deenek?»
Bɛdhiiti bot pak bot ɛ nadi tin ɔ, zokagwak dáa Yezu natsim ɛ. Bɛ ɛ́ boozɛke nɛ bɛsɔ bɔɔ náá: «Gwakeka! Nyɛ ɛpedjóo Eli!»
Tin, mot ngɔt pak'ɔɔ eezɛwyis kaab, kɛnɔɔ pes kaad, zɛkɔl é bil le ghwaazok, duu tɔ mɛnyok mɛ na bwaaz-bwaaz, nyɛ eesɛɛb Yezu yɛ ɛ, nyɛ needɛ.
Tin, wɔ gwaa, bɛdhiiti bot zokake náá: «Bwooda, mena pookobeeka nɛghu Eli ɛ́ waazyɛ, zɛdis nyɛ é mɛlaaba.»
Bhis yenek, wɔ gwaa, Yezu baazɛbo boo tsim, bhii tak nyɛ zɛsil eswos.
É di'enek wat, wɔ gwaa, boo lɛmbɛ nadi tɔ Di na Dɛɛ ɛ Zɛɛb ɛ zokazɛnyɛɛ kuku tak kan pɛ ɛko kɛkum pɛ si. Bɔs dheegel, mɛkok bel,
mɛvit diiel. Wɔ gwaa, bot ɛbuɛpe nagwyɛ bɔɔ edum koŋ nɛ Zɛɛb ɔ zokagom.
Bɔɔ zokawyis tɔ mɛvit, bhis ɛgom ɛ Yezu, bɔɔ zokani tɔ Yeluzalɛm dɛl ɛ na dɛɛ, ye nabɛ ɛ́ bot ɛbuɛpe nabee bɛ.
Kukuma tɔ lɔɔg esodja nɛ esodja ee nadi tin ebaal Yezu ɔ naabee dáa bɔs nadheegel ɛ, dɔɔ nɛ edjema djas nasael tin ɛ. Boo bwoo naazɛsa bɛ ɛlyelɛpe, bɛ ɛ́ boozɛke náá: «Tsɛɛtsɛ, nyɛ nabɛ ɛ́ Mɔn Zɛɛb.»
Bɛtɛ nɛ boa nadi ɛ́ tin, bɔɔ ebee ɛtsetaɛpe sa nasɛ́ɛ ɛ. Boa tak nadidi ɛ́, bɛ nɛ Yezu, kana pɛ Ghalile. Mɛsa mɔɔ nabɛ ɛ́ ɛkwyee ɛ Yezu.
Pak boa ɛ tak, ye nabɛ ɛ́: Maali, moma dɛl Makdala, Maali nyɛɛg ɛ Zak bɛ nɛ Zozɛf, zɛnɔɔ nyɛɛg bɔɔ Zɛbɛdɛ.
Dáa ye nabɛ dwoo moo bikoko ɛ, dhiiti kuma mot dɛl Alimate zokazyɛ, din ɛ lɛ nabɛ ɛ́ Zozɛf. Nyɛ nabaabɛ ɛ́ ngɔt tɔ bɛdjekel ɛ Yezu.
Wɔ gwaa, nyɛ zokatɔ́ pɛ daa kukuma Pilat, kɛwaab muu ɛ Yezu. Tin, Pilat ɛ́ booke náá, bɛ djɛ nyɛ muu ɛ Yezu.
Tin, Zozɛf ɛ́ boozɛnɔɔ bes bheeza na puu, pil muu ɛ Yezu tɔ tak.
Wɔ gwaa, nyɛ zokanɔɔ muu tak, kɛwa yɛ tɔ ɛvit ɛ nyɛ nakpak tɔ bat ɛkok ɛ. Nyɛ ɛ́ zokabiŋal boo ɛkok ɛ bɛ nasa étɛp bɛ neediyal ɛvit ɛ tak nɛ yɛ ɛ. Bhii tak, nyɛ eezɛnɔɔ nyel, sik, tɔ́ pɛ ndjaŋ'ɛ.
Tin, kabela ɛ́, Maali, moma dɛl Makdala nɛ nwyak Maali nadi ebee di bɛ nawa muu ɛ Yezu ɔ.
Ɛlu ɛwat bhii tak, ye nabɛ ɛ́ dwoo saba. Eboo bɛghaa-Zɛɛb nɛ eFalizyɛ zokazɛtɔ́ kɛsɛɛga pɛ daa Pilat.
Bɔɔ nɛ nɛ náá: «Ghɛŋ, ye bɛ ɛ́ bis eetaala náá, na ghaa mɛkɔŋ menɔk, é ghɛŋ nyɛ nadi, nyɛ dinaa nɛ tsik ɛ, ye nabɛ ɛ́, nyɛ naalɛɛ náá: “É ghɛŋ mɛ aagwyɛ ɛ, mɛlu mɛlɛl bhii tak, mɛ waagom.”
Ye goka ɛ́, wɔ lwom bot náá, bɛ kɛbaal ɛvit mɛlu mɛlɛl, etɛɛ náá, bɛdjekel bɛ ɛ́ nɛ ghwyil ɛzɛdjii muu, tɔ́ nɛ yɛ, da bɛ ɛ́ kake náá: “Nyɛ eegom!” Tin, mɛkɔŋ menek ɛ́ waabaagék dhaa-dhaŋak yii nabɛ sok ɛ.»
Pilat ɛ́ booke nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Beeka esodja étɛp ɛkɛbaal é. Tɔ́ka, kɛbaal ɛvit dáa bi di ekwyɛl ɛ.»
Bhii tak, bɛ eezɛtɔ́, kɛkoobal dáa bɛ aakɛbaal ɛvit ɛ. Bɛ ɛ́ boopyet ɛkok é ɛbɛ ɛ ɛvit ɛ tak ɛlyelɛpe. Esodja é tak eezɛnɔɔ mɛnyel, disi tin é ngwoob ɛvit.
Dáa dwoo saba nadhaŋ ɛ, kɛŋ tɔ mɛlem mɛ dwoo mɛkɛn mɛ yenga, wɔ gwaa, Maali moma dɛl Makdala, nɛ nwyak dhiiti Maali zɛtɔ́, kɛbee ɛvit.
Dáa bɛ katɔ́ ɛ́, bɛ kasɛka ɛ́, bɔs moo dheegel ɛlyelɛpe. Fofop ɛ Ghɛŋ ngɔt eedus pɛ tɔ gwoo, sul é bɔs, nyɛ eezɛbiŋal boo ɛkok ɛ bɛ nadiyal ɛbɛ ɛ ɛvit nɛ yɛ ɛ. Bhii tak, nyɛ eezɛnɔɔ nyel, disi kɔ ɛkok ɛ tak.
Nyɛ nadi ɛ́, ɛkasɛpe dáa ngwyes bhi, ekaad bɛ mɛpum dhaa nyel.
Tin, esodja ee nazɛbaal ɛvit ɔ, moo tin syeela nɛ bɛbebwol, bɛ moo tin «gbegbagba» epwak nɛ bwoo, saa dáa bɛ sa.
É di'enek, wɔ gwaa fofop zokake nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Nàdika nɛ bwoo, mɛ nɛ gu náá, bi saŋ ɛ́ Yezu, mot nabemaa é mɛlaaba ɔ.
Nyɛ tokapɛ wak. Nyɛ eezegom dáa nyɛ nalɛɛ bin é ghɛŋ nyɛ nadi, nyɛ dinaa nɛ nen é di wat ɛ. Dha beeka di bɛ nakɛl muu'ɛ ɔ.
Lelka, tɔ́ka, kɛlɛɛ nɛ bɛdjekel bɛ náá: “Nyɛ eezegom! Nyɛ eetɔ́, kɛbwood bin pɛ Ghalile. Ye ɛ́ penek ɛ bi aakɛboma nɛ nɛ.” Bhaadal mɛ kwyɛl mɛ neelɛɛ bin ɛ, ye ɛ́ yenek.»
É di tak wat, boa binɔk eezɛwyis tɔ ɛvit, bɔɔ zɛsum kaab. Tɔ elyem bɔɔ, ye nabɛ ɛ́ nɛ bwoo nɛ mɛmyaala ɛlyelɛpe. Bɔɔ zokasik kɛgoola lɛŋ pɛ daa bɛdjekel ɛ Yezu.
É di tak wat, Yezu zokazɛboma nɛ boa binɔk. Nyɛy nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Mɛ eeswos bin!» Tin, boa binɔk eezɛtiila pɛ dáa Yezu, bɛ eezɛmɛt nyɛ é mɛko, bɛ moo tin nɛ ɛduwal nyɛ.
Yezu ɛ́ booke nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Sa bi ààdi nɛ bwoo. Kɛlɛɛka nɛ bɔn nyaag'am náá, bɛ tɔ́ pɛ Ghalile. Ye ɛ́ penek ɛ bɛ aakɛbee mɛ.»
Boa binɔk dinaa é ze, bɛdhiiti bot tɔ esodja ee nanɛɛgaa étɛp ɛbaal ɛvit ɔ eezɛkum pɛ dɛl. Bɛ moo tin elɛɛ eboo bɛghaa-Zɛɛb esesɛɛ ee nadhaa penek ɛ djas.
Bot ɛ nadi kɔ elo e bɛghaa-Zɛɛb ɔ, nɛ bɛpaa eYuda zokasɛɛga é kwan. Bhii bɛ nazegwakel ɛ, wɔ gwaa, bɛ djɛ esodja binɔk bɛtɛ nɛ epata.
Bɛ eezɛke nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Bi lɛɛ bot ɛ náá: “Bɛdjekel bɛ eezyɛ é pum, zɛdjii muu mot'ɔɔ, bisɔ é egɔ́.”
Tin, kukuma yen ɛ gwak ɔɔ, yɛ aanàkwaasa sonok, etɛɛ náá, bis ɛ́ waagu dáa bis aasil nyɛ lyem ɛ. Bis ɛ́ waasa náá, bi nàbela etɛp pɛ di mɛsa men.»
Esodja é tak ɛ́ boonɔɔ epata é tak. Sika bɛ nakasik ɛ́, bɛ ɛ́ bookɛsa dáa bɛ nalɛɛ bɛ náá, bɛ sa ɛ. Deenek, ye nabɛ ɛ́ menduk mɛ etɛp binek naagék tɔ mɛlɔ mɛ eYuda djas, kɛkum dwoo pan mos'ak.
Bɛdjekel bɛ kam nɛ ngɔt nalik ɔ, nadi etɔ́ pɛ ze Ghalile, pɛ kɔ ɛtsok ɛ Yezu nalyo bɛ ɛ.
Dáa bɛ nakum ɛ, bɛ eezɛbee nyɛ. Bhii tak bɛ moo tin eduwal nyɛ. Ye kabela tin ɛ́, bɛdhiiti nadi ɛ́, nɛ mɛso tɔ elyem bɔɔ.
Yezu ɛ́ bootiila pɛ bɛ nadi ɛ́, nyɛ ɛ́ booke nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Ye nabɛ ɛ́, Zɛɛb eedjɛ mɛ eghɛŋ nɛ mɛbwala mɛ djas pɛ tɔ gwoo nɛ kɔ bɔs.
Deenek, tɔ́ka pɛ daa bot ɛ membyak djas di kɔ ɛko ɛ bɔs ɛ, da bi ɛ́ kɛsa náá, bɔɔ djas liigel, da bɛ ɛ́ di bɛdjekel bam. Duuka bɛ Zɛɛb nɛ din ɛ Sɛɛg, nɛ Mɔn, nɛ Sisim na Dɛɛ.
Lyoka bɛ, bɛ kɛlooba nɛ esesɛɛ djas mɛ nalyaal bin ɛ. Tin, bi ɛ́ waabee náá, mena waadika lɔɔg wat mɛlu djas, kɛkum dwoo bɔs'ak aabookɛsi ɛ.»
Ɛkɛn ɛ Mbɛɛ Bhaadal dum nɛ Yezu Klisto, Mɔn Zɛɛb.
Dáa ekwyala di elɛɛ tɔ mɛkana mɛ ngoolel-mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb Ezayi náá: «Mam Zɛɛb ɛ́ waadhis ngoola-ngoola yam pɛ sok bhwoob'ɔ étɛp nyɛ neekoobal wɔ mɛze.
Ye ɛ́ gwood mot di etuud kɔ kyee bɔs bɛsyɛ di ààbɛ nɛ mɛdii ɛ. Nyɛ nakeke nɛ bot ɛ mbyak'ɛ ɛ́ náá: “Koobalka mɛze ɛ Ghɛŋ! Tuuka nyɛ mɛze mɛ na looba-looba!”»
Tin, Zaŋ Nduuel-bot eezɛzyɛ pɛ kyee bɔs bɛsyɛ di ààbɛ nɛ mɛdii ɛ, nyɛy etuud náá: «Liigka elyem, da bi ɛ́ kɛduwa Zɛɛb. Tin, Zɛɛb ɛ́ waapel mesyem men.»
Tin, bot ɛ kyee dik Yude djas nɛ bot ɛ ghaada Yeluzalɛm lɔɔg wat, bɛ eezɛtɔ́ pɛ daa lɛ, kɛvaa mesyem mɔɔ é mis mɛ bot, nɛ ɛduwa Zɛɛb tɔ dii Yuldɛn.
Kaad Zaŋ nadi ebɔt ɛ nasael ɛ́, nɛ mya mɛ boo yaaga kyee bɔs bɛsyɛ di ààbɛ nɛ mɛdii ɛ. Nyɛ nabɛ ɛ́ nɛ bhɛtɛ ket é kuu. Nyɛ nadedɛ ɛ́ etsemaaka nɛ ego.
Nyɛ nadi elyo mɛdhuu mɛ bot binɔk ɛ́ náá: «Mot di ezyɛ bhii mam ɔ, nyɛ eedhaa mɛ nɛ mɛbwala. Mam aanàkwaakobela-belak duu ɛmalal étɛp ɛkotii-tiiak ekel e ekoko bɛ.
Mam duu bin Zɛɛb ɛ́ pɛ tɔ dii. Yɛ kabɛ nyɛy ɔ, nyɛ aaduu bin Zɛɛb ɛ́ tɔ Sisim na Dɛɛ.»
Tin, tɔ mɛlu menek, Yezu naazɛdus pɛ Nazalɛt, pɛ kyee dik Ghalile, nyɛ eezɛtɔ́ pɛ dii Yuldɛn, étɛp nyɛ neekɛduwa Zɛɛb pɛ daa Zaŋ.
É ghɛŋ nyɛ nadi ewyis tɔ dii ɛ́, wɔ gwaa, gwoo zɛbɛŋel. Sisim na Dɛɛ eezɛsul kɔ lɛ tyee ɛghum.
Gwood wat zɛgék tɔ gwoo eke náá: «Wɔ ɛ́ mɔn'am mɛ dyeebakwyɛl ɔ. Bum lyem'am ɛ́ nɛ mɛmyaala ɛbuɛpe kɔ ɛsu ɛ lɔ.»
É di tak wat, Sisim Zɛɛb eezɛtɔ́ nɛ nɛ pɛ kyee bɔs bɛsyɛ di ààbɛ nɛ mɛdii ɛ.
Yezu naazɛsa tin pɛ kyee bɔs bɛsyɛ di ààbɛ nɛ mɛdii ɛ, mɛlu mɛkam-mɛná. Satan naawa nyɛ tɔ mɛbhowal. Nyɛ nadi ɛ́ tɔ bɛtit ɛ dik. Efofop nadi ezɛkwyee nyɛ.
Ba mɛlu bhii tak, Zaŋ naazɛmɛtaa é mbok. Tin, ye nabɛ ɛ́, Yezu naazɛtɔ́ pɛ Ghalile egoola Mbɛɛ Bhaadal Zɛɛb. Nyɛy náá:
«Ɛwala Zɛɛb nakɛk ɛ, yɛ eezekum! Ɛyoŋ ɛ Zɛɛb moo ɛ́ ɛkunaaɛpe. Liigka elyem, myaalka Mbɛɛ Bhaadal Zɛɛb.»
Yezu nadi ekɛ mbaka-mbaka nɛ boo soob na djato-djato e Ghalile. Wɔ gwaa, nyɛ zɛbee bɛlael ɛ mɛwyet bɛbá, Simɔŋ bɛ nɛ dhyeeb Andele ela mɛwyet tɔ dii.
Yezu eezɛke nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Duka mɛ, mɛ waasa náá, bi di bɛlael ɛ mɛwyet étɛp ɛmɛt ɛ bot.»
É di'enek wat, bɛ eezɛdhuugal mɛwyet mɔɔ, étɛp ɛdu Yezu.
Bhii Yezu nakɛ ba «ziii» ɛ́, nyɛ eezɛboma nɛ Zak bɛ nɛ dhyeeb Zaŋ, bɔn Zɛbɛdɛ. Bɛ nadi ɛ́, mendiindil tɔ elɛɛd bɔɔ sela é ɛboŋ, bɔɔ ekoobal mɛwyet mɔɔ.
Batsa deenek, Yezu eezɛdjóo bɛ, wɔ gwaa, bɛ zɛdhuugal sɛɛg'ɔɔ Zɛbɛdɛ nɛ bot ɛ mɛsa mɛ tɔ elɛɛd, du nyɛ.
Yezu bɛ nɛ bɛdjekel bɛ eezɛni kɔ dɛl Kapɛlnaum dwoo saba. Wɔ gwaa bɛ zɛni tɔ ndjaa mendjaala mɛ eYuda. Nyɛ eezɛben gwood elyo mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb.
Bot ɛ nadi egwak nyɛ ɔ nadi edjoka kɔkɔ mbi yenek lyoa mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb. Etɛɛ náá, nyɛ nalelyo ɛ́, nɛ eghɛŋ, ààkabɛ dáa bɛghaŋ ɛ mɛkana mɛ etsi ɛ Moiiz di ezezyɛ nɛ ɛlelyaal bɛ sok ɛ.
É di tak wat, tɔ bot ɛ nadi tɔ ndjaa mendjaala mɛ eYuda ɔ, ye nabɛ ɛ́ nɛ dhiiti mot mbee sisim nadi dhedhek nyɛ ɔ. Wɔ gwaa, nyɛ zɛkyeeb náá:
«Haa! Mena ɛ́ nɛ yaa tɛp, Yezu, mot Nazalɛt? “Iyeee!” Wɔ zyɛ ɛ́ zɛtwak bis é? Mɛ nɛ gu náá, wɔy ɛ́ Mot na Dɛɛ Zɛɛb nadhis ɔ.»
Wɔ gwaa, Yezu zɛbhɛm nyɛ ɛlyelɛpe. Nyɛy náá: «Dia gwyem, wyisa tɔ nyel mot'ak!»
Mbee sisim zokazɛdheeg mot'enɔk ɛlyelɛpe. Bhii tak, nyɛ eezɛwyis tɔ lɛ nɛ boo tsim.
Bot djas naadjoka ɛlyelɛpe, bhii tak bɛ moo djinel pak'ɔɔ: «Nwyak ɛ́ nwyaa kwaambi kɔkɔ lyoel di elyo nɛ eghɛŋ djas'aak? Nyɛ ɛ́ nɛ eghɛŋ nɛ ghwyil ɛbatake nɛ embee esisim náá, bɛ wyis, bɔɔ batagwak nyɛ, da ɛ́ wyis!»
É di tak wat, dék din ɛ lɛ zokakɛ kɔ kyee dik Ghalile djas.
Wyisa Yezu nawyis tɔ ndjaa mendjaala mɛ eYuda ɛ, bɛ eezɛtɔ́ pɛ ndjaŋ ɛ Simɔŋ nɛ Andele, bɛ nabɛ ɛ́, bɛ nɛ Zak zɛnɔɔ Zaŋ.
Bɛ kabela tin ɛ́, tsi ɛ Simɔŋ yii moma «kpop» nɛ mɛkosa ndjaasi. Kuma nyɛ nakum ɛ, bɛ eezɛlɛɛ nyɛ.
Yezu zɛtiila pɛ daa lɛ, bhii tak, nyɛ eezɛmalal kɔ lɛ. Nyɛ eezɛmɛt nyɛ é mbɔ, wyɛl nyɛ. É di tak wat, mɛkosa eezɛsi tɔ lɛ. Tin, tsi ɛ Simɔŋ eezɛwyɛl, nyɛ moo zɛbe bɛ.
Bikoko, dwoo eezɛsila, wɔ gwaa, bot ɛ dɛl zokazyɛ nɛ bot ɛ mɛbɛ́ membi nɛ membi, dɔɔ nɛ bot ɛ embee esisim nadi edhedhek ɔ.
Bot ɛ mɛl djas zokazɛmaala é ɛbɛ ɛ ndjaa nyɛ nadi ɛ́.
Tin, Yezu naazɛtsik bɛtɛ nɛ membel membi nɛ membi nazyɛ ɔ, nyɛ naabaasɔ embee esisim tɔ bɛdhiiti. Tin, nyɛ nabɛ ɛ́ ààbet náá, embee esisim gheelii, etɛɛ náá, bɛ nadi egwyák nyɛ.
Tɔ ghooghom mɛlem mɛ yak ɛlu, Yezu eezɛkuud tɔ́ pɛ kyee bɔs bɛsyɛ di ààbɛ nɛ mɛdii ɛ, étɛp ɛkɛdjaala Zɛɛb.
Simɔŋ nɛ bot ɛ nadi bɛ nɛ bɛ nɔɔ ɔ eezɛtɔ́ kɛsaa nyɛ.
Bhii bɛ nakabela nyɛ ɛ, bɛ eezɛke nɛ nɛ náá: «Bot djas ɛpesaa wɔ.»
Nyɛ eezɛbɔɔza nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Djhokaka pɛ yii mɛl etɛɛ náá, ye goka ɛ́ mɛ kɛgoola mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb penek etɛɛ náá, mɛ nazyɛ ɛ́ étɛp tak.»
Bhii tak, Yezu zokakɛ kɔ kyee dik Ghalile djas, egoola mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb tɔ mendjaa mɛ mendjaala mɛ eYuda nɛ ɛsɔ embee esisim tɔ bot.
Dhiiti mot nadi nɛ ɛbɛ́ ɛ zezam ɔ, zokazɛtiila pɛ daa lɛ, kwyit mɛboŋ si, zɛdjaala nɛ nɛ náá: «Mɛ nɛ gu náá, wɔ ɛ́ nɛ ghwyil ɛtsik mɛ, lyem'ɔ ɛ́ kwyɛl ɔɔ, étɛp mɛ neebula nyel dɛɛ.»
Wɔ gwaa, ghoŋ zɛmɛt Yezu ɛlyelɛpe. Nyɛ eezɛsɛɛb mbɔ, mɛt nyɛ, nyɛ eezɛke nɛ nɛ náá: «Mɛ eekwyɛl! Tsaka.»
É di tak wat, ɛbɛ́ ɛ zezam zokasi é nyel mot'enɔk, nyɛ moo dɛɛ.
Bhii tak, Yezu ɛ́ boozɛswaal mot'enɔk é di tak wat. Tin, nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛdul nyɛ mɛlɔ ɛlyelɛpe.
Nyɛ eezɛke nɛ nɛ náá: «Gwaka mɛ ɛnyɔɛpe! Sa wɔ ààlɛɛ mot sa dhaa wak ɛ. Tɔ́ kɛlyaal nyel'ɔ pɛ daa bɛghaa-Zɛɛb, da wɔ ɛ́ kɛdjɛ ebuwa e bɛtit dáa Moiiz nake ɛ, étɛp ɛlyaal nɛ bot náá, wɔ eetsak.»
Mot'enɔk eezɛtɔ́, nyɛ ààpakadi gwyem. Nyɛ moo lɛɛ nɛ bot egba nɛ egba sa dhaŋ ɛ. Kɔ ɛsu ɛ tak, ye nabɛ ɛ́, ye naalyel nɛ Yezu nyɛ tuula kɔ dɛl. Nyɛ nazokadi ɛ́ pɛ tɔ kyee bɔs bɛsyɛ di ààbɛ nɛ mɛdii ɛ. Bot nadi edus pɛ ekyee sis, zyɛ pɛ daa lɛ.
Ba mɛlu bhii tak, Yezu eezɛbula pɛ Kapɛlnaum. Dáa bot nagwak náá, nyɛ ɛ́ pɛ ndjaŋ ɛ,
wɔ gwaa zukamwaa nɛ mot zɛsɛɛga kɔ ɛbɛsɛɛ. Mɛbu mɛ bot saa-saŋak di ɛsɛɛ mɛtel. Bot kum-kumak pɛ ɛbɛ ɛ ndjaa. Tin, Yezu nabɛ ɛ́, elyo bot mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb.
Bɛdhiiti bot zokazyɛ nɛ mot ngɔt, nyɛ nabɛ ɛ́, nyɛ eezesɔɔb nɛ ɛbɛ́. Bot ɛná ɛ́ nabyaal nyɛ kɔ mwaala.
Dáa ɛdhuu ɛ bot nadi ɛbuɛpe, ààbɛ nɛ ze ɛkpaa étɛp bɛ neekɛnɛɛg nyɛ si mɛko ɛ Yezu ɛ. Wɔ gwaa, bot binɔk zokazɛtuu ɛlen kɔ mii ndjaa, bɛ eezɛsil mwaala mot ɛbɛ́ ɛ tak.
Dáa Yezu nabee ɛdum ɛ koŋ ɛ bot ɛ nazyɛ nɛ mbel tak ɔ, nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛke nɛ mot nazesɔɔb ɔ náá: «Mɔn'am, mesyem mɔ eepelel.»
Bɛdhiiti bɛghaŋ ɛ mɛkana mɛ etsi ɛ Moiiz nadi mendiindil tin ɔ, nabɛ ɛ́, bɛ moo nɛ bɛtɛ nɛ esiiza tɔ elyem bɔɔ. Bɔɔ náá:
«Mot'ak lii deenek étɛp yé? Nyɛ ɛpebyasal Zɛɛb, etɛɛ náá, mot tok nɛ ghwyil ɛpel mesyem mɛ sɔ mot, bhii Zɛɛb nyɛ ɛmet.»
É di tak wat, Yezu naagu esiiza bɔɔ. Nyɛ ɛ́ booke náá: «Étɛp yé bi di nɛ mbi yenek egeka?
Ɛye di elyel nɛ nen, ɛke ɛ́ nɛ mbel náá: “Mesyem mɔ eepelel”, “ooho” nɛghu ɛke ɛ́ náá: “Wyɛla, ghɛɛa mwaala yɔ, da wɔ ɛ́ kɛ”?
Ye goka ɛ́ bi gu náá, Sɛɛŋɛlɛ Mɔn Mot ɛ́ nɛ ghwyil ɛpel mesyem mɛ bot ɛ bɔs.» Bhii tak, nyɛ eezɛke nɛ mot nadi sɔɔba ɔ náá:
«Mɛ ke ɛ́ náá: Wyɛla, nɔŋa mwaala yɔ, da wɔ ɛ́ sik pɛ ndjaŋ'ɔ!»
É di'enek wat, bot djas «dhuuu» nɛ mis é nyel'ɛ, mbel eezɛwyɛl, ghɛɛ mwaala yɛ, zɛnɔɔ nyel tɔ́. Bot djas naadyeebadjoka. Bhii tak, bɛ moo duwal Zɛɛb é ɛkeke náá: «Mena dinaa ààpaabee kɔkɔ yak sok!»
Yezu eebaazɛsik mbaka-mbaka nɛ boo soob na djato-djato Ghalile. Bot mɛdhuu-mɛdhuu nadi ezyɛ pɛ daa lɛ. Tin, nyɛy elelyo bɛ mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb.
Dáa nyɛ nadi edhaŋ ɛ, nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛbee Levi, mɔn Alfe, ndiindil é di mɛsa mɛ. Nyɛ nadi ɛ́, nɔŋel epata e lapo. Yezu eezɛke nɛ nɛ náá: «Dua mɛ!» Tin, «ngbat», Levi eezɛwyɛl, nyɛ eezɛdu nyɛ.
