Mɛsia, mɛkoozi mɛ bot ɛ mbyak Yisalaɛl, kasul kɔ mɛlaaba bɛ bem wɔ é tak ɛ, étɛp bis neebee, bhii tak, da bis ɛ́ dum koŋ nɛ nɔ!» Dɔɔ nɛ bot ɛ nabemaa bɛ nɛ bɛ nɔɔ ɔ, nabaadi ɛ́, elee nyɛ.
Dáa ye nadhaa mɛwala mɛlɛl bhii kuku mwos ɛ, wɔ gwaa, ɛgwyitok zɛgwyiidela kɔ ɛko ɛ bɔs djas, ɛgwyitok ɛlenek naabɔya, kɛkum ɛwala elɛl yii bikoko.
Tin, é ɛwala ɛ tak wat, wɔ gwaa Yezu zɛbo tsim: Eloyi, Eloyi, lama sabatani? Ye kwyɛl ɛlɛɛ ɛ́ náá: «Zɛɛb saag'am, Zɛɛb Saag'am! Étɛp yé wɔ bet mɛ mam mɛ ɛmet deenek?»
Dhiiti mot tɔ bot ɛ nadi tin ɔ, zokagwak dáa Yezu nalii ɛ. Nyɛy nɛ bɛsɔ náá: «Gwakeka! Nyɛ ɛpedjóo Eli!»
Mot ngɔt pak'ɔɔ eezɛwyis kaab, kɛnɔɔ pes kaad, kɔl e le ghwaazok, duu yɛ tɔ mɛnyok mɛ na bwaaz-bwaaz. Bhii tak, nyɛ eezɛsɛɛb Yezu yɛ ɛ, nyɛ needɛ. Wɔ gwaa nyɛ baake nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Betka, djhooka beeka nɛghu Eli ɛ́ waazyɛ, zɛdis nyɛ é mɛlaaba!»
Tin, bhii Yezu bo boo tsim ɛ, nyɛ naazɛsil eswos.
É di'enek wat, wɔ gwaa boo lɛmbɛ na pip-pip nadi tɔ Di na Dɛɛ, di ebɛk dhɛŋ nɛ koo tɔ Ndjaa-ebuwa ɔ, zokanyɛɛ kuku tak, kan pɛ ɛko, kɛkum pɛ si.
Dáa mot di kɔ lo esodja nadi pɛ sok bhwoob ɛ Yezu, nabee dáa Yezu nasil eswos deenek ɛ, nyɛ eezɛke náá: «Nɛ tsɛɛtsɛ, mot'ak nabɛ ɛ́ Mɔn ɛ Zɛɛb.»
Ye nabaabɛ pe ɛ́, nɛ boa nadi ebee etɛp binek ɛtsetaɛpe ɔ. Boa ɛ tak nabɛ ɛ́: Maali, moma dɛl ɛ Makdala, nɛ Maali, nyɛɛg ɛ Zak yii mɔɔ dhyeeb bɛ nɛ Yosɛs, zɛnɔɔ Salome.
Ye nabɛ ɛ́, boa nadi egyee e lɔɔg ɛ Yezu ɔ, ye ɛ́ bɔɔ ɛ́ nadi edjedjaabal Yezu é ghɛŋ bɛ nadi pɛ kyee dik Ghalile ɔ, zɛnɔɔ bɛdhiiti bɛtɛ nɛ boa natɔ́ pɛ Yeluzalɛm bɛ nɛ bɛ nɔɔ lɔɔg wat étɛp bɛ neekwyi-kwyee nyɛ nɛ mɛsa ɔ.
Dáa ye nabɛ náá, dwoo moo ɛ́ bikoko ɛ, ye nagoka ɛ́ náá, mot nɛ mot kɛ ɛkoobal yɛ esesɛɛ etɛɛ náá, mɛlem mɛ nadi du dwoo tak ɛ, nabɛ ɛ́ mɛlem mɛ dwoo saba.
Tin, wɔ gwaa dhiiti mot, din ɛ lɛ nabɛ ɛ́ Zozɛf, nyɛ nadi ɛ́ mot dɛl Alimate. Nyɛ nadi ɛ́, ngɔt tɔ bɛdhil ɛ bot ɛ boo kwan eYuda. Yɛ mɛfulu nabɛ ɛ́ ààdjala nɛ yii bɛsɔ. Nyɛ nabɛ ɛ́ nɛ ɛbwaalel ɛ ɛbee ɛ Ɛyoŋ ɛ Zɛɛb. Wɔ gwaa nyɛ zɛtɔ́, kɛwaab muu ɛ Yezu pɛ daa Kukuma Pilat.
Tin, Pilat eezɛdjoka dáa Yezu naleegwyɛ kaab deenek ɛ. Bhii tak, nyɛ eezɛdjóo mot nadi kɔ elo e esodja bɛ ɔ, nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛdji nyɛ náá: «Yezu eeloogwyɛ mos é?»
Bhii nyɛ nagwak bɔɔza mot nadi kɔ elo e esodja náá, bɛ nalɛɛ nyɛ tsɛɛtsɛ náá, ye nabɛ ɛ́ Yezu naazegwyɛ ɛ́, nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛdjɛ Zozɛf mot Alimate muu ɛ Yezu.
Bhis Zozɛf nakabɔm bheeza na puu ɛ, nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛsil muu ɛ Yezu é mɛlaaba. Bhii tak, nyɛ eezɛpil muu'ɛ tɔ bheeza tak. Tin, nyɛ eezɛnɔɔ yɛ, kɛwa tɔ ɛvit ɛ bɛ nabwak tɔ ɛkok ɛ. Bhii tak, bɛ ɛ́ boozɛdiyal ɛbɛ ɛ ɛvit ɛ tak nɛ boo ɛkok ɛ bɛ nakpak étɛp tak ɛ.
Ghuna Maali, moma dɛl ɛ Makdala, nɛ Maali, nyɛɛg ɛ Yosɛs, nadi ebee di bɛ nawa muu ɛ Yezu ɛ.
Dáa dwoo saba nadhaŋ ɛ, wɔ gwaa Maali, moma dɛl ɛ Makdala, nɛ Maali, nyɛɛg ɛ Zak, zɛnɔɔ Salome zɛtɔ́, kɛbɔm bɛmul ɛ na mbɛɛ mɛnuub étɛp bɛ neekɛlɔɔb yɛ é muu ɛ Yezu.
Tɔ ghooghom mɛlem dwoo mɛkɛn mɛ yenga, bɛ eezɛghɛɛ mɛnyel, zɛtɔ́ pɛ mɛvit.
Bɛ moo tin elii pak'ɔɔ: «Bɛ zɛ aakobiŋal mena ɛkok ɛ bɛ diyal ɛvit nɛ yɛ ɛ nenak é?»
Dáa bɛ kaben mis, gwyák pɛ sok ɛ, bɛ kabee ɛ́, boo ɛkok ɛ bɛ nadiyal ɛvit nɛ yɛ ɛ, yɛ eezebiŋelaa, ye moo é ngwoob ɛvit.
Wɔ gwaa bɛ zɛni tɔ ɛvit, bɛ kabee ɛ́, dhiiti mɔɔ ngbaaz ndiindil pɛ mbɔ eghɛŋ nɛ kaad na puu é nyel. É di tak wat, bwoo eezɛmɛt bɛ.
Mɔɔ ngbaaz tak ɛ́ boozɛke nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Sa mot ààbem ba! Bi saŋ ɛ́ Yezu, mot Nazalɛt, nabemaa é mɛlaaba ɔ. Nyɛ eezegom! Nyɛ tokapɛ wak. Beeka di bɛ nakɛl nyɛ ɔ.
Tɔ́ka, kɛlɛɛ nɛ bɛdjekel bɛ nɛ Pyɛɛd náá: “Nyɛ eetɔ́, kɛbwood bin pɛ Ghalile. Ye ɛ́ penek ɛ bi aakɛboma nɛ nɛ dáa nyɛ nalɛɛ bin ɛ.”»
Bhii tak, bɛ eezɛwyis tɔ ɛvit, zɛsum kaab é gbakeba etɛɛ náá, bɛbebwol naasa bɛ. Wyisa bɛ nawyis tin ɛ, kaab wat, ààlɛɛ bot étɛp bwoo bɛ nadi nɛ yɛ ɛ.
[Yezu eezegom tɔ mɛlem mɛ ɛlu ɛkɛn e yenga, nyɛ nakan ɛlyaal nyel'ɛ ɛ́ nɛ Maali, moma dɛl ɛ Makdala, moma nyɛ nasɔ embee esisim etɛn nɛ ebá tɔ lɛ ɔ.
Wɔ gwaa Maali tak kɛlɛɛ etɛp e tak nɛ bot ɛ nadi bɛ nɛ Yezu ɔ. Bɛ nadi ɛ́, tɔ ghoŋ nɛ mɛgwyɛ.
Tin, dáa bɛ nadi egwak dáa Maali nadi eke náá: «Yezu ɛ́ nɛ tsik! Mɛ eebee nyɛ!» Bɔɔ djas nabɛ ɛ́ ààmyaal nyɛ.
Bhis yenek, bot ɛbá nadi esik, tɔ́ pɛ dɛl ɛ lɔɔ. Wɔ gwaa, Yezu zɛboma nɛ nɔɔ é ze, nyɛ zokazɛtel nyel mbi tela sis.
Bɛdjekel binɔk bɛbá zokabula, zɛlɛɛ bɛsɔ bɔɔ. Bɔɔ ààmyaal bɛ yenek.
Bhii tak, wɔ gwaa nyɛ zɛtel nyel nɛ bɛdjekel kam nɛ ngɔt nalik ɛ, é sok bɛ nadi kɔ mesa edɛ edee ɛ. Tin, nyɛ eezɛdul bɛ mɛlɔ náá: Bɛ ààdum koŋ nɛ Zɛɛb. Dɔɔ nɛ ɛlyel ɛ lo bɛ di nɛ yɛ ɛ, ààmyaal sa bot ɛ nabee nyɛ, nyɛ eezegom ɔ nalɛɛ ɛ.
Bhii tak nyɛ eezɛlɛɛ nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Tɔ́ka kɔ bɔs djas, kɛgoolaka bot ɛ membyak djas Mbɛɛ Bhaadal.
Mot ɛ́ dum koŋ nɛ Zɛɛb, da nyɛ ɛ́ duwa Zɛɛb ɔɔ, mot tak ɛ́ waabela tsik. Mot ɛ́ pɛɛ ɛmyaal ɔɔ, nyɛ waabela ndjɛ tɔ epɛ́ɛ.
Beeka endem e mɛbwala aalyaal náá, bak ɛ́ bot ɛ di edum koŋ nɛ nam ɔ: Nɛ din ɛ lam, bɛ waasɔ embee esisim. Bɛ waalii elii na bes.
Bɛ waamɛt bɛnyɔ nɛ mɛmbɔ. Nɛghu bɛ dɛ mɛdii mɛ dho ɔɔ, yɛ aanàkwaasa bɛ sonok. Bɛ waakɛl mɛmbɔ mɔɔ kɔ bot ɛ mɛbɛ́, bot ɛ mɛbɛ́ tsak.»
Bhii Ghɛŋ Yezu nazelii nɛ nɔɔ deenek ɛ, wɔ gwaa nyɛ zɛbyet tɔ gwoo. Penek, nyɛ ɛ́ ndiindil pɛ mbɔ eghɛŋ ɛ Zɛɛb.
Bhii tak, bɛdjekel naazɛtɔ́ mɛdhik djas, kɛgoola Mbɛɛ Bhaadal. Ghɛŋ nadi ɛ́ nɛ nɔɔ sama wat, ekwyi-kwyee bɛ tɔ mɛsa. Endem e mɛbwala menek ɛ́ nadi elyaal bot nɛ tsɛɛtsɛ náá, Zɛɛb ɛ́ nadhis bɛ.]
Boo-mot Teofil, dáa ye nabɛ náá, bot ɛbuɛpe naakwyɛl ɛkaada tɔ mɛkana etɛp ee nadhaa pak'ena ɛ,
nɛ dáa bot ɛ nabee nɛ mis mɔɔ met tyee etɛp bak djas nadi esael nakaadaa bis é mɛkɛn ɛ. Bot ɛ tak nabɛ ɛ́, bɛ moo bot ɛ mɛsa ɛ Zɛɛb.
Bhii mɛ nazedu etɛp tak kɛkum pɛ mɛsuk mɛ tak ɛ, mɛ ɛ́ booke náá, ye goka ɛ́ náá, mam pe, mɛ kaada wɔ etɛp bak djas tɔ ekwyala, wɔy kukuma Teofil.
Mɛ sa deenek ɛ́, étɛp wɔ neegu etsɛɛtsɛ e mɛlyo mɛ wɔ nabela ɛ.
É ghɛŋ Elood nadi mɛkoozi kɔ Yude ɛ, ye nabɛ ɛ́ nɛ dhiiti ghaa-Zɛɛb, din ɛ lɛ nabɛ ɛ́ Zakali. Nyɛ nadi ɛ́ ngɔt tɔ sama ɛdhuu ɛ bɛghaa-Zɛɛb nadi tɔ lɔɔg ɛ Abiya ɔ. Myɛl nabɛ ɛ́ dha ɛ boo ghaa-Zɛɛb Alɔn. Din ɛ lɛ nabɛ ɛ́ Elizabɛt.
Bɔɔ djas bɛbá nadi ɛ́ bot ɛ epiki é mis ɛ Zɛɛb. Bɛ nadi eduwal nɛ ɛkɛ tyee etsi nɛ mɛtiŋ ɛ Ghɛŋ di elɛɛ ɛ ɛnyɔɛpe.
Saabɛgɔs kabɛ ɛ́ náá, bɛ nabɛ ɛ́ ààbɛ nɛ mɔn. Elizabɛt nabɛ ɛ́ kwyiid moma, nyɛ nabɛ ɛ́ ààbɛ nɛ ghwyil ɛbya etɛɛ náá, bɔɔ djas nabɛ ɛ́, bɛ moo bɛtɔa-bot.
Dhiiti dwoo, Zakali nadi esa mɛsa mɛ yii ghaa-Zɛɛb tɔ Ndjaa-ebuwa, etɛɛ náá, ye nabɛ ɛ́ yɔbɔ lɔɔg ɛ nadi tɔ mɛsa é dwoo tak.
Bɛ eezɛsa dhiiti ɛgwyeeg tɔ ɛzel ɛ lɔɔ, dáa eboo bɛghaa-Zɛɛb nadi ezezyɛ nɛ ɛsa sok ɛ étɛp bɛ neesɛ́ɛ mot aani, tɔ́ kɛdik bɛmul na mbɛɛ mɛnuub tɔ Di na Dɛɛ ɛ Ghɛŋ ɛ. Zakali ɛ́ nasɛ́ɛaa dwoo tak étɛp ɛkɛdik mɛnanas.
Ɛdhuu ɛ bot djas naleelik ɛ pɛ kel edjaala é ɛwala ɛ mɛnanas na mbɛɛ mɛnuub nadi edikaa tɔ Di na Dɛɛ ɛ.
Tin, dhiiti fofop ngɔt ɛ Ghɛŋ zokazɛtuula Zakali «zaka». Fofop tak eezɛtyaa tetel pɛ mbɔ eghɛŋ mesa ebuwa di edikaa bɛmɛnanas ɛ.
Dáa Zakali nabee nyɛ ɛ́, ye nabɛ ɛ́ bwoo nɛ bɛbebwol naamɛt nyɛ ɛlyelɛpe.
É di'enek, fofop eezɛke nɛ nɛ náá: «Nàdi nɛ bwoo Zakali, etɛɛ náá, Zɛɛb eegwak mendjaala mɔ! Elizabɛt mwalɔ ɛ́ waabela ɛbum. Nyɛ waabya wɔ mɔn mɔɔ motom. Wɔ aaget mɔn tak ɛ Zaŋ.
Wɔ aadi ɛ́ tɔ boo mɛmyaala. Tin, bot ɛbuɛpe ɛ́ waamyaala dum nɛ ɛbyel ɛ lɛ.
Etɛɛ náá, nyɛ aadi ɛ́ boo-mot é mis ɛ Ghɛŋ. Nyɛ aanàdɛ mɛnyok mɛ vin, ààdɛ dɔɔ nɛ kwaambi bɛdhiiti mɛnyok mɛ di edjɛ elangi ɛ. Sisim na Dɛɛ ɛ́ waalwood tɔ lɛ nyɛ dinaa tɔ mɔ nyɛɛg.
Nyɛ waasa náá, bɔn Yisalaɛl ɛbuɛpe bula zɛdum koŋ nɛ Ghɛŋ Zɛɛb'ɔɔ.
Tin, nyɛ waakɛ sok bhwoob ɛ Ghɛŋ nɛ sisim nɛ eghɛŋ ɛ ngoolel-mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb Eli, étɛp nyɛ neebulal ɛgwakel pak bɛsɛɛg nɛ bɔn bɔɔ. Nɛ ɛbaasa náá, bot ɛ di elyel elo ɔ swoola mɛfulu étɛp bɛ needi bot ɛ etsoŋ nɛ epiki.»
Tin, Zakali eezɛke nɛ fofop náá: «Mam aagu náá, etɛp ee wɔ di elɛɛ ɛ, ye ɛ́ tsɛɛtsɛ dáa? Etɛɛ náá, mɛ moo ɛ́ tɔa-mot. Mwalam pe moo ɛ́ yɛ sil-moma.»
É di'enek, fofop ɛ́ boozɛbɔɔza nɛ nɛ náá: «Din ɛ lam ɛ́ Ghabhiliɛl. Ye ɛ́ mam ɛ́ dyeebadi sok bhwoob ɛ Zɛɛb étɛp elwomel bɛ. Nyɛ lwom mɛ ɛ, mɛ zɛlii nɛ nɔ, mɛ zɛlɛɛ wɔ mbɛɛ bhaadal'enek.
Deenek, wɔ ààpamyaal etɛp ee mɛ lɛɛ wɔ ɛ, sonok bɛ náá, etɛp tak ɛ waasɛ́ɛ é ɛwala ɛ Zɛɛb zekoobal ɛ. Étɛp tak ɛ́ di náá, wɔ aadi ɛ́ bubu. Wɔ aanàkwaabaalii, kana dwoo mos kɛkum dwoo esesɛ́ɛ binek djas aasael ɛ.»
É di'enek, bot ɛ nazyɛ mendjaala ɔ nadi ebwood Zakali, bɔɔ edjoka dáa nyɛ nadi ebɔya tɔ sum Di na Dɛɛ ɛ Zɛɛb.
Tin, dáa nyɛ nakawyis ɛ, nyɛ nabɛ ɛ́, nyɛ moo ààkabɛ nɛ tyee nyɛ kalii nɛ nɔɔ. Tin, bot eezɛgek náá, nyɛ eebee dhiiti djema mɛbwala penek tɔ sum Di na Dɛɛ ɛ Zɛɛb. É di'enek, nyɛ nakalii-lii nɛ nɔɔ ɛ nɛ egeka dáa bubu, étɛp nyɛ nabɛ ɛ́, nyɛ moo bubu.
Tin, dáa Zakali nasilal bim mɛlu mɛ nyɛ nagoka nɛ ɛsa mɛsa mɛ tɔ Ndjaa-ebuwa ɛ Zɛɛb ɛ, nyɛ eezɛsik pɛ dɛl ɛ lɛ.
Ba mɛlu bhii tak, Elizabɛt myɛl eezɛbela ɛbum. Wɔ gwaa, nyɛ zokazɛsɔwa nɛ ɛbum ɛ tak tyee bɛngɔn ɛtɛn. Nyɛ nadi ekeke ɛ́ náá:
«Beea sa Ghɛŋ sa dum nɛ nam ɛ, nyɛ eemyaal ɛdis ɛ mɛ tɔ esa ee nadi edjɛ mɛ sen é mis mɛ bot ɛ.»
Bhii bɛngɔn ɛtɛn nɛ wat yii ɛbum ɛ Elisabɛt, Zɛɛb eebaazɛdhis fofop Ghabhiliɛl pɛ dɛl ɛ Nazalɛt, pɛ kyee dik Ghalile.
Nyɛ nadhis fofop tak ɛ́ pɛ daa mɔɔ moma ngɔt di ààgu botom ɔ, din ɛ lɛ nabɛ ɛ́ Maali. Nyɛ nadi ɛ́, ghɔɔd motom ngɔt nɛ din ɛ Zozɛf. Zozɛf nabɛ ɛ́ dha ɛ Mɛkoozi Dhavid.
Fofop eezɛtuula nyɛ, swos nyɛ, nyɛy náá: «Dia tɔ mɛmyaala, wɔ eeboma nɛ mbɛɛ bhwoob ɛ Zɛɛb. Ghɛŋ ɛ́ nɛ nɔ lɔɔg.»
Maali moo tinaak «yooo», edjoka nɛ mbi yenek mɛkpa. Nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛdji ɛsuk ɛ yenek mɛswosel.
Fofop ɛ́ bookake nɛ nɛ náá: «Maali, nàbem ba, etɛɛ náá, wɔ eeboma nɛ mbɛɛ bhwoob ɛ Zɛɛb.
Wɔ waabela ɛbum. Wɔ waabya mɔn mɔɔ motom. Din ɛ wɔ aaget nyɛ ɛ, yɛ aadi ɛ́ Yezu.
Nyɛ aaboodi ɛ́ boo-mot, bɛ aadjóo nyɛ Mɔn Zɛɛb-Mɛkaake. Ghɛŋ Zɛɛb ɛ́ waanɛɛg nyɛ mɛkoozi dáa Dhavid bhaab'ɛ nadi ɛ́.
Deenek, nyɛ aadi ɛ́ mɛkoozi kɔ mbyak Yisalaɛl kɔm-kɔm. Ɛyoŋ ɛ lɛ aadi ɛ́ ààbɛ nɛ ɛsik.»
Maali eezɛke nɛ fofop náá: «Yiizaag aasael dáa? Mam ɛ́ di ààgu botom'aak?»
Fofop eezɛbɔɔza nɛ nɛ náá: «Sisim na Dɛɛ ɛ́ waazyɛ kɔ lɔ. Ghwyil ɛ Zɛɛb-Mɛkaake ɛ́ waabutal wɔ. Étɛp tak ɛ mɔn na dɛɛ wɔ waabya ɔ, nyɛ aadjóoaa ɛ́ Mɔn Zɛɛb.
Dɔɔ nɛ Elizabɛt mɔn nyoog ɛ́ waabya ngbɛ mɔn motom, ye nakoozobɛ náá, nyɛ ɛ́ sil-moma. Nyɛy mot bɛ nadi ekeke náá, nyɛ ɛ́ kwyiid ɔ, ɛbum ɛ lɛ moo mos ɛ́ nɛ bɛngɔn ɛtɛn nɛ wat.
Etɛɛ náá, ye tok nɛ sa Zɛɛb aadi ààkwak.»
Tin, Maali zɛbɔɔza nɛ nɛ náá: «Mam ɛ́ mot-mɛsa ɛ Ghɛŋ. Ye sael nɛ nam dáa mɛkpa mɔ di eke náá, ye sael ɛ.» Bhii tak, fofop eezɛtɔ́ yɛ.
Ààbɔya tɔ mɛlu menek deenek, Maali eezɛghɛɛ, tɔ́ kaab pɛ dɛl ɛ mɛtsok nadi pɛ kyee dik Yude ɛ.
Nyɛ eezɛni tɔ ndjaŋ ɛ Zakali, bhii tak nyɛ eezɛswos Elizabɛt.
Dáa Elizabɛt nazogwak-gwakak mɛswosel ɛ Maali ɛ, é di tak wat wɔ gwaa, mɔn zɛkuu nyɛ tɔ mɔ. Tin, wɔ gwaa Sisim na Dɛɛ zɛlwood tɔ lɛ.
Nyɛ eezɛtsim ɛlyelɛpe náá: «Zɛɛb eesɛɛ wɔ mɛtel dhaa boa djas kɔ bɔs'ak! Deenek, esɛɛa mɛtel menek ɛ́ dɔɔ nɛ kɔ mɔn wɔ aabya ɔ.
Mam ɛ́ yam nwyaa dhiiti vaŋ moma, etɛɛ náá, nyɛɛg ɛ Ghɛŋ'am zyɛ pɛ daa lam?
Etɛɛ náá, ye bɛ ɛ́, wɔ eebee náá, é sok mɛ gwak mɛswosel mɔ ɛ, ye bɛ ɛ́, mɔn eekuu mɛ tɔ mɔ nɛ mɛmyaala.
Mɛnyɔ nɛ nɔ, etɛɛ náá, wɔ eemyaal náá, Ghɛŋ ɛ́ waasa sa nyɛ lɛɛ wɔ ɛ!»
É di'enek, Maali eezɛke náá: «Mɛ ɛpeduwal Ghɛŋ nɛ lyem'am djas.
Sisim'am ɛ́ pɛ tɔ boo mɛmyaala kɔ ɛsu ɛ Zɛɛb mɛtsik-bot mam.
Etɛɛ náá, nyɛ eeliig mis mɛ, gwyák mot-mɛsa mɛ, mam ààkobɛ yam mot ɛtela ɛ nyel. Nɛ tsɛɛtsɛ, kana dwoo ɛlak mos, membu nɛ mesee, bot aakadjóo mɛ ɛ́ “moma Zɛɛb nazesɛɛ mɛtel ɔ”.
Etɛɛ náá, Zɛɛb Mɛkaake eesa eboo esonok tɔ lam. Nyɛ ɛ́ Zɛɛb na Dɛɛ.
Nyɛ nɛ bu enɛm esa, mɛlu nɛ mɛwala djas dum nɛ bot ɛ di eduwal mɛtiŋ mɛ ɔ.
Nyɛ eesa mɛsa mɛ mɛbwala nɛ eghɛŋ bɛ. Nyɛ eetwak bot ɛ di nɛ mɛbet tɔ elyem ɔ.
Nyɛ eedis bɛmɛkoozi kɔ mɛbhóó mɛ mɛkoozi mɔɔ. Bhii tak, nyɛ eedjɛ bot ɛ di ààbɛ nɛ ɛbet ɔ, mɛbhóó mɛ mɛkoozi.
Nyɛ eedjɛ mbɛɛ edee nɛ bot ɛ nadi nɛ za ɔ. Nyɛ eeswaal bɛkum ɛ bot mɛmbɔ mɛ toto.
Nyɛ nazyɛ ɛ́ zɛkwyee Yisalaɛl, mot-mɛsa mɛ. Nyɛ ààdjisa ɛlyaal enɛm nɛ embɛɛ bɛ
nɛ Abalaam bɛ nɛ bɛdha bɛ, kɔm-kɔm sii nɛ kɔm, dáa nyɛ nakɛk bɛbhaab binaka ɛ.»
Tin, Maali eezɛdi pɛ daa Elizabɛt tyee bɛngɔn ɛlɛl, bhii tak, nyɛ eezɛsik pɛ dɛl ɛ lɛ.
Ɛwala nabɛ náá, Elizabɛt ɛ́ waabya ɛ, yɛ eezɛkum. Wɔ gwaa, nyɛ zɛbya mɔn motom.
Bɛsɔ bot ɛ nadi nɛ mendjaa ɛkunaaɛpe nɛ nɛ ɔ, nɛ bot ɛ mɛbyel mɛ zokazɛgwak náá, Ghɛŋ nabɛ ɛ́, nyɛ naagek nyɛ ghoŋ. Bɛ nɛ bɛ nɔɔ moo tin tɔ mɛmyaala bɔɔ djas.
Dáa mɔn nabɛ, nyɛ moo nɛ mɛlu mɛtɛn nɛ elɛl bhis ɛbyel ɛ lɛ ɛ, wɔ gwaa, bɛ zɛtɔ́ étɛp ɛkɛniigal nyɛ beka. Bɛ nakwyɛl ɛget nyɛ ɛ nɛ din ɛ sɛɛg Zakali.
Tin, nyɛɛg ɛ́ boopɛɛ, nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛke náá: «Ààbɛ! Din ɛ lɛ aadi ɛ́ Zaŋ.»
É di'enek, wɔ gwaa bɛ zɛke nɛ nɛ náá: «Deenek, ye tok nɛ mot ngɔt tɔ bot bɔ nadi nɛ din ɛ Zaŋ!»
Tin, tɔ ɛgek ɛ dáa ebubu di elii ɛ, bɛ eezɛdji sɛɛg mɔn, din ɛ nyɛ nakwyɛl ɛget mɔn'ɛ ɛ.
Wɔ gwaa Zakali zokazɛwaab náá, bɛ zyɛ nyɛ nɛ mɔɔ pɛt ɛbaya bɛ di ezezyɛ nɛ ɛkwyal kɔ tak ɛ. É di tak, wɔ gwaa, nyɛ zokakwyal náá: «Nɛ tsɛɛtsɛ, din ɛ lɛ ɛ́ Zaŋ.» Tin, bɔɔ djas naazɛdjoka ɛbuɛpe.
É di tak wat, wɔ gwaa, Zakali zɛbaakan ɛlii ɛnyɔɛpe. Nyɛ moo tin etsim ɛlyelɛpe eduwal Zɛɛb.
É di'enek, bot djas nadi bɛ nɛ bɛ nɔɔ ɛ, bɛ nadi ɛ́ bɛ moo nɛ bwoo, pɛ kɔ mɛl mɛ nadi tɔ mɛtsok mɛ kyee dik Yude ɛ. Tin, bot nazokakekaada ɛ tɛp'enek.
Bot djas nadi egwak dáa tɛp tak nasael ɛ, bɛ moo tin esiiza tɔ bhum elyem bɔɔ, edji náá: «Mɔn tak aadi zɛ?» Ye nabɛ ɛ́ tsɛɛtsɛ náá, ghwyil ɛ Ghɛŋ nadi ɛ́ tɔ lɛ.
Zakali, sɛɛg mɔn nabɛ ɛ́, nyɛ eelwood nɛ Sisim na Dɛɛ. Wɔ gwaa, nyɛ zokani egoola mɛkpa mɛ Zɛɛb tɔ Sisim. Nyɛ nadi ekeke ɛ́ náá:
«Mena goka ɛ́ nɛ ɛsɛɛ Ghɛŋ Zɛɛb bot ɛ Yisalaɛl mɛtel. Etɛɛ náá, nyɛ eezɛkwyee bot ɛ mbyak'ɛ, nyɛ eepɛk bɛ.
Nyɛ eewyisal mena ghɛŋ mot, mɛtsik-bot, pɛ tɔ bɛdha ɛ mɛkoozi Dhavid mot-mɛsa mɛ.
Ye ɛ́ etɛp ee nyɛ naloozelɛɛ tɔ enuub e bɛngoolel ɛ mɛkpa mɛ na edɛɛ ɛ.
Nyɛ naakɛk mena tsik di epɛk mena é mɛmbɔ mɛ bot ɛ mɛbhuka mena ɛ, dɔɔ nɛ si mɛko mɛ bot ɛ di esa mena ɛbiyo ɔ.
Nyɛ naagék ghoŋ nɛ bɛbhaab benaka. Nyɛ nabɛ ɛ́ ààdjisa ɛbhɛŋ ɛ lɛ na dɛɛ nyɛ nalik ɛ.
Nɛ tsɛɛtsɛ ye nabɛ ɛ́, Zɛɛb eetuwal myoŋ nɛ mɛsoŋ mɛ é mis mɛ bhaab'ena Abalaam náá,
nyɛ waazɛpɛk mena é mɛmbɔ mɛ bot ɛ mɛbhuka mena. Étɛp mena neesaka mɛsa mɛ, ààbɛ nɛ bwoo tɔ ebhum elyem bena.
Etɛɛ náá, mena needika dɛɛ nɛ piki é mis mɛ, é mɛlu mɛ tsik'ena djas.
Deenek, wɔy mɔn'am, wɔ aadi ɛ́, ngoolel-mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb-Mɛkaake. Etɛɛ náá, wɔy ɛ́ kwaakɛ sok bhwoob ɛ Ghɛŋ étɛp wɔ neekoobal mɛze mɛ.
Etɛp wɔ neelɛɛ bot bɛ náá, nyɛ ɛpezyɛ zɛtsik bɛ, da pel mesyem mɔɔ.
Tsɛɛtsɛ, Zɛɛb'enabɛlka nɛ bu enɛm esa, nɛ kwyɛl. Dusa tɔ gwoo, nyɛ eewyisal kɔ lena gwyɛ tyee wat nɛ mɛkas mɛ gwyes di edjem tɔ mɛlem ɛ.
Etɛɛ náá, nyɛ neewyisal bot ɛ di tɔ ghooghom, nɛ tɔ piyo ɛsyee ɔ, tɔ gwyɛ. Nyɛ needjɛɛd mɛko mɛ kyeed mena pɛ ze egwyem.»
Dáa mɔn nadi ewyee ɛ, sisim yɛ nabaadi ewyee ɛbuɛpe. Nyɛ nadidi ɛ́, tɔ kyee dik bɛsyɛ di ààbɛ nɛ mɛdii ɛ, kɛkum dwoo nyɛ nazɛlyaal bot ɛ Yisalaɛl nyel ɛ.
É ghɛŋ tak, wɔ gwaa, Sezaad Oghust zokazɛlwom bot, bɛ kwyal min mɛ mɛtaŋ mɛ bot ɛ bɔs djas.
Ɛkɛn ɛ ɛlɛɛga nɛ ɛkwyal ɛ min mɛ bot nasael ɛ́ é ghɛŋ Kilinus nadi kukuma dik Siili ɛ.
Bot djas nadi etɔ́ kɛkwyekwyalaa min ɛ mot nɛ mot pɛ dɛl ɛ lɛ.
Zozɛf zokadus pɛ kyee dik Ghalile, pɛ ghaada Nazalɛt, nyɛ neezɛtɔ́ pɛ kyee dik Yude, pɛ dɛl ɛ Bheteleɛm, etɛɛ náá, nyɛ nabɛ ɛ́ dha ɛ Dhavid.
Nyɛ ɛ́ bootɔ́ pɛ ɛlɛɛga nɛ ekwyala e min bɛ nɛ ghɔɔd'ɛ Maali. Maali nadi ɛ́ nɛ ɛbum.
Dáa bɛ nakadi tin ɛ, wɔ gwaa, ɛwala ɛ nabɛ náá, Maali ɛ́ waasyas ɛ zokazɛkum.
Nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛbya mɔn mɛgwyak mɛ. Tin, nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛbet nyɛ ɛghɔɔd, pil nyɛ tɔ bhelangiti, bhii tak nyɛ eezɛkɛl nyɛ kɔ mɔɔ tɛɛg bɛ nadi ekekɛl edee e ebhata ɛ, etɛɛ náá, bɛ nabɛ ɛ́ ààbela di tɔ ndjaa bɛdjoŋ.
É kyee dik tak wat, ye nabɛ ɛ́ nɛ bɛbaalel ɛ ebhata, bɛ nadi ɛ́ tɔ bal ebaal ɛsaŋ ɛ ebhata bɔɔ é pum.
Wɔ gwaa, fofop ɛ Ghɛŋ zɛtuula bɛ. Mɛkas ɛ Ghɛŋ naazɛkaal bɛ «bwyeee». Wɔ gwaa, bwoo zɛsa bɛ ɛbuɛpe.
Tinaak, fofop eezɛlɛɛ bɛ náá: «Nàbemka ba, etɛɛ náá, mɛ zyɛ ɛ́, zɛgoola bin mbɛɛ bhaadal, yii bot djas aamyaala nɛ yɛ ɛ.
É pum'ak mos, kɔ dɛl ɛ Dhavid, mɛtsik-bot eezebyel étɛp'en. Ye ɛ́ Mɛsia, Ghɛŋ.
Beeka geka bi aagwyak nyɛ nɛ yɛ ɛ: bi ɛ́ waabela mɔn tɔlɔɔ wola tɔ bhelangiti, ndjaasi kɔ mɔɔ tɛɛg bɛ di ekɛl edee e ebhata ɛ.»
É di'enek wat, wɔ gwaa, bɛtɛ nɛ efofop zokadus tɔ gwoo, zɛsɛɛga nɛ fofop nadi tinaak sok ɔ, bɛ moo tin eduwal Zɛɛb, bɔɔ náá:
«Duu nɛ Zɛɛb pɛ ɛko tɔ gwoo, tin, egwyem kɔ bɔs dum nɛ bot ɛ nyɛ di ekwyɛl ɔ!»
Dáa efofop nalik bɛ, sik pɛ tɔ gwoo ɛ, bɛbaalel ɛ mɛsaa mɛ ebhata zokazɛke pak'ɔɔ náá: «Djhootɔ́ka pɛ Bheteleɛm. Ye goka ɛ́ náá, mena beeka sa tuula penek ɛ, sa Ghɛŋ lyaal menaka ɛ.»
Bɛ eezɛghɛɛ mɛnyel tɔ́, tin, bɛ eezɛbela Maali bɛ nɛ Zozɛf, dɔɔ nɛ mɔn tɔlɔɔ ndjaasi kɔ mɔɔ tɛɛg bɛ nadi ekekɛl edee e ebhata ɛ.
Dáa bɛ nakabee nyɛ ɛ́, wɔ gwaa, bɛ zɛlɛɛ etɛp ee fofop'enɔk nalɛɛ bɛ dum nɛ mɔn tak ɛ.
É ghɛŋ bot djas nadi egwak mbi etɛp ee bɛbaalel ɛ mɛsaa mɛ ebhata binek nadi elɛɛ ɛ, bot djas naadyeebadjoka.
Yɛ kabɛ Maali ɔ, nyɛ nazobaal etɛp binek djas ɛ́ tɔ bum lyem'ɛ. Tin, nyɛ moo esiiza ɛbuɛpe.
Bhii tak, bɛbaalel ɛ mɛsaa mɛ ebhata ɛ́ boozɛsik. Bɛ nadi eduwal Zɛɛb, étɛp endem ee bɛ nazebee ɛ, nɛ yii bɛ nazegwak ɛ, nɛ etɛp ee efofop nalɛɛ, nabatasael ɛ.
Bhii mɛlu mɛtɛn nɛ elɛl mɔn nabyel ɛ, wɔ gwaa, bɛ zɛtɔ́, kɛniigal nyɛ beka, tin, bɛ eezɛget nyɛ din ɛ Yezu, din ɛ fofop nalɛɛ bɛ, ɛsok nɛ nyɛɛg nɛ bela ɛbum ɛ.
Tin, ɛwala ɛ nabɛ náá, Zozɛf bɛ nɛ Maali kɛsa mɛzel mɛ etsi ɛ Moiiz nadi elɛɛ étɛp ɛbyel ɛ mɔn ɛ, yɛ eezɛdjala. Wɔ gwaa, bɛ zɛtɔ́ nɛ mɔn pɛ kok Ndjaa-ebuwa Yeluzalɛm étɛp ɛkɛlyaal Ghɛŋ mɔn.
Etɛɛ náá, tɔ etsi ɛ Ghɛŋ, ye nabɛ ɛ́, yɛ eekwyalaa náá: «Mɔn motom, yii mɛgwyak aabyel ɔ, nyɛ aadi ɛ́ ngbɛ Ghɛŋ.»
Bɛ nabaadi ɛ́, edjɛ dɔɔ nɛ dhiiti buwa yii etsi e tak wat di edji ɛ. Ye nabɛ ɛ́: «Mɛpepak mɛmbá, nɛghu bɔɔ mɛgum mɛmbá.»
Pɛ Yeluzalɛm, ye nadi ɛ́, nɛ dhiiti mot, din ɛ lɛ nabɛ ɛ́ Simɛyɔŋ. Nyɛ nadi ɛ́, mot epiki, eduwal Zɛɛb. Nyɛ nadi ebwood mot aazɛtsik Yisalaɛl ɔ. Sisim na Dɛɛ nadi ɛ́ nɛ nɛ lɔɔg.
Sisim na Dɛɛ naaloolɛɛ nyɛ náá, ɛsok nɛ nyɛ nɛ gwyɛ, nyɛ waabee Mɛsia Ghɛŋ aadhis ɔ.
Wɔ gwaa, Sisim na Dɛɛ zɛdul Simeyɔŋ, nyɛ tɔ́ pɛ kok Ndjaa-ebuwa. Bɛbyael ɛ Yezu naazyɛ nɛ mɔn'ɔɔ étɛp ɛzɛsa nyɛ dáa mɛkpa mɛ etsi di elɛɛ ɛ.
Simeyɔŋ ɛ́ boobɛp mɔn tɔ mɛmbɔ mɛ. Bhii tak, nyɛ eezɛghaapɛɛ Zɛɛb. Nyɛy náá:
«Nenak, Ghɛŋ, beta kwom'ɔ nyɛ gwyɛ tɔ egwyem, tyee wɔ nalɛɛ nyɛ ɛ.
Etɛɛ náá, mis mam eezebee tsik wɔ nadhis bis yɛ ɛ,
tsik wɔ nazekoobal étɛp membyak djas ɛ.
Ye ɛ́ ngel aasa náá, membyak mesis gu wɔ ɛ. Ye ɛ́ duu bot ɛ mbyak'ɔ, Yisalaɛl.»
Sɛɛg nɛ nyɛɛg ɛ Yezu nabɛ ɛ́, edjoka dáa Simeyɔŋ nadi elii dum nɛ mɔn'ɔɔ ɛ.
Simɛyɔŋ ɛ́ boozɛsɛɛ bɛ mɛtel, nyɛ nɛ Maali nyɛɛg náá: «Zɛɛb dhis mɔn'ak ɛ, étɛp ɛkwyesal bot ɛbuɛpe nɛ ɛwyɛl bot ɛbuɛpe pɛ kɔ Yisalaɛl. Nyɛ aadi ɛ́, ndem ngɔt ɛ Zɛɛb. Bot ɛbuɛpe ɛ́ waasyaala bhyeed kɔ lo'ɛ.
Tin, nyɛ waalyaal popoopwon egeka ee di esyela tɔ ebhum elyem e bot ɛbuɛpe ɛ. Yɛ kabɛ wɔy Maali ɔ, mezuk ɛ waatuu wɔ lyem dáa pɛl, kɛtuula pɛ yii kyee.»
Ye nabaabɛ ɛ́ nɛ dhiiti ngoolel-mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb. Din ɛ lɛ nabɛ ɛ́ An. Nyɛ nabɛ ɛ́ ɛsyes ɛ Fanuɛl, mot mbyak ɛ Asɛɛd. Nyɛ nabɛ ɛ́, nyɛ eezedyeebageeb. Nyɛ nabɛ ɛ́, nyɛ naadi membu metɛn nɛ ebá, bɛ nɛ ngom naba nyɛ, nyɛ dinaa ààgu botom ɔ.
Bhis ɛsyee ɛ ngom, nyɛ nabɛ ɛ́ ààkabaatɔ́ ɛba, kɛkum membu mɛkam-mɛtɛn nɛ elɛl nɛ membu mená (84). Nyɛ nabɛ ɛ́ ààdus tɔ kok Ndjaa-ebuwa. Nyɛ nadidi ɛ́, esa mɛsa mɛ Zɛɛb mwos nɛ pum, nɛ ɛtsi ɛ edee tɔ mendjaala.
Wɔ gwaa, nyɛ zɛtuula dwoo tak wat, nyɛ moo tin eduwal Zɛɛb, bhii tak nyɛ moo elii nɛ bot ɛ nadi ebwood náá, Yeluzalɛm zɛpɛkel é ban ɔ, dum nɛ mɔn tɔlɔɔ.
Dáa sɛɛg nɛ nyɛɛg ɛ Yezu nasilal ɛsa esesɛɛ djas etsi ɛ Ghɛŋ nadi elɛɛ ɛ, bɛ eezɛsik nɛ nɛ pɛ kyee dik Ghalile pɛ dɛl ɛ lɔɔ Nazalɛt.
Tin, ye nabɛ ɛ́ mɔn eewyee nɛ ɛbɛɛ ɛ mis, Zɛɛb naawa tɔ lɛ etsoŋ nɛ enɛm nɛ embɛɛ bɛ.
Membu djas bɛbyael ɛ Yezu nabɛ ɛ́, etetɔ́ pɛ Yeluzalɛm étɛp ɛkɛbɔl ɛbyoŋ ɛ Pak.
Dáa Yezu nabɛ nyɛ moo nɛ membu kam nɛ ebá ɛ, bɛ ɛ́ boozɛtɔ́ nɛ nɛ, dáa ye nadi ezezyɛ nɛ ɛsesɛɛ tɔ mɛfulu mɔɔ ɛ.
Dáa ɛbyoŋ nasi ɛ, bɛ eezɛsik. Ghuna mɔn'ɔɔ Yezu naalik pɛ Yeluzalɛm, tinaak, bɛbyael ɛ Yezu ààgu.
Bɔɔ nadi egek ɛ náá, nyɛ ɛ́ bɛ nɛ bɛdhiiti bot tɔ zukamwaa nɛ bot ɛ nadi ekɛ lɔɔg wat bɛ nɛ bɛ nɔɔ ɔ. Tin, bɔɔ zokakɛ muu dwoo. Wɔ gwaa, bɛ zɛkan ɛsaŋ ɛ nyɛ pak bɔn nyɛɛg bɔɔ, nɛ bɛsɔ bɔɔ bot ɛ nadi é ɛbyoŋ bɛ nɛ bɛ nɔɔ ɔ.
Bɔɔ ààbela nyɛ ɛ yenek. Bɛ ɛ́ boozɛsik pɛ Yeluzalɛm esaa nyɛ.
Tin, kuma ye nakum mɛlu mɛlɛl bɔɔ esaa nyɛ ɛ, wɔ gwaa, bɛ zɛbela nyɛ tɔ kok Ndjaa-ebuwa. Nyɛ nadi ɛ́, ndiindil, bɛlyoel eewa nyɛ kuku ɛbwak, nyɛy egwak bɛ, nɛ ɛbaadji bɛ ekiya.
Bot djas nadi egwak nyɛ ɔ, bɛ nadi edjoka ɛbuɛpe nɛ kwaambi etsoŋ nyɛ nadi nɛ yɛ ɛ, nɛ dáa nyɛ nadi ebɔɔza ekiya bɔɔ ɛ.
Dáa sɛɛg nɛ nyɛɛg nabee nyɛ ɛ, wɔ gwaa bɛ zɛdjoka ɛbuɛpe. Nyɛɛg ɛ́ boozɛke nɛ nɛ náá: «Mɔn'am, étɛp yé wɔ sa bis deenek? Bhum elyem e bis nɛ soog di ɛ́ pɛ ɛko. Bis eesaa wɔ, saa saa.»
Nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛbɔɔza nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Bi saa mɛ étɛp yé? Bi ààgu náá, mɛ ɛ́ tɔ ndjaa saag'am, étɛp ɛsa mɛsa mɛ?»
Kabela náá, bɛ nabɛ ɛ́ ààmɛt ɛsuk ɛ sa nyɛ nadi elii ɛ.
Bhii tak, bɛ eezɛsik nɛ nɛ pɛ Nazalɛt. Nyɛ nadi elooba nɛ nyɛɛg nɛ sɛɛg. Tin, nyɛɛg zokabaal etɛp binek djas tɔ lyem'ɛ.
Yezu moo tin ewyee nɛ tyɛ, nɛ etsoŋ, nɛ enɛm nɛ embɛɛ é mis mɛ Zɛɛb nɛ é mis mɛ bot.
Ye nabɛ ɛ́, é sok Sezaad Tibɛɛd nadi, nyɛ moo nɛ membu kam nɛ etɛn kɔ bóó ekukuma dik'ɛ ɛ, Pɔɔs Pilat nadi ɛ́ kukuma Yude, Elood kadi ɛ́ ekɔk kɔ Ghalile. Yɛ kabɛ mɔn nyɛɛg Filip ɔ, nyɛ nadi ɛ́ kukuma kyee dik Ituud, nɛ Talakonitid. Lizanyas nakabɛ yɛ ɛ kukuma kyee dik Abilɛn.
É ghɛŋ Anas nɛ Kayif nadi eboo bɛghaa-Zɛɛb ɛ, ye nabɛ ɛ́ Zɛɛb naalii nɛ Zaŋ mɔn Zakali pɛ tɔ bal.
Zaŋ zokazyɛ kɔ mɛl mɛ nadi pɛ kyee dik wat nɛ dii Yuldɛn ɛ. Nyɛ natutuud ɛ́ náá: «Liigka elyem, da bi ɛ́ kɛduwa Zɛɛb. Tin, Zɛɛb ɛ́ waapel mesyem men.»
É di'enek, etɛp ee nadi kwyala tɔ Mɛkana mɛ ngoolel-mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb Ezayi ɛ, ye naabela ɛsuk. Ye nabɛ ɛ́ náá: «Mot ngɔt ɛpetuud tɔ bal: “Koobalka ze ɛ Ghɛŋ, da bi ɛ́ tuu nyɛ mɛze mɛ na looba-looba!
Edi e na sɛbɛtɛɛ di pak mɛtsok djas ɛ, yɛ waabimelaa. Mɛtsok nɛ eghooda djas ɛ́ waasilaa. Memboŋ djas di é ze ɛ, yɛ waasekaa. Mɛze mɛ di, yɛ eezepulel ɛ, yɛ waakoobelaa.
Tin, bot djas ɛ́ waabee tsik Zɛɛb aadjɛ ɛ.”»
Mɛdhuu mɛ bot nadi ezyɛ pɛ daa Zaŋ etɛɛ náá, Zaŋ neezɛduu bɛ Zɛɛb. Zaŋ zokake nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Biyɔ mɛgel mak, ɛzɛ lyo bin náá, bi kaab ɛbuk ɛ Zɛɛb di ekunaa yenek?
Lyaalka nɛ esesɛɛ bin náá, ye ɛ́ tsɛɛtsɛ náá, bi eezeswoola etsik bin, da bi ɛ́ bet ɛke biyɔ nɛ biyɔ náá: “Dhiiti sonok aanàkwaasa mena, etɛɛ náá, Abalaam ɛ́ bhaab'enaka.” Betka mɛ lɛɛ bin náá, Zɛɛb ɛ́ nɛ ghwyil ɛsa náá, mɛkok mak liiza, ye di bɛdha ɛ Abalaam.
Ye goka ɛ́ bi ɛ́ gu náá, zoŋ moo ɛ́ nɛɛga é ɛbok ɛ le, étɛp ye neetsaal ekaŋal e tak. Ele djas aadi ààdjɛ bhum ɛ, goka ɛ́ nɛ ɛtsaalaa. Bhii tak, yɛ waakɛdikaa tɔ du.»
Wɔ gwaa bot moo tin edji nyɛ náá: «Bis goka nɛ ɛsa dáa?»
Nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛbɔɔza nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Mot di nɛ ekuwa ebá ɔ, goka ɛ́ nɛ ɛgwyena wat, djɛ mot di ààbɛ nɛ yɛ ɔ. Bela náá, mot di nɛ edee e dek ɔ, nyɛ kaa nɛ bot ɛ́ di ààbɛ nɛ yɛ ɔ.»
Bɛnɔŋel ɛ epata e lapo zokabaazyɛ yɔbɔ zɛduwa Zɛɛb. Wɔ gwaa bɛ dji Zaŋ Nduuel-bot náá: «Lyoel, bis goka nɛ ɛsa dáa?»
Nyɛ eezɛbɔɔza nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Nàwaabka bot epata e lapo dhaa yii kukuma di elɛɛ náá, bi goka nɛ ɛwaab ɛ.»
Esodja zokabaadji yɔbɔ náá: «Yɛ kabɛ bis ɔ, bis goka nɛ ɛsa dáa?» Nyɛ eezɛbɔɔza nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Sa mot ààbaanɔɔ sa mot nɛ bhel, sa mot ààsu mot tɛp. Bi goka ɛ́ nɛ ɛdɛ ɛ efute e mɛsa min.»
Bot djas nadi ebwood nɛ ɛbwaalel djas. Bot djas nagek ɛ́ náá, Zaŋ nabɛ ɛ́ Mɛsia.
Nyɛ eezɛke nɛ bɔɔ djas náá: «Mam duu bin Zɛɛb ɛ́ tɔ mɛdii. Yɛ kabɛ mot di ezyɛ bhis'am ɔ, nyɛ eedhaa mɛ nɛ mɛbwala nɛ ghwyil. Mam aanàkwaakobela-belak duu ɛmalal étɛp ɛkotii-tiiak ekel e ekoko bɛ. Nyɛy aaduu bin Zɛɛb ɛ́ tɔ ghwyil Sisim na Dɛɛ nɛ tɔ du.
Tɔ mɛmbɔ mɛ, nyɛ eemɛt zyaagal étɛp nyɛ neewa mbɛk pak mbee bhum nɛ mbɛɛ bhum. Tin, da nyɛ ɛ́ wa mbɛɛ bhum kɔ taa. Yɛ kabɛ embee bhum ɔ, nyɛ kakɛmwas yɛ ɛ tɔ du na kɔm-kɔm.»
Zaŋ naalelɛɛ bot Mbɛɛ Bhaadal nɛ bɛtɛ nɛ dhiiti bɛmɛlyo. Nyɛ nadi elyo bɛ nɛ ɛdjɛ bɛ ghwyil.
Wɔ gwaa, Zaŋ zokazɛdul mɛkoozi Elood mɛlɔ kɔ ɛsu ɛ Helodhiaad mwaa mɔn nyɛɛg nyɛ nadɛk ɔ, dɔɔ nɛ étɛp embee esesɛɛ nyɛ nadi esa ɛ djas.
Tin, Elood naabaazɛsa dhiiti mbee tɛp: nyɛ naawa Zaŋ é mbok.
Bhii bot djas nazeduwa Zɛɛb ɛ, Yezu pe naazɛduwa Zɛɛb. Nyɛ nadi edjaala, wɔ gwaa gwoo zɛbɛŋel.
Bhii tak, Sisim na Dɛɛ eezɛsul kɔ lɛ tyee ɛghum. Wɔ gwaa, dhiiti gwood zokazɛgék tɔ gwoo náá: «Wɔ ɛ́ mɔn'am mɛ dyeebakwyɛl ɔ. Mɛ eedyeebamyaala nɛ nɔ ɛbuɛpe.»
Yezu nabɛ ɛ́, nyɛ moo nɛ membu tyee mɛkam-mɛlɛl é sok nyɛ nakan mɛsa mɛ ɛ, nɛ dáa bot nadi eke náá, nyɛ ɛ́ mɔn Zozɛf ɛ. Zozɛf nadi ɛ́ mɔn Eli.
Eli ɛ́ mɔn Mattat, Mattat nakadi ɛ́ mɔn Levi. Levi nabɛ ɛ́ mɔn Mɛlki, Mɛlki nakadi ɛ́ mɔn Zanayi, Zanayi nabɛ ɛ́ mɔn Zozɛf.
Zozɛf nakadi ɛ́ mɔn Mattatya, Mattatya nabɛ ɛ́ mɔn Amɔs. Amɔs ɛ́ mɔn Nawum. Sɛɛg ɛ Nahum nabɛ ɛ́ Esli, Esli ɛ́ mɔn Naghayi.
Naghayi nabɛ ɛ́ mɔn Maat. Mot nabya Maat ɔ nabɛ ɛ́ Matatyas. Matatyas nabɛ ɛ́ mɔn Semeyi. Mot nabya Semeyi ɔ, nabɛ ɛ́ Yosɛk. Yosɛk nabɛ ɛ́ mɔn Yoda.
Yoda nakadi ɛ́ mɔn Yoanan. Sɛɛg ɛ Yoanan nabɛ ɛ́ Lesa. Lesa nadi ɛ́ mɔn Zolobabɛl, Zolobabɛl nakadi ɛ́ mɔn Salatyɛl, Salatyɛl nabɛ ɛ́ mɔn Neeli.
Neeli nakadi ɛ́ mɔn Mɛlki, Mɛlki nadi ɛ́ mɔn Adhi, Adhi nakadi ɛ́ mɔn Kosam, Kosam nadi ɛ́ mɔn Elmadham. Elmadham nakadi ɛ́ mɔn Eed.
Mot nabya Eed ɔ, nabɛ ɛ́ Zosue, Zosue nabɛ ɛ́ mɔn Eliezɛɛd, Eliezɛɛd kadi ɛ́ mɔn Yolim, Yolim nabɛ ɛ́ mɔn Matat. Matat kadi ɛ́ mɔn Levi.
Levi nabɛ ɛ́ mɔn Simeyɔŋ, Simeyɔŋ kadi ɛ́ mɔn Yuda. Yuda nabɛ ɛ́ mɔn Zozɛf, Zozɛf kadi ɛ́ mɔn Yonam, Yonam nabɛ ɛ́ mɔn Eliakim.
Eliakim nakadi ɛ́ mɔn Melea, Melea nabɛ ɛ́ mɔn Mena, Mena nakadi ɛ́ mɔn Matata. Sɛɛg ɛ Matata nabɛ ɛ́ Natan, Natan kadi ɛ́ mɔn Dhavid.
Dhavid nabɛ ɛ́ mɔn Yese, Yese kadi ɛ́ mɔn Obɛɛd. Obɛɛd nabɛ ɛ́ mɔn Bhooz, Bhooz kadi ɛ́ mɔn Sala. Sala nabɛ ɛ́ mɔn Naasɔn.
Naasɔn kadi ɛ́ mɔn Aminadaab, Aminadaab nabɛ ɛ́ mɔn Almin, Almin kadi ɛ́ mɔn Aalni. Aalni nabɛ ɛ́ mɔn Ɛslɔn, Ɛslɔn kadi ɛ́ mɔn Pelɛɛz, Pelɛɛz nabɛ ɛ́ mɔn Yuda.
Yuda nabɛ ɛ́ mɔn Zakɔɔb, Zakɔɔb nakadi ɛ́ mɔn Izak. Izak nabɛ ɛ́ mɔn Abalaam. Sɛɛg ɛ Abalaam nabɛ ɛ́ Teela, Teela nabɛ ɛ́ mɔn Nakɔɔd.
Nakɔɔd nabɛ ɛ́ mɔn Seluug, Seluug nabɛ ɛ́ mɔn Lewu, Lewu kadi ɛ́ mɔn Pelɛɛg. Pelɛɛg nabɛ ɛ́ mɔn Ebɛɛd, Ebɛɛb nabɛ ɛ́ mɔn Sala.
Sala nabɛ ɛ́ mɔn Kenan, Kenan nabɛ ɛ́ mɔn Alpaksaad, Alpaksaad ɛ́ mɔn Sɛm, Sɛm ɛ́ mɔn Noe, Noe ɛ́ mɔn Lemɛk.
Lemɛk nabɛ ɛ́ mɔn Matusalɛm, Matusalɛm nabɛ ɛ́ mɔn Enɔk. Enɔk ɛ́ mɔn Yelɛɛd, Yelɛɛd nabɛ ɛ́ mɔn Malaleɛl. Malaleɛl nabɛ ɛ́ mɔn Kenan.
Tin, Kenan nabɛ ɛ́ mɔn Enɔs, Enɔs nakadi ɛ́ mɔn Sɛt. Sɛt kadi ɛ́ mɔn Adam, Adam ɛ́ mɔn Zɛɛb.
Dáa Yezu nabula pɛ dii Yuldɛn ɛ, ye nabɛ ɛ́ Sisim na Dɛɛ moo tɔ lɛ na «tɔɔɔ», Sisim zɛdul nyɛ tɔ bal,
é di Dim mot mɛkɔŋ nakɛwa nyɛ tɔ mɛbhowal ɔ. Ye nabɛ ɛ́, nyɛ naasa mɛlu mɛkam-mɛná ààdɛ edee. Bhii tak za zokazɛsa nyɛ.
Dim mot mɛkɔŋ eezɛke nɛ nɛ náá: «Nɛghu wɔ ɛ́ Mɔn Zɛɛb ɔɔ, kea nɛ ɛkok ɛlak náá, ye liigel, da yɛ ɛ́ di mapa.»
Yezu eezɛbɔɔza nɛ nɛ náá: «Ekwyala ɛ Zɛɛb lɛɛ náá: “Tsik mot tok nɛ mapa toto.”»
Bhii tak, dim mot mɛkɔŋ eezɛbyet nɛ nɛ kɔ dwol, wɔ gwaa nyɛ lyaal nyɛ tɔ ɛwala ɛwat mɛyoŋ mɛ di kɔ bɔs ɛ, djas.
Satan nɛ nɛ náá: «Gwyáka, mɛ waadjɛ wɔ eghɛŋ nɛ mɛkas mɛ di tɔ mɛyoŋ mak ɛ djas. Etɛɛ náá, ye naazedjɛaa mɛ. Mɛ ɛ́ nɛ ghwyil ɛdjɛ nɛ mot mɛ aakwos ɛdjɛ ɔ.
Yɛ bɛ náá, wɔ eemyaal ɛkwyit mɛboŋ mɔ si mɛko mam ɔ, mɛ waadjɛ wɔ djas.»
Yezu eezɛbɔɔza nɛ nɛ náá: «Ekwyala lɛɛ ɛ́ náá: “Ye ɛ́ Ghɛŋ, Zɛɛb'ɔ ɛ́ wɔ di egoka nɛ ɛduwal. Wɔ zosa ɛ mɛsa mɛ nyɛy nyɛ ɛmet.”»
Bhii tak, Dim mot mɛkɔŋ eebaazɛtɔ́ nɛ nɛ pɛ Yeluzalɛm, zɛgel nyɛ kɔ ɛko ɛ kok Ndjaa-ebuwa. Nyɛy nɛ Yezu náá: «Yɛ bɛ náá, wɔ ɛ́ Sɛɛŋɛlɛ Mɔn Zɛɛb ɔɔ, tsela, da wɔ ɛ́ kɛduma pɛ si.
Deenek, etɛɛ náá, ekwyala lɛɛ ɛ náá: “Zɛɛb ɛ́ waalɛɛ nɛ efofop bɛ náá, bɛ baal wɔ.”
Tin, baabela náá: “Bɛ waabɛp wɔ kɔ mɛmbɔ mɔɔ, é kaab náá, ko'ɔ ɛzɛkɛbema ɛbɛk.”»
Tin, Yezu eezɛbɔɔza nɛ nɛ náá: «Ekwyala baalɛɛ ɛ́ náá: “Sa wɔ ààwa Ghɛŋ, Zɛɛb'ɔ tɔ mɛbhowal.”»
Bhii nyɛ nazewa Yezu tɔ mɛbhowal dáa nyɛ nakwyɛl ɛ, Dim mot mɛkɔŋ eezɛbet nyɛ, nyɛ tɔ́ ɛtsetaɛpe, kɛkum é dhiiti ɛwala aanyɔ nɛ nɛ ɛ.
Yezu eezɛsik pɛ Ghalile, ghwyil Sisim na Dɛɛ tɔ lɛ «tɔɔɔ». Duma yɛ zokakɛ kɔ mɛl mɛ nadi mbaka-mbaka nɛ tin ɛ djas.
Tin, Yezu moo tin elyo bot mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb tɔ mendjaa mɛ mendjaala mɛ eYuda. Bot ɛ nadi egwak nyɛ ɔ, naadyeebaduduwal nyɛ.
Dhiiti dwoo Yezu zɛtɔ́ pɛ Nazalɛt, é di nyɛ nawyelaa ɔ. É dwoo saba, nyɛ eezɛni tɔ ndjaa mendjaala mɛ eYuda dáa nyɛ natawa nɛ ɛsesa ɛ. Nyɛ ɛ́ boowyɛl é mis mɛ bot étɛp ɛlaŋ ɛ ekwyala ɛ Zɛɛb.
Bhii tak náá, bɛ eezɛdjɛ nyɛ mbwoob mɛkana mɛ ngoolel-mɛkpa Ezayi, nyɛ eezɛwyiiz mɛkana mɛ tak. Nyɛ kabela é di nakwyalaa náá:
«Sisim ɛ Ghɛŋ ɛ́ nɛ nam etɛɛ náá, nyɛ naadjɛ mɛ ebotan, étɛp mɛ neezɛtuud bɛdjel ɛ bot mbɛɛ bhaadal. Nyɛ naadhis mɛ, mɛ zɛlɛɛ bot ɛ membok náá, bɛ moo ɛ́ tiia. Mɛ zɛlɛɛ bɛ na edhim náá, bɛ moo zɛnyaa sok. Mɛ zɛlɛɛ bot ɛ́ di nyalaa ɔ, bɛ neepɛka.
Mɛ zɛtuud náá, mena moo ɛ́, é mɛwala mɛ Ghɛŋ di zɛtsik bot bɛ ɛ.»
Bhii tak, Yezu eezɛwol mɛkana, zɛdjɛ nɛ mot nakwokwom mbwoob mɛkana mɛ tak ɔ, nyɛ eezɛnɔɔ nyel, disi. Bot djas nadi tɔ ndjaa mendjaala mɛ eYuda ɔ, moo tin «dhuuu», nɛ mis é nyel'ɛ.
É di'enek, nyɛ boozɛlɛɛ bɛ náá: «Mos ekwyala ee bi zegwak ɛ, eedjala.»
Bɔɔ djas nadi etaŋal étɛp'ɛ, bɛ nadi edjoka mbɛɛ etɛp ee nyɛ nadi elɛɛ bɛ ɛ. Bɛ zokazɛdji náá: «Ye tok mɔn Zozɛf'aak é?»
Tin, Yezu eezɛke nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Tsɛɛtsɛ náá, bi ɛ́ waadjɛ kana yak: “Ngwomel bot, tsika nyel'ɔ wɔy wɔ ɛ́ ɛmet.” Bi ɛ́ waabaake nɛ nam náá: “Bis eegwak menduk mɛ mɛsa mɛ wɔ nasa pɛ dɛl ɛ Kapɛlnaum ɛ. Baasa esa e tak wak kɔ ghaada yɔ met!”»
Bhii tak nyɛ eezɛbaabil náá: «Nɛ tsɛɛtsɛ, mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ́ náá, ye tok nɛ dhiiti ngoolel-mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb ààmyaalaa kɔ dɛl ɛ lɛ met.
Tsɛɛtsɛ, mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ náá: É ghɛŋ ɛ ngoolel-mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb Eli, ye nabɛ ɛ́ nɛ bɛtɛ nɛ bɛkus ɛ boa tɔ Yisalaɛl, é sok ye nasa membu melɛl nɛ pes, bhi àànee ɛ, é sok boo pwom nasa kɔ dɛl djas ɛ.
Zɛbela náá, Zɛɛb nabɛ ɛ́ ààkyeed Eli pɛ daa kus moma dik'ena. Nyɛ nazokyeed nyɛ ɛ́ pɛ daa dhiiti kus moma, nadidi pɛ dɛl ɛ Salepta ɔ, pɛ kyee dik Sidɔn.
Ye nabaabɛ pe ɛ́, nɛ bot ɛ nadi nɛ ɛbɛ́ ɛ zezam ɔ, ɛbuɛpe tɔ Yisalaɛl é ghɛŋ ɛ ngoolel-mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb Eliize. Zɛbela náá, ye nabɛ ààbɛ nɛ mot ngɔt tɔ sama yɔɔ natsak, bhis Naaman, mot kyee dik Siili nyɛ ɛmet.»
Tin, wɔ gwaa ɛbuk zɛmɛt bɔɔ djas tɔ ndjaa mendjaala mɛ eYuda, bhii bɛ nazegwak deenek ɛ.
Wɔ gwaa bɛ zɛwyɛl, bhii tak bɛ eezɛwyis tɔ́ nɛ Yezu edi sis ààbɛ kɔ dɛl, pɛ kɔ nges boo ɛtsok ɛ Nazalɛt nasumaa kɔ tak ɛ, étɛp bɛ neekɛ zyeegal nyɛ, nyɛ neeges tɔ toŋ.
Tin, Yezu zokazɛsyela tɔ lɔɔ, nɔɔ nyel'ɛ, tɔ́ yɛ.
Dhiiti dwoo, Yezu naatɔ́ pɛ Kapɛlnaum, dɛl ɛ Ghalile. Nyɛy é lelyo bot mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb, dwoo saba.
Bot naadyeebadjodjoka dáa nyɛ nadi elelyo ɛ, etɛɛ náá, nyɛ nalelyo ɛ́ nɛ eghɛŋ.
Tɔ ndjaa mendjaala mɛ eYuda nadi ɛ́ nɛ dhiiti mot nadi nɛ mbee sisim nadi edhedhek ɔ. Mot'enɔk moo zɛtsim ɛlyelɛpe.
Nyɛy náá: «Haa! Mena ɛ́ nɛ yaa tɛp, Yezu, mot Nazalɛt? Wɔ zyɛ, zɛtwak bis é? Mɛ nɛ gu náá: Wɔy ɛ́ mot na dɛɛ Zɛɛb nadhis ɔ.»
Yezu eezɛbhɛm nyɛ ɛlyelɛpe. Nyɛy náá: «Dia gwyem, wyisa tɔ nyel mot'ak!» Mbee sisim zɛghɛɛg mot'enɔk si é mis mɛ bot. Bhii tak, nyɛ eezɛwyis tɔ lɛ, ààzuk nyɛ é dhiiti di.
Bot djas naadjoka ɛlyelɛpe, bɛ moo tin elelii pak'ɔɔ náá: «Yak ɛ́ yaa kɔkɔ lii nɛ nwyak mot? Nyɛ ɛ́ nɛ eghɛŋ nɛ ghwyil ɛbatake nɛ embee esisim náá, bɛ wyis, bɔɔ ɛ́ batawyis.»
Wɔ gwaa, dék din ɛ lɛ zɛdjala kɔ kyee dik'enek djas.
Yezu eezɛwyis tɔ ndjaa mendjaala mɛ eYuda, tɔ́ pɛ daa Simɔŋ. Ghuna tsi ɛ Simɔŋ yii moma nadi ɛ́ nɛ mɛkosa ɛkpaŋɛpe. Bɛ eezɛke nɛ Yezu náá, nyɛ sa sonok étɛp'ɛ.
Nyɛ eezɛmalal é ngwoob'ɛ, tinaak nyɛ zɛbhɛm mɛkosa, nyɛ wyis. Wɔ gwaa, mɛkosa zɛwyis tɔ lɛ. E di tak wat, moma yenɔk eezɛwyɛl, nyɛ moo ebe bɛ.
Kasɛka ɛ́, é ɛbil ɛ dwoo ɛ, bot ɛ nadi nɛ membel membi-membi ɔ, naazyɛ nɛ nɔɔ pɛ daa Yezu, nyɛ ɛ́ bookɛl mɛmbɔ kɔ lɔɔ. Bhii tak náá, bɛ eezɛtsak.
Embee esisim nadi ewyis tɔ bɛtɛ nɛ membel, bɔɔ é tsitsim náá: «Wɔ ɛ́ Mɔn ɛ Zɛɛb!» Yezu ɛ́ boozɛlyak bɛ náá, bɛ diyal enuub etɛɛ náá, bɛ nadi egu náá, nyɛy ɛ́ di Mɛsia.
Dáa mɛlem nalem ɛ, Yezu eezɛdus tɔ ghaada tɔ́ pɛ kyee di ààbɛ nɛ bot ɛ. Tin, zukamwaa nɛ mot moo zɛsaa nyɛ, wɔ gwaa, bɛ zokazɛbela nyɛ. Ɛkwosak ɛ lɔɔ nabɛ ɛ́, bɛ nɛ bɛ nɔɔ di é di wat, nyɛ nàkabaalik bɛ.
Nyɛ eezɛke nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Ye goka ɛ́ náá, mɛ tɔ́, kɛgoola mbɛɛ bhaadal dum nɛ Ɛyoŋ ɛ Zɛɛb pɛ bɛdhiiti eghaada esis, etɛɛ náá, mɛ nadhisaa ɛ́, étɛp tak.»
Tin, nyɛ nadi egoola mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb tɔ mendjaa mɛ mendjaala mɛ eYuda kyee dik Yude.
Dhiiti dwoo Yezu nadi ɛ́, é ngwoob boo soob na djato-djato Ghɛnɛɛzalɛt. Tin, bot ɛbuɛpe eezɛsaala nyɛ é nyel pɛ kyee nyɛ nadi ɛ́, étɛp bɛ neezɛgwak mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb.
Nyɛ eezɛbee é ɛboŋ ɛ dii, mɛlɛɛd mɛmbá ye zesɛɛ, bɛlael ɛ mɛwyet naasɛɛ étɛp ɛgwyii mɛwyet mɔɔ.
Nyɛ eezɛni tɔ elɛɛd wat. Yiizaag nabɛ ɛ́ yɛ ɛ́ Simɔŋ. Nyɛ ɛ́ booke nɛ nɔɔ náá, bɛ waatiila batsa nɛ ɛboŋ. Bhii tak nyɛ eezɛnɔɔ nyel, disi. Tin, nyɛ moo zɛlyo bot mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb.
Dáa Yezu nasilal ɛlii ɛ, nyɛ ɛ́ booke nɛ Simɔŋ náá: «Tiila kuku dii, bhii tak, da bi ɛ́ la mɛwyet men.»
Simɔŋ ɛ́ boozɛbɔɔza nɛ nɛ náá: «Ghɛŋ, bis eegɔɔl tu pum'ak djas mos, ààbela sonok. Tin, dum nɛ mɛkpa mɔ, mɛ ɛpela mɛwyet.»
Dáa bɛ kala mɛwyet ɛ, wɔ gwaa bɛ zɛmɛt bɛsu ɛbuɛpe, mɛwyet mɔɔ moo saa ye neekɛk.
Bɛ ɛ́ boozɛdjóo bɛsɔ bɔɔ nadi tɔ dhiiti elɛɛd ɔ, bɛ zɛkwyee bɛ. Bɛ ɛ́ boozyɛ. Bɔɔ bela bɛsu, bhii tak, wɔ gwaa bɛ zokazɛlwoodal mɛlɛɛd mɛmbá mɔɔ, mɛlɛɛd ɛkɛɛ saa diida.
Dáa Simɔŋ Pyɛɛd nabee deenek ɛ, wɔ gwaa nyɛ zɛkwyit mɛboŋ si mɛko ɛ Yezu. Nyɛy nɛ nɛ náá: «Ghɛŋ, tɔ́a yɔ ɛtsetaɛpe nɛ nam, etɛɛ náá, mɛ ɛ́ mot mesyem.»
Etɛɛ náá, ɛkɛɛd naadyeebasa nyɛ nɛ bot ɛ nadi tin bɛ nɛ bɛ nɔɔ ɔ sama, dum nɛ yenek mbi bɛtɛ nɛ bɛsu ɛ bɛ nagó ɛ.
Ɛkɛɛd ɛ tak baazɛmɛt dɔɔ nɛ Zak nɛ Zaŋ bɔɔ Zɛbɛdɛ bot ɛ bɛ nɛ bɛ nɔɔ nadi ɔ. É di'enek Yezu ɛ́ booke nɛ Simɔŋ náá: «Nàbem ba, etɛɛ náá, kana dwoo pan mos'ak, wɔy aakadi ɛ́ lael mɛwyet étɛp ɛmet bot.»
Bhii bɛ nasel mɛlɛɛd é ɛboŋ ɛ, bɛ eezɛdhuugal esesɛɛ bɔɔ djas, bɛ eezɛdu Yezu.
Yezu nadi ɛ́, kɔ dhiiti dɛl, wɔ gwaa dhiiti mot nadi nɛ ɛbɛ́ ɛ zezam ɔ, zɛtiila pɛ daa lɛ, kwyit mɛboŋ, bhwoob si, zɛdjaala nɛ nɛ náá: «Ghɛŋ, lyem'ɔ ɛ́ kwyɛl ɔɔ, wɔ ɛ́ nɛ ghwyil ɛtsik mɛ, da nyel'am ɛ́ bula dɛɛ.»
Yezu eezɛsɛɛb mbɔ, mɛt nyɛ. Nyɛ eezɛke nɛ nɛ náá: «Mɛ eekwyɛl! Tsaka.» É di tak wat, zezam zokasi é nyel mot'enɔk.
Tin, nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛdul nyɛ mɛlɔ ɛlyelɛpe náá: «Sa wɔ ààlɛɛ mot sa dhaa wak ɛ. Tɔ́a kɛlyaal nyel pɛ daa ghaa-Zɛɛb, da wɔ ɛ́ kɛdjɛ ebuwa e bɛtit dáa Moiiz nake ɛ́. Etɛp náá, bɛ neetaŋal é di yen dum nɛ tsik wɔ zetsak ɛ.»
Tin, dék'ɛ, nabaazɛkala dhaa tyɛ kɔ mɛl djas, bot ɛbuɛpe nadi ezyɛ, zɛgwak mɛlyo mɛ Zɛɛb nɛ zɛsaa tsik pɛ daa lɛ.
Yezu nabɛ ɛ́ é ɛtetɔ́ tɔ bal é edi di ààbɛ nɛ bot ɔ, étɛp nyɛ neekɛdjaala.
Dhiiti dwoo Yezu nadi elyo bot mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb, eFalizyɛ nɛ bɛghaŋ ɛ mɛkana mɛ etsi nadus mɛl nɛ mɛl pɛ kyee dik Ghalile, nɛ Yude, zɛnɔɔ ghaada Yeluzalɛm ɔ nadi ɛ́ tin mendiindil é gwoob Yezu. Tin, ghwyil ɛ Ghɛŋ Zɛɛb nadi ɛ́ tɔ Yezu étɛp nyɛ neetsik bot ɛ mɛbɛ́.
Wɔ gwaa, bɛdhiiti bot zokazyɛ nɛ mot zesɔɔb nɛ ɛbɛ́ ɔ, byaala kɔ mwaala. Bɛ nadi esaa dáa bɛ aaniigal nyɛ tɔ ndjaa étɛp ɛkɛnɛɛg nyɛ si mɛko ɛ Yezu.
Dáa bɛ nadi ààbɛ nɛ dáa bɛ sa ɛ, wɔ gwaa, bot binɔk zokazɛbyet kɔ mii ndjaa, tuu ɛlen tɔ ɛbo, bɛ eezɛsil mbel'enɔk kɔ mwaala yɛ, kuku ɛbwak, zeza nɛ di Yezu nadi ɔ.
Dáa Yezu nabee ɛdum ɛ koŋ ɛ bot ɛ nazyɛ nɛ mbel tak ɔ, nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛke nɛ mbel náá: «Mɔɔ sɔ'am, mesyem mɔ eepelel.»
Bɛghaŋ ɛ mɛkana mɛ etsi nɛ eFalizyɛ moo tin nɛ bɛtɛ nɛ esiiza tɔ elyem. Bɔɔ náá: «Yenɔk ɛzɛ di ebyasal Zɛɛb deenek? Nwyak mot di nɛ ghwyil ɛpel mesyem mɛ sɔ mot, bhis Zɛɛb nyɛ ɛmet?»
Dáa Yezu naagu esiiza bɔɔ ɛ, nyɛ ɛ́ booke náá: «Étɛp ye bi di nɛ mbi yenek egeka?
Ɛyé di ààdyeebalyel nɛ nen, ɛke ɛ́ náá: “Mesyem mɔ eepelel” ooho, nɛghu ɛke ɛ́ náá: “Wyɛla, da wɔ ɛ́ kɛ”?
Ye goka ɛ́, bi gu náá: Sɛɛŋɛlɛ Mɔn Mot ɛ́ nɛ ghwyil ɛpel mesyem mɛ bot kɔ bɔs.» Bhii tak, nyɛ eezɛke nɛ sɔɔbela mot'enɔk náá: «Mɛ ke ɛ́ náá, wyɛla, nɔŋa mwaala yɔ, da wɔ ɛ́ sik pɛ ndjaŋ'ɔ!»
É di'enek wat, bot djas «dhuuu», nɛ mis é nyel mbel, wɔ gwaa, nyɛ zɛwyɛl, ghɛɛ mwaala nyɛ nagheghɛɛaa nɛ yɛ ɛ, zɛnɔɔ nyel, tɔ́ pɛ ndjaŋ'ɛ, nyɛy é duwal Zɛɛb.
Bot djas naadyeebadjoka, bhii tak bɛ moo duwal Zɛɛb é ɛkeke náá: «Bis dinaa ààpaabee kɔkɔ yak sok!»
Bhii tak Yezu zokazɛwyis, wɔ gwaa, nyɛ bee dhiiti nɔŋel epata e lapo, din ɛ lɛ nabɛ ɛ́ Levi, ndiindil é di mɛsa mɛ. Yezu eezɛke nɛ nɛ ɛ náá: «Dua mɛ!»
Ngbat, Levi eezɛwyɛl, nyɛ eezɛlik esesɛɛ bɛ djas, du nyɛ.
Bhii tak, Levi eezɛsa ɛbyoŋ tɔ ndjaŋ'ɛ. Bɛtɛ nɛ bɛnɔŋel ɛ epata e lapo, nɛ bɛdhiiti bot ɛbuɛpe nadi ɛ́, lɔɔg wat bɛ nɛ bɛ nɔɔ kɔ mesa.
EFalizyɛ nɛ bɛghaŋ ɛ mɛkana mɛ etsi nadi bɛ nɛ bɛ nɔɔ ɛ nadi elii ɛbiyoɛpe nɛ sa tak ɛlyelɛpe. Bɛ ɛ́ boozɛke nɛ bɛdjekel bɛ náá: «Étɛp ye bi di edɛ é di wat bi nɛ bɛnɔŋel ɛ epata e lapo nɛ bot ɛ di nɛ mbee dék ɔ?»
Yezu ɛ́ boozɛbɔɔza nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Bot ɛ di mɛnyel ɛnyɔɛpe ɔ, tok nɛ gwyes ngwomel mot étɛp nyɛ neegwom bɛ. Ye ɛ́ membel ɛ di nɛ gwyes mɛgwoma mɛ.
Mɛ nabɛ ɛ́ ààzyɛ, zɛsaa bot ɛ epiki. Mɛ nazyɛ ɛ́, zɛsaa bot ɛ di gu náá, bɛ ɛ́ bot ɛ mesyem ɔ, étɛp bɛ neeswoola mɛfulu mɔɔ.»
EFalizyɛ zokazɛdji Yezu náá: «Bɛdjekel ɛ Zaŋ Nduuel-bot nɛ bɛdjekel bis nɛ tsi edee étɛp mendjaala esok nɛ esok. Étɛp yé bɔ bɛdjekel di ààtsi edee étɛp mendjaala?»
Wɔ gwaa, Yezu zokabɔɔza nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Bi nakobee sok paa náá, bɛsɔ ɛ mwaaz tsi edee dwoo ɛba, dhi bɛ di lɔɔg wat nɛ mwaaz, mot paazyɛ zɛba moma ɔ? Mɛ ààbee deenek.
Tin, ɛwala ɛ tak ɛ́ waakum, sɔ'ɔɔ mot zyɛ zɛsa ɛba ɔ, nyɛ waadisaa tɔ lɔɔ. É di tak ɛ́ bɛ aatsi edee.»
Yezu eebaazɛbɔɔza bɛ tɔ kana náá: «Ye tok nɛ mot aanyaa kaad na bes étɛp ɛkoobal bet kaad nɛ yɛ. Yɛ sael deenek ɔɔ, pes bes kaad ɛ́ waanyaa bet kaad, tin, pes bes kaad tok nɛ ghwyil ɛlataa é bet kaad.
Ye tok nɛ mot aawa bes mɛnyok tɔ ebhɛɛb na mwa etɛɛ náá, yɛ wyil ɔ, mɛnyok ɛ́ nɛ ghwyil ɛbo ebhɛɛb. Mɛnyok waasee é bɔs tin, bhɛɛb waapulel.
Ɛnyɔ náá, mɛnyok mɛ bes waaa tɔ ebhɛɛb na bes!
Ye tok nɛ mot aakwyɛl ɛdɛ mɛnyok mɛ bes, bhis nyɛ eezedɛ mɛnyok mɛ na mwa ɔ. Ye dyeebakeaa ɛ náá: “Mɛnyok mɛ na mwa nɛ nyɔ.”»
Dhiiti dwoo saba Yezu nadi edhaa tɔ pyeeb mɛbhek mɛ di edjóoaa ble ɛ. Bɛdjekel bɛ nadi ebɔ́k mɛbhek nɛ ɛdjas yɛ tɔ mɛmbɔ mɔɔ, bhii tak, bɛ eezɛdɛ bhum tak.
Bɛdhiiti eFalizyɛ ɛ́ boozɛke nɛ Yezu náá: «Étɛp yé bi di esa sa etsi di elyak dwoo saba ɛ?»
Yezu eezɛbɔɔza nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Bi dinaa ààpaalaa dáa Dhavid nasa é sok za nasa bɛ nɛ bot bɛ ɛ?
Bɛ naani tɔ Ndjaa Zɛɛb, nyɛy zokanɔɔ emapa ee nakaŋaa Zɛɛb ɛ, dɛ, nɔɔ yak pak, djɛ bot ɛ nadi egyee bɛ nɛ nɛ ɔ. Dhi bɔɔ eezogu ɛnyɔɛpe náá, etsi lɛɛ náá, bot di egoka nɛ ɛdɛ emapa binek ɛ́, yɛ ɛ́ bɔɔ bɛmet bɛghaa-Zɛɛb.»
Yezu zokabaazɛke nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Sɛɛŋɛlɛ Mɔn Mot ɛ́ di kukuma dwoo saba.»
Dhiiti dwoo saba, Yezu eezɛni tɔ ndjaa mendjaala mɛ eYuda, nyɛ moo tin elyo bot mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb. Tɔ tak nadi ɛ́ nɛ dhiiti mot ngɔt nɛ mbɔ eghɛŋ sɔɔbela.
EFalizyɛ nɛ bɛghaŋ ɛ mɛkana mɛ etsi moo tinaak «dhuuu» nɛ mis é nyel ɛ Yezu é gwyák nɛghu nyɛ waatsik nyɛ dwoo saba, étɛp ɛbela lo mɛsɔ mɛ bɛ aapit nyɛ.
Tin, Yezu nadi egu egeka e ebhum e elyem bɔɔ. Nyɛ eezɛke nɛ mot na sɔɔbela mbɔ náá: «Wyɛla! Tyaŋa tetel tin kuku ɛbwak.» Wɔ gwaa, mot'enɔk eezɛwyɛl, nyɛ eezɛtyaa tetel.
Nyɛ eezɛdji ɛdhuu ɛ bot ɛ́ nadi tin ɔ náá: «Tɔ etsi, ɛyé di egoka nɛ ɛsael dwoo saba, enɛm esa “ohoo” embee esesɛɛ? Ɛtsik ɛ mot “ohoo”, nɛghu ɛbet náá, nyɛ gwyɛ?»
Yezu eebulal mis gwyák bɛ, bhii tak nyɛ eezɛke nɛ mot tak náá: «Sɛɛba mbɔ'ɔ.» Nyɛ eezɛsɛɛb mbɔ'ɛ, yɛ eezɛsekel, bula ɛnyɔɛpe.
Wɔ gwaa bɛghaŋ ɛ mɛkana mɛ etsi nɛ eFalizyɛ zokazɛkpaa lyem ɛlyelɛpe, bɛ moo tinaak esɔs pak'ɔɔ, edjek tyee bɛ aasa kɔ ɛsu ɛ Yezu ɛ.
É ghɛŋ tak, Yezu naazɛbyet kɔ ɛtsok étɛp ɛkɛdjaala Zɛɛb. Nyɛ naadjaala Zɛɛb tu pum tak djas.
Dáa mɛlem nakalem ɛ, nyɛ eezɛdjóo bɛdjekel bɛ. Bhii tak, nyɛ eezɛsɛ́ɛ tɔ sama yɔɔ bot kam nɛ bɛbá, nyɛ nadjóo bɛ «bot ɛ lwoma».
Min mɔɔ nabɛ ɛ́: Simɔŋ Yezu naget Pyɛɛd ɔ, zɛnɔɔ mɔn nyɛɛg Andele, Zak nɛ Zaŋ, Filip, Bhaatelemi,
Matye, Toma, Zak mɔɔ Alfe, zɛnɔɔ Simɔŋ, mot di tɔ ɛdhuu ɛ bot ɛ nadi djóoaa eZɛlɔt ɔ,
zɛnɔɔ, Yuda mɔɔ Zak, bɛ nɛ Yudas Iskaliɔt, mot aaka nyɛ ɔ.
Yezu eezɛwyeed ɛtsok bɛ nɛ bɛ nɔɔ. Nyɛ eezɛtyaa é di na sɛbɛtɛɛ, é di bɛdhiiti bɛdjekel ɛbuɛpe nadi ɔ. É di tak, ye nabaabɛ ɛ́ nɛ zukamwaa nɛ mot. Bot ɛ tak naadudus ɛ́ pɛ kyee dik Yude nɛ Yeluzalɛm, kɔ eghaada di é ngwoob boo dii mɛsɔn ɛ, pɛ Tiid nɛ Sidɔn.
Bɛ nazyɛzɛgwak embɛɛ mɛlyo mɛ Zɛɛb, dɔɔ nɛ zɛsaa tsik. Bot ɛ embee esisim nadi edhedhek ɔ, nabɛ ɛ́, bɛ naabela yɔbɔ tsik.
Bot nadi esuu ɛ́, bɛ mɛt nyɛ bɔɔ bɛ ɛmet, etɛɛ náá, dhiiti kwaambi mɛbwala nadi ewyis tɔ lɛ, é tse-tsik bɔɔ djas.
Yezu eezɛgwyák bɛdjekel bɛ, nyɛy nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Mɛnyɔ nɛ biyɔ, bɛdjel ɛ bot etɛɛ náá, Ɛyoŋ ɛ Zɛɛb ɛ́ yibɔ.
Mɛnyɔ nɛ biyɔ, bot ɛ di nɛ za nenak ɔ, etɛɛ náá, bi ɛ́ waadɛ, djil. Mɛnyɔ nɛ biyɔ, bot ɛ di edje nenak ɔ, etɛɛ náá, bi ɛ waagɔ.»
«Mɛnyɔ nɛ biyɔ, bot ɛ di ebhina bin ɔ, bɛ sɔ bin ɔ, bɛ lee bin, nɛ ɛsaab ɛ dék ɛ len, kɔ ɛsu ɛ Sɛɛŋɛlɛ Mɔn Mot ɔ.
É dwoo tak, myaalka, da bi ɛ́ bɔl zɛŋ, etɛɛ náá, boo etuud bin ɛ́ nɛɛga pɛ tɔ gwoo. Bɛbhaab bɔɔ nasesa ɛ́ deenek nɛ bɛngoolel ɛ mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb.»
«Haa kpaa-ghoŋ nɛ biyɔ, bɛkuma ɛ bot etɛɛ náá, bi nazebela yebɔ enɛm nɛ embɛɛ.
Kpaa-ghoŋ nɛ biyɔ, bot ɛ zedɛ, djil nenak ɔ, etɛɛ náá, bi aadi ɛ́ nɛ za. Haa kpaa-ghoŋ nɛ biyɔ, bot ɛ di egɔ nenak ɔ, etɛɛ náá, bi aadi ɛ́ dje.»
«Haa kpaa-ghoŋ nɛ biyɔ, yɛ bɛ náá, bot djas ɛpeduwal bin ɔ. Ye ɛ́ deenek ɛ, bɛbhaab bɔɔ nadi eduwal bɛngoolel ɛ mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb yii mɛkɔŋ.»
Yɛ bɛ biyɔ, bot ɛ di egwak mɛ ɔ, mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ náá: Kwyɛlka bot ɛ mɛbhuka men. Saka enɛm esa nɛ bot ɛ́ di ebhina bin ɔ.
Sɛɛka bot ɛ di ekal bin ɔ, mɛtel. Da bi ɛ́ baadjaala Zɛɛb étɛp bot ɛ́ di esa bin ɛbiyo ɔ.
Yɛ bɛ, mot ɛ́ nyuu wɔ bɛɛz é ɛmuk ɔɔ, baadjɛ yak kyee ɛmuk. Mot ɛ́ nɔɔ wɔ ndjookuwa ɔɔ, beta nyɛ baanɔɔ kuwa yɔ.
Gwyena nɛ mot nɛ mot di ewaab wɔ sonok ɔ. Yɛ bɛ mot eenɔɔ seeyɔ ɔɔ, sa wɔ ààkabaadu.
Saka nɛ bot tyee bi di ekwyɛl náá, bɛ sa nɛ nen ɛ.
Yɛ bɛ náá, biyɔ zokwyɛl ɛ́ bot ɛ di ekwyɛl bin ɔɔ, étɛp yé bi di ebun náá, bi djɛaa bhɔɔ? Dɔɔ nɛ bot ɛ mesyem zobaakwyɛl ɛ́, bot ɛ di ekwyɛl bɛ ɔ.
Yɛ bɛ náá, biyɔ zosa enɛm esa ɛ, nɛ bot ɛ di esa bin enɛm esa ɔɔ, étɛp yé bi di ebun náá, bi djɛaa bhɔɔ? Dɔɔ nɛ bot ɛ mesyem baasaa deenek.
Yɛ bɛ náá, bi ekola bot esonok ɛ é bwaal náá, bɛ neebaadjɛ bin yɔbɔ ɔɔ, étɛp yé bi di ebun náá, bi djɛaa bhɔɔ? Dɔɔ nɛ bot ɛ mesyem baadjɛel pak'ɔɔ ɛ fulu ɛkola, etɛɛ náá, bɛ neebulela yɛ.
Yɛ bɛ biyɔ ɔ, ye goka ɛ́, bi kwyɛl bot ɛ mɛbhuka men. Saka bɛ enɛm esa. Gwyenaka nɛ bot esa bin, ààbwaal náá, bɛ waabaabulal bin yɛ. Deenek Zɛɛb ɛ́ waadjɛ bin boo etuud. Bhii tak, bi ɛ́ waadjóoaa bɔn Zɛɛb-Mɛkaake, etɛɛ náá, nyɛ ɛ́ Zɛɛb mɛnyɔ nɛ bot ɛ lwalɛŋ, zɛɛg nɛ bɛmbee ɛ bot.
Gekeka bot ghoŋ, dáa Sɛɛg'en di egek bin ghoŋ ɛ.
«Sa bi ààdidi é pɛ́ɛ bot, deenek Zɛɛb aanàkwaapɛ́ɛ bin. Sa bi ààdidi é kwyesal bot ndjɛ sɔs, deenek Zɛɛb aanàkwaakwyesal bin ndjɛ sɔs. Pelka bot ɛbiyo ɛ bɛ di esa bin ɛ, deenek Zɛɛb ɛ́ waapel bin.
Gwyenaka nɛ bot. Deenek Zɛɛb ɛ́ waadjɛ bin ɛbuɛpe, lwoodal. Zɛɛb ɛ́ waaso tɔ boo bhwaŋ'en bɛtɛ nɛ bhum, nyɔmelaa, dital-dital, “tɔɔɔ” see. Hɛɛɛ! Zɛɛb bee ɛ́ dáa bi di elwoodal bhwaa bɛsɔ bin ɛ. Ye ɛ́ deenek ɛ nyɛ aalwoodal yebɔ bhwaa.»
Tin, Yezu eebaazɛlii nɛ nɔɔ pɛ tɔ kana náá: «Mot edhim tok nɛ ghwyil ɛdul sɔ mot edhim étɛp ɛlyaal ɛ́ nyɛ ze, deenek tɛ? Bɛ ɛ́ sa deenek ɔɔ, bɔɔ djas bɛbá ɛ́ waakɛdjoola tɔ guk.
Ye tok nɛ djekel di nɛ ghwyil ɛdhaa sɛɛg mot di elyaal nyɛ mɛsa ɔ. Tin, yɛ bɛ náá, djekel di edjek mɛsa ɔɔ, nyɛ eezedjek ɛnyɔɛpe ɔ, nyɛ aakaswaala ɛ́, nyɛ moo dáa sɛɛg mɛsa mɛ.
Étɛp yé wɔ gwyák kwyɛɛzyoŋ di tɔ dis ɛ sɔ mot, wɔ kadi ɛ́, ààbee pɛk le di tɔ dis ɛ lɔ ɛ?
Wɔ naakwaake nɛ sɔ mot náá: “Mɔɔ sɔ'am, beta, mɛ dis mɔɔ kwyɛɛzyoŋ tɔ dis ɛ lɔ,” dhi wɔy di ààbee pɛk le di tɔ yɔ dis ɛ! Wɔy mot mɛdjhaaz pɛ ɛko, bhimis pɛ si, pookodis sok pɛk le tɔ dis ɛ lɔ! Bhii tak ɛ́ wɔ aanyaa sok, étɛp wɔ needis kwyɛɛzyoŋ di tɔ dis ɛ mɔɔ sɔ ɛ.
«Mbɛɛ le ààbya mbee bhum. Tyee wat nɛ mbee le, yɛ aanàkwaabya mbɛɛ bhum.
Le djas gwyakaa ɛ́, nɛ ebhum nyɛ di edjɛ ɛ. Bhum efiigh ààbɔ́kaa kɔ le mɛgɔk. Baadi náá, bhum di saaa mɛnyok mɛ vin nɛ ye ɛ́, yɛ ààbɔ́kaa tɔ engwyinini.
Mbɛɛ mot dyeebawyisal ɛ́ embɛɛ etɛp di edus tɔ di ɛkwom ɛ di tɔ lyemɛ ɛ, kadi ɛ́ náá, mbee mot dyeebawyisal ɛ́ embee etɛp mɛbiyo mɛ di tɔ mbee lyemɛ ɛ. Etɛɛ náá, mɛkpa mɛ mot dyeebawyisal tɔ nuubɛ ɛ, ye ɛ́ mɛkpa mɛ zelwood tɔ lyemɛ ɛ.»
«Étɛp yé bi di edjóo mɛ “Ghɛŋ, Ghɛŋ”, da bi kadi ɛ́, ààsa dáa mɛ ke ɛ?
Mɛ paalyaal bin mbi mot zyɛ pɛ daa lam é gwak mɛkpa mam, da nyɛ ɛ́ kɛ tyee tak ɔ, di egoka nɛ ɛdi ɛ:
Nyɛ ɛ́ dáa mot nadi eesum ndjaa, nyɛ ɛ́ zɛben epap e tak, zɛpu bɔs ɛdimɛpe, tuula kɔ bat ɛkok ɔ. Nyɛ nakawyɛl epap ɛ́ kɔ tak, tyee bhyoŋ nakatuula ɛ, ɛbhyeeb ɛ mɛdii mɛ tak naanyuŋa é ndjaŋ'enek, ààbik, etɛɛ náá, ndjaa naasumel ɛ ɛnyɔɛpe.
Deenek, mot maa-ɛlɔ di gwak mɛkpa mam, nyɛ kadi ɛ́, ààkɛ tyee tak ɔ, nyɛ ɛ́ dáa mot nasum ndjaŋ'ɛ kɔ bɔs, ààpu ɛdimɛpe, ààbɛ ghus epap. Tyee bhyoŋ nakatuula ɛ, ndjaŋ'enek eezɛbik é di tak wat ɛ́ “syɛɛɛ”.»
Bhii Yezu nasilal ɛlii nɛ mɛdhuu mɛ bot ɛ nazemaala tin ɔ, nyɛ eezɛtɔ́ pɛ Kapɛlnaum.
Tin, dhiiti boo kukuma tɔ lɔɔg esodja eLɔm nadi ɛ́, nɛ dhiiti mot-mɛsa mɛ ngɔt nyɛ nadi ekwyɛl ɛbuɛpe ɔ. Mot-mɛsa mɛ tak nadi ebɛ́ ɛkpaŋɛpe, é siila nɛ ɛsyee.
Dáa boo kukuma esodja tak nagwak menduk ɛ Yezu ɛ, nyɛ ɛ́ boolwom bɛdhiiti bɛpaa ɛ eYuda, bɛ zɛdjóo Yezu étɛp nyɛ neezɛtsik nyɛ.
Bɛ eezɛkum pɛ dáa Yezu. Bɛ moo tin edjaala nɛ nɛ ɛlyelɛpe. Bɔɔ náá: «Mot tak goka ɛ́ náá, wɔ kwyee nyɛ.
Nyɛ nɛ kwyɛl bot ɛ mbyak'enaka. Yɛ nyɛy ɛ́ nasum ndjaa mendjaala mɛ eYuda yenaka.»
Tin, Yezu eezɛghɛɛ nyel, tɔ́ bɛ nɛ bɛ nɔɔ. Bɛ dinaa ààpaakotseta nɛ ndjaa deenek e, kukuma esodja eezɛlwom bɛsɔ bɛ, bɛ lɛɛ nyɛ náá: «Ghɛŋ, nàdhek nyel'ɔ gwyes. Mam tok mbɛɛ mot étɛp wɔ neeni tɔ ndjaŋ'am.
Étɛp tak ɛ́ mam nakuma nyel, di ààzyɛ zɛlii nɛ nɔ. Deenek, “iyeee!” Lóoa ɛkpa wat etɛɛ náá, mot-mɛsa mam neetsak.
Di mɛ di'aak, mɛ ɛ́ nɛ ekukuma bam mɛ di gwak esesɛɛ mɛ aasa ɛ́ nɛ nɔ ɔ. Pɛ si mɛko mam, mɛ ɛ́ nɛ esodja. Mɛ ke nɛ ngɔt náá: “Tɔ́ak” ɔɔ, nyɛ ɛpetɔ́. Mɛ ke nɛ nwyak náá: “Bulak” ɔɔ, nyɛ ɛpebula. Tin, mɛ ke nɛ mot-mɛsa mam: “Sa dáak” ɔɔ, nyɛ ɛpesa.»
Dáa Yezu nagwak ɛbɔɔza kukuma yenɔk ɛ, ye nabɛ ɛ́, nyɛ naadyeebakwyɛl nyɛ. Nyɛ ɛ́ boo liig mis, nyɛy nɛ ɛdhuu ɛ bot ɛ nadi egyee nɛ nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Mɛ lɛɛ náá, mɛ dinaa ààpaabee kwaambi yak ɛbwaalel nɛ Zɛɛb sok, ye nakoozobɛ kɔ dɛl ɛ Yisalaɛl.»
Bot ɛ nalwomaa ɔ, eezɛsik yɔbɔ pɛ dáa kukuma esodja, bɛ kakɛbela mot-mɛsa nadi bɛ́ ɔ, nyɛ eezetsak.
Bhii tak, Yezu eezɛtɔ́ pɛ dɛl ɛ di djóoa Nayin ɛ, bɛdjekel bɛ nɛ mɛdhuu mɛ bot ɛ nadi egyee nɛ nɛ ɔ.
Dáa nyɛ nadi, nyɛ moo é ngwoob ɛniel ɛ dɛl ɛ tak ɛ, bot ɛ dɛl nadi ezyɛ nɛ muu mot pɛ mɛvit étɛp ɛkɛdel nyɛ. Ye nabɛ ɛ́ ɛtsak ɛ mɔn dhiiti kus moma. Bot ɛ dɛl ɛ tak ɛbuɛpe nadi ɛ́, é ngwoob'ɛ.
Dáa Ghɛŋ nabee kus moma yenɔk ɛ, ghoŋ naasa nyɛ ɛbuɛpe étɛp'ɛ. Nyɛ ɛ́ booke náá: «Nàdje!»
Nyɛ eezɛtiila, wɔ gwaa nyɛ mɛt kɛs, bot ɛ nadi ebɛp kɛs ɔ, eezɛtyaa. Yezu zɛke náá: «Mɔɔ ngbaaz, mɛ lɛɛ náá: Wyɛla!»
Mot nagwyɛ ɔ eezɛgom, di ndiindil, nyɛ moo tinaak elii. Yezu eezɛbulal nyɛ é mɛmbɔ mɛ nyɛɛg.
Bot ɛ nadi tin ɔ, naadjoka ɛbuɛpe. Bɛ ɛ́ boozɛduwal Zɛɛb é ke náá: «Boo ngoolel-mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb eetuula pak'enaka. Deenek, Zɛɛb eezɛkwyee bot ɛ mbyak'ɛ!»
Bot ɛ kyee dik Yude nɛ mɛl mɛ mengwoob nɛ mengwoob nabɛ ɛ́, bɛ naagwak menduk mɛ sa Yezu nasa ɛ.
Bɛdjekel ɛ Zaŋ eezɛkaada Zaŋ etɛp binek djas. Zaŋ eezɛdjóo bɛdjekel ɛbá pak'ɔɔ.
Nyɛ eezɛlwom bɛ pɛ dáa Yezu, étɛp ɛdji Ghɛŋ náá: «Ye ɛ́ wɔy ɛ di Mɛsia nabɛ náá, nyɛ ɛpezyɛ ɔ, “ohoo” nɛghu ye baabwoodaa dhiiti baadi ezyɛ ɔ?»
Dáa bɛ nakum pɛ Yezu nadi ɛ, bɛ eezɛke nɛ nɛ náá: «Zaŋ Nduuel-bot lwom bis ɛ́, bis zɛdji wɔ náá: “Ye ɛ́ wɔy ɛ di Mɛsia nabɛ náá, nyɛ ɛpezyɛ é, ‘ohoo’ nɛghu ye baabwoodaa dhiiti baadi ezyɛ ɔ?”»
É ɛwala ɛ tak wat, Yezu zokazɛtsik bɛtɛ nɛ membel, bot ɛ nadi nɛ edjam ɔ, nɛ bot ɛ embee esisim nadi edhedhek ɔ, dɔɔ nɛ ɛbɛ́ ɛ mis mɛ bot ɛ edhim.
Bhii tak Yezu eezɛbɔɔza nɛ engoola-ngoola ɛ Zaŋ náá: «Kɛbaaŋaka nɛ Zaŋ esesɛɛ bi bee ɛ, nɛ yii bi gwak ɛ. Bot ɛ edhim moo nyaasok, bot ɛ di nɛ edjam ɔ moo kɛ ɛnyɔɛpe, bot ɛ nadi nɛ ɛbɛ́ ɛ zezam ɔ, bɛ eezetsak. Bɛ na endiila e mɛlɔ, moo gwak. Bot ɛ zegwyɛ ɔ, bɛ eezegom. Mbɛɛ Bhaadal ɛpegoolel, kɛkum pɛ daa bɛdjel ɛ bot.
Mɛnyɔ nɛ mot aadi ààdis ɛbwaalel ɛ lɛ kɔ lam ɔ!»
Bhis engoola-ngoola ɛ Zaŋ nasik ɛ, Yezu moo tin elii nɛ zukamwaa nɛ mot nadi tin ɔ kɔ ɛsu ɛ Zaŋ. Nyɛ nalɛɛ nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Bi nakɛbee yé pɛ tɔ bal? Mɔɔ le ghwaazok é dheegel nɛ pup é? Ààbɛ!
Haa ɛyé bi naakɛbee tɔ bal? Mot ngɔt nɛ vaŋ mbi bhet é? Bi nɛ gu náá, bot ɛ dyeebabɔt evaŋ e ekaad ɔ, nɛ bot ɛ di edi tɔ ekum ɔ, dyeebadi ɛ́ tɔ eboo mendjaa mɛ bɛmɛkoozi.
Ha bi nakɛbee yé? Bi nakɛbee ɛ́ ngoolel-mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb é? Nɛ tsɛɛtsɛ mɛ lɛɛ bin náá, yii bi nakɛbee ɛ, nyɛy eedhaa-dhaŋaak ngoolel-mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb.
Etɛɛ náá, Zaŋ ɛ́ mot ekwyala nalɛɛ náá: “Ɛsok nɛ wɔ nɛ tɔ́, mɛ waalwom ngoola-ngoola yam, étɛp nyɛ neekɛkoobal wɔ mɛze.”»
Yezu eebaabil náá: «Mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ etsɛɛtsɛ náá: Pɛ tɔ bot ɛ di kɔ bɔs'ak ɔ djas, ye tok nɛ mot dhaa Zaŋ Nduuel-bot. Tin, ye guaa náá, tɔ bot djas di tɔ Ɛyoŋ ɛ Zɛɛb ɔ, mot di mɔɔ dhyeeb ɔ di boo-mot nɛ nɛ.
«Bot ɛ mbyak Yisalaɛl djas nɛ bɛnɔŋel ɛ epata e lapo naagwak nyɛ, bɔɔ myaal náá, Zɛɛb ɛ́ mot epiki. Bhii tak, bɔɔ batazɛduwa Zɛɛb pɛ daa Zaŋ.
Tin, eFalizyɛ nɛ bɛlyoel ɛ etsi ɛ Zɛɛb naabyen ɛkwosak ɛ Zɛɛb étɛp'ɔɔ, bɛ naapɛɛ náá, Zaŋ duu bɛ Zɛɛb.»
Yezu eebaazɛke náá: «Mɛ gek bot ɛ mɛlu mak nɛ bɛzɛ? Bɛ baakɔa nɛ zɛ é?
Bɛ ɛ́ dáa zɛɛga bɔɔ dhyeeb mendiindil kɔ ɛbɛsɛɛ ɛ bot djas di edi ɛ. Tin, ngɔt katsim ɛ́, lɛɛ nɛ bɔɔ bɛsɔ bɛ náá: “Bis eebwom bin ngɔmbi, bi ààpabɔl. Bis eedjeeb bin mɛdjeeb mɛ ɛsyee, bi ààpadje!”
Etɛɛ náá, Zaŋ Nduuel-bot eezyɛ. Nyɛ nabɛ ààdɛ mapa, ààdɛ mɛnyok, bi kake ɛ náá: “Ye ɛ́ ɛlyeeb ɛ di esa nyɛ deenek!”
Sɛɛŋɛlɛ Mɔn Mot eezyɛ. Nyɛ ɛpedɛ yɛ edee nɛ mɛnyok, bi kake ɛ náá: “Beeka nwyak é, mɛsa mɛ ɛ́, yɛ ɛ́ ɛdɛ edee nɛ mɛnyok. Nyɛ ɛ́ mɔɔ sɔ bɛnɔŋel ɛ epata e lapo, nɛ bot ɛ di nɛ mbee tsik ɔ!”
Tin, bot djas di myaal etsoŋ e Zɛɛb ɔ, bɛ ɛpegu náá, ye ɛ́ epiki.»
Dhiiti mot Falizyɛ zokazɛdjóo Yezu, nyɛ zɛdɛ edee bɛ nɛ. Wɔ gwaa, Yezu zɛtɔ́ pɛ daa lɛ, nyɛ eezɛnɔɔ di kɔ mesa.
Pɛ kɔ dɛl ɛ tak ye nabɛ ɛ́ nɛ dhiiti moma nadi nɛ mbee dék ɔ. Dáa nyɛ nagwak náá, Yezu nadi ɛ́, kɔ mesa pɛ daa mot Falizyɛ ɛ, nyɛ eezɛzyɛ nɛ bɛɛb nasael nɛ ɛkok ɛ albat ɛ «tɔɔɔ» nɛ mɛnanas.
Nyɛ eezɛtyaa bhii koŋ ɛ Yezu, é dje si mɛko mɛ. Nyɛ moo tin ebel mɛko ɛ Yezu nɛ miŋal mɛ. Tin, nyɛ moo suŋal yɛ nɛ bhoo lo'ɛ, dɔɔ nɛ ɛboma nuub'ɛ é mɛko ɛ Yezu. Bhii tak nyɛ eezɛso mɛnanas kɔ mɛko mɛ tak.
É ghɛŋ mot Falizyɛ nadjóo Yezu náá, nyɛ zɛdɛ pɛ daa lɛ ɛ, nabee deenek ɛ, nyɛ moo tin elii tɔ lyem'ɛ náá: «Mot tak ɛpedi ɛ́ ngoolel-mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb ɔɔ, pe nyɛ eegu mbi moma mɛt nyɛ'aak. Pe nyɛ eegu náá, nyɛ ɛ́ moma na mbee dék!»
Yezu eezɛke nɛ mot Falizyɛ yenɔk náá: «Simɔŋ, mɛ ɛ́ nɛ sa wat mɛ di kwyɛl ɛlɛɛ wɔ.» Simɔŋ eezɛke nɛ nɛ náá: «Bela, liia lyoel.»
Yezu eezɛke nɛ nɛ náá: «Mot ngɔt naakola bot ɛbá epata. Ngɔt nakola ɛ́, epata bɛmil ɛtɛn, dhiiti tak epata bɛmil mɛkam-mɛtɛn.
Dáa bɔɔ djas nadi ààbɛ nɛ ghwyil ɛbulal epata tak ɛ, nakuma epata ɛ́ boopel kola bɔɔ djas bɛbá. Pɛ tɔ bot ɛbá binɔk ɛzɛ aakwyɛl mot'enɔk dhaa tyɛ?»
Simɔŋ eezɛbɔɔza náá: «Yɛ bɛ mam ɔ, mɛ gek ɛ́ náá, yɛ aadi ɛ́, mot nakola epata ɛbuɛpe ɔ.» Yezu eezɛbɔɔza nɛ nɛ náá: «Simɔŋ, wɔ ɛ́ nɛ gham.»
Bhii tak nyɛ eezɛliig mis, gwyák moma tak. Nyɛy nɛ Simɔŋ náá: «Wɔ eebee moma yak é? Mɛ eeni tɔ ndjaŋ'ɔ, wɔ ààpadjɛ mɛ mɛdii mɛ ɛgwyii ɛ mɛko. Gwyáka! Nyɛ eegwyii mɛ mɛko nɛ miŋal mɛ, bhii tak nyɛ eesuŋal yɛ nɛ bhoo'ɛ.
Wɔ ààpaboma nuub'ɔ é mɛmuk mam. Yɛ kabɛ nyɛy ɔ, dáa mɛ looni wak mos ɛ, nyɛ ààpakat ɛboma nuub'ɛ é mɛko mam.
Wɔ ààpalɔɔb mɛ mul kɔ lo. Yɛ kabɛ nyɛy ɔ, nyɛ eelɔɔb mɛ mɛnanas é mɛko!
Étɛp tak ɛ́ mɛ di lɛɛ wɔ náá: Bɛtɛ nɛ mesyem mɛ eepelel! Étɛp tak ɛ́ nyɛ lyaal boo kwyɛl deenek. Mot pelaa ba bim ɔ, zobaalyaal ɛ́ ba bim kwyɛl.»
Yezu ɛ́ boozɛke nɛ moma tak náá: «Mesyem mɔ, eepelel.»
Bot ɛ bɛ nɛ bɛ nɔɔ nadi kɔ mesa ɔ moo tin elii pak'ɔɔ náá: «Nwyak ɛ́ nwyaa kwaambi mot di nɛ ghwyil ɛpel mesyem mɛ bot'aak?»
Tin, Yezu eezɛke nɛ moma yenɔk náá: «Ɛmyaal ɛ lɔ eetsik wɔ. Tɔ́a tɔ egwyem.»
Bhii tak, Yezu eezɛtɔ́ kɛgoola bot Mbɛɛ Bhaadal Ɛyoŋ ɛ Zɛɛb pɛ tɔ eghaada nɛ kɔ bɔɔ mɛl, bɛ nɛ bɛdjekel bɛ kam nɛ bɛbá,
zɛnɔɔ bɛdhiiti boa nyɛ nawyisal embee esisim tɔ lɔɔ ɔ, nɛ bot nyɛ natsik bɛ ɔ. Ye nabɛ ɛ́ Maali di djóoaa Maali mot dɛl ɛ Makdala ɔ, mot esisim etɛn nɛ ebá nasɔaa tɔ lɛ ɔ,
Zan, mwaa Kuuza, ngɔt tɔ lɔɔg ekukuma di sa mɛsa tɔ ndjaa mɛkoozi Elood ɔ, Suuzan, nɛ bɛtɛ nɛ bɛdhiiti boa nadi ekwyee Yezu nɛ bɛdjekel bɛ nɛ esa e bɔɔ met.
Zukamwaa nɛ mot nadus mɛl nɛ mɛl ɔ, naazɛsaala é bhaaz ɛ Yezu. Wɔ gwaa Yezu zɛkan kana yak:
«Dhiiti mot ngɔt zokazɛtɔ́, kɛmwam mɛbhek tɔ pyeeb'ɛ. Tyee nyɛ nadi emwam ɛ, dhiiti kyee bhek eezɛkwyit é ze. Haa kpaa-ghoŋ nɛ bhek'enek, bhii tak, enen ɛ zɛdɛ yɛ.
Dhiiti kyee bhek kakwyit ɛ́, kɔ bɔs di nɛ bat mɛkok ɛ. Tyee bhek'enek nakwyit ɛ, ye ɛ́ boozɛsyee, etɛɛ náá, é di tak, bɔs nadi ɛ́ ghas.
Dhiiti yak kyee bhek kazɛkwyit ɛ́ tɔ engwyinini. Bhek tak eezɛkwyil lɔɔg wat nɛ engwyinini. Dikel engwyinini e tak eeboozɛgó yɛ.
Ghuna dhiiti kyee bhek naazɛkwyit é mbɛɛ bɔs. Tyee yɛ nawyee ɛ, bhek nɛ bhek naadjɛ bhum bɛdhet ɛbuɛpe.» Bhii Yezu nasilal kana yenek ɛ, nyɛ eezɛke náá: «Gwakeka ɛnyɔɛpe, bi ɛ́ di nɛ mɛlɔ étɛp ɛgwak ɔɔ.»
Bɛdjekel ɛ Yezu zokazɛdji nyɛ ɛsuk ɛ kana tak.
Wɔ gwaa nyɛ zɛbɔɔza nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Biyɔ, bi eezedjɛaa etsoŋ e ɛgu ɛsuk ɛ Ɛyoŋ ɛ Zɛɛb. Yɛ bɛ bɛsɔ bin ɔ, bɛ gwak yɛ ɛ tɔ ekana. Deenek, “Bɛ ɛ́ nɛ ghwyil ɛgwyák nɛ mis, ààbee. Bɛ ɛ́ nɛ ghwyil ɛgwak nɛ mɛlɔ, ààpiibal sa di kwyɛl ɛlɛɛ ɛ.”»
«Gwakeka ɛsuk ɛ kana tak: Bhek ɛ́ mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb.
Mɛbhek mɛ nakwyit é ngwoob gba ɛ, ye ɛ́ dáa bot ɛ di egwak mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb, da Dim Mot Mɛkɔŋ ɛ́ zɛdis bɛ yɛ tɔ ebhum e elyem ɔ, étɛp ɛkaab náá, bɛ ɛ́ zɛkɛdum koŋ nɛ Zɛɛb, da bɛ ɛ́ tsak.
Mɛbhek nakwyit kɔ bɔs di nɛ bat ɛkok ɛ́ dáa bot ɛ di egwak mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb ɔ, bɛ dja yɛ ɛ nɛ mɛmyaala. Ghuna bɛ ààbet náá, ye tyaa “zik”. Bɛ dyeebamyaal yɛ ɛ, é ba mɔɔ ɛwala batsa, kasɛka ɛ́, é di mɛbhowal aakatuula ɔ, bɛ eekat ɛdum koŋ nɛ Zɛɛb.
Bhek nakwyit tɔ engwyinini ɛ, ye ɛ́ dáa mbi bot ɛ di egwak mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb ɔ, bhii tak, bɛ kawak ɛ́ tete ze kɔ ɛsu ɛ embee esiiza, nɛ ekum e bɔs'ak, nɛ mɛnyɔ mɛ tsik bɔs'ak. Bɛ tok nɛ ghwyil ɛdjɛ tɛtɛ ebhum.
Bhek kwyit kɔ mbɛɛ bɔs kwyɛl ɛlyaal ɛ, bot ɛ di egwak mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb, da bɛ ɛ́ wa lyem é ɛbaal ɛ yɛ, da bɛ ɛ́ kɛ mbɛɛ kyeed, bɛ aadjɛ mbɛɛ ebhum ɛ.»
«Mot ɛ́ nɛ ghwyil ɛtuub lama, da nyɛ ɛ́ butal yɛ nɛ mɔɔ bhe, nɛghu ɛnɔɔ yɛ, da wa pɛ si goŋ é? Ye nɛɛgaa ɛ́, pɛ kɔ tɛɛg etɛɛ náá, bot ɛ di ni tɔ ndjaŋ ɔ, needi tɔ gwyɛ.
Esa ee di tɔ sɔ ɛ djas aadi ɛ́, wyis é gwyɛ mwos dwoo. Esa e mɛsɔ djas aadi ɛ́, nyen é gwyɛ.
Dika nɛ etsoŋ dum nɛ etɛp djas bi di egwak ɛ! Etɛɛ náá, mot aadi nɛ ba bim sonok ɔ, bɛ waabil nyɛ dhiiti. Tin, mot kwaadi ààbɛ nɛ sonok ɔ, bɛ aadis nyɛ ba bim djas nyɛ di nɛ yɛ ɛ.»
Nyɛɛg ɛ Yezu nɛ bɔn nyɛɛg zokazyɛ, zɛbela Yezu. Bɛ eezɛtyaa pɛ kel etɛɛ náá, ze ɛdhaa étɛp bɛ neekɛboma nɛ Yezu nadi ɛ́, ɛkɔɔlaɛpe étɛp mɛbu mɛ bot.
Deenek, bɛ eezɛlɛɛ Yezu náá: «Nyoog nɛ bɔn nyoog ɛ́ metetel pɛ kel, bɛ ɛpekwyɛl ɛboma nɛ nɔ.»
Wɔ gwaa Yezu zɛbɔɔza nɛ bot djas náá: «Nyaag'am nɛ mɔn nyaag'am ɛ́ bot ɛ di egwak mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb, da looba nɛ yɛ ɔ.»
Dhiiti dwoo, Yezu eezɛni tɔ boo elɛɛd bɛ nɛ bɛdjekel bɛ. Bhii tak nyɛ eezɛke nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Djhoosɛɛka, tɔ́ pɛ yii kyiid boo soob na djato-djato.» Bhii tak bɛ eezɛtɔ́.
Dáa bɛ nadi ekɛ tɔ elɛɛd ɛ, gɔ eezɛbe Yezu. Kasɛka ɛ́, boo ghuu ɛlyelɛpe eezɛkan ɛpupal kɔ dii. Mɛpupal mɛ ghuu tak eeghɛɛ ɛbhyeeb ɛ mɛdii kɛɛza é elɛɛd, elɛɛd moo tin eni mɛdii. Mɛdii mɛ tak ɛkɛɛ sa yɛ aalwoodal-lwoodelak elɛɛd, bɛ moo tin pak tsik nɛ ɛsyee.
Bɛdjekel ɛ Yezu eezɛtiila pɛ daa lɛ, bɛ eezɛdjem nyɛ nɛ etsim: «Ghɛŋ, Ghɛŋ, mena ɛ́ di esik'aak!» Tin, Yezu eezɛdjem. Bhii tak, nyɛ eezɛbhɛm ghuu nɛ ɛbhyeeb. É di'enek, ghuu eezɛsila, bhwak moo tin «kup».
Bhii tak, Yezu eezɛke nɛ bɛdjekel bɛ náá: «Ɛmyaal ɛ len ɛ́ wo?» Ye nabɛ ɛ́ boo bwoo naamɛt bɛ, bɛ naadyeebadjoka dhaa nyel. Bɛ moo tin edjinel pak'ɔɔ náá: «Nwyak ɛ́ nwyaa kwaa mbi mot di náá, dɔɔ nɛ ghuu nɛ mɛdii ɛpegwak nyɛ?»
Yezu nɛ bɛdjekel bɛ eezɛkum pɛ kyee dik Ghadasa di di egwyákel nɛ kyee dik Ghalile ɛ.
Dáa Yezu nadi esul tɔ elɛɛd ɛ, dhiiti mot dɛl tak zokazyɛ, zɛboma nɛ nɛ. Mot tak nabɛ ɛ́ nɛ embee esisim nadi dhedhek nyɛ ɛ. Nyɛ nabɛ ɛ́ ààbɛ nɛ ekaad é nyel, ààkadidi tɔ ndjaa. Nyɛ nakadidi ɛ́ tɔ mɛvit.
Dáa nyɛ nabee Yezu ɛ, wɔ gwaa nyɛ zɛbo tsim. Nyɛ eezɛkwyit mɛboŋ si mɛko mɛ. Nyɛ eezɛbo tsim, nyɛy nɛ nɛ, náá: «Mena ɛ́ nɛ yaa tɛp, Yezu, Mɔn Zɛɛb-Mɛkaake? Mɛ ɛpedjaala nɛ nɔ, nàtwak mɛ!»
Yezu eezɛke nɛ mbee sisim náá, nyɛ wyis tɔ lɛ, etɛɛ náá, ye nabɛ ɛ́, mbee sisim tak eezeloobe di tɔ lɛ. Nyɛ nadi ɛ́ kɔɔla mɛmbɔ nɛ mɛko nɛ eghwooz étɛp nyɛ neemɛtaa é di wat. Mot tak nabebwak yɛ ɛ bwakak. Da mbee sisim tak ɛ́ kazyeegal nyɛ, kyeed nyɛ tɔ bal.
Yezu zokazɛdji nyɛ náá: «Din ɛ lɔ ɛ́ ɛyé?» Nyɛ eezɛbɔɔza nɛ nɛ náá: «Yam din ɛ́ “Mɛkɔm-mɛkɔm”», etɛɛ náá, bɛtɛ nɛ embee sisim naani tɔ lɛ.
Tin, embee esisim nadi edjaala nɛ Yezu náá, nyɛ nàkyeed bɛ tɔ guk di ààbɛ nɛ ɛsik ɛ.
É di tak, ye nabɛ ɛ́ nɛ boo ɛsaŋ ɛ bɛghwyee nadi é ɛgɔɔ kɔ mɛtsok menek ɔ. Embee esisim eezɛdjaala nɛ Yezu, náá, nyɛ kyeed bɛ tɔ mɛnyel mɛ bɛghwyee binɔk. Yezu zokamyaal bɛ.
Tin, wɔ gwaa embee esisim zɛwyis tɔ mot'enɔk, ni tɔ ɛsaŋ ɛ bɛghwyee binɔk. Bɔɔ djas eezɛsul nɛ ekaab pɛ bɛ nadi kɔ ɛkalel ɛtsok ɛ. Wɔ gwaa bɛ zɛges, kɛghaaga tɔ dii, diida. Bɔɔ djas si na «bhɛɛɛ».
Dáa bot ɛ nadi ebaal mɛsaa mɛ bɛghwyee binɔk nabee edjema binek djas ɛ, bɛ ɛ́ boozɛtsema nɛ ekaab, sik, kɛlɛɛ bot kɔ eghaada nɛ kɔ bɔɔ mɛl.
Bot zokawyis tɔ́ kɛbee sa nasɛ́ɛ ɛ. Bɛ eezɛkum pɛ kyee Yezu nadi ɛ́. Tin, bɛ eezɛbee mot na embee esisim mɛkɔm-mɛkɔm nawyis tɔ lɛ ɔ, ndiindil é ngwoob ɛ Yezu, nyɛy nɛ ekaad é nyel. Nyɛy nyel ɛnyɔɛpe. Wɔ gwaa, bwoo zɛmɛt bɔɔ djas.
Bot ɛ nabee edjema binek djas ɔ, moo tin ebaŋa dáa mot na embee esisim mɛkɔm-mɛkɔm natsak ɛ.
Tin, bot ɛ kyee dik'enek djas zokazɛdjaala nɛ Yezu náá, nyɛ dus kɔ kyee dik'ɔɔ, etɛɛ náá, ye naadyeebakpaa bɛ boo ɛkɛɛd. Bhii tak, Yezu eezɛni tɔ elɛɛd, nɔɔ nyel'ɛ, sik.
Mot na embee esisim nawyis tɔ lɛ ɔ booke nɛ nɛ náá: «Mɛ kwyɛl ɛ́, mena gyeeka lɔɔg wat.» Yezu ɛ́ boozɛswaal nyɛ. Nyɛ ɛ́ booke nɛ nɛ náá:
«Sika pɛ ndjaŋ'ɔ, da wɔ ɛ́ kɛlɛɛ enɛm nɛ embɛɛ Zɛɛb sa wɔ ɛ.» Mot'enɔk eezɛtɔ́, nyɛ moo tin ekɛtuud kɔ ghaada djas dáa Yezu natsik nyɛ ɛ́.
Dáa Yezu nabula pɛ yak kyiid dii ɛ, wɔ gwaa zukamwaa nɛ mot baazɛboma nɛ nɛ, etɛɛ náá, bɛ nadi ebwood nyɛ.
Dhiiti mot, din ɛ lɛ nabɛ ɛ́ Zayilus. Nyɛ nadi ɛ́, kukuma ndjaa mendjaala mɛ eYuda. Nyɛ eezɛkwyit mɛboŋ si mɛko ɛ Yezu, é djaala nɛ nɛ, nyɛ zyɛ pɛ ndjaŋ'ɛ,
etɛɛ náá, nyɛ nabɛ ɛ́ nɛ sim ɛsyes ɛ lɛ ngɔt, mɔn membu kam nɛ ebá nadi ebɛ́ ɛkpaŋɛpe pak tsik nɛ ɛsyee. Dáa Yezu nadi etɔ́ ɛ, zukamwaa nɛ mot nadi edu nyɛ, bak eghuŋa nyɛ é nyel, bak tak etiidal nyɛ.
Ghuna tɔ ɛdhuu ɛ bot binɔk, ye nabɛ ɛ́ nɛ dhiiti moma, ghiya nadi ekekɛk nyɛ é nyel boa, ààbɛ nɛ ɛtsek ɔ. Ɛbɛ́ ɛ tak naasa nɛ nɛ tyee membu kam nɛ ebá. Nyɛ naasilal epata bɛ djas tɔ mendjaa mɛ mɛgwoma ɛbuɛpe, ɛbɛ́ ààsi. Ye nabɛ ààbɛ nɛ mot nakwak ɛgwom ɛbɛ́ ɛ tak.
Nyɛ eezɛdu Yezu bhii koŋ, zyɛ, zɛmɛt kyee ɛghɔ ɛ kaad'ɛ wat. Mɛta nyɛ nazomɛt ɛ, é di tak wat, ghiya eezɛtsek.
Yezu eezɛdji náá: «Ɛzɛ mɛt mɛ?» Wɔ gwaa bot djas kɛla, Pyɛɛd eezɛke náá: «Ghɛŋ, beea kwaambi zukamwaa nɛ mot di etiidal wɔ ekyee djas'aak.»
Deenek, Yezu eezɛke náá: «Tsɛɛtsɛ mot eekwyɛt mɛ, etɛɛ náá, mɛ eegwyak náá, dhiiti pes mɛbwala eewyis tɔ lam.»
Dáa moma tak nagu náá, nyɛ eepanaa ɛ, moma tak eezɛtiila, nyɛ moo pwak nɛ bwoo. Bhii tak, nyɛ eezɛkwyit mɛboŋ si, si mɛko ɛ Yezu. Nyɛ eezɛmyam é mis mɛ bot djas, tin, nyɛ moo elɛɛ nɛ bot djas étɛp yé nyɛ namɛt kaad ɛ Yezu ɛ, nɛ dáa nyɛ nakatsak é di tak wat ɛ.
Wɔ gwaa Yezu eezɛke nɛ nɛ náá: «Ɛsyes ɛ lam, ɛdum ɛ koŋ ɛ lɔ nɛ Zɛɛb eetsik wɔ. Tɔ́a tɔ egwyem.»
Tinaak, Yezu dinaa elii, ngoola-ngoola ngɔt eezɛdus pɛ ndjaŋ ɛ kukuma ndjaa mendjaala mɛ eYuda, zɛlɛɛ nyɛ náá: «Ɛsyes ɛ lɔ eezepɛka. Nàkabaadhek lyoel.»
Yezu nabɛ ààbis sa bɛ nadi elii ɛ. Nyɛ ɛ́ boozɛke nɛ Zayilus náá: «Nàbem ba. Duma koŋ nɛ Zɛɛb, nyɛ waatsak!»
Dáa nyɛ nakum pɛ ndjaŋ ɛ, nyɛ eezɛlu bot djas náá, bɛ nàni tɔ ndjaa. Nyɛ nazomyaal ɛ́, bɛdjekel bɛ, Pyɛɛd, Zaŋ nɛ Zak, zɛnɔɔ sɛɛg nɛ nyɛɛg mɔn.
Bot djas, metetel nɛ mɛgwyɛ, nɛ etaŋal nɛ etsim. É di'enek Yezu ɛ́ booke nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Nàdjeka. Mɔn ààpagwyɛ. Nyɛ ɛ́ é gɔ́.»
Wɔ gwaa bot gɔ nyɛ etɛɛ náá, bɛ nadi egu náá, mɔn naazegwyɛ.
Nyɛ eezɛmɛt mɔn é mbɔ, nyɛ eezɛben gwood. Nyɛy nɛ nɛ náá: «Mɔn'am, wyɛla!»
É di tak wat, mɔn'enɔk eezɛgom, nyɛ eezɛwyɛl. Bhii tak, nyɛ ɛ́ boolwom bɛ náá, bɛ djɛ mɔn tak edee e dek.
Tin, ye nabɛ ɛ́, sɛɛg nɛ nyɛɛg naadyeebadjoka ɛlyelɛpe. Yezu eezɛlyak bɛ náá, bɛ nàlɛɛ bot sa nasael ɛ.
Yezu eezɛsɛɛg bɛdjekel bɛ kam nɛ bɛbá, nyɛ eezɛdjɛ bɛ ghwyil nɛ eghɛŋ ɛsɔ embee esisim nɛ ɛtsik ɛ bot ɛ mɛbɛ́.
Bhii tak nyɛ eezɛlwom bɛ, bɛ kɛgoola Mbɛɛ Bhaadal Ɛyoŋ ɛ Zɛɛb, nɛ ɛtsik ɛ membel.
Nyɛ eezɛdjɛ bɛ etsi náá: «Sa mot àànɔɔ sonok wat, nyɛ neetɔ́ nɛ yɛ mɛdjoŋ. Sa mot àànɔɔ sek, àànɔɔ ɛkoo, àànɔɔ mapa, kɛyaka nɛ epata tɔ mengwyɛ men. Sa mot ààdi nɛ ekuwa ebá.
Tɔ edi djas bot aamyaal náá, bi sulal ɛ, dika tɔ ndjaa tak, kɛkum dwoo bi aadus tin ɛ.
Mɛl djas bot aapɛɛ náá, bi nàsulal pɛ daa lɔɔ ɔ, kpaaka yibɔ, da bi ɛ́ kut bɛ piib mɛko men. Yɛ aadi ɛ́, tyee mwana étɛp embee esesɛɛ bɔɔ.»
Bɛdjekel eezɛtɔ́ pɛ mɛl djas, kɛlɛɛ bot Mbɛɛ Bhaadal, nɛ ɛtsik ɛ bɛtɛ nɛ membel é edi djas.
Tin, Elood mot nadi mɛkoozi kɔ kyee dik Ghalile ɔ, naagwak menduk mɛ etɛp binek djas. Nyɛ nabɛ ɛ́ ààkagu sa nyɛ gek ɛ, etɛɛ náá, bɛdhiiti bot nadyeebake náá: «Zaŋ Nduuel-bot nagwyɛ ɔ, naazegom.»
Bak náá: «Ye ɛ́ ngoolel-mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb, Eli, eebaatuula!» Yak kyee bot náá: «Ye ɛ́ ngoolel-mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb na mwa, eezegom!»
Elood ɛ́ boozɛke náá: «Ye nabɛ ɛ́ mam ɛmet naazelwom náá, bɛ tsak Zaŋ Nduuel-bot. Ha yenɔk ɛ́ nwyaa mot? Mot mɛ di egwak bot é lii etɛp bak ko ɛsu ɛ lɛ'aak ɛ́ zɛ?» Nyɛ nadi esaa nyɛ neebee Yezu.
Bot ɛ lwoma zokazɛbula pɛ daa Yezu, bɛ moo tin é baŋa nyɛ esesɛɛ ee bɛ nasa ɛ. Yezu ɛ́ boozɛdul bɛdjekel bɛ, tɔ́ nɛ nɔɔ é ngwoob dhiiti ghaada di edjóoaa Bhɛtsaida ɛ.
Ghuna bot ɛbuɛpe naagu ze bɛ nadi tɔ́ ɛ, bɛ ɛ boozɛdu bɛ. Yezu zokazɛboma nɛ nɔɔ. Bhii tak, nyɛ moo tin é lyo bɛ dum nɛ Ɛyoŋ ɛ Zɛɛb, nɛ ɛtsik ɛ bot ɛ nadi kwos mɛtsika ɔ.
Dáa dwoo nabɛ ye moo sila ɛ, bɛdjekel bɛ kam nɛ bɛbá ɛ́ boozɛtiila pɛ daa lɛ. Bɔɔ nɛ nɛ náá: «Swaala bot bak, bɛ tɔ́ pɛ kɔ mɛl nɛ pɛ tɔ epɛt eedi pak nɛ wak ɛ, etɛɛ náá, penek bɛ waakɛ bela di ndjɔk nɛ edee e dek, etɛɛ náá, menaka wak ɛ́ tɔ bal.»
É di'enek, Yezu eezɛbɔɔza nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Djɛka bɛ edee biyɔ bɛ ɛmet!» Bɛ eezɛbaake nɛ Yezu náá: «Bis zokalik ɛ́, nɛ emapa etɛn, zɛnɔɔ bɛsu ɛbá. Wɔ kwyɛl bilak ɛ́ náá, bis kɛɛbɔm edee ee bot bak djas ee?»
É di'enek, mɛtaŋ mɛ bot naakum tyee botom bɛmil ɛtɛn. Tin, Yezu ɛ́ boozɛlɛɛ bɛdjekel bɛ náá: «Dhilka bot djas mendiindil, zɛɛga bot mɛkam-mɛtɛɛ-tɛn e di wat.»
Bɛdjekel ɛ́ boozɛsa dáa Yezu nake ɛ. Bɛ eezɛdil bɛ si.
Bhii tak, Yezu zɛnɔɔ emapa etɛn nɛ bɛsu ɛbá binek, nyɛ eezɛben mis pɛ ɛko, zɛghaapɛɛ Zɛɛb étɛp edee binek. Nyɛ eezɛpyak mapa, nɔɔ, djɛ bɛdjekel bɛ, bɛ kaa bot djas.
Mot nɛ mot naadɛ, djil. Bɛdjekel zokabula nɛ mɛbhwaa kam nɛ ebá yii mɛbhubhwak.
Dhiiti dwoo, dáa Yezu nadi é djaala nɛ Zɛɛb e dhiiti sum di ɛ, bɛdjekel nadi ɛ́, bɛ nɛ nɛ. Nyɛ eezɛdji bɛ náá: «Mɛdhuu mɛ bot ke náá, mam ɛ́ zɛ?»
Bɛ eezɛbɔɔza nɛ nɛ náá: «Bak ke ɛ́ náá, wɔ ɛ́ Zaŋ Nduuel-bot. Bɛdhiiti náá, wɔ ɛ́ ngoolel-mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb Eli. Bɛdhiiti pe ka baake ɛ náá: Wɔ ɛ́ ngɔt tɔ bɛngoolel-mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb ee na mwa zegom ɔ.»
Yezu eezɛdji bɛ náá: «Yɛ kabɛ biyɔ ɔ, bi ke náá, mam ɛ́ zɛ?» Pyɛɛd eezɛbɔɔza nɛ nɛ náá: «Wɔ ɛ́ Mɛsia Zɛɛb nadhis ɔ.»
Yezu eezɛdul bɛ mɛlɔ ɛlyelɛpe, nyɛ eezɛke nɛ nɔɔ náá, sa bɛ ààlɛɛ bot.
Bhii tak nyɛ eebaazɛbil náá: «Ye goka ɛ́ Sɛɛŋɛlɛ Mɔn Mot zukaa ɛbuɛpe. Bɛpaa, nɛ eboo bɛghaa-Zɛɛb, zɛnɔɔ bɛghaŋ ɛ mɛkana mɛ etsi ɛ́ waabhina nyɛ. Nyɛ waagóaa. Mɛlu mɛlɛl bhis ɛsyee ɛ lɛ, nyɛ waagom.»
Bhii tak, Yezu eezɛlii nɛ bɔɔ djas náá: «Yɛ bɛ náá, mot ngɔt ɛpekwyɛl ɛdu ɛ mɛ ɔ, nyɛ bet ɛkwyɛɛg ɛ nyel'ɛ, da nyɛ ɛ́ bɛp mɛlaaba mɛ mɛlu djas, da nyɛ ɛ́ du mɛ.
Etɛɛ náá, mot di ekwyɛl ɛtsik nyel'ɛ ɔɔ, nyɛ aanàkwaabela tsik, mot ɛ́ myaal ɛsu ɛ tsik nyel'ɛ étɛp'am ɔɔ, nyɛ waabela tsik.
Mot ɛbela mɛvu mɛ bɔs djas, da nyɛ ɛ́ gel nyel'ɛ ɛmet ɔɔ, nɛghu ɛpul ɛ nyel ɔɔ, ye ɛ́ tɛtɛ yé nyɛ sa?
Mot aagwak sen étɛp'am nɛ étɛp mɛkpa mam ɔ, tin, mam Sɛɛŋɛlɛ Mɔn Mot ɛ́ waagwak sen étɛp'ɛ dwoo mɛ aazyɛ tɔ duma yam ɛ, nɛ tɔ duma Saag'am nɛ efofop na dɛɛ ɛ.
Mɛ lɛɛ bin nɛ tsɛɛtsɛ náá: Tɔ sama bot ɛ di wak'aak, bɛdhiiti aanàkwaagwyɛ, bɔɔ ààbee Ɛyoŋ ɛ Zɛɛb.»
Ye naasa tyee yenga wat bhii nyɛ naalii deenek ɛ, Yezu zɛnɔɔ Pyɛɛd, nɛ Zaŋ, zɛnɔɔ Zak, nyɛ eezɛbyet kɔ dhiiti ɛtsok étɛp ɛdjaala nɛ Zɛɛb.
Esok Yezu nadi edjaala ɛ, bhwoob'ɛ zokaaaswoola; ekaad bɛ moo puu, ɛkasɛpe dáa ngwyes bhi.
Kasɛka tin ɛ́, bot ɛbá é bhaaz'ɛ, bɔɔ elɛɛ elɛŋ nɛ Yezu. Ye nabɛ ɛ́ Moiiz bɛ nɛ Eli.
Bɛ eezɛtuula kuku mɛkas ɛ Zɛɛb. Bɛ nɛ Yezu nadi elii dum nɛ tyee nyɛ aasilal lwomel'ɛ ɛ, nɛ dáa nyɛ aakɛgwyɛ pɛ Yeluzalɛm ɛ.
Tinaak, Pyɛɛd nɛ bot ɛ lɔɔg'ɛ eezɛduma tɔ gɔ́, «syaaz». Dáa bɛ nakadjem ɛ, bɛ eezɛbee mɛkas ɛ Yezu nɛ bot ɛbá bɛ nɛ bɛ nɔɔ nadi ɔ.
É di nabɛ náá, bot binɔk moo é lik Yezu ɔ, Pyɛɛd eezɛke nɛ nɛ náá: «Ghɛŋ, ye goka ɛ́ náá, mena di wak. Djhoosumka epɛt elɛl: Wat yɔ, dhiiti yii Moiiz, dhiiti kadi ɛ́ yii Eli.» Tinaak, nyɛ nadi ɛ́, ààgu sa nyɛ nadi eke ɛ.
É di nyɛ nadi elii deenek ɔ, eguud eezɛsul, zɛbutal bɛ. Bɛdjekel ɛ́ boozɛgwak bwoo é ɛbee dáa eguud di ebutal bɛ ɛ.
Tɔ eguud binek, gwood zokagék náá: «Nwyak ɛ́ Mɔn'am mɛ nazetɔ ɔ. Gwakeka nyɛ.»
Bhii gwood nazegék ɛ, ye nakalik ɛ́, Yezu nyɛ ɛmet. Bɛdjekel ɛ́ boozɛsyel tɛp tak, é ghɛŋ tak, bɛ nabɛ ɛ́ ààbaŋa bot etɛp ee bɛ nabee ɛ.
É yak ɛlu Yezu bɛ nɛ bɛdjekel ɛlɛl binɔk moo é sul ɛtsok ɛlenek, wɔ gwaa zukamwaa nɛ mot zɛboma nɛ nɛ.
Tɔ ɛdhuu ɛ bot binɔk, mot ngɔt moo tin etsim: «Lyoel, mɛ ɛpedjaala nɛ nɔ, kɛla mis kɔ mɔn'am. Ye ɛ́ sim mɔn'am!
Etɛɛ náá, mbee sisim ɛ́ mɛt nyɛ ɔ, é di tak wat nyɛ ɛpekyeeb, bhii tak, ye ɛ́ kadheeg nyɛ ɛlyelɛpe, é di'enek mɛwyil moo tin ewyis é nuub mɔn. Mbee sisim tak ɛpezuk nyɛ ɛlyelɛpe, ɛdus ɛ lɛ tin nɛ lyel.
Ye bɛ ɛ́, mɛ eedjala nɛ bɛdjekel bɔ náá, bɛ sɔ mbee sisim tak. Bɛ ààpakwak yɛ.»
Yezu eezɛke nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Embee bot, bot di ààdum koŋ nɛ Zɛɛb ɔ! Mɛlu mɛdhen kalik nɛ nam é ɛdi tɔ len? Baabela náá, mɛlu mɛdhen mɛ di egoka nɛ ɛmaad bin? Dha mɛ nɛ mɔn'ɔ wak.»
Dáa mɔɔ tak nazokunaa nɛ Yezu ɛ, wɔ gwaa mbee sisim zɛghɛɛg nyɛ si. Bhii tak ye moo zɛdheeg mɔn'enɔk ɛlyelɛpe na «buku-kuku». Tin, Yezu eezɛbhɛm mbee sisim tak, mɔn eezɛtsak. Bhii tak Yezu eezɛbulal nyɛ é mɛmbɔ mɛ sɛɛg.
Ye nabɛ ɛ́ bot naadyeebadjoka mɛbwala mɛ Zɛɛb tin. Dáa ye bɛ náá, mot nɛ mot nabɛ ɛ́, nyɛ dinaa edjoka nɛ ɛsɔs etɛp djas Yezu nadi esa ɛ, Yezu ɛ́ boolɛɛ nɛ bɛdjekel bɛ náá:
«Bɛɛka mɛlɔ men ɛnyɔɛpe étɛp bi neebaal sa mɛ aalɛɛ bin ɛ: Ye kalik ɛ́ batsa Sɛɛŋɛlɛ Mɔn Mot neekaaa é mɛmbɔ mɛ bot.»
É di'enek, bɛdjekel nabɛ ɛ́, ààmɛt lo tɛp nyɛ nalɛɛ bɛ ɛ, etɛɛ náá, ɛsuk ɛ tak nadi bɛ ɛ́ syela étɛp bɛ needi ààmɛt yɛ. Bɛ nadi ɛ́ nɛ bwoo ɛdji ɛ Yezu tɛp'enek.
Bɛdjekel moo tin ebe mɛso pak'ɔɔ étɛp bɛ neegu tɔ sama yɔɔ, ɛzɛ di boo-mot.
Yezu eezɛgu sa nadi edhaa pak'ɔɔ ɛ, wɔ gwaa nyɛ zɛnɔɔ mɔɔ dhyeeb, nɛɛg nyɛ é ngwoob'ɛ.
Nyɛy nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Mot ɛ́ myaal mɔn'ak kɔ ɛsu ɛ kwyɛl nyɛ di nɛ yɛ nɛ nam ɔ, nyɛ myaal ɛ́ mam. Tin bela náá, mot ɛ́ myaal mɛ ɔ, nyɛ myaal ɛ́, mot nadhis mɛ ɔ. Etɛɛ náá, mot di mɔɔ dhyeeb pak biyɔ djas ɔ, ye ɛ́ nyɛy ɛ di boo mot.»
Zaŋ eezɛke nɛ Yezu náá: «Ghɛŋ, bis eebee dhiiti mot esɔ embee esisim nɛ din ɛ lɔ. Bis eelyak nyɛ, etɛɛ náá, nyɛ ààkɛ lɔɔg wat mena nɛ bɛ nɔɔ.»
Tin, Yezu eezɛbɔɔza nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Sa mot ààlyak nyɛ, etɛɛ náá, mot di ààbhina bin ɔ, yenɔk ɛ́ mot'en.»
Dáa ɛlu ɛ nabɛ náá, nyɛ neebyet tɔ gwoo ɛ, nadi yɛ eezekunaa ɛ, Yezu ɛ́ boozɛke nɛ lyemɛ wat náá: Nyɛ ɛpetɔ́ pɛ Yeluzalɛm.
Nyɛ ɛ́ bookyeed engoola-ngoola mɛbhaadal pɛ sok. Engoola-ngoola eezɛtɔ́, bɛ eezɛni tɔ dhiiti dɛl pɛ kyee dik Samali étɛp bɛ neekoobal nyɛ di, nɛ esesɛɛ djas.
Tin, bot ɛ dɛl zokabyen náá, nyɛ nàsulal kɔ dɛl ɛ tak, etɛɛ náá, nyɛ nadi etɔ́ pɛ kyee dik Yeluzalɛm.
Dáa Zak nɛ Zaŋ bɛdjekel bɛ nagwak deenek ɛ, bɛ ɛ́ boozɛke náá: «Ghɛŋ, wɔ ɛpekwyɛl náá, bis djóo du, dus tɔ gwoo étɛp ye neezɛdik bɛ?»
Yezu eezɛliig mis, bhɛm bɛ. Bhii tak, nyɛ moo edul bɛ mɛlɔ.
Bɛ eezɛtɔ́ pɛ dhiiti dɛl.
Yezu bɛ nɛ bot ɛ nadi egyee nɛ nɛ ɔ gba-gba kuku kyeed, wɔ gwaa dhiiti mot zokake nɛ nɛ náá: «Mɛ ɛpekwyɛl ɛdu ɛ wɔ é di djas wɔ aatɔ́ ɛ.»
Yezu zokazɛbɔɔza nɛ nɛ náá: «Bɛbhɛk ɛ́ nɛ eku, enen ɛ́ nɛ mɛk. Kabela náá, Sɛɛŋɛlɛ Mɔn Mot tok nɛ di nyɛ di edjaasi nɛ ɛwala ɛ.»
Nyɛ eezɛke nɛ nwyak dhiiti mot náá: «Dua mɛ.» Mot'enɔk eezɛbɔɔza nɛ nɛ náá: «Ghɛŋ, pookobet mɛ, mɛ pookokɛdel sok saag'am.»
Yezu eezɛbɔɔza nɛ nɛ náá: «Beta bot ɛ zegwyɛ ɔ bɛ del myoŋ mɔɔ. Yɛ bɛ wɔy ɔ, tɔ́a, kɛlyaal bot Ɛyoŋ ɛ Zɛɛb.»
Nwyak dhiiti mot eebaake yɛ náá: «Ghɛŋ, mɛ waadu wɔ. Pookobet náá, mɛ kɛ ɛmwana nɛ bot ɛ mɛbyel mam.»
Yezu eezɛbɔɔza nɛ nɛ náá: «Mot zemɛt awata, da nyɛ baake náá, nyɛ bulal mis, gwyák pɛ bhis ɔ, yenɔk tak ààpakɔa nɛ Ɛyoŋ ɛ Zɛɛb.»
Bhii tak Ghɛŋ eebaazɛsɛ́ɛ bɛdjekel mɛkam-mɛtɛn nɛ mɛkam-mɛmbá nɛ ebá. Nyɛ eezɛlwom bɛ bɛbá-bɛbá pɛ tɔ eghaada nɛ kɔ mɛl mɛ Yezu nabɛ náá, nyɛ aadhaŋ ɛ.
Nyɛ eezɛke nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Pyeeb nɛ bɔk. Bot ɛ mɛsa ààbu. Ye goka ɛ́ bi djaala náá, nakuma pyeeb nyɛ dhis bɛdhiiti bot ɛ mɛsa étɛp bɛ needis edee tɔ pyeeb.
Tɔ́ka! Mɛ kyeed bin tin ɛ́, dáa bɔɔ ebhata tɔ eben.
Sa mot àànɔɔ ngwyɛ epata, àànɔɔ ɛkoo, àànɔɔ-nɔŋak dɔɔ nɛ mɛpapa. Sa mot ààbe tyɛ étɛp mɛswosel e ze.
Pɛ tɔ mendjaa mɛ bi aani ɛ, keka sok náá: “Betka náá, egwyem di tɔ ndjaŋ'ak!”
É di'enek, mot di nɛ egwyem ɔ di tin ɔ, egwyem bin ɛ́ waakala kɔ lɛ. Yɛ kabɛ náá, mot egwyem tok tin ɔ, egwyem bin ɛ́ waabula pɛ daa len.
Sulalka tɔ ndjaa mot egwyem é tak. Bi ɛ́ djɛaa mɛdii nɛ edee ɔɔ, da bi ɛ́ dɛ yɛ, etɛɛ náá, mot-mɛsa goka ɛ́ nɛ ɛbela etuud e mɛsa mɛ. Sa mot ààkɛ mendjaa nɛ mendjaa.
Bi ɛ́ ni kɔ dɛl, da bɛ ɛ́ myaal bin ɔ, dɛka edee bɛ aadjɛ bin ɛ.
Tsikeka bot ɛ mɛbɛ́ di kɔ dɛl ɛ tak ɔ, da bi ɛ́ lɛɛ bot ɛ dɛl náá: “Ɛyoŋ ɛ Zɛɛb eezekunaa nɛ nen.”
Pɛ kɔ bɛdhiiti mɛl mɛ bi aani, da bot ɛ́ mɛl mɛ tak ɛpɛɛ náá, bi nàsulal pɛ daa lɔɔ ɛ, tɔ́ka kɔ ɛbɛsɛɛ ɛ dɛl, da bi ɛ́ lɛɛ nɛ nɔɔ náá:
“Bis ɛpekut piib mɛko mes. Ye ɛ́ piib dɛl ɛ len zenaata bis é mɛko ɛ. Ye goka ɛ́ náá, bi gu náá, Ɛyoŋ ɛ Zɛɛb moo ɛ́ ɛkunaaɛpe nɛ nen.”
Mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ tsɛɛtsɛ náá: Dwoo Zɛɛb aazɛpɛ́ɛ bot ɛ, bot ɛ dɛl ɛlak ɛ́ waapɛ́ɛaa ɛ́ ɛlyelɛpe dhaa bot ɛ dɛl ɛ Sodɔm.»
«Haa kpaa-ghoŋ nɛ nɔ, ghaada Koodazin! Haa kpaa-ghoŋ nɛ nɔ, ghaada Bhɛtsaida! Etɛɛ náá, endem e mɛbwala mɛ nasael pɛ yebɔ ɛpedi náá, ye nasael ɛ́ pɛ ghaada Tiid nɛ pɛ Sidɔn ɔ, pe bot ɛ mɛl menɔk eeloobɔt kaad ɛpum, pe bɛ naazelɔɔba mɛsii, pe bɛ naaloozeliig elyem bɔɔ.
Étɛp tak ɛ́ mɛ di elɛɛ bin náá, dwoo bot aadi pɛ́ɛaa ɛ́, yebɔ mɛpɛ́ɛa waadhaa yii Tiid nɛ Sidɔn nɛ mɛlyel.
Kapɛlnaum! Yɛ kabɛ wɔy ɔ, egeka bɔ ɛ́ náá, wɔ ɛ́ nɛ ghwyil ɛbyet, tɔ́ pɛ ɛko? Wɔ waasila pɛ si, batakɛkum dɛl ɛ myoŋ mɛ bot.»
Nyɛ eebaazɛke nɛ bɛdjekel bɛ náá: «Mot aagwak bin ɔ, nyɛ eegwak mɛ. Mot ɛ byen bin ɔ, nyɛ byen ɛ́ mam. Tin, mot ɛ byen mɛ ɔ, nyɛ eebyen mot nadhis mɛ ɔ.»
Bɛdjekel mɛkam-mɛtɛn nɛ mɛkam-mɛmbá nɛ ebá nalwomaa ɔ, bɛ eezɛbula nɛ mɛmyaala djas. Bɔɔ nɛ Yezu náá: «Ghɛŋ, dɔɔ nɛ embee esisim ɛpegwak bis esok bis di elii nɛ nɔɔ é ghwyil din ɛ lɔ ɛ!»
Yezu eezɛbɔɔza nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Mɛ di ɛ́, ebee Satan eedus pɛ ɛko sila pɛ kɔ bɔs tyee ngwyes bhi.
Gwakeka: Mɛ eedjɛ bin eghɛŋ ɛkɛ kɔ bɛnyɔ, ebaalwɔl, dɔɔ nɛ ɛkɛ kɔ ghwyil mot mɛbhuka men. Ye tok nɛ sa yɛ aasa bin.
Tin, nàmyaalaka, etɛɛ náá: Embee esisim ɛpegwak bin. Bi goka nɛ ɛmyaala ɛ́, yɛ bɛ náá, min men ɛ́ kwyalaa tɔ gwoo ɔ.»
É ghɛŋ tak, Yezu naazɛbela boo mɛmyaala Sisim na Dɛɛ nadjɛ nyɛ ɛ́. Nyɛ eezɛtsim: «Hee Saag'am, Ghɛŋ gwoo nɛ bɔs. Mɛ eeghaapɛɛ wɔ, étɛp náá, wɔ eelyaal bɔɔ dhyeeb esesɛɛ ee di esyela é mis mɛ bɛtsoŋ ɛ bot nɛ bot ɛ mɛtselal ɛ. Nɛ tsɛɛtsɛ, Saag'am, wɔ nɛ kwyɛl náá, eesael deenek.
«Saag'am naadjɛ mɛ esonok djas. Ye tok nɛ mot di egu Mɔn, yɛ di ààbɛ Sɛɛg ɔ. Tin, mot aanàkwaagu náá, Sɛɛg ɛzɛ, yɛ di ààbɛ Mɔn ɔ, nɛ bot ɛ Mɔn aakwyɛl ɛlyaal bɛ nwyak ɔ.»
Bhii tak Yezu eezɛliig mis, gwyák bɛdjekel, nyɛy nɛ nɔɔ, bɔɔ bɛmet náá: «Mɛnyɔ nɛ biyɔ, etɛɛ náá, bi ɛpebee sa bi di ebee'enek!
Etɛɛ náá, mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ́ tsɛɛtsɛ náá, bɛtɛ nɛ bɛngoolel ɛ mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb nɛ bɛmɛkoozi ɛbuɛpe nadi ɛ́, nɛ gwyes ɛbee esa ee bi di ebee'aak. Saabɛgɔs nɛ nɔɔ ɛ́ náá, bɛ nabɛ ɛ́ ààbee. Bɛ nadi ɛ́ nɛ gwyes ɛgwak sa bi di egwak mos'ak, saabɛgɔs nɛ nɔɔ ɛ́ náá, bɛ nabɛ ààgwak.»
Dhiiti lyoel etsi e Zɛɛb naazɛwyɛl, lii, étɛp ɛbhowal ɛ Yezu. Nyɛ eezɛdji nyɛ náá: «Lyoel, mɛ sa dáa étɛp mɛ neebela tsik na kɔm-kɔm?»
Yezu kabɔɔza nɛ nɛ náá: «Haa, yé nakwyalel tɔ mɛkana mɛ etsi bina? Wɔ gwak dáa tɔ tak?»
Mot'enɔk zɛbɔɔza náá: «“Wɔ goka ɛ́ wɔ kwyɛl Ghɛŋ, Zɛɛb'ɔ nɛ lyem'ɔ djas, nɛ sisim'ɔ djas, nɛ ghwyil'ɔ djas, nɛ ɛtselal ɛ lɔ djas.” Zɛnɔɔ náá: “Wɔ goka ɛ́ wɔ kwyɛl sɔɔ mot dáa wɔ di ekwyɛl nyel'ɔ met ɛ.”»
Yezu ɛ́ bookake nɛ nɛ náá: «Wɔ ɛ́ bɔɔza ɛnyɔɛpe. Sa deenek, wɔ neebela tsik na kɔm-kɔm.»
Ghuna ghaa mɛkana mɛ etsi ɛ Zɛɛb nakwyɛl ɛ́, nyɛ neebela gham. Nyɛ ɛ́ boodji Yezu náá: «Sɔ'am mot ɛzɛ?»
Yezu kadjɛ nyɛ kana ɛ́ náá: «Dhiiti motom nadi edus pɛ Yeluzalɛm, eesul pɛ Yeliko. Wɔ gwaa bot ɛ djii zɛmɛt nyɛ, duma nyɛ é nyel nɛ mɛbin, bɔɔ zɛdɛk nyɛ esa bɛ djas. Bɛ eezɛkaab, lik nyɛ ekɔɔ nɛ ɛsyee.
Dhiiti ghaa-Zɛɛb nadi edhaa é ze'enek tyee zɛm-dhyee. É ghɛŋ nyɛ nabee mot'enɔk ɛ, nyɛ eezɛgwoob, tɔ́ yɛ.
Tyee wat nɛ dhiiti Lɛvit eezɛkwyil é di'enek, bee mot mɛpyoŋ, gwoob nyɛ, tɔ́ yɛ.
Tin, dhiiti mot dɛl ɛ Samali nadi etɔ́ yɛ mɛdjoŋ ɔ nazɛkum é ngwoob mot mɛpyoŋ menɔk. Dáa nyɛ nakabee nyɛ ɛ́, wɔ gwaa ghoŋ zɛmɛt nyɛ ɛlyelɛpe.
Nyɛ eebaazɛtiila é bhaaz'ɛ, zɛso nyɛ mɛnyok nɛ mul tɔ mɛpyoŋ, zɛdjɛl nyɛ yɛ ɛ́. Bhii tak, nyɛ eezɛkɛl nyɛ kɔ yaaga yɛ, tɔ́ nɛ nɛ pɛ ndjaa bɛdjoŋ. Tin, nyɛ eezɛgwom nyɛ ɛnyɔɛpe.
Yii myɛn, mot dɛl ɛ Samali yenɔk eezɛwyisal ghwooz epata mɛdil ebá, zokadjɛ nakuma ndjaa bɛdjoŋ. Nyɛy nɛ nɛ náá: “Gwoma motom'ak. Epata djas ee wɔ aadi ebaawyisal étɛp'ɛ ɛ, mɛ waaboobulal wɔ yɛ ɛ́, dwoo mɛ aabula ɛ.”»
Yezu eebaazɛdji náá: «Tɔ bɔɔ bɛlɛl, ɛzɛ kɔa nɛ ɛdi ɛ́ mɔɔ sɔ mot bot ɛ djii namɛt ɔ?»
Ghaa etsi zokabɔɔza náá: «Yɛ ɛ́ mot nagek nyɛ ghoŋ ɔ.» Yezu ɛ́ booke nɛ nɛ náá: «Tɔ́a, da wɔ ɛ́ sa deenek.»
Dáa Yezu nadi é ze, bɛ nɛ bɛdjekel bɛ ɛ, wɔ gwaa bɛ zokazɛni tɔ dhiiti dɛl. Tɔ dɛl ɛ tak ye nabɛ ɛ́ nɛ dhiiti moma din ɛ lɛ nabɛ ɛ́ Maat. Nyɛ eezɛsulal pɛ daa lɛ.
Nyɛ nabɛ ɛ́ nɛ dhyeeb, din ɛ lɛ nabɛ ɛ́ Maali. Maali tak nadi ɛ́ si mɛko ɛ Ghɛŋ Yezu é gwak mɛlyo mɛ.
Ye kabela ɛ́ náá, Maat nadi eghuula étɛp ɛdjaab ɛ edee e bɛdjoŋ. Maat ɛ́ boozyɛ zɛke nɛ Yezu náá: «Ghɛŋ, wɔ ààbee dáa dhyeeb'am dhuugal mɛ nɛ bɛtɛ nɛ yak mɛsa mam mɛ ɛmet'aak é? Lɛɛa nyɛ náá, nyɛ kwyee mɛ.»
Ghɛŋ eezɛbɔɔza nɛ nɛ náá: «Maat, Maat, wɔ ɛpebem ba é etɛp e gwyes, lyem'ɔ ɛpesɔs etɛp ɛbuɛpe yii toto.
Ye ɛ́ nɛ sonok wat di nɛ boo mɛtaŋ. Maali sɛ́ɛ sa di nɛ boo mɛtaŋ ɛ. Yiizaag ɛ́ di náá, mot tok nɛ ghwyil ɛ dɛk nyɛ yɛ ɛ́.»
Dhiiti dwoo, Yezu nadi edjaala é dhiiti di. Dáa nyɛ nasilal ɛ, djekelɛ ngɔt eezɛke nyɛ náá: «Ghɛŋ, lyaala bis ɛdjaala Zɛɛb, dáa Zaŋ nalyaal bɛdjekel bɛ ɛ.»
Yezu eezɛke nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Bi ɛ́ di edjaala ɔ, keka náá: “Zɛɛb Sɛɛg'es, din ɛ lɔ di Dɛɛ ye guaa. Ɛyoŋ ɛ lɔ zyɛ.
Djɛ bis ɛlu nɛ ɛlu edee di egoka nɛ nes ɛ.
Pela bis mesyem mes etɛɛ náá, bisɔ ɛpepel bot ɛ nasa bis mɛbiyo ɔ. Sa wɔ ààbet bis tɔ mɛbhowal.”»
Yezu eezɛbaake nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Djhoopookogek tyee náá: mot ngɔt pak'en ɛ́ nɛ sɔ, nyɛ eezɛtɔ́ pɛ daa lɛ kuku pum. Nyɛ eezɛke nɛ nɛ náá: “Sɔ'am, djema! Kola mɛ emapa elɛl,
etɛɛ náá, dhiiti sɔ'am ngɔt nadi é mɛndjoŋ ɔ, aloo nɛ tuula nenak pɛ daa lam. Mɛ tok nɛ edee mɛ djɛ nyɛ.”
Djhoopookogekeka náá: Sɔ'ɛ eezɛbɔɔza nɛ nɛ tɔ ndjaŋ'ɛ náá: “Beta mɛ gwyem! Ɛbɛ ɛ ndjaa moo ɛ́ kɔɔla nɛ ɛngoŋ. Bis nɛ bɔn moo ɛ́ ‘kpop’ mendjaa me si. Mɛ aanàkwaawyɛl, zɛdjɛ wɔ emapa é tak!”
Mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ tsɛɛtsɛ náá, yɛ bɛ náá, nyɛ di ààwyɛl zɛdjɛ nyɛ ɛ́, kɔ ɛsu ɛ ɛsɔ ɛ bɛ nɛ nɛ ɔ, nyɛ waabatawyɛl, zɛdjɛ nyɛ sa nyɛ saŋ ɛ́, etɛɛ náá, sɔ ɛpenaada ɛwaab, ààbɛ nɛ sen.
Yɛ bɛ mam ɔ, mɛ kalɛɛ bin ɛ náá: Waabka, bi ɛ waadjɛaa. Saaka, bi ɛ waabela. Diigka é ɛbɛ ɛ ndjaa, bɛ waadii bin ye ɛ́.
Ye ɛ́ deenek, mot aawaab ɔ, nyɛ waadjɛaa. Mot aasaŋ ɔ, nyɛ waabela. Bɛ dii ndjaŋ ɛ́, nɛ mot diig ɔ.
«Yɛ bɛ náá, dhiiti mot pak'en ɛ́ sɛɛg mɔn ɔ, mɔn ɛ́ waab su ɔɔ, nyɛ nɛ ghwyil ɛdjɛ mɔn nyɔ é di tak é?
Yɛ kabɛ náá, mɔn waab ɛ́ ɛke ɔɔ, nyɛ ɛ́ nɛ ghwyil ɛdjɛ nyɛ baalɔɔl é di tak é? Yɛ aanàkwaasael.
Kwyii biyɔ, bɛmbee ɛ bot bi di ɛ, bi nɛ gu ɛdjɛ embɛɛ esonok nɛ bɔn bin, gwyasa nɛ Sɛɛg'en di tɔ gwoo ɔ, nyɛ waadjɛ Sisim na Dɛɛ nɛ mot aawaab ɔ.»
Dhiiti dwoo, Yezu nadi esɔ mbee sisim nanɛɛg dhiiti mot bubu ɛ. Wɔ gwaa mbee sisim zokawyis tɔ mot'enɔk, bubu mot'enɔk moo tin é lii. Tin, ɛdhuu ɛ bot ɛ nadi tin ɔ moo tin é djoka.
É di'enek, bot ɛ nadi tin ɔ moo tin é ke pak'ɔɔ náá: «Ye ɛ́ Bɛlzebul, kukuma embee esisim, ɛ di edjɛ kɔkɔ yak mbi mɛbwala mɛ nyɛ di esɔ embee esisim nɛ ye ɛ́!»
Bɛdhiiti nadi ekwyɛl ɛlóo ɛ nyɛ pɛ ɛko, da ɛ́ bwood nyɛ pɛ kyɛ. Bɛ ɛ́ boolɛɛ nɛ nɛ náá: «Sa bis dhiiti ɛtseŋa mɛbwala di elyaal náá, Zɛɛb ɛ́ nadhis wɔ ɛ!»
Tin, Yezu nabɛ ɛ́, eegu egeka e elyem bɔɔ. Nyɛ ɛ́ booke nɛ nɔɔ náá: «Ɛyoŋ ɛ di náá, mɛsa mɛ bot ɛ tak ɛwaya pak'ɔɔ ɛ, ɛyoŋ ɛ tak aanàkwaadi. Bɔn bil wat tak ɛ waagonel pak'ɔɔ.
Yɛ bɛ náá, Satan ɛ́ di etwak nyel'ɛ nyɛ met ɔɔ, ɛyoŋ ɛ lɛ aapyet dáa? Etɛɛ náá, bi ke ɛ́ náá, mɛ twak embee esisim ɛ nɛ ghwyil ɛ Bɛlzebul djɛ mɛ ɛ.
Yɛ bɛ náá, mɛ sɔ embee esisim ɛ́ nɛ ghwyil ɛ Bɛlzebul ɔɔ, haa yebɔ bot aasɔ embee esisim nɛ yaa ghwyil? Étɛp tak ɛ́ di náá, bot bin bɔɔ bɛmet aadi ɛ́ bɛtetɛp bin.
Nɛ tsɛɛtsɛ mɛ lɛɛ bin ɛ náá: Ye ɛ́ nɛ ghwyil ɛ Zɛɛb ɛ mɛ di esɔ embee esisim. Ye kwyɛl ɛlyaal ɛ́ náá: Ɛyoŋ ɛ Zɛɛb eezekum tɔ len.
«Yɛ bɛ náá, mot ghwyil di nɛ mɛkoo mɛ dɛɛb ɛ di ebaal ndjaŋ'ɛ ɔɔ, esa bɛ ɛ́ waabaalaa ɛnyɔɛpe.
Yɛ kabɛ náá, dhiiti mot di dhaa nyɛ nɛ ghwyil eezyɛ ɔɔ, nyɛ kwak ɛbhaad nyɛ si ɔ, bhii tak, nyɛ kadɛk nyɛ mɛkoo mɛ dɛɛb mɛ nyɛ nadi ebe-bwaal ɛ. Tin, nyɛ kanɔɔ esa bɛ djas ɛ́ kaa.
«Mot ɛ di ààdi bis nɛ nɛ ɔ, nyɛ ɛ́ mot mɛbhuka mam. Zɛnɔɔ náá, mot di ààkwyee mɛ nɛ ɛsɛɛg ɔ, waaz ɛ waaz'aak.»
«É sok mbee sisim di ewyis tɔ nyel mot ɛ, ye dyeebawyis ɛ́ tɔ́, tɔ di di ààbɛ nɛ mɛdii ɔ, é kɛsaa di yɛ aakɛwala ɔ. Yɛ di ààbela di ɔɔ, yɛ kake ɛ́ náá: “Mɛ pookosik pɛ ndjaŋ'am, ndjaa mɛ nawyis tɔ tak ɛ.”
Tin, sika yɛ aakasik ɛ, ye kabela ndjaa tak ɛ́, toto, waabela, koobela.
É di'enek, ye katɔ́, kɛnɔɔ bɛdhiiti embee esisim etɛn nɛ ebá di edhaa yɛ nɛ embee mɛsa ɔ. Tin, bɔɔ djas kazɛni ɛ́ tɔ ndjaa bɛ bela di ɛdisi ɔ. É di'enek, tsik mot'enɔk kazɛpulel dhaa-dhaŋak tyee nabɛ sok ɛ.»
Dáa Yezu nadi elii deenek ɛ, dhiiti moma zokazɛben gwood tɔ ɛdhuu ɛ bot, nyɛy nɛ nɛ náá: «Mɛnyɔ nɛ moma nabɛp ɛbum ɛ lɔ ɔ! Mɛnyɔ nɛ mɛbel mɛ wɔ nadɛɛ!»
Tin, Yezu eezɛbɔɔza nɛ nɛ náá: «Mɛnyɔ nɛ nen, bot ɛ di egwak mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb, da bi ɛ́ kɛ dáa Zɛɛb di ekwyɛl ɛ.»
Dáa mɛdhuu mɛ bot nadi esaala é ngwoob ɛ Yezu ɛ, nyɛ moo tin é ke náá: «Bot ɛ di kɔ bɔs'ak mos'aak àànyɔ bot. Bɛ ɛpewaab dhiiti tseŋa mɛbwala mɛ Zɛɛb. Bɛ aanàkwaakobee dhiiti wat, yɛ di ààbɛ yii nabɛ ye ɛ́ ngoolel-mɛkpa ɛ Zɛɛb Yonas ɔ.
Deenek, tyee wat Yonas nadi tseŋa é mis mɛ bot ɛ ghaada Niniv ɛ, deenek ɛ́ Sɛɛŋɛlɛ Mɔn Mot aadi tseŋa étɛp bot ɛ di kɔ bɔs'ak mos'ak.
